, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is the rogue who\nsaid menstruating women can go to Sabarimala because now there are no tigers in\nthe forest<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balls to this rascal !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is your intention\nthat invokes karma good or bad.. If you take away intention, then there is no\nkarma. If you genuinely didn\u2019t mean to harm or hurt someone, then the law of\nkarma is now absent</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is a universal\nlaw; it cannot be broken.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is intention that\ncreates karma. Good intentions will always create \u201cgood karma\u201d. You can hide\nyour intentions from others but not from yourself or the universe. You are a\nsmall cog within many other cogs. When you move, you move all the other cogs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is about\nconsciousness and quantum physics. There is NO dogma or superstition here</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma is\nenmeshed with Karma\u2014as &nbsp;karma gives us\nhope, in this lifetime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma doctrine makes\nSanatana Dharma a great religion. Karma gives hope. There is NO eternal hell in\nSanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is the physical\nmanifestation of the law of balance and harmony, as it applies to the results\nof decisions reached and attitudes held by beings capable of free will and\nchoice<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is an unbreakable\nlaw of the cosmos. You deserve everything that happens to you, good or bad. You\ncreated your happiness and your misery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your intentional actions\ncreate your future. What you are experiencing right now is what karma wants you\nto experience<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--Qn2RwcVmtU/WmSMER_092I/AAAAAAABYJQ/KHiV0sle6RUQdPGUMDxKNCqTazMF-LHEQCLcBGAs/s1600/53a6b24f4f00ffi56644403d0f86402699.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"935\" data-original-width=\"918\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--Qn2RwcVmtU/WmSMER_092I/AAAAAAABYJQ/KHiV0sle6RUQdPGUMDxKNCqTazMF-LHEQCLcBGAs/s400/53a6b24f4f00ffi56644403d0f86402699.jpg\" width=\"392\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can\u2019t escape from\nyour past, but learning from it will change your future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is real. Karma is\nyour bond with the past. Karma teaches you and makes your knowledge of the\nworld more complete.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guilt is a form of\npunishment. &nbsp;Guilt deprives man of REM\nsleep.&nbsp; Painful results in your life come\nfrom actions you took that clashed with the laws of the universe. The pain\ndrives home the lesson.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--tnEDyTUBOE/WmSKtfmQA6I/AAAAAAABYIw/7dS_T3b5xJIxp6QAhuzy9YKTdi6OvFo2QCLcBGAs/s1600/imafges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--tnEDyTUBOE/WmSKtfmQA6I/AAAAAAABYIw/7dS_T3b5xJIxp6QAhuzy9YKTdi6OvFo2QCLcBGAs/s1600/imafges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole universe is\nobserving you<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma treats everyone\nequally. You won\u2019t get special treatment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A clear conscience\ncannot be bought from a moment of regret or shame. If you want forgiveness for\nyour actions you must first take responsibility for them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Feeling sorry for what\nyou did sends a signal to the universe. You must mean what you say.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No matter how bad you\nhave been, you can always begin again. You can only erase bad karma with\nregret, then practice kindness and love. There is no other way.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kIn6n-oJKas/WmSNR2J5MVI/AAAAAAABYJ0/6-8VMrgzvT4i3VKi7fGgRerto9SROIzZQCLcBGAs/s1600/394998cd3ab509f420ef687984dd0ab4c--einstein-quotes-quantum-physics.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"236\" data-original-width=\"236\" height=\"636\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kIn6n-oJKas/WmSNR2J5MVI/AAAAAAABYJ0/6-8VMrgzvT4i3VKi7fGgRerto9SROIzZQCLcBGAs/s640/394998cd3ab509f420ef687984dd0ab4c--einstein-quotes-quantum-physics.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you ever harmed\nanyone, ask them for forgiveness. Their forgiveness will dissolve any bad karma\nand turn it into good karma. Your guilt will disappear. You will feel\nwonderful.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you hate or\ndislike someone, it creates negativity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No one can harm you\nwhen your intentions are pure. The universe wants harmony. It seeks balance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Feel for those who are\njealous of you. Have respect for their jealousy as they think so highly of you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are counting your blessings instead of their own. They are not jealous of\nyou but what you represent, what they always wanted to be.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forgiving jealousy is\ngood karma. They are hurting themselves, not you. If you are attractive or\ngreat in some way, sympathize with those who are not. Jealousy is also a test.\nHow will you react to those who are jealous of you?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negativity is a sign of\njealousy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma plants a seed.\nOver time it will grow. At just the right moment, the exact moment, you will\nreceive your karma. Karma makes you experience what you have done to others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember the purpose of\nkarma is not revenge. The universe is not vengeful. The purpose of karma is to\nhelp you become a better person.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The consequences of\nyour actions good or bad may will follow you into the next life. God has not\ntreated all the same.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kumari Mayawati\ncannot bitch why Aishwarya Rai is more beautiful than her\u2014these are matters of\nFATE.. Remember, it is impossible to avoid your karmic destiny<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Destiny is created by\nman's thoughts, habits and character. There is every chance for his correction\nand improvement by changing his thoughts and habits. The scoundrel can become a\nsaint<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Doctrine of Karma\nonly can bring solace, contentment, peace and strength to the afflicted and the\ndesperate. It solves our difficulties and problems of life. It gives\nencouragement to the hopeless and the forlorn. It pushes a man to right\nthinking, right speech and right action<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most important part\nof your life will be the unseen random acts of kindness you performed. A person\nwho will put money in a box only if cameras are on him\u2014or will donate for\ncharity only if his name comes in the donors list in a newspaper\u2014this fellow\u2019s\nnegative karmic baggage increases<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember, when you give\ncharity\u2014let it be unknown to all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Give when you can without\nhesitating. You don\u2019t have to be seen by others..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kindness gives others\nhope. Your inconvenience is minor if you stop to help someone. But for them it\nmeans a great deal. Kindness is the most valuable gift you can give to someone.\nIt changes them. By lifting up someone in need you automatically lift yourself.\nIn that instant, you make the world a better place.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Next time when you are\ndriving, try giving a lift to someone whom you always ignored\u2014someone who cannot\ngive you any help<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-48HsGJzP97k/WmSLNBkVfzI/AAAAAAABYJA/ytWsKf476FIOD_ar3kVcHykSibWJ0F9GwCLcBGAs/s1600/masxresdefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"900\" data-original-width=\"1600\" height=\"225\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-48HsGJzP97k/WmSLNBkVfzI/AAAAAAABYJA/ytWsKf476FIOD_ar3kVcHykSibWJ0F9GwCLcBGAs/s400/masxresdefault.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You have free will.\nTherefore your future cannot already be written. That would not be fair. Life\ngives you chances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rewriting your karma\ninvolves becoming conscious of your inner thoughts, feelings and beliefs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mindfulness is the most\npowerful technique of all. Spend time every day learning how to observe your\ninner chatter without identifying with it. This leads to self-awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Develop a sense of\ngratitude. Count your blessings \u2013not your sorrows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stop resisting life and\nother people. Get out of your own way. Learn to flow with life and all of its\nlessons, painful or not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be fair.&nbsp; As a ship captain at sea, I was always FAIR\u2014and\nsailors remember me for this. They knew that captain does NOT care for any\nrulebook when it came to be fair<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having a sense of\npurpose gives us direction, hope and empowerment. Listen to your soul and the\nmission it has for you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our thoughts create our\nreality. Think negative thoughts, and our lives will be full of negativity<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xwFSI9zoSvE/WmSNCe1c20I/AAAAAAABYJs/IHTnY2B8Vz8haWwAg0dWOYk0E7_XL9svQCLcBGAs/s1600/ANd9GcQdbsfPOMqsRvyxhAqgw_g2d15XWBnvYKd6B1wocmc-WIzZsd90z.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"200\" data-original-width=\"200\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xwFSI9zoSvE/WmSNCe1c20I/AAAAAAABYJs/IHTnY2B8Vz8haWwAg0dWOYk0E7_XL9svQCLcBGAs/s400/ANd9GcQdbsfPOMqsRvyxhAqgw_g2d15XWBnvYKd6B1wocmc-WIzZsd90z.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The thing with karma is\nthat it doesn\u2019t always happen immediately. Sometimes we have to wait for years.\nSometimes our karma arrives without us even knowing it, or knowing what form it\nhas taken.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don't dwell on your\npast mistakes or worry about what might happen in the future because that will\nattract negativity into your life. When you are unconcerned about what life\ndeals you, you will probably find that you achieve success effortlessly.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We need to use our intuition\nto guide us when to stand up for ourselves and when to just accept things as\nthey are. If we are honest with ourselves and put our egos to one side we will\nknow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE CAN BE NO MOKSHA\nEVEN IF YOU HAVE AN IOTA OF EGO WITHIN YOU.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS EGO REDUCES KARMIC BAGGAGE\nLIGHTENS AND YOUR SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-cAGSVeY1MXM/WmSJUcTPzrI/AAAAAAABYII/LvWA2TEQ0uwwCNyBxgm8UVbX1EEt3Jj8ACLcBGAs/s1600/Quote-from-The-Afterlife-ofdr-Billy-Fingers.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; But karma is often slow to respond and, because of its intimate relationship with destiny, often waits until a future incarnation</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKarma and destiny are woven into the very fabric of our lives to the extent that the average person barely notices their effects.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery choice we make affects our future and therefore our destiny. Right now we are experiencing the destiny (and the karma) that arose from choices we made in the past.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKARMA IS NOT RELIGION OR EVEN SPIRITUALITY.. IT KNOWS WHAT GOES ON IN YOUR MIND..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS IS WHY INTENTION IS SUCH A POWERFUL THING. IT MOVES THE COSMOS</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWE HINDUS WERE THE FIRST TO PRAY ON THIS PLANET.. WE WERE THE FIRST TO UNDERSTAND THE MEANING OF INTENTION AND CONCSIOUSNESS</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nConsciousness as a fundamental component of reality itself. We all know the DOUBLE SLIT EXPERIMENT which is expounded in our Vedas</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">IF YOU ARE NOT SHELL SHOCKED BY THE VIDEO BELOW -YOU HAVE NOT UNDERSTOOD IT</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aXvHfCeXd5U</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIntention and , meditation can affect and influence quantum particles \u2013 the smallest components of matter that form our physical universe..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe arrogantly named \u2018pure sciences\u2019 such as physics, chemistry and biology regard consciousness as some philosophical backwater of SAVAGE Hindus.. Blinded by reductionism, neuroscience persists in attempting to reduce the action of consciousness to the physical laws that govern matter.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn 1905, Albert Einstein discovered that light acts as both a particle and a wave.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery single thing --100% for which Einstein was awarded is stolen from the Vedas..Einstein just gave them a math veneer ,, Remember Einstein was VERY poor in Math and he outsourced his Math to India</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThis duality was highly mysterious to the emerging breed of quantum physicists because our world was anticipated to be concrete, definite and predictable.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_6B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_7B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3376809899960951179\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nThe stunning result of the double-slit experiment irrevocably altered our understanding of reality in ways that we are still coming to terms with. Yet it was written down in the Vedas 70 centuries ago-- after being transmitted on oral route for 330 centuries<br />\n<br />\nHow could a single electron \u2013 which is a particle \u2013 display a wave-like pattern? More over, how could one electron appear in areas such as directly behind the middle of the two slits or way off to the side? Shouldn\u2019t single electrons being shot through two vertical slits only make two vertical lines on the detector wall behind it?<br />\n<br />\nThis strange quantum behavior is described by Heisnberg\u2019s uncertainty principle. Each individual particle exists in a superposition \u2013 a probabilistic state of being everywhere and nowhere at once. As with the earlier experiment, the act of measurement \u2013 the act of pinning down the exact location and speed of the particle seemed to \u2018force\u2019 it to pick a spot and lose that probabilistic wave-like behavior.<br />\n<br />\nHeisenberg's uncertainty principle, is just another equation of MAYA.. It tells us that there is a fuzziness in nature, a fundamental limit to what we can know about the behaviour of quantum particles and, therefore, the smallest scales of nature.<br />\n<br />\nHeisenberg came to India to study Sanskrit and Vedanta.<br />\n<br />\nEach individual particle exists in a superposition \u2013 a probabilistic state of being everywhere and nowhere at once. As with the earlier experiment, the act of measurement \u2013 the act of pinning down the exact location and speed of the particle seemed to \u2018force\u2019 it to pick a spot and lose that probabilistic wave-like behavior.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum physicists had to admit that at the smallest levels of known reality, our universe is not OBJECTIVE or predictable<br />\n<br />\nReality is a big question mark until something or someone interacts with it. Matter, which is made up of quantum particles, can\u2019t exist in a definite state unless the wave function is collapsed<br />\n<br />\nIn the effort to suck up to Jew Rothschild's COMMUNISM -- scientists were reticent to implicate consciousness. They could be excommunicated . After all Jew Rothschild controlled modern science<br />\n<br />\nMaterial science is based on objective forces in our universe that obey strict laws of behavior. Were consciousness proven to exist, it would imply a force unknown to science and it has shades of religiosity that scientists recoil in horror<br />\n<br />\nIf consciousness were proven to affect matter at the most basic level all of materialist science would collapse.<br />\n<br />\nHuman consciousness can affect the very fabric of reality with no proximity limitation. From anywhere in the world, a person\u2019s intentions can collapse a particle wave function into a definite state.<br />\n<br />\nYour thoughts have power; they can set up circumstances for our success or our demise, hurt or help others and lead us into journeys of enlightenment or toil. Our consciousness literally creates the universe around us.<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS ALWAYS HAS THE LAST LAUGH.<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS HAVE NEVER BEEN PROVED TO BE WRONG !<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nRSBaq3vAeY<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_8b+seedCayzD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_8b+seedCayzD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE ARE SO MANY\nMANDHA BUDDHIS WITH ZERO EGO -- YOU TEAR UP HIS PASSPORT IN HIS PRESENCE , HE\nWONT REACT-- THAT IS A MEDICAL CONDITION --AND THIS PERSON DOES NOT GET MOKSHA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God is fair and gives\nyou exactly what you deserve.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Karma is\nnot punishment or retribution but simply an expression or consequence of\nnatural acts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although it may often appear like a punishment (or reward), the\npurpose of Karma is to perfectly follow the cosmic law (God\u2019s system of\nUniversal operation) and not to punish (or reward).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Abrahamic\nreligions if every life is considered as an isolated event then there is\nabsolutely no explanation for events that happen in life. . There is no\nexplanation why someone is born wealthy while other spends entire life in\nhunger. There is no explanation why one child is born diseased , ugly and daft with\nheart defects while other one is healthy , handsome and intelligent <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If life and events are\nGod\u2019s will then that means God is either random and he punishes people or\nrewards them at his sweet will. This implies that God is NOT fair and has no\nidea of what is happening in this universe because everything works as per his\nrandom will, wish and fancy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prarabdha is that\nportion of the past karma which is responsible for the present body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God is PERFECT and\nGod\u2019s system (Law of Karma) works absolutely PERFECTLY.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God does not punish or\nreward people based on his will and fancies. God is neither partial nor unjust.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Z7XyLjdgisM/WmSMSjrAgZI/AAAAAAABYJU/_XTj6pd3WsEyhvzmk7Usn_7lCCaC2w-ewCLcBGAs/s1600/creadte.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"320\" data-original-width=\"320\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Z7XyLjdgisM/WmSMSjrAgZI/AAAAAAABYJU/_XTj6pd3WsEyhvzmk7Usn_7lCCaC2w-ewCLcBGAs/s400/creadte.jpeg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God is not responsible for the wealth of one man or the poverty of another. You\nsuffer on account of your own actions (Prarabdha karma). There is nothing\nchaotic or capricious in this world. Things do NOT happen in this universe by\naccident or chance in a disorderly manner or with God\u2019s random will.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God loves every one\nequally and he is fair to everyone. It is true that the entire universe and our\nlives run on the \u201cWill of the God\u201d and at the same time that \u201cGod\u2019s will\u201d\n(cosmic system in place) is perfect and fair --not imperfect and unfair that\nruns on irregular impulses of God\u2019s desires or passions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per Sanatana Dharma\n, God is fair and humans have a free will to choose good or evil Karma and\ntherefore, will face the consequences (good or bad) according to their Karma in\nthe past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is like a seed,\nmost of the times Karma does not fructify immediately after the seed is sown.\nWe produce numerous Karmic seeds by our actions (speech and thoughts) every\nmoment - desire, aversion, love, hatred, happiness, etc. will undoubtedly\nproduce, a positive or negative result, sooner or later, according to the\nnature of the seed, if not in this life, then in some future one.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZvMTTY7EnyA/WmSMe8vWgTI/AAAAAAABYJY/uCjfGwa2Ttk5B7ospDAwWvws6BnKB5NxgCLcBGAs/s1600/7d19.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"825\" data-original-width=\"550\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZvMTTY7EnyA/WmSMe8vWgTI/AAAAAAABYJY/uCjfGwa2Ttk5B7ospDAwWvws6BnKB5NxgCLcBGAs/s640/7d19.jpg\" width=\"426\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is as predictable\nas the laws of gravity: what is done to you is the net result of what you have\ndone to others. He who hurts others, has already hurt himself in the future.\nThe most important unpredictable aspect of Law of Karma is the \u201cDelivery\u201d (or\nconsequences) that are controlled by the Divine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cLaw of Karma\u201d is like\na universal law say \u201cLaw of Gravity\u201d - It applies whether you accept or reject\nthe law. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_CkR3egfeZY/WmSJJJJGDrI/AAAAAAABYIA/kinB3KvuxzIWMMRy1yvPQf_MmvHpXpbEgCLcBGAs/s1600/222a34f4f85dedc61444dcea5d843d406.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"960\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_CkR3egfeZY/WmSJJJJGDrI/AAAAAAABYIA/kinB3KvuxzIWMMRy1yvPQf_MmvHpXpbEgCLcBGAs/s400/222a34f4f85dedc61444dcea5d843d406.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: magenta; font-size: large;\">Law of Karma is\ncompletely unrelated to faith the person follows\u2014so Atheists , Christians and\nMuslims \u2013listen up.&nbsp; Karma works--perfectly,\napplying to everyone, all the time, without fail--no exceptions!</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To reduce the karmic\nbaggage Krishna told in Bhagawd Gita\u2014be rooted IN THE MOMENT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a simple process\nof paying more attention in the moment. When you take the time to stop and\nthink about what you are doing, with awareness on your inner self, body,\nenergy, and emotion, you are able to make a more informed decision on what your\nnext course of action should be.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All it &nbsp;requires is mindfulness. As long as you are\nalways choosing what you feel is best for yourself and others, then you will\nconsequently produce good Karma. Steer away from situations or people that you\nbelieve are toxic, and move toward positivity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You gut feeling never lets your\ndown<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x3tk2J3dF8c/WmSMtMtBIoI/AAAAAAABYJg/_Aj7AhNfDPUOB-QtPRNCyMp9dI6CxfCBQCLcBGAs/s1600/awakeddning.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"556\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"370\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x3tk2J3dF8c/WmSMtMtBIoI/AAAAAAABYJg/_Aj7AhNfDPUOB-QtPRNCyMp9dI6CxfCBQCLcBGAs/s400/awakeddning.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When life gives you\nlemons, make lemonade-- his is a simple lesson for how to deal with Karma.. Going\nback to the processing of an experience, it\u2019s critical to learn how to allow\ntransformation to occur in your life.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as your home\nrequires a full cleaning a few times a year, so does your life. Take some time\nto clear out your extra baggage. Cleanse yourself of unwanted junk that you\naccumulate in your mind, body, space, and time.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do some gentle detoxing a few\ntimes a year, preferably with seasonal changes. All of these cleansing\npractices are intended to remove obstruction, negative energy, and ama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/are-you-mentally-sick-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/are-you-mentally-sick-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XVMFXz4eAzw/WmSIzKv9abI/AAAAAAABYH8/1Lwi7-TvGFkF90Sf_JhkC0hBK4hpNkBxACLcBGAs/s1600/imeages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"183\" data-original-width=\"275\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XVMFXz4eAzw/WmSIzKv9abI/AAAAAAABYH8/1Lwi7-TvGFkF90Sf_JhkC0hBK4hpNkBxACLcBGAs/s400/imeages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samkaras are subtle\nimprints (impressions) that are made in the mind-stuff (chitta) whenever we do\nactions (consciously).&nbsp; Impressions are\nnot memories.&nbsp; Memories are formed from\nimpressions just like a photograph is developed from a negative. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soul samskaras ( scars\n) are impressions remaining unconsciously in the mind from past good or bad\nactions, giving rise to pleasure or pain. Samskaras become the cause of future\nactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Generally, we only retain memories from recent\nimpressions.&nbsp; Yet, we have countless\nimpressions (samskaras) from many, many lives.&nbsp;\nMost of these impressions no longer have memories associated with them.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Impressions (samskaras)\nfrom many, many lifetimes are affecting us but we do not generally know how or\nwhy they affect us because we have no recollection of the actions that caused\nthe impressions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our thinking patterns (vrittis)\nleads to action.&nbsp; I&nbsp; We act (KARMA) because our mind tells us\n(VRITTI) to act, because that is how we will satisfy our desire (VASANA) which\narose from the impression (SAMSKARA) made in the mind from an earlier action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The effect of a\nsamskara is called a vasana.&nbsp; Vasanas are\ntendencies. In other words, vasanas&nbsp; are\nthe inclinations formed from our impressions (samskaras).&nbsp; They are mental urges, desires, and\nfeelings.&nbsp; Unlike samskaras, the vasanas\n(tendencies) are readily identifiable.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vaC1FIKetIk/WmSqHJz3nXI/AAAAAAABYLU/_kb3_R4KYQEXUlflGRbOvLJU5ZKhpP6XACLcBGAs/s1600/7e02e7b730a2ej7c96c4bf792ff5f899a--quantum-physics-reiki.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"540\" data-original-width=\"720\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vaC1FIKetIk/WmSqHJz3nXI/AAAAAAABYLU/_kb3_R4KYQEXUlflGRbOvLJU5ZKhpP6XACLcBGAs/s640/7e02e7b730a2ej7c96c4bf792ff5f899a--quantum-physics-reiki.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasana is a behavioural\ntendency or karmic imprint which influences the present behaviour of a person .\nVasana means habitual tendencies, subtle inclinations that are imprinted in the\nmind, like a stain.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deepened vasanas\nlead to binding/attachment. Binding vasanas drive us just like puppets are\ndriven. It is much more difficult to burn binding vasanas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasanas are the\nimpression of anything in the mind, the present consciousness formed from past\nperceptions, knowledge derived from memory, the impressions remaining in the\nmind;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our tendencies\n(vasanas) create thought patterns (vrittis) in the mind. In other words, our\nthinking becomes motivated by our tendencies.&nbsp;\nThat is, we THINK to support our FEELINGS (desires, urges, etc.).&nbsp; These thinking patterns form our attitudes\nand mental disposition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot control our\npast samskaras because they have been automatically created as a result of our\npast actions.&nbsp;&nbsp; So, how do we stop our\npast samskaras from controlling us.&nbsp; The\nanswer is found in the practice of&nbsp; yoga\nwhich reveals that the way to break the karmic cycle is to interrupt the cycle\nthe VRITTI level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharishi Patanjali\ndefines Yoga as thUs:&nbsp; Yoga is the\nrestriction (control) of the modifications of the mind (Yogash chittavritti\nnirodhah. Chapter 1, Sutra 2, of the Yoga Sutras).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">1.02&nbsp; &nbsp;yogashchittavrittinirodhah</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Yoga restrains the\nmind-stuff (Chitta) from taking various forms (Vrttis). </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Yoga is about\nrestraining the thought-streams natural to the mind.&nbsp; Yoga restrains fluctuations of the\nconsciousness. Yoga is the art and science of mental discipline , to make the\nmind cultured and mature. Chitta is the subtlest form of cosmic intelligence (\nmahat ) .The eyes are only a secondary instrument, not the organ of vision. The\norgan of vision is in the nerve centre of the brain. Sometimes a man is asleep&nbsp; with his eyes open. The light is there and\nthe picture is there, but a third thing is necessary; mind must be joined to\nthe organ. The mind takes the impression farther in, and presents it to the\ndeterminative faculty\u2014Buddhi\u2014which reacts. Along with this reaction flashes the\nidea of egoism. Then this mixture of action and reaction is presented to the\nPurusa, the real Soul, who perceives an object in this mixture. The organs\n(Indriyas), together with the mind (Manas), the determinative faculty (Buddhi)\nand egoism (Ahamkara), form the group called the Antahkarana (the internal\ninstrument). They are but various processes in the mind-stuff, called Chitta (\nconsciousness ) . The waves of thought in the Chitta ( mindstuff )&nbsp; are called Vrtti ( the whirlpool). The bottom\nof the lake we cannot see, because its surface is covered with ripples. It is\nonly possible when the rippled have subsided, and the water is calm, for us to\ncatch a glimpse of the bottom. If the water is muddy, the bottom will not be\nseen; if the water is agitated all the time, the bottom will not be seen. If\nthe water is clear, and there are no waves, we shall see the bottom. That\nbottom of the lake is our own true Self; the lake is the Chitta, and the waves\nare the Vrttis. Again, this mind is in three states; one is darkness, which is\ncalled Tamas, just as in brutes and idiots; it only acts to injure others. No\nother idea comes into that state of mind. Then there is the active state of\nmind, Rajas, whose chief motives are power and&nbsp;\nnjoyment. \u201cI will be powerful and rule others.\u201d Then, at last, when the\nwaves cease, and the water of the lake&nbsp;\nbecomes clear, there is the state called Sattva, serenity, calmness. It\nis not inactive, but rather intensely active. It is the greatest manifestation\nof power to be calm. It is easy to be active. Let the reins go, and the horses\nwill drag you down. Anyone can do that, but he who can stop the plunging horses\nis the strong man. Which requires the greater strength, letting go, or\nrestraining? The calm man is not the man who is dull. You must not mistake\nSattva for dullness, or laziness. The calm man is the one who has restraint of\nthese waves. Activity is the&nbsp;\nanifestation of the lower strength, calmness of the superior strength.\nTo restrain it, and to checkthis outward tendency&nbsp; is the first step in Yoga, because only in\nthis way can the Chitta get into its proper course. Although this Chitta is in\nevery animal, from the lowest to the highest, it is only in the conscious human\nform that we find intellect, and until the mind-stuff can take the form of\nintellect it is not possible for it to return through all these steps, and\nliberate the soul. Immediate salvation is impossible for the non conscious\nanimal ( who cant pass the colour/ mirror test )&nbsp; although they have mind, because their Chitta\ncannot as yet take that form which we call intellect. Chitta manifests itself\nin all these different forms - scattering, darkening, weakening, and\nconcentrating. These are the four states in which the mind-stuff manifests\nitself. First a scattered form, is activity. Its tendency is to manifest in the\nform of pleasure or of pain. Then the dull form is darkness, the only tendency\nof which is to injure others. The commentator says the first form is natural to\nthe Devas, the angels, and the second is the demoniacal form. The Ekagra, the\nconcentrated form of the Chitta, is what brings us to Samadhi. The sadhaka\u2019s\naim is to bring consciousness to a state of purity and transclusence.\nAntakharana ( conscience ) unifies ahamkara ( ego ) and antaratma ( soul ) by a\ncommon thread. Yoga stops mind chatter ( fluctuating thought ). Stillness is\ndharana ( concentration ) and silence is dhyana ( meditaion ) Restraining the\nfluctuations of the mind is the goal ( samadhi ). Yoga is both the means and\nthe end.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is action, either\nphysical or mental. Each encounter with a pleasurable object leaves an\nimpression that gives rise to a desire to re-experience that object. Each time\nwe re-experience the object our desire is strengthened until it eventually\nblossoms into an addiction. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our addictions (i.e.,\nbinding vasanas) then compel us to act at their behest and, thus, we become\ntheir slaves. Addiction is rooted in the erroneous beliefs that one is\nincomplete as one is and that the desired object will be able to quell that\nsense of incompleteness and provide permanent fulfillment. rage and addiction\ncan become powerful triggers for self-inquiry.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every time you feel angry, stop\nand acknowledge the feeling and examine what the rage is in response to.\nInvariably, it has erupted because you are not getting something you want.\nIdentify what that something is, and look into it. Ask yourself why you want\nit, why you think you need it, what deficiency in your being you believe this\nobject will remedy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/anger-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/anger-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/anger-management-part-2-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/anger-management-part-2-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma yoga is a\nfundament spiritual practice. Unless you are approaching life with the attitude\nof humble offering and grateful acceptance that characterizes karma yoga, you\nwill not have the peace of mind necessary for any other spiritual practice to\nbear fruit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma yoga is not a\nspecific practice, as such, but rather an attitude that one takes regarding\naction and its results that effectively transforms one\u2019s daily activities into\nyoga, a means of purifying the mind and, thus, rendering it capable of assimilating\nself-knowledge ..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adopting the karma yoga attitude neutralizes one\u2019s binding\nvasanas, one\u2019s compelling likes and dislikes, desires and fears, which are the\nagents that both extrovert one\u2019s attention to such an extent that one is\nprevented from sustaining the introverted focus necessary to \u201csee\u201d the self and\ndisturb the mind to such a degree that its reflective surface is too agitated\nto accurately mirror one\u2019s true limitless, unmodified nature as pure awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jnana yoga,&nbsp; is the essence of self-inquiry, for it is\nonly through self-knowledge that the ignorance of one\u2019s true identity as whole,\ncomplete, limitless, non-dual awareness can be removed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-am1QIlfYiTg/WmSpq_VkkhI/AAAAAAABYLM/w5KNGTonO8AbSYCxuCIpuGUYJfAxG1b-wCLcBGAs/s1600/ijmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"247\" data-original-width=\"204\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-am1QIlfYiTg/WmSpq_VkkhI/AAAAAAABYLM/w5KNGTonO8AbSYCxuCIpuGUYJfAxG1b-wCLcBGAs/s400/ijmages.jpg\" width=\"330\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is neither\npunishment nor reward. It means you are building up memory; you are\nunconsciously writing a \u201csoftware\u201d, every moment of your life. Whatever your\nsoftware turns out to be, accordingly you behave, function and experience your\nlife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma means life is\nentirely your making. Whether you create it consciously or unconsciously is the\nquestion. No one up in heaven is operating your life. Karma means you create\nyour life. Once you understand that you are largely creating your life\nunconsciously, is it not natural for your intelligence to try to become as\nconscious as possible?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness is like the voltage of a light bulb. If\nyou crank up the voltage, it shows you everything. If you lower the voltage, it\nonly shows you a little.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma&nbsp; God is not our goal. God is just one more\ntool. The ultimate goal and highest value for us is liberation, freedom, mukti\nor moksha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS NO PLACE FOR\nBHAKTI YOGA IN SANATANA DHARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BHAGAWAD GITA DEALS\nWITH SHRADDHA \u2013NEVER BHAKTI</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED\nTHOUSANDS OF FAKE MUTTS AND PROPAGATED BHAKTI MOVEMENT \u2013SOLELY FOR DIVIDE AND\nRULE<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE BLOODY FIGHTS AT\nKUMBH MELA LEAVING HUNDREDS OF DEAD PEOPLE ( WHO WILL&nbsp; BATHE FIRST ?--SHIVA FOLLOWERS OR VISHNU FOLLOWERS ?-- NORTH BRANCH OF VISHNU FOLLOWERS OR SOUTH BRANCH OF VISHNU FOLLOWERS?&nbsp; &nbsp;) &nbsp;HAS BEEN DELETED FROM HISTORY.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES (\nLIKE THE COOKED UP AND BACKDATED DASAS ) NEVER EXISTED</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bhakti_movement\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bhakti_movement</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna describes in\nBhagwad Geeta to keep doing the work and leave the fruit of the Karma on him..\nWe have come to this material world due to some karmic results and it is our\nduty to perform karma which can lead us back to him.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only way to escape\nthis karmic bond is by offering everything to god, to do nishkama karma- which\nessentially means, doing an action without looking at its fruits.&nbsp; Karmic debt encompasses the whole spectrum of\nhuman interactions<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-i4X8B1_6yHY/WmSpbDiKRRI/AAAAAAABYLI/G-5JJId4ieUa1o3k_2d2FQClbOHYDGHMACLcBGAs/s1600/imaknges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-i4X8B1_6yHY/WmSpbDiKRRI/AAAAAAABYLI/G-5JJId4ieUa1o3k_2d2FQClbOHYDGHMACLcBGAs/s640/imaknges.jpg\" width=\"425\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as an accountant\nopens his books every new year, and carries forward the assets and liabilities\nof the past year, similarly a soul upon taking birth in this earth plane\ncarries with them the karmas of the past.
