Karma is recorded as impressions or\nvasanas on the soul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An essential condition\nfor attaining Moksha or Liberation is that the Karmic debt be neutralized.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is not punishment\nor retribution, but simply an extended expression or consequences, of natural\nacts. The effects experienced are also able to be mitigated by actions and are\nnot necessarily fated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word KARMA appears\nin the Rig Veda , Atharva Veda&nbsp; and the\nBrhadaranyaka Upanisad&nbsp; penned 7000 years\nago ..The doctrine occurs here in the context of a discussion of the fate of\nthe individual after death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of karma\nappears strongly in the Bhagavad Gita penned 6000 years ago . The topic of\nkarma is mentioned in the Puranas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not all karmas rebound\nimmediately. Some accumulate and return unexpectedly in this or other lifetimes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only conscious human\nbeings who can distinguish right from wrong are affect by Karma.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b>Homosexuals who put their pricks into another\nman\u2019s asshole get heavily weighed down by Karmic baggage. &nbsp;&nbsp;The souls of all these homosexuals can reach\nonly the first astral layer after death\u2014 where they keep company with lower\nforms of life and criminals..</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9PAAvhBDINw/WmSnnOzKU8I/AAAAAAABYKc/DLKel71biYk4XFLocu2oH2Lr7NuYHvvtgCLcBGAs/s1600/iffmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"238\" data-original-width=\"212\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9PAAvhBDINw/WmSnnOzKU8I/AAAAAAABYKc/DLKel71biYk4XFLocu2oH2Lr7NuYHvvtgCLcBGAs/s400/iffmages.jpg\" width=\"356\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mammals &nbsp;and young children ( less than 27 months age )\nare considered incapable of creating new karma (and thus cannot affect their\nfuture destinies) as they are incapable of discriminating between right and\nwrong.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is important to\nremember that an individual\u2019s karma is&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">based on their\nthoughts, words, and intentional actions and the choices they&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">make.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every birth is the\nresult of an individual\u2019s unique karmic circumstances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cycle of\nreincarnation (birth, death, and rebirth) is called samsara.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deluded belief (maya)\nis that one\u2019s existence is independent of&nbsp;\neverything and everyone else. With this understanding of maya, the individual\nforgets not only his or her own Divine nature, but the presence of that same\ndivine nature in the rest of existence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mistaken belief in an individual\u2019s\nown autonomy from the rest of existence is what drives them to act selfishly or\nin a fashion that generates karma, and this karma, in turn, keeps the\nindividual tied to the cycle of samsara.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-bMUJ47OKgk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/-bMUJ47OKgk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">v\u0101s\u0101nsi j\u012br\u1e47\u0101ni yath\u0101\nvih\u0101ya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">nav\u0101ni g\u1e5bih\u1e47\u0101ti naro\n\u2019par\u0101\u1e47i<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tath\u0101 \u015bhar\u012br\u0101\u1e47i vih\u0101ya\nj\u012br\u1e47\u0101nya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ny\u0101ni sany\u0101ti nav\u0101ni\ndeh\u012b-&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">BHAGAWAD GITA 2.22 - 4000\nBC</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BG 2.22: As a person\nsheds worn-out garments and wears new ones, likewise, at the time of death, the\nsoul casts off its worn-out body and enters a new one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Dy-QLmh_yjY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Dy-QLmh_yjY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: yellow;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">YOGA IS NOT ABOUT TWISTING YOUR BODY INTO PRETZEL\nPOSITIONS</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kHg4jite9ss/WmSnWlTEG0I/AAAAAAABYKU/Iif1KKf14i0zOlZBv6xwOveagCYVyd1ugCLcBGAs/s1600/Learn-Ashtanga-Yorga.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"500\" data-original-width=\"1100\" height=\"290\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kHg4jite9ss/WmSnWlTEG0I/AAAAAAABYKU/Iif1KKf14i0zOlZBv6xwOveagCYVyd1ugCLcBGAs/s640/Learn-Ashtanga-Yorga.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lz3VIrzYbRI/WmSm7xZAASI/AAAAAAABYKQ/gcRXjX3ICigCXMUlTrrkYLead5nDL8CjwCLcBGAs/s1600/a2eff9e4bee081efdb65f6d4779c59e93--ashtanga-yoga-poses-pace.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"552\" data-original-width=\"736\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lz3VIrzYbRI/WmSm7xZAASI/AAAAAAABYKQ/gcRXjX3ICigCXMUlTrrkYLead5nDL8CjwCLcBGAs/s640/a2eff9e4bee081efdb65f6d4779c59e93--ashtanga-yoga-poses-pace.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ultimate purpose of\nyoga is not to feel sexier, healthier, and more energetic. To the sadhus, the\ngoal of life is to escape the attachment of samsara and the lusts of the body,\nescape the cycle of birth and death, stop the cause of bad karma, and, finally,\nto awaken one\u2019s identity with the superconscious Self, or atman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carl Sagan said. \u201cThere\nare claims in the parapsychology field,\u201d he said, \u201cwhich, in my opinion,\ndeserve serious study, with [one] being that young children sometimes report\ndetails of a previous life, which upon checking turn out to be accurate and\nwhich they could not have known about in any other way than reincarnation.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_hfs3LT9dYM/WmSpMdwkFwI/AAAAAAABYLA/F-_aJKrR-fYQu5OJ9Ktvzgef4K7qzPSYQCLcBGAs/s1600/fcf85f96aoo4755fcd796ecea4036895e8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"960\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_hfs3LT9dYM/WmSpMdwkFwI/AAAAAAABYLA/F-_aJKrR-fYQu5OJ9Ktvzgef4K7qzPSYQCLcBGAs/s400/fcf85f96aoo4755fcd796ecea4036895e8.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The doctrine of karma\nprovides a rational explanation to the apparently inexplicable phenomena of\nbirth and death, happiness and misery, inequalities in mental and physical\nattainments<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In absence of knowledge\nof the functioning of God\u2019s Cosmic System (Law of karma), man becomes a slave\n(of his desires).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is in the\nconsciousness of an individual. It is our action, reaction, thought and even\nbehavior. Our Karma influences our perspective of life, how we deal with\nrelationships, how we forge relations, our belief system and our outlook of\nourselves.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5unowZw5mY0/WmSotrl15iI/AAAAAAABYK0/qIK2P3scJPkh47hFfax8k8YFZQQL_yexQCLcBGAs/s1600/fimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"201\" data-original-width=\"251\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5unowZw5mY0/WmSotrl15iI/AAAAAAABYK0/qIK2P3scJPkh47hFfax8k8YFZQQL_yexQCLcBGAs/s400/fimages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purport of the term\nKarma is to make individuals take ownership for their conscious actions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma Yoga, purifies the\nmind-- it is based upon individuals undertaking their obligatory moral,\nreligious, social, personal and professional duties with an attitude of\ndetachment to the results.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Vedas&nbsp; RTA is &nbsp;is the principle of natural order which\nregulates and coordinates the operation of the universe and everything within\nit.&nbsp; &nbsp;In the hymns of the Vedas, \u1e5ata is described as\nthat which is ultimately responsible for the proper functioning of the natural\nand moral &nbsp;orders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Rigveda, the\nterm \u1e5ata appears as many as 393 times, and has been characterized as \"the\none concept which pervades the whole of \u1e5agvedic thought\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u1e5ata as an ethical\nprinciple is linked with the notion of karmic baggage .. Committing one's\nactions to the governance of \u1e5ata, referred to as its \"Dharma\", &nbsp;is imperative in ensuring one's own well-being<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being an extension of \u1e5ata,\nKarma was conceived of as operating with the same absolute efficiency<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cosmic law RTA is\nthis all-encompassing dharma controls everything in existence from the tiniest\nsub-atomic particles to the most expansive galaxies. &nbsp;&nbsp;Since Hindus consider themselves to be part\nof this universal cosmic order, they aim to bring themselves into harmony with\nit by adhering to their own personal dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna tells Arjuna\nthat it\u2019s a barren excuse to not uphold his duties because the circumstances\naren\u2019t advantageous, as no situation is ever completely perfect.. No one should\nabandon duties because he sees defects in them. Every action, every activity,\nis surrounded by defects as a fire is surrounded by smoke..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation is an\nexercise of the mind and is a part of yoga .&nbsp;\nWhat physical exercise is to the body, meditation is to the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the keys to\nhappiness is reduction and complete removal of greed. Greed creates tremendous\nconflicts and all round unhappiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe lower knowledge is\nthe knowledge of the phenomenal world. In reality it is ignorance, for it does\nnot lead to the Highest Good. The seer of the Upanishads asks the aspirant to\nacquire both the knowledge of the relative world and the Knowledge of Ultimate\nReality. When by the pursuit of the former he fails to attain true freedom and\nimmortality, he cultivates the latter.\u201d <b>Mundaka Upanishad Mantra, 2.2.11, 5000\nBC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Death is an illusion\ncreated by our consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We think that life is\njust work of carbons and a mixture of molecules \u2013 live a while and then rot in\nthe ground<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Words like time and\nspace are just tools of our mind.&nbsp; Death\nand immortality exist in a world without linear boundaries. Life is an amazing\nadventure that can not fit into our linear way of thinking.&nbsp; Death is most likely not as definitive as\nmost of us believe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beyond this physical\nreality there is no right and wrong, in this same sense, we determine what is\nright and wrong for us, based on our thoughts, feelings, our physical, mental,\nemotional and spiritual level of growth.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hhbK31x8k-I/WmSoR2fJ9mI/AAAAAAABYKs/qqDvHuVvzA8ZG_NfeOQQluo0267O-NGGwCLcBGAs/s1600/iemages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"398\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hhbK31x8k-I/WmSoR2fJ9mI/AAAAAAABYKs/qqDvHuVvzA8ZG_NfeOQQluo0267O-NGGwCLcBGAs/s400/iemages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What one person deems as wrong,\nanother could easily justify as right and so on. So what becomes our karma is\nnot so much a \u2018bad\u2019 experience happening to us but rather \u2018an\u2019 experience\nhappening with our full participation albeit usually starting off as\nsubconscious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are in control of\nour destiny but have no control over our fate. Destiny cannot be forced on us;\nif we are forced then it is our fate. Destiny gives us an opportunity to turn a\nsituation to our advantage and accomplish something great through our own\nefforts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is designed to give us the best opportunities for the development\nof our consciousness, but it is only an outline \u2013 not an exact script. It\ndoesn't detract from our free-will in any way, because we decide exactly how we\nwant to act in any situation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8ewDBPkhfms/WmSn-Bf8V0I/AAAAAAABYKk/iPL-vJVhrGI6PYLyQHJ7ZZoOpQxuO1HYwCLcBGAs/s1600/d89932a8f34476718a003j5026df128ae.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"531\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8ewDBPkhfms/WmSn-Bf8V0I/AAAAAAABYKk/iPL-vJVhrGI6PYLyQHJ7ZZoOpQxuO1HYwCLcBGAs/s640/d89932a8f34476718a003j5026df128ae.jpg\" width=\"472\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A life plan can be\ncompared to a maze, and our life's purpose is to complete the maze. We don't\nknow where we are going or where we will end up, so all we can do is make our\nway through life using our best judgment. Every wrong turn leads to a dead end\nand every correct turn leads to progress. A correct turn may not correspond to\nsuccess in the physical sense, for example: failing to get a promotion may not\nseem like the best outcome from a financial perspective, but it might actually\nbe the best outcome for the development of your consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is a Sanskrit\nword meaning \"action\", but it is the consequences of one's actions. The\nword \"karma\" is commonly used to indicate bad karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We all occasionally\nmake what appear to be bad decisions, but if we learn from those seemingly\nwrong decisions we eventually discover that they were in fact right decisions.\nIf we deviate from our life's plan we may need to be coaxed back on to the\nright track, and the further we stray from the optimal path the harder the\nlessons get. Every choice we make affects our future and therefore our destiny.\nRight now we are experiencing the destiny (and the karma) that arose from\nchoices we made in the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The great cosmic\nevolution does not work according to a predetermined plan. Only the final goal\nis laid down: all monads acquiring omniscience about the whole cosmos... In\neach incarnation we suffer the consequences of some of our previous bad karma\nand reap the benefits of some of our previous good karma. During the early\nstages of our human evolution we all acquired large amounts of bad karma which\nmust be gradually worked off. Because many people still have much more bad\nkarma than good, seemingly favourable circumstances often have a sting in their\ntail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is often slow to\nrespond and, because of its intimate relationship with destiny, often waits\nuntil a future incarnation.. We never know how long ago we acquired the karma\nthat is manifesting in our lives today, and we never know how or when the karma\nwe create today will manifest its consequences. This is because karma works\nbehind the scenes \u2013 we only see the effects in the physical world and have no\nidea of the causes that are operating out of sight in the subtle worlds. Karma\nand destiny are woven into the very fabric of our lives to the extent that the\naverage person barely notices their effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is simply an\nopportunity to make good \u2013 it neither punishes nor rewards; it simply guides.\nThe law of karma is not the cause of suffering; it is merely the agent. 99% of\nall human suffering originates from the simple fact that we cannot and do not\nwant to control our subtle bodies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wilfully and knowingly\ntransgressing the laws of life generates a lot more negative karma than\nunintentional or ignorant transgressions. The more developed we are the more\nresponsibility we have, so the consequences of abusing the laws of life are\nmore severe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although bad karma\nusually results in suffering it is not a punishment for punishment's sake; nor\nis it divine retribution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is self-balancing\ndivine justice; it is 100% fair and absolutely infallible. It doesn't matter if\na criminal seems to \"get away with it\", because there is no getting\naway with it \u2013 karma will eventually catch up with him.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We need to learn that vengeance is not the\nsame as justice, and that an act of vengeance will result in bad karma for\nourselves. Even holding onto vindictive thoughts, self pity or grief prolongs\nour own suffering and generates more bad karma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative energy\naccumulates and can manifest itself as hurricanes, volcanic eruptions, floods,\nplagues, drought, earthquakes, etc. This is known as collective karma because\nit applies to an entire town, region, country or planet.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The effects of\ncollective karma are sometimes allocated individually so that diseases,\nafflictions or \"accidents\" can be the result of our allotted portion\nof mankind's collective karma. &nbsp;Some baby\nis born in Somalia, another is born in Switzerland\u2014there is a reason<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is not justice\nfor justice's sake, and it is not necessarily \"an eye for an eye\".\nKarma provides situations that will best help us to learn from our mistakes.\nThis may involve experiencing the other side of our original transgression<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is only made good\nby bearing the trials of life in an honourable and accepting way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ASK DOCTOR KANCHA\nILAIH SHEPHERD TO STOP BITCHING ABOUT HIS LOT ON TV IN AN ENDLESS MANNER.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">KANCHA ILAIH SQUEAK MOANS ON TV--HINDUS GODS ARE SO CRUEL AND VIOLENT&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEEEE ..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS PATHETIC&nbsp; IDIOT DOES NOT KNOW THAT THESE GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LAW OF &nbsp;KARMA HAS GOT&nbsp;\nSOMETHING TO DO WITH YOU BEING SOMEONE WHOM NOBODY CARES FOR<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kKPn6XvaYbo/WmS_pri23VI/AAAAAAABYLo/Cbyq_6-LyVk14X5LgvKkPNxha3vcof4BACLcBGAs/s1600/ddownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kKPn6XvaYbo/WmS_pri23VI/AAAAAAABYLo/Cbyq_6-LyVk14X5LgvKkPNxha3vcof4BACLcBGAs/s400/ddownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bad karma can affect\nour physical lives in a variety of ways, including: disease, disability,\nugliness, abuse, miscarriages of justice, lack of intelligence, poverty, low\nsocial standing, etc. We should never blame our parents for a disease or\ndisability that we inherited from them because our own karma and destiny\ndetermine such matters<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I KNOW OF A GIRL WHO\nABUSED HER PARENTS&nbsp; AND ACCUSED THEM OF\nPASSING ON BAD GENES TO HER \u2013SHE WAS A UGLY &nbsp;MIDGET <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don't dwell on your\npast mistakes or worry about what might happen in the future because that will\nattract negativity into your life. Be in the moment</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fate is the force that\nputs you in a particular place at a particular time to help with your soul\u2019s\nevolution. Some times it is a painful, hard lesson to be learned and sometimes\nit is positive and joyous. Either way you grow<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The capacity to perform\ntruly selfless actions\u2014actions that benefit all beings\u2014is called karma\nyoga.&nbsp;&nbsp; Karma yoga is selfless service,\nor service to others without expectation of any outcome. The practice of karma\nyoga is a path to freedom from karma and its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Awareness is the\nultimate tool we use to liberate ourselves from the bondage of karma. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga teaches us how to\nmanage our karma. Through the practice of karma yoga, we develop greater\nawareness. We witness the quality of our actions,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our thoughts, emotions,\nand desires have a way of repeating themselves, and these form karmic patterns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We inherit some of\nthese patterns at birth, and some we create over the course of our lives. A\nkarmic pattern can be a strength or a weakness. We can find it difficult\n(perhaps impossible) or easy to change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The root cause and\nnature of our karmic patterns can only be fully understood through meditation,\nwhich is the most important yogic tool for managing karma. Meditation&nbsp; gives us a calmer, less emotionally reactive\nmind and nervous system, so that we can respond with more peace and wisdom and\nwith less fear, anger, or attachment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fate can be called as\nsomething that is predetermined. It is something that has been written in your\nlife even before you were born. By fate, it has been already decided that you\nshould be born to certain poor parents, born at a certain godforsaken place\nUGLY --BONDHU&nbsp; ,.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fate is that one cannot change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand,\nKarma is the result of your actions. If you do something good, you will get\ngood things in return and if you do bad things, you will only encounter bad\nthings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fate means that there\nare no choices in life; it is predetermined. On the contrary, karma means that\nthere are choices in life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Unlike karma, fate is something that has been\nalready decided. You have control over Karma but you don\u2019t have control over\nfate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Karma or the conscious actions\nthat you do in the present life is passed on to the next life. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">But fate is not passed\non to the next life \u2014&nbsp; read this a\n</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">million times</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Karma\nYoga is selfless service unto humanity.. The important point is that you will\nhave to serve humanity without any attachment or egoism.&nbsp; Karma binds when it is done with a selfish\nmotive, with the expectation of fruits. But when action is done without the\nexpectation of fruits, it is liberating.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">Unlike the great \u201cdesh bhakts\u201d who\nsupport India by writing books for money ( they will narrate Ramayana , but don\u2019t\nhave the balls to talk about Ravan )&nbsp;\n\u2014&nbsp; this blogsite renders free\nservice to Bharatmata without FEAR..&nbsp; &nbsp; Everybody knows I\ncan mint mucho dinero ( quid ) using my blogsite<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LfQhgXN5jls/WmUfHTlbQKI/AAAAAAABYL4/MY80nES91wgvFAJbGTQqfxncUJKweKVKwCLcBGAs/s1600/cat-meeme-fear-and-loathing-in--4297.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_50M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1516580403695#c1533314326760383716\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 22, 2018 at 5:50 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS A KARMA YOGI?<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--<br />\n<br />\nA PICKLE JOHN WHO WASHED HIS WIFEs DIRTY UNDERWEAR ( WHILE SHE GOES TO OFFICE TO FUCK THE PEON ) CAN NEVER BE A KARMA YOGI<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2hv42havE4w</span><br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT THE POST BELOW-- WHERE CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL-- A KARMA YOGI-- WAS ATTACKED BY MAIN STREAM MEDIA<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://www.firstpost.com/living/open-letter-to-capt-vadakayil-the-man-who-wont-do-his-wifes-laundry-1192201.html</span><br />\nTHAT COULD NOT TOLERATE MY POST BELOW--<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/karva-chauth-synchronising-fertility.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHEY WANT MAN TO FAST FOR HIS WIFE AND COOK , WHILE SHE GOES FOR KITTY PARTY TO BITCH WITH HER CHOOTIYA SAHELIS WHILE PLAYING CHAKKLU-- NAY-- PAPPLU<br />\n<br />\nA timid man is absolutely unfit for Karma Yoga. He is fit to assist his wife in cleaning utensils in the kitchen in the morning and in washing her dirty underwear in the evening.<br />\n<br />\nIF MY WIFE IS SICK, I WILL DEFINITELY DO 100% OF HER WORK .. THIS IS MY DUTY AS A HUSBAND<br />\n<br />\nA Karma Yogi should have large heart.<br />\n<br />\nHe should be free from jealousy, crookedness, meanness, miserliness and selfishness. He should be absolutely free from greed, anger and egoism.<br />\n<br />\nA karma Yogi does not expect any kind of fruits for his actions herein and hereafter.<br />\n<br />\nEuropeans have translated my Chemical posts into their language and are minting money. I know because some of my officers have these books and showed it to me<br />\n<br />\nThey were glad to sail under Capt Vadakayil\u2019s command\u2014 because my officers learn 50% more than what I pen down<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/stowage-of-multiple-parcels-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nNon-attachment brings freedom from sorrow and FEAR.<br />\n<br />\nNon-attachment makes a man absolutely bold and fearless.. He gradually feels that brahman works directly through his Indriyas .<br />\n<br />\nHe feels no tiredness , strain or burden in discharge of his works .<br />\n<br />\nMy readers know how many hours I put in a day and at what off hours.<br />\n<br />\nE SREEDHARAN WHOM I WANTED TO BE PRESIDENT OF INDIA-- IS A KARMA YOGI<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E._Sreedharan</span><br />\n<br />\nOUR PAST PRESIDENT ADDUL KALAM WAS A KARMA YOGI -- WHEN HE DIED, INDIA GRIEVED- GENUINE GRIEF<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A._P._J._Abdul_Kalam</span><br />\n<br />\nBy doing selfless service you purify your heart<br />\n<br />\nKARMA YOGIS LIGHTEN THEIR KARMIC BAGGAGE AND INCREASE THEIR SOUL FREQUENCY<br />\n<br />\nIS IT EASY TO GET <b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">422.3 MILLION</span></b> PROFILE VIEWS --ARE PEOPLE CUNTS OF THE FIRST ORDER ?</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THEY REALIZE THAT A PERSON IS DOING SOMETHING WHICH NO OTHER PERSON COULD DO IN THE PAST/ CAN DO IN THE PRESENT AND CAN DO IN THE FUTURE</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654</span><br />\n<br />\nWhen action is performed selflessly, with full focus and attention, it brings fulfillment and freedom. Acting without being attached to the fruits of one's deeds \u2013 this alone can lead to union with the Self, which is the goal of yoga.<br />\n<br />\nPerforming one\u2019s duties while being IN THE MOMENT -- and serving humanity without any selfish motives , with perfect timing -- purifies the heart and brings liberation --this is the message of Bhagawad Gita<br />\n<br />\nKarma yoga is the yoga of action or work; specifically, karma yoga is the path of dedicated work: renouncing the results of our actions as a spiritual offering rather than hoarding the results for ourselves.<br />\n<br />\nIntelligent people ( even Jews ) realise that Captain is doing something for the PLANET<br />\n<br />\nThis chain of cause and effect that we ourselves have created can be snapped by karma yoga: fighting fire with fire, we use the sword of karma yoga to stop the chain reaction of cause and effect. By disengaging the ego from the work process, by offering the results up to a higher power, we stop the whole snowballing process.<br />\n<br />\nASK ANY MAN WHO SAILED WITH CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL-- WERE CAPTAINs INTENTIONS OR ACTIONS ON HIS SHIP SELFISH ?<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_50BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_50b+seedDeryD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_49T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_50b+seedDeryD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_49TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-arrow\" id=\"bc_0_49TA\" style=\"background: url(&quot;data:image/png; display: inline-block; height: 6px; margin: 0.3em; overflow: visible; padding-right: 4px; width: 7px;\"></span><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1516580442349#c5121760827522164873\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 22, 2018 at 5:50 AM</a></span></span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_49TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_50b+seedDeryD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_49B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5121760827522164873\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_49MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">6000 years ago Krishna told Arjuna on the battle field of Kurushetra--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">sakt\u0101\u1e25 karma\u1e47yavidv\u0101nso yath\u0101 kurvanti bh\u0101rata</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">kury\u0101d vidv\u0101ns tath\u0101sakta\u015bh chik\u012br\u1e63hur loka-sa\u1e45graham</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BG 3.25: As ignorant people perform their duties with attachment to the results, O scion of Bharat, so should the wise act without attachment, for the sake of leading people on the right path.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">buddhi-yukto jah\u0101t\u012bha ubhe suk\u1e5bita-du\u1e63hk\u1e5bite</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">tasm\u0101d yog\u0101ya yujyasva yoga\u1e25 karmasu kau\u015bhalam</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BG 2.50: One who prudently practices the science of work without attachment can get rid of both good and bad reactions in this life itself. Therefore, strive for Yog, which is the art of working skillfully (in proper consciousness).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KARMA YOGA refers to all human activities performed with concentration, skill and finesse.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The way to liberation is to perform your duties without attachment and FEAR. Attachment with the result leads to stress, competition , aggression and back biting.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You have been born on this planet to be CREATIVE -- to make a difference for the better&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I STARTED PENNING MY MEDICAL POSTS MANY DOCTORS ( EVEN FROM ABROAD ) THREATENED TO SUE ME</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">6000 year old , Bhagavad Gita is the first recorded evidence of crisis intervention psychotherapy. Such clarity of thought can come only from a VISHNUs MORTAL AVATAR.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Spirituality leads to finding purpose and meaning in life.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Gita teaches the doctrine of uttermost detachment . It is a Sanskrit text written in Bhisma Parva of Mahabharata epic, comprising 745 verses. Philosophical concepts of Gita's are Ishvara ( brahman), Jiva ( soul), Prakrti ( matter ), Karma ( action) and Kala (time).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Bhagavad Gita proposed that true enlightenment comes from growing beyond identification with the temporal ego and self. According to Krishna, the root of all suffering and discord is the agitation of the mind caused by a selfish desire.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The only way to douse the flame of desire is by simultaneously stilling the mind through self-discipline and engaging oneself in a higher form of activity.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The central themes of positive psychology include happiness, hope, creativity and wisdom. I ask-- which single messiah dogma laden SINGLE HOLY BOOK can ever match Bhagawad Gita ? Even stupid people know the answer..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Understanding and facilitating happiness and subjective well-being is the central objective of positive psychology</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SANATANA DHARMA WANTS MAN TO BE HAPPY, WHILE HE IS IS ON PLANET EARTH</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u201cDon\u2019t hanker after the fruit\u201d, says the Gita. However, it also insists that you should act with full energy and skill.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The action of the person who acts without desire should be much better than that of the person who acts with desire. The latter is attracted to the fruit, and a part, much or little, of his time and attention will, of course, be spent on thought and dreams of the fruit.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By focusing on only work we can give 100% of our concentration. It is the desire of a result that comes in the way causing anxiety. Whenever emotions are intense, it causes distraction and work is hampered.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Flow of work as explained in positive psychology can be only understood by understanding karma yoga ..Karma yoga is a therapeutic method to reduce anxiety and apprehension&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Our present situation is a result of our past deeds and our present actions will determine our future. Once we understand this, we can no longer blame anybody else for what happens to us, but rather accept responsibility for ourselves.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">UNLIKE SINGLE MESSIAH RELIGION HOLY BOOKS-- BHAGAWAD GITA CAN NEVER EVER GO OUT OF STYLE.. IT NEEDS NO AMENDMENT ( TO SUIT THE TIMES ) NEW EDITIONS</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT IS ALL THIS EAR DRUM SHATTERING CALLS BY LOUDSPEAKER AT 5 AM --TELLING ALL-- OUR GOD IS GREAT ?&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERY POST ON CHEMICAL TANKERS --IS PART OF MY KARMA YOGA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOBODY HAS ATTEMPTED TO WRITE CHEMICAL POSTS - BECAUSE THEY DONT HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONLY KARMA YOGIS DO \u2013THEY BECOME CHANNELS !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_50b+seedDeryD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Karma or the conscious actions that you do in\nthe present life is passed on to the next life.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">But fate is not passed on to the next life\n\u2014&nbsp; read this a </span><span style=\"color: red;\">BILLION</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> times</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
