, &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">422.5 MILLION</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> IS A COUNT WHICH CAN NEVER BE BROKEN</span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE NUMBER 2 ON THIS PLANET DOES NOT EVEN HAVE 1% OF THIS COUNT</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nishkam Karma&nbsp; self-less or desireless action, is an action\nperformed without any expectation of fruits or results, and the central tenet\nof Karma Yoga path to Liberation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nishkam Karma, gets an\nimportant place in the Bhagavad Gita,&nbsp;\nwhere Krishna advocates 'Nishkam Karma Yoga' (the Yoga of Selfless\nAction) as the ideal path to realize the Truth.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Allocated work done without expectations,\nmotives, or thinking about its outcomes tends to purify one's mind and\ngradually makes an individual fit to see the value of reason<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The central tenet of\npracticing Nishkam Karma is Mindfulness in the PRESENT MOMENT ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the long run it\nleads to cleansing of the heart but also spiritual growth and holistic\ndevelopment..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nishkam Karma, means\nmore balanced approach to work, and as work has been turned into a pursuit of\npersonal excellence, which results in greater personal satisfaction, which one\nwould have otherwise sought in job satisfaction coming from external rewards<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The opposite is Sakam\nKarma (Attached Involvement) or actions done with results in mind.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nishkam Karma has been\nvariously explained as 'Detached Involvement'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sakam Karma might lead\nto excessive work pressure and workaholism as it aims at success, and hence\ncreates more chances of physical and psychological burn outs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nishkam Karma means\ndoing Seva (selfless service), without the expectation of receiving\nacknowledgement, reward or a word of thanks. When you have even just one\nthought that someone should have said \"Thank you\", this is not\nNishkam Karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">yoga-stha\u1e25 kuru karm\u0101\u1e47i\nsa\u1e45ga\u1e41 tyaktv\u0101 dhana\u00f1jaya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">siddhy-asiddhyo\u1e25 samo\nbh\u016btv\u0101 samatva\u1e41 yoga uchyate-</span>- <b>Bhagawad Gita 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BG 2.48: Be steadfast\nin the performance of your duty, O Arjun, abandoning attachment to success and\nfailure. Such equanimity is called Yog.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">k\u0101yena manas\u0101 buddhy\u0101\nkevalair indriyair api<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">yogina\u1e25 karma kurvanti\nsa\u1e45ga\u1e41 tyaktv\u0101tma-\u015bhuddhaye</span>-<o:p></o:p></span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 16px;\">Bhagawad Gita 4000 BC</b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BG 5.11: The yogis,\nwhile giving up attachment, perform actions with their body, senses, mind, and\nintellect, only for the purpose of self-purification.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Doctrine of Karma\nalone can explain the mysterious problem of good and evil in this world.. It\nbrings a brilliant future for that man who lives according to this universal\nlaw. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If all people\nunderstand this law correctly and discharge their daily duties carefully, they\nwould rise to sublime heights in the ladder of spirituality. They will be moral\nand virtuous and have a happy, peaceful, contented life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1662114989205040729\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_118M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/12333354635999003839\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Sangeetha</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1516665298464#c1662114989205040729\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 23, 2018 at 5:24 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_118MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear captain, this is another brilliant post. You have taken a big load of my mind by clarifying intentions matter and not action. Thanks a ton.<br />\n<br />\nToday I was thinking of asking you about sharks and blood. Surprised to see you have already mentioned sharks. Once I read an English novel where heroine kills her husband by inserting a tampon in his swimming trunk pocket and then sharks eat him. How sharks detect blood so fast from kilometers away ? I can understand they have acute sense of smell. But at least one blood particle need to reach them for smell. Can blood particle travel so fast in sea water ? Is there quantum physics involved ? Like sharks sensing the negative energy in blood.&nbsp;</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_118BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_118b+seedBtGZD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_117T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; , serif; font-size: 72pt; line-height: 115%;\">BASTARDS&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ramakrishna\nParamahamsa and his disciple Swami Vivekananda ( both agents of Jew Rothschild\n)&nbsp; Ramakrishna propagated that &nbsp;the essential message of the Gita could be\nobtained by repeating the word Gita several times, &nbsp;\"'Gita, Gita, Gita', you begin, but then\nfind yourself saying 'ta-Gi, ta-Gi, ta-Gi'.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Tagi means one who has renounced\neverything for God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS\nIS AKIN TO \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHEN I\nWAS IN SCHOOL I USED TO CRY <b><span style=\"color: red;\">DEECUP DEECUP</span></b> INSTEAD OF <b><span style=\"color: red;\">KABADDI KABADDI</span></b>-- PISSING OFF EVERYBODY</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">HOW DID ANCIENT MAHARISHI MEASURE DIAMETERS AND DISTANCES OF PLANETS -- AND PEN IT DOWN IN OUR VEDAS 7000 YEARS AGO ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5293892609275957632\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_159M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1516725005630#c5293892609275957632\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 23, 2018 at 10:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_159MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME ABOUT BOSE \u2013EINSTEIN CONDENSATE</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWELL I HAVE WRITTEN ABOUT IT IN THE POST BELOW-</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_7.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBose-Einstein condensates (BECs) are one exception where quantum effects are visible on a MACROSCOPIC level.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=6&amp;v=xu7gK6EZ_u8</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA quantum effect that can have important consequences in mental phenomena, -- for awareness (for the emergence of consciousness). It is the Bose-Einstein condensation, in which each particle loses its individuality in favor of a collective, global behavior.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Bose-Einstein Condensate is one of the states of matter. Like gas, liquid, or solid, it has its own properties. Predicted by a Satyendranath Bose back in the early twentieth century, it was only proven to exist in 1995. Einstein just attached his name \u2013it was the theory of Bose</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIf matter was.cooled to very low temperatures to Absolute Kelvin or minus 273 degrees, then the entropy of that matter should decrease and matter should come down to a zero-energy state.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThis remained only in the realms of hypothetical speculation until it was proved much later on This zero-energy state is now known in physics as the Bose-Einstein condensate</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThis state of matter is also called a super atom as the entire mass behaves as if it were a single atom It loses all its characteristics of shape, charge and polarisation It probably reverts to a shapeless, attributeless phenomenon in a de-evolution of matter, reverting back to just the potential to manifest as anything.and everything.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">MAHARISHIS COULD USE THEIR MINDS LIKE LASERS \u2013WHILE IN TURIYA STATE</span></b><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Turiya there is total mental clarity, and complete inner peace one recognizes the Self in every shining atom of existence</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen we concentrate, we are increasing the synchronicity of a specific group of neurons and silencing unrelated neuronal activity In scientific parlance, concentration decreases the entropy of the neuronal apparatus</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJust as the entropy of matter drops to near-zero levels.when we approach Absolute Kelvin, similarly, the neuronal disorder keeps waning as we concentrate.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe neuronal firing decreases in amplitude as well as frequency So would the propagation across various networks In the waking state, when you consciously attempt to decrease the entropy of the nervous system, it is referred to as meditation.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAs the entropy of the neurons keeps decreasing, a state of calmness is perceived. As this progresses further, the neurons start becoming synchronous. That is, they neither modulate nor amplify any incoming signal They just resonate in harmony. As this orchestra gets more in sync, you experience varying states of bliss and happiness.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSatyendra Nath Bose declared that light could be parceled out in tiny packets called \"quanta.\"He also came up with a number of rules for distinguishing different quanta based on their different energy levels.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAt regular temperature levels, nothing remarkable happened. When the temperature dropped perilously close to absolute zero, the atoms would take on a strange property.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe atoms would drop into the same energy state. There would be no way to distinguish between them - not even spatially.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt took until 1995 for a group of scientists, lead by Eric Cornell and Carl Wieman to actually form a Bose-Einstein Condensate. It's tough to make, and even tougher to recognize. The atoms in the single energy state aren't just mathematically identical. They \"condense\" into what is effectively one atom - a superatom.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe attainment of Bose\u2013Einstein condensation (BEC) in a weakly interacting atomic gas has opened up a new frontier in physics. Many scientists working in physics or related fields now consider it manifest destiny that BEC will be part of many new scientific discoveries and, perhaps, new technologies.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_159BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_159b+seedBWUJD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_157T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_157TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_157TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_159b+seedBWUJD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_157B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6356712068472362296\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_157M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1516725049135#c6356712068472362296\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 23, 2018 at 10:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_157MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nIn quantum mechanics, elementary particles of the same type are considered identical. For example, an electron in an atom could be replaced by another electron and the atom would behave in exactly the same way. Nature has taken particular advantage of this, allowing only two types of elementary particles: bosons and fermions.<br />\n<br />\nThey differ fundamentally in how a collection of identical particles interact. Identical fermions cannot occupy the same quantum state (only one per state!). Identical bosons can occupy the same quantum state. The statistics of identical particles (how they act in groups) has profound affects.<br />\n<br />\nFor example, the rich and complex structure of the periodic table arises from the principle that only one electron can occupy each quantum state. The spin and the statistics of particles are closely connected: (fermions) bosons have (half-)integer spin. (Spin is an internal angular momentum measured in units of Planck\u2019s constant.)<br />\n<br />\nComposite particles, such as atoms, also behave as bosons or fermions. Depending on the number of electrons, protons and neutrons, an atom can have integer or half-integer total spin and, therefore, be a boson or fermion. We most commonly encounter atoms in situations where their fermionic or bosonic nature is not manifested.<br />\n<br />\nThis is because the atoms are either at too high an energy or are too rarefied for quantum effects to be important. In solids, the atoms interact strongly. As a result, they are localized and don\u2019t compete for the same space so indistinguishability plays a minor role. The only material that does not become solid at low temperatures is liquid helium.<br />\n<br />\nWhen liquid helium is cooled below 2.2 K, a Bose condensate begins to form in the liquid. At these low temperatures, liquid helium behaves as a superfluid having, among other strange properties, zero viscosity.<br />\n<br />\nWhen gaseous bosonic atoms are cold enough (so that they have a long quantum wavelength) and dense enough (so that the spacing between the particles is on the order of the wavelength), quantum effects become important and the gas may undergo a phase transition into the Bose condensed state.<br />\n<br />\nThis must be done in a density regime low enough so that the gas does not nucleate and form a solid. BEC was achieved with three elements: rubidium, sodium, and lithium physicists find BEC intriguing because it is quantum mechanics brought to the human scale. Atoms in the BEC state are all part of one macroscopic quantum wave function.<br />\n<br />\nBecause of this, BEC is like a laser for atoms. Similar to the photons in a laser, all of the atoms in a condensate have exactly the same energy and spatial mode. The advantages that a laser brings to many applications are high intensity and phase coherence. It may be possible to realize similar gains for atoms.<br />\n<br />\nThe realization of an \u201catom laser\u201d (now used in the sense of BEC as a source of coherent atoms) would be a boon to the field of atom optics. Also, just about any experiment or technology currently using atomic beams would probably benefit from a higher intensity, coherent beam.<br />\n<br />\n. The world is so sophisticated scientists cannot predict what will happen. One small change, even a seemingly tiny insignificant change has enormous consequences (The Butterfly Effect).<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the laws of physics, energy and matter cannot be created or destroyed. Your thoughts are energy. Therefore your thoughts can never be destroyed.<br />\n<br />\nYour thoughts are immortal.<br />\n<br />\nYour consciousness creates space, time and matter. According to physics when your mind observes something, you change that something. It\u2019s called \u201cThe Observer Effect\u201c. You make the future happen.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_157MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_157BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_157B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_158B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9149779709167817283\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_158M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1516725079154#c9149779709167817283\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 23, 2018 at 10:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_158MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nWe can\u2019t see much of the physical world. Our senses process very little. There is an invisible, hidden world out there.<br />\n<br />\nYour view of the world is based on your \u201cinternal reality,\u201d your thoughts. Thoughts shape the invisible energy around you. The cause of your world is your mind.<br />\n<br />\nYour mind is holographic, each part of it knows the whole. In the same way that each cell of your body has information about your entire body, your mind has information about the whole universe.<br />\n<br />\nScientists can clone (duplicate) an organism using a single cell. All the information of the whole is in a single cell. We all began as a single cell. In each cell all the information of life is present.<br />\n<br />\nNot all your cells have been activated., your mind decides which cells should be turned on. You decide which cells to activate. Consciousness (your thoughts) create everything in your future. Your mind cannot be located in space and time. It is everywhere, at the same time. Your mind goes beyond space and time and creates them. Energy fields are unobservable and influence matter.<br />\n<br />\nYour mind produces energy fields that stretch across the universe. These fields can\u2019t be measured. They are invisible forces.<br />\n<br />\nSynchronicity can organize random chance events to create an outcome of your choosing. Chance events align themselves to your advantage when you focus your attention on them. You are capable of doing this, but most don\u2019t believe they can.<br />\n<br />\nBelief is the trigger for synchronicity, the law of attraction and any psychic ability. If you don\u2019t believe, then you can\u2019t activate this extraordinary gift. Your brain won\u2019t process information that it doesn\u2019t expect to see. If you are not open to believing, something could be right in front of you and you still won\u2019t see it.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_159b+seedBWUJD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_159b+seedBWUJD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2152201745995146476\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_168M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1516751371390#c2152201745995146476\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 24, 2018 at 5:19 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_168MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY DOES SANATANA DHARMA INSIST OF SANYASA ASHRAMA<br />\n<br />\nWELL --IT IS NOT ABOUT BEING A HERMIT IN A CAVE<br />\n<br />\nIT IS ABOUT SELF IMPOSED SOLITUDE. THE GREATEST CREATIVITY IN ANCIENT INDIA CAME FROM SOLITUDE<br />\n<br />\nThere is a great difference between LONELINESS and SOLITUDE<br />\n<br />\nLoneliness is the poverty of self, the pain of being alone, unwanted \u2014it breaks human spirit.<br />\n<br />\nSolitude is the richness of self, the glory of being alone. In solitude mind grains strength.<br />\n<br />\nIn solitude you face yourself\u2014it is delicious in years of human maturity.<br />\n<br />\nThis is why Sanatana Dharma insisted in Vanaprasta and Sanyasa ashramas.<br />\n<br />\nIn solitude you have god as your friend. The best thoughts come while in self imposed solitude<br />\n<br />\nIn the Hindu system four stages of life have been prescribed: brahmacharya (celibacy), grihastha (family life), vanaprastha (literally, living in a forest), sanyasa (total renunciation).<br />\n<br />\nIn the first stage, brahmacharya, a person leads the life of a student as a celibate.<br />\n<br />\nAfter finishing the studies, he enters the married life of a grihastha.<br />\n<br />\nHaving fulfilled the obligations to children and the society, both husband and wife follow spiritual pursuits during Vanaprasta --they move closer to nature<br />\n<br />\nIn sanyasa, a person completely renounces all worldly belongings and lives in solitude<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHALLOW WHITE MIND HAS NEVER REALLY UNDERSTOOD SANATANA DHARMA<br />\n<br />\nALL SINGLE MESSIAH SINGLE HOLYBOOK RELIGIONS COLLECTIVELY ARE A DROP OF DIRTY WATER-- SANATANA DHARMA IS THE PRISTINE DEEP BLUE OCEAN<br />\n<br />\nWHAT A CRYING SHAME-- INDIANS CONVERTED TO THE SHALLOW RELIGIONS OF INVADERS BY SWORD ( FEAR ) AND SOP ( GREED ) --AND THEIR DESCENDANTS FOLLOW THE RELIGIONS OF THEIR ANCESTORS WHO HAD EXTREMELY POOR CHARACTER<br />\n<br />\nGREED IS A HEART ISSUE<br />\n<br />\nFEAR IS THE REAL ENEMY. KICK THE BASTARD AS HARD AS YOU CAN IT ITS TEETH ( Walter White --BREAKING BAD )<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6203085622177908526\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_198M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">April 4, 2018 at 5:21 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_198MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCOUPLE OF DAYS AGO SHATRUGHAN SINHA CAME ON TV..<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS BITCHING ABOUT MODI..<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS TRYING TO TELL ALL THAT HE IS A GREAT GYAANI..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS FELLOW NAMED HIS SONS LUV AND KUSH..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS DHAKKAN DOES NOT KNOW THAT NOBODY IN INDIA HEARD OF LUV AND KUSH ( SITAs TWIN BOYS ) BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE STORY OF LUV AND KUSH CAPTURING THEIR FATHER RAMs ASHWAMEDHA WHITE HORSE IS ALL COCK AND BULL..<br />\n<br />\nMARYADA PURUSH RAM NEVER KICKED HIS PREGNANT WIFE SITA TO THE FOREST..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/ashwamedha-yagam-bloodless-sacrifice.html</span><br />\nVALMIKI RAMAYANA ENDS WITH RAM COMING BACK TO AYODHYA WITH SITA -- ALIGHTING FROM PUSHPAK VIMANA TO A TUMULTUOUS WELCOME..WITH BHARAT AT THE FORE.<br />\n<br />\nTULSIDAS WHO WROTE RAMAYANA IN AWADHI--NEVER EXISTED --LIKE ALL OTHER DASAS OF THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT..<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA --NOT BHAKTI..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Sanatana Dharma allows only SHRADDHA ( enlightened faith ) \u2013never BHAKTI ( blind faith out of dogma ) \u2013self verification is paramount for Hindus..&nbsp;</span><br />\nShraddha is not something that we can command; it has to happen..<br />\n<br />\nIn having Shraddha, there is trust, faith, reverence, devotion, openness, and freedom. In fact, this is the trust where there is freedom.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is a Sanskrit/ Malayalam word -- an unshakable conviction in our journey.<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN THE FOLLOWING WEBSITES--<br />\nSHATRUGHAN SINHA<br />\nYASHWANT SINHA<br />\nARUN SHOURIE<br />\nLK ADVANI<br />\nJASWANT SINGH<br />\nMURLI MANOHAR JOSHI<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nPMO<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES ( LEAVE OUT MOMOTO AND KACHRAWAAL )<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCBSE CHIEF<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABHA KANT<br />\nMANEKA GANDHI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nEDUCATION MINISTER<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF ALL DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA-- EVERY WHICH WAY.<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MY READERS TO CO-OPERATE. , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; Five\nyears ago they cost $11 each. 12 months ago they were &nbsp;$850 and just last month they were worth\nalmost $20,000 each. Today they are $ 9200 each<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin set a cap of 21 million bitcoins.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many analysts ( CUNTS ) noticed that this set\ncap makes bitcoin more attractive than other assets, even gold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The CUNTS argued-- Bitcoin is a decentralized\ncurrency; it means that;&nbsp; no government,\nbank or single person has control over it; it can't be collapsed by fraud at\nall.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Gi9IgQ0N8oE/Wl94yOGorfI/AAAAAAABYCA/3IxpNq0KH1Y9ZZbKNgQltx1fH-Ig-vPpQCLcBGAs/s1600/b6bc4b7ttfc1b9817a49b5042fbe4f9504.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"330\" data-original-width=\"440\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Gi9IgQ0N8oE/Wl94yOGorfI/AAAAAAABYCA/3IxpNq0KH1Y9ZZbKNgQltx1fH-Ig-vPpQCLcBGAs/s400/b6bc4b7ttfc1b9817a49b5042fbe4f9504.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is a saying \u2013 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">ONCE A CUNT ALWAYS A CUNT !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fhuPeFWf9CU/Wl94kaySZSI/AAAAAAABYB8/Ql2XOhTsSy8NhuuCktQnPGang1zR5AdGQCLcBGAs/s1600/dotwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fhuPeFWf9CU/Wl94kaySZSI/AAAAAAABYB8/Ql2XOhTsSy8NhuuCktQnPGang1zR5AdGQCLcBGAs/s400/dotwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GNUvhZYl4g8/Wl95CStQ6KI/AAAAAAABYCE/5t9Gpzo4wTEDWso1z4l4aTwZrkRaxICqgCLcBGAs/s1600/ay_1d09688811.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"776\" data-original-width=\"1000\" height=\"496\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GNUvhZYl4g8/Wl95CStQ6KI/AAAAAAABYCE/5t9Gpzo4wTEDWso1z4l4aTwZrkRaxICqgCLcBGAs/s640/ay_1d09688811.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain could get a dedicated exchange\ntraded fund. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission\n(SEC) insisted the ETFs not include the word blockchain in their names if the\nstocks they hold do not directly collect a significant portion of their revenue\nfrom the technology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An ETF, or exchange-traded fund, is a\nmarketable security that tracks an index, a commodity, bonds, or a basket of\nassets like an index fund. Unlike mutual funds, an ETF trades like a common\nstock on a stock exchange. ETFs experience price changes throughout the day as\nthey are bought and sold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An exchange-traded fund (ETF) is an\ninvestment fund traded on stock exchanges, much like stocks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">An ETF holds\nassets such as stocks, commodities, or bonds and generally operates with an\narbitrage mechanism designed to keep it trading close to its net asset value, &nbsp;although deviations can occasionally occur.&nbsp; &nbsp;Most ETFs track an index, such as a stock index or bond index<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) are securities\nthat closely resemble index funds, but can be bought and sold during the day\njust like common stocks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Exchange-traded funds don't sell shares\ndirectly to investors. Instead, each ETF's sponsor issues large blocks (often\nof 50,000 shares or more) that are known as creation units.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These units are\nthen bought by an \"authorized participant\" -- typically a market\nmaker, specialist or institutional investor -- which obtains shares of the\nunderlying securities and places them in a trust. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The authorized participant then splits up\nthese creation units into ETF shares -- each of which represents a legal claim\nto a tiny fraction of the assets in the creation unit -- and then sells them on\na secondary market.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whereas traditional mutual funds are only\npriced at the end of the day, ETFs can be bought and sold at any time\nthroughout the trading day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/pwUy9lf8zgs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/pwUy9lf8zgs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1428126390989729248\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_75M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/blockchain-bitcoin-intrinsic-value-of.html?showComment=1516277480088#c1428126390989729248\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 18, 2018 at 5:41 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_75MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWe ask the Modi govt \u2014 Do not allow any agency in India to process transactions that are Bitcoin based. Bitcoin can never be a payment system. ..<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin is NOT even a commodity.&nbsp; &nbsp;Commodity values can surge \u2014NEVER like this \u2014 as commodities are BARTERED.&nbsp; &nbsp;Direct exchange of goods against goods without use of money is called barter exchange..<br />\n<br />\nA nation can export wheat and gets minerals from the same nation in return-- this is known as barter exchange..<br />\n<br />\nIn September 2015, the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) in the United States officially designated Bitcoin as a commodity. ..BALLS !..<br />\n<br />\nIf bitcoin is indeed a commodity, the next question to be asked is: What commodity is it? A commodity is an object with use value. That use value creates an exchange value, which is modified by market expectations\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCommodities exchanges usually trade futures contracts on commodities, such as trading contracts to receive something, say corn, in a certain month..<br />\n<br />\nA farmer raising corn can sell a future contract on his corn, which will not be harvested for several months, and guarantee the price he will be paid when he delivers; a breakfast cereal producer buys the contract now and guarantees the price will not go up when it is delivered. This protects the farmer from price drops and the buyer from price rises\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSpeculators and investors also buy and sell the futures contracts in attempt to make a profit and provide liquidity to the system\u2026<br />\n<br />\nReal currencies NEVER soar or drop in value overnight. ..<br />\n<br />\nShould traders postpone sales of goods and services sold through bitcoin because they might receive a higher price for the same number of bitcoins tomorrow? ..<br />\n<br />\nShould buyers put off purchases to wait for the value of bitcoin to decline?...<br />\n<br />\nVolatile and manipulated Bitcoin\u2019s value is NOT determined by market expectations Bitcoin as a commodity has only an UNCERTAIN exchange value. It represents no underlying object with use value\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSome purchases may be made in bitcoins, but given the hourly fluctuation in its value relative to the dollar, it is NOT prudent. ..<br />\n<br />\nIt is IMPOSSIBLE to use bitcoin as a currency, since the price of goods valued in bitcoin is UNPREDICTABLE\u2014as a KOSHER mafia is controlling Bitcoin prices . ..<br />\n<br />\nThis mafia is buying up REAL ESTATE from gullible people..<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin, unlike real estate or tungsten, is that it has no intrinsic value beyond people\u2019s confidence, and confidence is the most volatile of things\u2026<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin is neither fish nor fowl, and its advocates argue that that is its virtue\u2014 MY LEFT BALL !..<br />\n<br />\nBandwidth for Bitcoin nodes has increased by 1.7 times since 2016. With more allocation of bandwidth, block size can increase without impacting decentralization. And with an increase per second cleared, transactions for bitcoin should be able to nearly double..<br />\n<br />\nSybil attacks can overinflate influence in a peer-to-peer system, making it appear there to be more consensus than the actual reality. ..These are real concerns for consensus networks like Bitcoin\u2026<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin MINING very centralized, with the top four miners in Bitcoin (and the top three miners in Ethereum) controlling more than 50% of the hash rate. ..<br />\n<br />\n51% attack is a attack vector that can appear when one entity ( and his mafia pool gang ) controls a large percentage of the overall network hashrate\u2026<br />\n<br />\nA 51% attack is eminently feasible \u2013 with the rise of MAFIA mining pools (groups of people mining together as a single unit)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nBITCOIN IS NOT DECENTRALISED \u2013AS PER PROPAGANDA..<br />\n<br />\nThe punishment for trading Bitcoin in India , must be jail and loss of registration. ..<br />\n<br />\nMoney laundering is happening at a VERY large scale and Arun Jaitley is allowing it. ..<br />\n<br />\nAnyone with a computer can set up a Bitcoin address to receive or transfer Bitcoins in seconds. .<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin is anonymous\u2014and capital flight is happening daily from India..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_75BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qs1bG6BIYlo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qs1bG6BIYlo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://www.news18.com/news/india/bitcoin-craze-how-fraudsters-are-fooling-investors-with-fake-cryptocurrency-1635143.html\">http://www.news18.com/news/india/bitcoin-craze-how-fraudsters-are-fooling-investors-with-fake-cryptocurrency-1635143.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">58% of\nBitcoin\u2019s \u201cnodes,\u201d the computers around the world running its software (not all\nof them engage in mining), are located in data centers.&nbsp; That indicates that Bitcoin is corporatized<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hundreds\nof cryptocurrencies now exist, and many of them work differently from Bitcoin.\nNot all of them rely on miners or even use a blockchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Part\nof the vision sold by the technology\u2019s biggest promoters is that it can help\nsolve problems of financial inequality created in part by traditional,\ncentralized institutions. If digital currency allows wealth and power to pool\nin the hands of a few, that aint revolutionary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Tether\nclaims to have one US dollar for each tether issued. However, there seems to\nhave been no completed audit to check this and there are claims that millions\nof tethers have been issued all of a sudden. &nbsp;There &nbsp;has been manipulation of bitcoin's price by\nthe tethers being used to buy bitcoin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ntether can be used as a store of value, spent as a medium of exchange, and has\na fixed unit of account like a traditional currency. &nbsp;&nbsp;Tether is acting like a central bank<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Tether\nsimply issues money, but regular fiat money is backed by the government and\nlaws that make it legal tender. Tether is not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As\nwith central banks, as long as people accept the currency they issue it can\nstill be used as a medium of exchange. While Bitfinex will not change tethers\ninto US dollars they will trade them for bitcoins. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Tethers\ncan be bought to use as a store of value, to in effect park US dollar\nequivalents and wait for other cryptocoins to decline in value until they\nappear so low as to be a buying opportunity. By being pegged to the US dollar,\ntethers cannot decline in the way that other cryptocurrencies have.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2557423265261052802\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_130M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/blockchain-bitcoin-intrinsic-value-of.html?showComment=1516370020554#c2557423265261052802\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 19, 2018 at 7:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_130MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/economy/policy/tax-notices-slapped-on-cryptocurrency-investors-as-trading-hits-3-5-billion/articleshow/62570494.cms<br />\n<br />\nFINED DONT WORK<br />\n<br />\nONLY JAIL WORKS IN INDIA<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE India has sent tax notices to tens of thousands of people dealing in cryptocurrency after a nationwide survey showed more than $3.5 billion worth of transactions have been conducted over a 17-month period, the income tax department said. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nIT IS FAR MORE THAN 3.5 BILION USD&nbsp;</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-01-19/as-bitcoin-sinks-crypto-bros-party-hard-on-a-blockchain-cruise\">https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-01-19/as-bitcoin-sinks-crypto-bros-party-hard-on-a-blockchain-cruise</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cryptocurrency investors are claiming to have\nlost their life savings in a devastating crash which saw a \u00a3200 virtual coin\nBitconnect &nbsp;become almost worthless\novernight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The coin launched at the beginning of last\nyear and went from being worth less than a cent to being valued at more than $463,\nwith the total BCC market worth about $2.8 billion .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BitConnect Coin was among the world\u2019s top 20\nmost successful cryptocurrency tokens until its price plunged 65 percent\nstarting January 3, 2018. Shortly after, on January 16, it announced it would\nshut down its cryptocurrency exchange.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;After\nBCC hit an all-time high of US $463 in December 2017, it declined to US $19.28\non January 16 2018<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was promoted by a bizarre and hilarious\nvideo showing a bald man called Carlos excitedly ranting about how much money\nhe\u2019s made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The film features clapping and whooping but\ndoes not contain shots of an actual audience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1YCVZPBhrjQ\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1YCVZPBhrjQ</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitconnect was a Ponzi Scheme \u2013 the name for\na type of scam practised by Bernie Madoff in which con artists pays old\ninvestors a return generated by cash pledged by new investors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitconnect Trading and is run by a man who\nalso operates a Bitcoin mining business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>I HAD WARNED ALL ABOUT BITCONNECT &nbsp;TWO MONTHS AGO</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThe most brazen of BitConnect\u2019s&nbsp;\nmarketing is a pyramid info-graphic depicting different percentage\nawards depending on the \u201clevel\u201d of member a user is. BitConnect, was registered\nby a British man under the name Ken Fitzsimmons. Interestingly, the name\ndoesn\u2019t appear anywhere within BitConnect\u2019s own literature leaving the\ncommunity with considerable doubt about the legitimacy of the platform. Bitconnect\nhas been showing signs recently that its top promoters are jumping ship.UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;$400\nmillion USD worth of new Tethers have been issued in just the last 4 days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Despite announcing in December that they were\nin the process of performing an audit of their balance sheet, the company has\nstill not published any information about their finances and how it compares to\nthe USDT token balance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is a large discrepancy between their\nUSD holdings and the amount of Tethers in circulation. The entire point of USDT\nis to maintain a 1:1 exchange ratio with the US dollar, which it achieves by\nguaranteeing that every tether is redeemable for 1 US dollar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was confirmed via the Paradise Papers \u2014\nconfidential electronic documents relating to offshore investments that were\nleaked to the public in Nov 2017, that Bitfinex and Tether are essentially\nsister companies with overlapping ownership between the two.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHOEVER WRITE ANYTHING AGAINST THIS CRUESOME\nDO\u2014THEY SUE IN COURTS WITH FAVORABLE JUDGES <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There had been long-held suspicions that a covert\nrelationship between the two existed and because whenever new USDT is printed\nout it is often sent straight to Bitfinex. .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It has been observed on numerous\noccasions that Bitcoin\u2019s price always seems to rise right after new USDT is\ndeposited into the Bitfinex exchange \u2014 which is enough for some to conclude\nthat the USDT is being used to buy Bitcoin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This new money flowing into Bitcoin causes\nits price to go up, which then spurs more investors to buy into it and\nbasically causes a snowballing effect that continually forces the price upwards\neven further.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
