This regulation threatens one of the core parts of Bitcoin, the\nfact that they can make anonymous transactions..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The new regulations are set to\ntake effect early next week, and will prevent those living outside of South\nKorea, and who do not have local bank accounts, and those who are 19 and under\nfrom buying or selling all cryptocurrencies. These rules are designed to crack\ndown on speculative trading and possible crimes, such as engaging in money\nlaundering and tax evasion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The requirements will ensure that an investors\ncrypto currency will come from a bank account that\u2019s owned by the same\nindividual, and all banks will be able to refuse to open accounts with crypto\ncurrency exchanges that do not disclose all information about any suspicious\ntrading<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>BITCOIN IS CRASHING.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>NO\u2014IT IS NOT A PIT STOP</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin \u201cinvestors\u201d (or, to be more accurate,\nspeculators) may be in denial, and analysts may be daunted by the complexities\nof blockchain technology. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin is\nfollowing the pattern of all manias and crashes since the Dutch went ga-ga over\nKOSHER tulips in 1636-37. Crashes following the world\u2019s biggest stock-market bubbles\nhave resulted in share price declines of 90%<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But remember, these were stock markets, which\nprice in real earnings by real companies. Bitcoin reflects mostly what people\nwill pay for it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoin buyers \u2014 do the fuckin' math. A 90% drop would drive it down\nto $2,000 or below.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency which is not\ncontrolled by a single administrator and can be used to buy things worldwide\nelectronically\u2014mostly clandestine trade via the dark web<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Bitcoin was designed to avoid being\nregulated.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Sorry\u2014bitcoin shall be regulated<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>India will KILL capital flight and money\nlaundering using bitcoin.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>BALLS to libertarian freedom !<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Bitcoin\nis not a currency because a currency is supposed to be a STABLE store of value\nand the currency that can fluctuate 30 % in a day can\u2019t be used for instance to\npay wages. This is unacceptable ..</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3658636147299051722\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_128M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\ncurrency is an instrument that implies three features:</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;a) intermediary of\nexchange,&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">b) measure of value and unit of account,&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">c) reserve of value: these\nthree features must coexist to consider it as money.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The definition is not\ntheoretical, but purely practical, it has been refined over time following\ncenturies of empirical observations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; In this regard, there are a lot of new and\ninnovative consensus mechanisms that are being worked on.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ethereum, which currently relies on Proof of Work to\nprocess a transaction, is in the process of transitioning to Proof of Stake.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Proof of Stake requires only a small fraction of the current electricity\nconsumption because of its unique architecture. Proof of Stake is achieved by\nusing the validators own Ethereum funds as collateral rather than large amounts\nof computational power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7692961479966662108\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_17M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bitcoins lost about its value over the\npast seven weeks - if Bitcoin were an actual currency, that would be the\nequivalent of a roughly 8,500 percent annual inflation rate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Asset\nbubbles are like \u201cnaturally occurring Ponzi schemes.\u201d Early investors in a\nbubble make a lot of money as new investors are drawn in, and those profits\npull in even more people. The process can go on for years before something \u2014 a\nreality check, or simply exhaustion of the pool of potential marks \u2014 brings the\nparty to a sudden, painful end.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">When\nit comes to cryptocurrencies there\u2019s an additional factor: It\u2019s a bubble, but\nit\u2019s also something of a cult, whose initiates are given to paranoid fantasies\nabout evil governments stealing all their money (as opposed to private hackers,\nwho have stolen a remarkably high proportion of extant cryptocurrency tokens).</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5554485860865310252\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_124M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The cryptocurrency claims to back up its 2.3 billion coins at a 1-to-1 ratio with US dollars.<br />\n<br />\nTether and Bitfinex don\u2019t disclose on their websites or in public documents where they\u2019re located or who\u2019s in charge<br />\n<br />\nJan Ludovicus van der Velde is the CEO of both. Phil Potter is a Tether director, according to documents -- dubbed the Paradise Papers -- recently leaked by the International Consortium of Investigative Journalists. He\u2019s also the chief strategy officer at Bitfinex.<br />\n<br />\nBitfinex is creating Tether coins out of thin air<br />\n<br />\nTETHER AND BITFINEX SUES BLOGGERS WHO WRITE ABOUT THEIR SCAM<br />\n<br />\nTether is an unregulated cryptocurrency token that was issued on the Bitcoin blockchain (before transitioning to the Litecoin blockchain) through the Omni Layer Protocol.<br />\n<br />\nTether is not a legal tender currency or a financial instrument. The ownership of Tether has no contractual rights, other legal claims, or guarantees against losses..Tether tokens are not legal tender currency and are not covered by deposit insurance.<br />\n<br />\nTether transactions violate regulatory compliance banking standards such as Know Your Customer and anti-money laundering standards required of financial institutions<br />\n<br />\nMODI GOVT HAS ALLOWED THEIR POLITICAL DONORS TO TAKE CAPITAL OUT OF INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nWE WATCH<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs KOSHER AGENCIES ARE STILL PROMOTING BITCOIN --BY ALLOWING ADS FAVOURABLE TO BITCOIN<br />\n<br />\nKOSHER Facebook\u2019s board of directors includes two MAJOR Bitcoin KOSHER investors \u2014 Marc Andreessen and Peter Thiel<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3422779250997806605\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_147M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/dubious-role-of-bilderberg-club-created.html?showComment=1517361104381#c3422779250997806605\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 31, 2018 at 6:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_147MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nBitcoin is up shit creek without a paddle.<br />\n<br />\nAfter bringing in millions of users to the cryptocurrency space, Bitcoin has hit a log jam on its network as available blocks fill up with transactions quicker than they can be mined. This backlog has led to higher transaction fees and longer waiting times.<br />\n<br />\nThese factors all end up being counterproductive to the principles underpinning cryptocurrency which are to eliminate the power that banks have over money. Banking fees and centralised waiting times are part and parcel of the irritation that comes from another entity being in control of one's money.<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin is increasingly picking up these bad habits<br />\n<br />\nThe bitcoin scalability problem is a consequence of the fact that records (known as blocks) in the bitcoin blockchain are limited to one megabyte in size. Bitcoin miner fees for processing bitcoin transactions rose to above $25 per transaction in December 2017, making small payments uneconomical<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin's blocks include the transactions on the bitcoin network. In contrast to the Visa payment network's peak of 47,000 transactions per second the bitcoin network's theoretical maximum capacity with the 1MB block size limit sits between 3.3 and 7 transactions per second<br />\n<br />\nPOOR BITCOIN<br />\n<br />\nTHROW A CHAPPATI IN ITS GENERAL DIRECTION<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3404498255658445118\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_168M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1517455241204#c3348455252132716335\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 1, 2018 at 8:50 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nBITFINEX AND TETHER ARE KEEPING SINKING BITCOIN AFLOAT.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS DUO ARE SUING BLOGGERS WHO EXPOSE THEM<br />\n<br />\nBitfinex is a crypto-currency exchange trading and currency-storage platform--it is the largest Bitcoin exchange platform<br />\n<br />\nTether is an unregulated cryptocurrency token that was issued on the Bitcoin blockchain..<br />\n<br />\nTether Limited has NOT subjected themselves to an audit--they are supported by KOSHER forces. They claim that each unit of Tether is backed by one United States dollar held in reserve by Tether Limited, and may be redeemed through the Tether Platform<br />\n<br />\nHundreds of millions of dollars worth of new Tether were created; almost always when the prices of other virtual currencies were heading down-- every body knows this scam..<br />\n<br />\nThe Tether were used on the Bitfinex exchange to make big purchases of Bitcoin and other tokens, helping push their prices back up..every single time the markets went down, you have seen the same thing happen.<br />\n<br />\nTether and Bitfinex are owned and operated by the same people<br />\n<br />\nMany of the largest virtual currency exchanges, including Bitfinex, operate with essentially no regulatory oversight.<br />\n<br />\nBitfinex was hacked in 2015 and again in 2016, and Tether was hacked at the end of last year \u2014 with the combined losses totaling more than $100 million-- all INSIDE JOBS<br />\n<br />\nThe Tether currency allows KOSHER traders to hold a stable token, tied to the value of the dollar, and move it quickly between virtual currency exchanges.<br />\n<br />\nIn a single week in mid-January, $450 million new Tether were created, bringing the total amount of Tether to more than $2 billion.<br />\n<br />\nJan Ludovicus van der Velde is the CEO of both Tether and Bitfinex, though he\u2019s little more than a name--like SATOSHI NAKAMOTO<br />\n<br />\nPRICE MANIPULATION IS GOING ON-- BJPs POLITIAL DONORS ARE SHIFTING CAPITAL ABROAD<br />\nVIA BITCOIN---ARUN JAITLEY IS VERY VERY QUIET-- ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY<br />\nRBI GOVERNOR<br />\nSBI CHAIRMAN<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nMEA<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nHOME MINISTER<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES ( LEAVE OUT MAMATA AND KACHRAWAAL )<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKTS</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3549207369145062642\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_16M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1517475783051#c3549207369145062642\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 1, 2018 at 2:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_16MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\n<br />\nhttps://qz.com/1195316/budget-2018-busts-bitcoin-arun-jaitley-has-just-killed-indias-cryptocurrency-party/<br />\n<br />\nWELL DONE ARUN JAITLEY !<br />\n<br />\nFinance minster Arun Jaitley, in his budget speech today (Feb. 01), stated that the government will do everything to discontinue the use of bitcoin and other virtual currencies in India. He reiterated that India does not recognise them as legal tender and will instead encourage blockchain technology in payment systems.<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Hashgraph is a consensus protocol because\nit provides a distributed consensus platform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It allows community users to generate\ntransactions, and agree on the order in which they did the transactions, in an\nenvironment where everyone trusts no single user.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Hashgraph can achieve a consensus, and\nstill be fast, fair, provable, efficient and inexpensive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Hashgraph is fair because no single node\ncan manipulate the transactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That means there is no way for an individual\nto control which instruction is going to occur, and which one is to be\npostponed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">In a blockchain, a miner is allowed to choose\nwhat to include and what to discard in their block. If two people say Muniyaandi\nand Muniyamma are transacting, a blockchain miner can choose to carry Muniyaandi\u2019s\ntransaction and drop Muniyamma\u2019s , but in a Hashgraph platform, an individual\nmust include both transactions in the order they were received.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The transactions from the Hashgraph are\nprovable because once a transaction occurs; it only takes a few minutes before\neveryone in a community knows where the transactions will be queued in the\nledger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Moreover, everyone will be aware that the\nwhole community knows about it, and therefore, implement the changes caused by\nthe transaction, and discard it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is no need to keep the record in their\nledger for life. That\u2019s why unlike Bitcoin\u2019s 160 GB blockchain, Hashgraph\u2019s\nplatform only needs a device to have less than one gig of storage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Therefore, you can use a typical phone to run\nthe Hashgraph platform.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The term technical term Byzantine means that\nno small group of members or single member can stop a community from reaching a\nconsensus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Furthermore, once a consensus has been\nreached, the smaller group or individual cannot change it, and every member\nwill know eventually learn the network has reached a consensus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blockchain doesn\u2019t guarantee a Byzantine\nagreement; each member never gets to a point where they believe they have\nreached a consensus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For example, if a group of miner cut-off from\nthe rest of the internet from a few minutes, the can easily reach a consensus\nwithin a short time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Hashgraph, no effort is wasted. That\u2019s because\nthe list of transactions or what\u2019s equivalent to a \u201cblock\u201d in the blockchain,\nis never discarded by the community.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All \u201cblocks\u201d are utilized to reach a\nconsensus.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Also, the need for proof-of-work makes the\nblockchain technology expensive to run when the mining power of the community\nincreases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The proof-of-work is a series of calculations\nthat are fulfilling any other purpose apart from slowing down the community in\ngenerating new blocks. Since Hashgraph doesn\u2019t require proof-of-work, no\n\u201cblocks\u201d are wasted, and it\u2019s therefore 100% efficient.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Hashgraph, each transaction receives a\ntime stamp that is an average of the time it was received by each community\nmember.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That timestamp guarantees it\u2019s provable and\nByzantine. The timestamp remains reliable as long as the participating members\nare running reliable clocks on the mining machines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In contrast, the blockchain only uses the\ntimestamp of the machine that mined the block that was accepted by the 50+1\nmining power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The timestamp consensus is useful in the\nsmart contract because it helps to determine if an event met a deadline or not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Hashgraph is resistant to DoS because an\nattack on one member of the network will not stop the rest of the community\nfrom continuing processing transactions successfully.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DoS attack - Denial of Service attack &nbsp;is a type of attack on a network that is\ndesigned to bring the network to its knees by flooding it with useless traffic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A total DoS attack on a Hashgraph requires\nthe attacker to attack all members at once, which is prohibitively expensive.\nThe Blockchain is resistant to DoS attack, also, but it attempts to avoid\nproof-of-work using the round robin or leaders system makes it vulnerable to\nit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The attack only needs to be able to predict\nthe current leader, attack them, identify the next one just before the\nhandover, and attack them as well. The Hashgraph isn\u2019t vulnerable to such\nattacks and doesn\u2019t need proof-of-work. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DDoS, or Distributed Denial of Service\nattacks, begin when hackers take control of a large number of devices, or\n\u2018bots\u2019.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These can be anything from mobile phones to laptops \u2013 anything that can\naccess the internet. Often, the owners of the devices have no idea that they\u2019ve\nbeen hacked and never will.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The aim is to overwhelm the target website\u2019s server\nwith a huge amount of traffic, causing the site to slow down significantly or\neven stop working. This can be catastrophic for organizations, causing them to\nlose large amounts of money through site inactivity or suffer reputational\ndamage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DDoS works by targeting bandwidth \u2013 the\nattack is successful if the perpetrators can hurl enough traffic at the server\nto totally consume its bandwidth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks\nare nothing new, but recent attacks are increasing in severity, complexity, and\nfrequency and have therefore become a mainstream concern for businesses and\nprivate customers alike<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That means that disaster can be averted by\nsimply providing more bandwidth, preventing the attackers from being able to\nuse all of it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Hashgraph is non-permissioned, although\nit doesn\u2019t require proof-of-work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For example, it allows members to vote\naccording to their ownership stake or proof-of-stake. That stops Sybill\nattacks, where attackers use large hordes of fake accounts to prevent the\nsystem from reaching a consensus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Therefore, it remains secure without the use\nof proof-of-work. In a permissioned system, only members who have been vetted\nare allowed to participate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WARNING-- TO BE SUCCESSFUL:: \u2013 </span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">HASHGRAPH DISCARDS \u201cOLD BLOCK \u201c ONCE A\nTRANSATION IS VERIFIED \u2013 IT DOES NOT KEEP A RECORD OF THE DETAILS AS BLOCKCHAIN\nDOES.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BLOCKCHAIN RECORDS THE ENTIRE\nCHAIN FROM GENESIS BLOCK ONWARDS</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_84M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1517535462030#c3006957714362386041\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 2, 2018 at 7:07 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCoincheck is a bitcoin wallet and exchange service headquartered in Tokyo, Japan<br />\n<br />\nIn January 2018, Coincheck was hacked into and approximately 523 million USD was stolen.<br />\n<br />\nIt is an INSIDE job<br />\n<br />\nCoincheck hasn\u2019t disclosed how their system was breached beyond saying that it wasn\u2019t an inside job. Coincheck lacked multi-signature security, a measure requiring multiple sign-offs before funds can be moved.<br />\n<br />\nCoincheck has identified and published 11 addresses where all 523 million of the stolen coins ended up. You can see for yourself online. Trouble is, no one knows who owns the accounts<br />\n<br />\nAs prices of digital assets have soared, the platforms have become increasingly juicy targets for hackers--almost all were INSIDE jobs<br />\n<br />\nTether is a digital currency from a company of the same name. The coin, USDT, is allegedly pegged to the US dollar, backed by real deposits in real banks... somewhere. Where? No one really knows.<br />\n<br />\nTether is issued by Tether Holdings Limited on the Bitfinex exchange. In short, Bitfinex basically has a faucet it can turn on to issue tether/USDT in exchange for whatever traders want to give it. Want to hand over your Bitcoin - it will gladly give you \"market value\" in USDT.<br />\n<br />\nWhere did those USDT come from?&nbsp; Fuck knows !<br />\n<br />\nIn theory, the dollars backing those tethers are held in a bank account.<br />\n<br />\nLast year, the Paradise Papers (these are records of \"secret\" offshore bank accounts from hundreds of companies and individuals) revealed the CEO of Bitfinex is Jan Ludovicus van der Velde.<br />\n<br />\nThe CEO of Tether? Same guy Jan Ludovicus van der Velde. Nobody even knows if Jan baby exists .<br />\n<br />\nAnother couple of the people associated with Bitfinex and Tether are Philip Potter - Chief Strategy Officer, and Giancarlo Devasini.<br />\n<br />\nOn December 6th, The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission sent subpoenas to Bitfinex and Tether. But hey,this has NOT cramped their style or slowed them down<br />\n<br />\nThe last known audit was from September 2017, when Friedman LLP reported there was $400 million on deposit. All banks names were redacted in the report. Additionally, Friedman went so far as to basically say it had no idea where the money came from but when it looked there was money in account<br />\n<br />\nFriedman has ended its relationship with both parties? Not only that, but Friedman went so far as to remove language on its website that indicated it had been involved with auditing Bitfinex.<br />\n<br />\nShould USDT exist? Wouldn't it be more transparent to just use US dollars?<br />\n<br />\nA basic idea of the blockchain is that it persists the history of the transactions.<br />\n<br />\nWhy not make the accounts public?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5607458831202185889\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_85M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1517554101980#c5607458831202185889\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 2, 2018 at 12:18 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_85MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nBITCOIN KO LODA LAGG GAYA .<br />\n<br />\nToday Bitcoin is 8400 USD \u201335 days ago it was 20,000 USD<br />\n<br />\nSo Ethereum is jumping up and down in glee.<br />\n<br />\nEthereum, that also uses blockchain, is predicted by some experts to overtake Bitcoin .<br />\n<br />\nEthereum is an open-source, public service that uses blockchain technology to facilitate smart contracts and cryptocurrency trading securely without a third party.<br />\n<br />\nThere are two accounts available through Ethereum: externally owned accounts (controlled by private keys influenced by human users) and contract accounts.<br />\n<br />\nEthereum allows developers to deploy all kinds of decentralized apps. Bitcoin trades in cryptocurrency, while Ethereum offers several methods of exchange including cryptocurrency (Ethereum\u2019s is called Ether), smart contracts and the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM).<br />\n<br />\nThey are based on different security protocols: Ethereum uses a \u2018proof of stake\u2019 system as opposed the \u2018proof of work\u2019 system used by Bitcoin.<br />\n<br />\nBitcoin allows only public (permissionless or censor-proof) transactions to take place; Ethereum allows both permissioned and permissionless transactions.<br />\n<br />\nThe average block time for Ethereum is significantly less than Bitcoin\u2019s; 12 seconds versus 10 minutes. This translates into more block confirmations which allows Ethereum\u2019s miners to complete more blocks and receive more Ether.<br />\n<br />\nIt is estimated that by 2021 only half of the Ether coins will be mined (a supply of more than 90 million tokens), but the majority of Bitcoins already have been mined (its supply is capped at 21 million).<br />\n<br />\nFor Bitcoin, the computers (called miners) running the platform and verifying the transactions receive rewards. Basically, the first computer that solves each new block gets bitcoins (or a fraction of one) as a reward.<br />\n<br />\nEthereum does not offer block rewards and instead allows miners to take a transaction fee. Ethereum is still experiencing growing pains and suffers from some of the same issues that Bitcoin does primarily in its scalability.<br />\n<br />\nIn 2016, $50 million in Ether was stolen by an anonymous hacker which resulted in questions about the platform\u2019s security. This caused a split within the Ethereum community and it broke off into two blockchains: Ethereum (ETH) and Ethereum Classic (ETC).<br />\n<br />\nThere have been dramatic fluctuations in the price of Ether, but the Ethereum currency grew more than 13,000 percent in 2017.<br />\n<br />\nThe huge volatility makes investors cautious.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7013489673801400374\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_96M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. TEN YEARS IS A VERY LONG TIME...<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL SAYS ZILCH...<br />\n<br />\nOTHER THAN MANIPULATED SMART CONTRACTS CHEATING ( INSIDE JOBS ) PEOPLE, WITH HIGH TECHNOLOGY..<br />\n<br />\nCryptocurrencies\u2014 like Bitcoin , Ether etc are the means by which one participates in public blockchain protocols. This is not optional. It\u2019s a fundamental feature of the technology<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK ARUN JAITLEY TO DO HIS HOMEWORK- BEFORE HE MOUTHS OFF NONSENSE<br />\n<br />\nIf a public blockchain protocol is valuable, then the tokens through which one participates in it accrue value.<br />\n<br />\nCryptocurrency is a misnomer. Almost none of the hundreds of cryptocurrencies function anything like currencies. To invest in cryptocurrencies is not to engage in foreign exchange trading.<br />\n<br />\nInstead, think of cryptocurrencies as digital assets tied to the value of a particular blockchain protocol.<br />\n<br />\nWhen Bitcoin was the only blockchain, there wasn\u2019t much of a distinction between the terms and they were used interchangeably<br />\n<br />\nAdmittedly, one reason for this misconception is that Bitcoin was originally billed as a currency, but in the intervening years since the creation of Bitcoin, a variety of digital assets have emerged and even Bitcoin itself is now best thought of as a store of value ( MANIPULATED BY MAFIA ) rather than a more traditional currency.<br />\n<br />\nTo use the protocol to write and execute a smart contract, participants in the transaction must have a cryptocurrency stake in that protocol<br />\n<br />\nThe more popular the network, the greater the rise in the value of the network\u2019s tokens. Why is that? Supply and demand.<br />\n<br />\nCRYPTO CURRENCY HAS THE INHERENT ABILITY TO BRING GIANT ECONOMIES ON ITS KNEES.<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO INDIAs THINK TANKS HAVE PEOPLE WHO HAVE SHIT FOR BRAINS?<br />\n<br />\nWE TELL THESE IDIOTS-DO NOT DIVE OFF THE DEEP END WITHOUT VERIFYING OURSELVES ... WE DONT NEED TO RIDE ON WHITE MANs BRAINS..<br />\n<br />\nFor blockchain to build value (beyond false ICO --INITIAL COIN OFFERINGS--<br />\nexpectations), the industry needs to mature.<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO I SAY --ALL CRYPTO CURRENCY HACKS ARE INSIDE J0BS ? ASK ANY DECENT PROGRAMMER WHO KNOW HOW TO CODE. LOOP HOLES AND BACK DOORS ARE ALWAYS THERE.<br />\n<br />\nANY DECENT PROGRAMMER KNOWS HOW TO SCREW HIS COMPANY IF THEY SACK HIM IN A MEAN WAY-- UNFAIRLY.<br />\n<br />\nClearly smart contracts will play large roles in very simple deals, but in more finessed areas, these will take much much longer than people anticipate and come with some gaping flaws (like the DAO heist)<br />\n<br />\nIndeed Blockchain simplifies recording keeping, reducing the need for a large percentage of government employees whose sole job is to create and maintain paperwork.<br />\n<br />\nBut in India are we short of people ? Why this extreme tearing hurry to latch on to BLOCHCHAIN -UDU ( or is it ULU ? )<br />\n<br />\nIf India really want to get rid of PARASITES -- shut down the Income Tax dept and go for BTT<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/abolish-income-tax-in-india-have.html<br /><br />ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/blockchain-bitcoin-intrinsic-value-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n##########<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY<br />\nRBI GOVERNOR<br />\nSBI CHAIRMAN<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTER I&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nEDUCATION MINISTER<br />\nHOME MINISTER<br />\nCOMMERCE MINISTER<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES --EXCEPT MAMATA AND KACHRAWAAL.<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKTS</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The total value of all the Bitcoin in\nexistence is $143 billion, while Ethereum sits at $88 billion. &nbsp;Bitcoin was the first true cryptocurrency, and\nhas been in circulation since 2009. &nbsp;Ethereum\nis a far more recent development, going live in 2015. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the time between Bitcoin and Ethereum\u2019s\nrelease, lots of other cryptocurrencies emerged. &nbsp;Mostly, however, they were limited to trying\nto improve on aspects of Bitcoin\u2019s performance \u2013 for example, increasing speed\nof transactions, or improving the security or anonymity of transactions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nnumber of cryptocurrencies available over the internet &nbsp;is over 1385 and growing.. Jayasi wrote a poem Padmavat (1540), describing the story of the historic siege of Chittor by Alauddin Khalji in 1303....<br />\n<br />\nA RAJPUT RULER RATAN SINGH HEARD OF HER GREAT BEAUTY AND STATELY QUALITIES - HE CAME ALL THE WAY FROM RAJASTHAN TO SEE HER . ... padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_156b+seedCw4iD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_154B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_154M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/blockchain-bitcoin-intrinsic-value-of.html?showComment=1516406821587#c1077942026063007719\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 20, 2018 at 5:37 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_154MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe Theatre du Chatelet Paris' is the largest opera house of France\u2026\u2026\u2026. Paris, theater of the Ch\u00e2telet. 14-III-2008. Albert Roussel (1869-1937): Padm\u00e2vat\u00ee , opera-ballet in 2 acts on a libretto by Louis Laloy . Directed by: Sanjay Leela Banshali ; Backgrounds : Omung Kumar Bhandula ; Costumes: Rajesh Pratap Singh ; Choreography: Tanusree Shankar ; Lights: Somak Mukherjee . With: Sylvie Brunet , Padm\u00e2vat\u00ee; \u2026\u2026.. Finnur Bjarnason , Ratan-Sen; \u2026\u2026\u2026 Alain Fondary , Alaouddin; \u2026\u2026\u2026. Yann Beuron , the Brahman; Blandine Folio Peres , Nakamti; Fran\u00e7ois Piolino , Badal; Laurent Alvaro , Gora; Alain Gabriel , The Watcher; Jean-Vincent Blot , a Priest. Ch\u0153ur du Ch\u00e2telet ( conductor : Stephen Betteridge ), Radio-France Philharmonic Orchestra, conductor: Lawrence Foster \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nA POOR SUBSTITUTE SYLVIE BRUNET FINALLY DID THE PART OF QUEEN PADMAVATHY \u2026\u2026\u2026 THE OPERA FLOPPED --FELL PHUTTT-- \u2026\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nON 14TH MARCH 2008--HERE IS THE REVIEW \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026 Rest the staging ... One thing is sure: this one has not met unanimity, neither for nor against it. \"Bad taste\", \"first degree\", \"too busy\" could be heard among the various comments. In any case of the great spectacle, it was nevertheless expected of the Indian filmmaker Sanjay Leela Banshali, a little too quickly called \"director Bollywood\". Ballet body \"imported\" from India and settled by Tanusree Shankar (the niece by marriage of Ravi Shankar), subtle effects of light, smoke, menagerie sue scene (a horse, an elephant, a tiger, But the serpent announced was carried pale), parade of Hindu gods, ... A very down to earth reading, respectful to the line of the text, very spectacular, high and rich in colors. This profusion of effects can lead to a visual saturation (and sound, for the next time it will be necessary to remove the metallic jewels of the dancers), it is indisputable that Sanjay Leela Banshali controls his direction of actors, nothing is left to chance , All the movements are connected with natural. With its previous productions, the Th\u00e9\u00e2tre du Ch\u00e2telet clearly demonstrated that it was emerging as a stage in the \"grand spectacle\". And whether we appreciate or not this debauchery of colors, the present production is likely to prove to be prominent\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT BLOOD WIPED FROM THE FLOOR, BEING OFFERED ON THE SHIVA LINGAM - BY QUEEN PADMAVATHY.<br />\n<br />\nWATCH SHIVA DOING THE TANDAV..<br />\n<br />\nWATCH NANDI THE BULL...<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V_WPJCSRvW4</span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT TYPE OF DIRECTION IS THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS THE SHIVA LINGAM BEING DENIGRATED ?<br />\n<br />\nANY BOLLYOOD DIRECTOR WHO DENIGRATES HINDUSIM OR GLORIFIES HOMOSEXUALITY - IS PROPPED UP BY ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FRENCH OPERA FLOPPED..--FELL PHUTTT--<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A4gjOv8oIcU</span><br />\n<br />\nIN A KINGDOM LIKE SAUDI ARABIA, SANJAY LEELA BHASALI WOULD HAVE BEEN BEHEADED FOR BLASPHEMY, AT THE CITY SQUARE --WITH MILLIONS WATCHING<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_156b+seedCw4iD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_156b+seedCw4iD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
