Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "202", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1751929246063623184/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "4532031403838278418", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2018-01-15T00:06:00+05:30", "updated": "2019-04-21T08:11:27+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTU1ODE0NDg3NTcxCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_15.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4532031403838278418", "title": "SANATANA DHARMA , HINDUISM EXHUMED AND RESURRECTED, PART 89 - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 88, BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_11.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_11.html</a></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_169B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7386461603969836280\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_169M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_11.html?showComment=1515931360222#c7386461603969836280\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">January 14, 2018 at 5:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_169MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LIFE IS 1% OF WHAT HAPPENS TO YOU AND 99% OF HOW YOU REACT TO TRIGGERS. YOUR ACTIONS GOVERN YOUR KARMA.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FOR REDUCING YOU KARMIC BAGGAGE YOU HAVE TO DO YOGA</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">YOGA DEALS WITH HARNESSING / STIMULATING THE VAGUS NERVE AND AMYGDALA</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Emotional and physical pains and their intensity are similar in nature and the brain does not differentiate between the two. MRI scans of the subjects showed that the pain of rejection (emotional pain) and stubbing of big toe (physical pain) illuminated the same part of the brain.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Emotional pain allows the brain to intensely focus on resolving the conflicts and at the same time helps it to send and receive thought packets.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Yoga helps to remove the useless and squeamish \u201d monkey chatter\u201d sense organ inputs to the brain from various parts of the body.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Vagus nerve is the only nerve in the body that is present through each one of the 7 Chakras.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It will take modern scientists another 200 years to master the Vagus nerve...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The 108 marma points of ancient Kalari and Ayurveda were mostly to stimulate the Vagus nerve and the Amydgala.. we were grandmasters in this field ( which the white invader called superstition )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Vagus nerve acts as the mind-body connection, and it is the cabling behind your heart\u2019s emotions and gut instincts.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Vagus nerve is stimulated when we feel empathy. When we connect with someone else's emotions and feel for them, the Vagus nerve gets stimulated.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Vagus nerve is attached to emotions, and hence the right lobe of our brain.--right lobe is subconscious for right handers</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The parasympathetic system is pretty automatic and not within that \"conscious\" control.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sometimes you need to step back and \"allow\" intelligent conscious morphogenetic energy to flow the way it normally would if you didn't put up a fight or flight ( triggered by the amygdala )</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HUMANS ARE MORE CONSCIOUS THAN ANIMALS AS WE HAVE MORE AMYGDALA NUCLEI</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The amygdala is the most PRIMAL, sensitive and most active structures in the brain. It uses more blood than any other part of the brain.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You cannot control amygdala\u2019s immediate, instinctive, automatic reactions because they happen much before your consciousness kicks in.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Harnessing the amygdala is the miracle of yoga&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Amygdala makes your body ready to fight or flight the situation. Imagine you are taking a piss and suddenly find that you are pissing onthe head of an angry black mamba.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WITHIN A MICRO SECOND--Heart beats faster. Muscles tense. Blood pressure rises. Adrenalin is pumped into your bloodstream. More sweating. Lungs take in more O2- the works</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Your prefrontal cortex (rational brain) is not able to switch off the false alarms raised by an amygdala that has been triggered by thoughts and memories. Remember the amygdala is not out to get you. Quite the contrary this primal organ is trying to protect you</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The brain can and does change.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The amygdala can and does do both - sensitize as well as desensitize. Being TRAGEDY KING or MELODRAMA QUEEN affets your thoughts, intentions and actions .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GOD HAS GIVEN HUMANS NARROW BANDWIDTHS FOR 5 SENSES AND THESE SENSES ARE SQUELCHED--SO THAT YOU DONT REACT FOR NO REASON LIKE AN ASSHOLE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Neuroscience is showing that we can change our brain's wiring at any age. Meditation rewires the brain.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The amygdala has been implicated in nearly every psychiatric disorder. We don\u2019t have animals with mood swings, and OCD , right?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The amygdala has a substantial role in mental states, and is related to many psychological disorders. Children with anxiety disorders tend to have a smaller left amygdala.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Larger amygdalae allow for greater emotional intelligence, enabling greater societal integration and cooperation with others.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There are functional differences between the right and left amygdala. Electrical stimulations of the right amygdala induce negative emotions, especially fear and sadness.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_169MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_169BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_169B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_170B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2425128547841936012\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_170M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_11.html?showComment=1515931423110#c2425128547841936012\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">January 14, 2018 at 5:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_170MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nIn contrast, stimulation of the left amygdala mostly induces happiness. The left amygdala plays a role in the brain's reward system. The amygdala is the seat of emotion.<br />\n<br />\nPsychopaths and homosexuals lack emotion. They lack empathy, remorse, guilt.<br />\n<br />\nBrain scans of psychopaths and hardcore homosexuals show a deformation in the amygdala compared to non-psychopaths.<br />\n<br />\nIt is the amygdala which jolts our bodies in fear, form emotional memories, helps us feel our dreams and can shape the effects of certain stress disorders and phobias.<br />\n<br />\nThe amygdala has an important role in memory. It reminds us, for better or worse, of past situations.<br />\n<br />\nThe amygdala is responsible for those persistent thoughts and extra mental baggage we wish we would forget. It nags us with recollections of painful or shocking events. You cant be IN THE MOMENT<br />\n<br />\nSurya namaskar harnesses your amygdala. It must be done with the associated mantras . It is NOT a physical exercise<br />\n<br />\nThe post below is the most widely read among all my 1287 posts-- 96% by foreigners<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html<br />\n<br />\nStimulating the amygdala can be done by Pranayama .<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WRITE ABOUT PRANA YOU WILL KNOW WHAT I MEAN<br />\n<br />\nActivating the amygdala in a positive way stimulates higher order mental processes. This can improve creativity and intelligence while elevating positive emotion.<br />\n<br />\nIT WILL TAKE MODERN SCIENTISTS 300 YEARS TO UNDERSTAND THE HUMAN AMYGDALA.<br />\n<br />\nThere are Links ( which can be modified ) between homosexuality and the connectivity of the amygdala to the rest of the brain.<br />\n<br />\nHomosexuality depends on hormonal factors operating during fetal life and NOT genetics.<br />\n<br />\nHomosexuals are more likely to be left-handed.<br />\n<br />\nNo baby is born a homosexual. While the amygdala is almost fully developed at birth, the prefrontal cortex does not mature until early adulthood.<br />\n<br />\nDamage to the amygdala can thus result in behavioral deficits such as autism, post traumatic stress syndrome, child abuse, alcoholism, etc.<br />\n<br />\nThe amygdala is not only sensitive to physical hurt but also to emotional hurt.<br />\n<br />\nAmygdala is involved in both the basic emotions such as pain, pleasure, fear, disgust, surprise, and anger but also in social emotions, viz., shame, guilt, love, embarrassment, envy, jealousy, and pride.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike western psychiatrists and psychoanalysts the yogi does not commit suicide<br />\n<br />\nBy stimulating the amygdala you cane be in the flow.<br />\n<br />\nBeing in flow on auto-pilot results in single-minded focus and joy that comes from losing yourself in productive activity.<br />\n<br />\nTrivial issues don't slow you down ( like MELODRAMA QUEEN ) when you are actively engaged and living creatively. You will NOT view life through a narrow prism like our KUMAARI MAYAWATI<br />\n<br />\nSilencing the body is easy, but silencing the mind is difficult in this modern age. Silencing is about grace, harmony and tranquility. Exhaustion is NOT tranquility.<br />\n<br />\nIn the modern age people get stressed, and they need to still the mind--the chattering monkey, which remains entangled in the past and the imagined future, but never in the present.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_170MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_170BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_170B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_171B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7909315952926669242\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_171M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_11.html?showComment=1515931495236#c7909315952926669242\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">January 14, 2018 at 5:34 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_171MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nMeditation is about holding your mind to the present. The aim of every form of meditation is to still the mind, or you cant purify it and get rid of deep rooted negativities , which affect your health and even give you severe migraines.<br />\n<br />\nMeditation is a surgical operation of your subconscious mind to remove and discard negativity / ego and improve tolerance, grace and kindness.<br />\n<br />\nFor a layman-- you are stressed when your hands feel cold, your heart rate, breathing, and muscle tension increases. The result is that your immune system goes for a toss and you get depressed or burnt out.. Depression is a weird feeling of loss .<br />\n<br />\nMeditation teaches you to look inwards, with awareness , within yourself and know the true nature of all sensations, and loosen the stranglehold of habits and vices.. He scans his own body and sees where the stress and tension is.<br />\n<br />\nHe just witnesses , he does not react. His mind does not control him, rather he controls his mind. It is a universal remedy for all universal ills.<br />\n<br />\nPatanjali says that once the gunas (result of karma) are resolved through Yoga then the soul becomes pure (without memory) and merges into Universal Consciousness ( brahman )<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOUL is the source of\nconsciousness..&nbsp;&nbsp; The soul is that part\nof us that enables us to be aware of ourselves.&nbsp; &nbsp;All life has soul within&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No matter what our past\ndeeds might have been like, the present moment is totally a new opportunity\n..&nbsp; Hindusim gives all a fresh\nopportunity to&nbsp; choose how we think or\nact.&nbsp;&nbsp; Karma is our own choice made\nentirely through our free will in the present moment regardless of our past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A SOUL can lessen its\nkarmic baggage only when inside a human body</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After one\u2019s death, when\nthe soul is parked in one of the bottom six astral layers , it does not possess\nKriya Shakti or the ability to act or perform Kriyamana Karma. This starts\nagain at rebirth.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The accumulated result\nof all actions from all our past lifetimes is called \"Sanchita Karma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agami Karma:\nApproaching or Future Karma: This is the Karma or the actions that are now\ngoing to be done which will give their results later in the future. Some of\nAgami Karmas bear fruit in the current life; others are stored for future\nbirths in the form of Sanchita Karma. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kriyamana Karma: This\nis Karma that we create in our daily life because of our thoughts, will and\nactions. It refers to the decisions before us to act upon. These karma\nconsequences add to our Future Sanchita Karma as we perform the current karma.\nBut, not all of this karma goes to the Sanchita balance and some of them can\nfructify in the current life<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When it comes to Karma,\nit is useful to show gratitude toward the universe and to develop an attitude\nof service. &nbsp;&nbsp;By being thankful and\nalways seeking to serve the greater good, you will naturally place yourself\nwithin the flow of cooperation and congeniality within the universe. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you act as an agent of universal good,\ngood things happen.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In this way, you attract good Karma through your SHRADDHA\nto the laws of the universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lack of ego, greed and\njealousy ( austerity ) brings fruits at once. That is why the delivery of karma\nis faster for those who do meditation or spiritual practices.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A yogi (enlightened\none) is not affected by his karmas because he has no attachment. He is\nabsolutely desireless. Karmas cannot bind him<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogi does his karmas\nwithout ego or the feeling of \"I am the doer\". Since he is not the\n\"doer\" karma can not bind him. He works without expectation of any\nfruits for his actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since he is \"not\nthe doer\" he does not have to enjoy the fruits of his actions. He has\nreached state of perfection. He works for the upliftment of humanity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>TILL THE WHITE INVADER\nCAME TO INDIA, NO WRITTEN BOOK HAD THE AUTHORS NAME AFFIXED ON IT.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS\nWAS WHY IT WAS EASY FOR ANCIENT GREEKS TO COME TO INDIA, STUDY AT KODUNGALLUR\nUNIVERSITY, STEAL KNOWLEDGE AND PATENT IT IN THEIR NAMES .. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AFTER KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY BLACKBALLED THE\nTHIEVING GREEKS , THEIR FOUNTAIN HEAD OF KNOWLEDGE DRIED UP\u2014IT IS SO RIDICULOUS ..\n&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THEN THE WHITE MAN STARTED USING ARABS\nAS MIDDLEMEN WITH TRANSLATED ( INTO ARABIC ) &nbsp;KNOWLEDGE BOUGHT FOR GOLD.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b>THESE ARABS WERE\nSTUPID AND DID NOT EVEN KNOW WHAT KNOWLEDGE THEY BOUGHT FOR GOLD AND PATENTED\nIN THEIR OWN NAMES , BEFORE PASSING IT ON TO WHITE MEN FOR A PITTANCE </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have been given the\nindriyas, and the power of viveka, CONSCIOUS discrimination,&nbsp; to help us know what is good and what is bad.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do not mistake the power of viveka with the mind because the mind is nothing\nbut a bundle of thoughts. If you follow the mind and not your viveka, you will\nend up making mistakes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind has the power to grasp but not discriminate. That\nis why Hindu tradition emphasises the need to control both our mind and our\nsense organs because they impact our karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the universe was\ncreated, the law of karma came into play. No one can escape it. Therefore the\nintention to do good karma has to come from within; only then can you set in\nmotion the process of overcoming bad karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If we use viveka to\nensure that the five indriyas follow the path of righteousness, our accumulated\n\u2018bad\u2019 karma can be reduced to some extent. When a person dies, his karmas are\nnot burnt or buried with his lifeless body. Karma stays and gets carried\nforward to the next birth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karmic baggage is\ncarried by you&nbsp; alone . No pharaoh can\nemploy a porter to carry his karmic baggage on your behalf nor can he transfer\nhis karmic baggage to someone else. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is solely the\nresult of self-action based on the action-reaction philosophy embedded in\nQuantum physics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is the result of\nyour actions and INTENDS\u2014there is good karma and bad karma .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forgiveness is very\nimportant to living a life of positive Karma. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You may have\nundesirable experiences due to past Karma. This cosmic debt can only be paid\nonce the lessons are learned and experiences have been fully processed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your attachment to the\ndecision-making process and identification with the vulnerable ego is what\nopens the door for undesired Karma.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nDetachment from this, and developing true trust in your Self and the\nUniverse, will always lead you to the \u201cright\u201d path. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Giving is important\nwhen paying attention to Karma,&nbsp; You can\ncreate better Karma for yourself moving forward by being a blessing and force\nfor good in other\u2019s lives. From today onwards\u2014on every birthday of yours give\nsomething to the needy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As an evolving\nindividual, you\u2019re here on earth to learn. Many of life\u2019s problems can be\nsolved by simply stopping to appreciate the lesson in them. Since this is a\ncore factor of Karma, you can create better experiences for yourself by truly\nappreciating the wisdom you gain from them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When something bad happens in your life, sometimes a simple shift in\nattention is all it takes to transform that happening into something better.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Allow yourself to\ngrieve for a moment, but place more attention on what you\u2019ve gained from the\nexperience. Even when it comes to something as grim as death, try to place more\nattention on the blessings of the person and the happier emotions of the past.\nThis will undoubtedly allow you to feel better,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universe is here to\nserve your inner being in growth, love, and health. Even the bad stuff is truly\nmeant to teach or help you with something.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try seeing things from this\nperspective by asking yourself: \u201cWhat is there for me to gain?\u201d or \u201cWhat have I\nlearned through this pain ?\u201d Sometimes this is enough to transform even the\nhardest experiences into Karmic blessings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6206652247577723531\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_4M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 15, 2018 at 1:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_4MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSOMEONE CALLED ME AND CRIED</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI DONT BELIEVE YOU WHEN YOU SAY THAT THERE WAS NO PROSTITUTION IN INDIA TILL THE ISLAMIC INVADER CAME TO INDIA</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nLISTEN--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPROSTITUTION DURING ISLAMIC RULE WAS NOT VOLUNTARY-</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPROSTITUTION DURING WHITE MANs RULE WAS BY CHEATING ( DEVADASIS )-</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE STRENGTH OF CHARACTER ROSE FROM THE SPIRITUALITY OF SANATANA DHARMA</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nANCIENT INDIANS WROTE THE BEST LITERATURE AND VERSES --YET THE WORKS DID NOT HAVE THE NAMES OF AUTHORS AFFIXED ON IT</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE WHOLE WORLD KNOWS THIS.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN ANCIENT TIMES GURUS DID NOT EVEN WRITE BOOKS-- THEY TRANSMITTED ORAL KNOWLEDGE THROUGH A GURU/ SHIKSHA ( MENTOR/ PUPIL ) PARAMPARA</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nROTHSCHILD FUCKED IT UP WHEN HE CREATED AND BACKDATED SEVERAL WRITERS ( DASAS ETC ) WHO AFFIXED THEIR NAMES ON BOOKS</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nROTHSCHILD TOOK OLD AUTHORLESS TEXTS --AND JUST INJECTED POISON --</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBUT HE DID NOT KNOW THAT IT IS VERY EASY TO PICK OUT INJECTED PARTS--IT STICKS OUT LIKE A SORE THUMB</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">RAVINDTANATH TAGORE WAS GIVEN NOBEL PRIZE FOR GITANJALI</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">I KNOW THAT THAT THE PART HE GOT NOBEL PRIZE WAS WRITTEN BY YB YEATS --IT HAD HIS STYLE AND SIGNATURE..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/nobel-prize-and-knighthood-for-tagore.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHINDUS HAVE NEVER TRIED TO STEAL OTHERS NATIONS WORKS</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE DEAD SEA SCROLLS WERE WRITTEN BY HINDUS</div>\n<div , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the\nTV series BREAKING BAD Walt Heinsenberg achieves Samyama in the past hour of\nhis life\u2014&nbsp;<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"> ALL STORMS WEATHERED , LIFEs SEAS\nCROSSED</span></b> .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/tombstone-epitaphs-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/tombstone-epitaphs-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LE6dIbihsQQ/WlwGLfwTp6I/AAAAAAABX94/7HKNQU0hQ-IqKSXOZWMHlebMAgpmNCAhQCLcBGAs/s1600/bryant-h-mcgill-the-peath-to-transcendence-is-unrecognized-by-many.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"289\" data-original-width=\"289\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LE6dIbihsQQ/WlwGLfwTp6I/AAAAAAABX94/7HKNQU0hQ-IqKSXOZWMHlebMAgpmNCAhQCLcBGAs/s400/bryant-h-mcgill-the-peath-to-transcendence-is-unrecognized-by-many.jpg\" width=\"399\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samyama ( transcendence\n) is a state of being or existence above and beyond the limits of material\nexperience<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Witnessing requires you\nto be in the moment and to see things as they are.&nbsp;&nbsp; It enables you to respond with greater\nskill, intuition grace and wisdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The witness is the\nsilent,&nbsp; peaceful centre of your\nbeing.&nbsp;&nbsp; It is from this perspective that\nyou view your mind, the eternally changing, thinking, emoting, feeling,\nremembering, desiring part of you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary purpose of\nall the preparation work and the first five rungs of Yoga is to build this tool\ncalled samyama<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samyama means\nintegration. &nbsp;&nbsp;Samyama via the front door\nDharana, &nbsp;dhyana (the seventh limb), and\nsamadhi (the eighth limb) taken together compose samyama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last three rungs of\nYoga: Dharana (concentration), dhyana (meditation), and samadhi are the final\nthree rungs of Yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharana: Concentration\nis the process of holding or fixing the attention of mind onto one object or\nplace. Attention leads to concentration (dharana)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dhyana: Meditation is\nsustained concentration, whereby the attention continues to hold or repeat the\nsame object or place. Concentration leads to meditation (dhyana)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samadhi: Samadhi is the\ndeep absorption, wherein only the essence of that object, place, or point\nshines forth in the mind, as if the mind were devoid even of its own form.\nMeditation leads to absorption (samadhi)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samyama is the\ncollective practice&nbsp; of concentration ,\nmeditation , and samadhi , which are the sixth, seventh, and eighth of the\neight rungs of Yoga.&nbsp;&nbsp; The three\nprocesses of dharana, dhyana, and samadhi, when taken together on the same\nobject, place or point is called samyama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary purpose of\nall the preparation work and the first five rungs of Yoga is to build this tool\ncalled samyama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the mind is under\ncontrol (vashikara), then that mind can be used as an instrument to explore the\nsubtler components of the mind field, including the samskaras themselves, which\nare the deep impressions driving KARMA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the mind is\nreasonably stabilized and clear , the deeper process of Yoga can begin. The\nmind eventually becomes like a transparent crystal , and is a purified tool for\nthe subtler explorations of the gross and subtle levels. Such a mind can\nexplore the whole range of objects, even the smallest or largest<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The experience and\nrepeated practice of pranayama thins the veil of KARMA, which usually clouds\nthe inner light, allowing that to come shining through<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pratyahara is the\nwithdrawal of the senses (indriyas) of cognition and action from both the\nexternal world and the images or impressions in the mind field . The senses are\nsaid to follow the mind in the same way the hive of bees follows the queen bee.\nWherever she goes, they will follow. Similarly, if the mind truly goes inward,\nthe senses will come racing behind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the inner light\ndawns through samyama , it is used to examine the stages of subtle objects,\nwhether normally veiled or far away. The finest discrimination finally leads to\nliberation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>SO SO SO<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>A BTM ( BEHENJI TURNED MOD )&nbsp; CHUTNEY MARY, &nbsp;WEARING A MICRO MINI SKIRT , &nbsp;WITHOUT UNDIES INSIDE \u2013 &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">I HAVE MY METHODS .</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Ramkrishna Paramahamsa has given a very vivid\ndescription in his own words of who Swami Vivekanand was : \u2018One day in samadhi\nI saw that my mind, going up a luminous path, went beyond the gross world\nstudded with the sun, moon, and stars; and entered first into the subtle world\nof ideas. The more it ascended to higher and higher strata of that realm, the\nmore did I see beautiful ideal forms of gods and goddesses existing on both\nsides of the path. I came gradually to the end of that region. I saw that a fence\nmade of light separated the realm of the divisible from that of the\nindivisible. Leaping over that fence, the mind entered by degrees the realm of\nthe indivisible. No person or thing having a form existed there. As if afraid\nto enter there, even the gods/goddesses possessing heavenly bodies only\nexercised their authority over realms far below. But the very next moment I saw\nseven Rishis having bodies consisting of divine light only, seated there in\nsamadhi. I felt that in virtue and knowledge, love and renunciation, they had\nexcelled the gods and goddesses, not to speak of human beings. Astonished, I\nwas pondering over their greatness when I saw before me that a part of the\nhomogeneous mass of Light in this abode of the indivisible, devoid of the slightest\ntinge of difference, became solidified and converted into the form of a divine\nChild. Coming to one of those Sages, and throwing its soft delicate arms around\nhis neck, it embraced him, and then calling him with a voice sweeter than the\nmusic of the vina, made great efforts to wake him from samadhi. The sage did\nwake up, and with half-shut eyes beheld the Child. I, seeing his bright\nexpression full of delight, thought that the Child must be the treasure of his\nheart \u2013 that their familiarity was of eternity. The extraordinary divine Child\nthen expressed great joy and said to the sage, \u201cI am going to earth you must\ncome with me.\u201d The sage did not reply, but his loving eyes expressed his\nassent. Looking on the Child with eyes of love for some time, he entered again\ninto samadhi. I was astonished to see that a part of the mind and body of that\nRishi, converted into the form of a bright light, came down to earth along the\nluminous path. Hardly had I seen Narendra (Swami Vivekanand) when I knew that\nhe was that Rishi.\u2019 Ref. 81, pg. 83-84.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">MY LEFT BALL</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; a fifth, esoteric, quality shared by the divine proportion and the Christian God, which he derives from Plato: \u2018As God has conferred being to heavenly virtue as a fifth substance, and by means of this fifth substance has extended being to the other four simple bodies or four elements (earth, water, air and fire) and through these to every other thing in nature, so in our divine proportion, following the ancient Plato in his Timaeus, we give formal being to Heaven itself by creating for it the body called the dodecahedron or the body of twelve pentagons.\u2019<br />\n<br />\nBRAAAAYYYY Kerala Calculus was verified by making models and immersing it in water. font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WHY HAVE YOU REJECTED ASHTAVAKRA GITA AND\nSANT GYANESHWARSs BHAGAWAD GITA ( MARATHI)&nbsp;\n?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BECAUSE THESE FAKE ROTHSCHILDs WORKS DON\u2019T CONTAIN\nAN IOTA OF WISDOM</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/2pDh8k0mdQ8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/2pDh8k0mdQ8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">VEDAS USED BANYAN TREE REFLECTION IN WATER TO EXPLAIN MAYA ( ILLUSION ) AND CONSCIOUSNESS&nbsp;</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tX215OCDwXk/WlzWhhSDMJI/AAAAAAABX-U/GmpfneKU8hoAVfqqYfYcLs5h31D9KOEEgCLcBGAs/s1600/banyan-tr45ee-water-reflection.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1568\" data-original-width=\"909\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tX215OCDwXk/WlzWhhSDMJI/AAAAAAABX-U/GmpfneKU8hoAVfqqYfYcLs5h31D9KOEEgCLcBGAs/s640/banyan-tr45ee-water-reflection.jpg\" width=\"371\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">EVERY KORAN HAS 786 ON ITS&nbsp; COVER</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">DRAW OM SYMBOL ON A PIECE OF PAPER AND SHOW IT TO THE MIRROR AND READ 786 FROM RIGHT TO LEFT</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">JUST SHOWS MUDDLED THINKING IN ISLAM</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/SNraVirlP8U/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/SNraVirlP8U?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IT DOES NOT ADDRESS CONSCIOUSNESS- AND THE FLIP AXIS&nbsp;</b><br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ZSxCZCy5Wsk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZSxCZCy5Wsk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>SANATANA DHARMA USED THE BANYAN TREE REFECTION IN WATER TO EXPLAIN MAYA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/o_D-HsMOYQ8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/o_D-HsMOYQ8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">The mirror does not\nreverse images from left to right, it reverses them from front to back relative\nto the front of the mirror. ... You and your mirror image are pointing in the\nsame direction. Point to the front. Your mirror image is pointing in the\nopposite direction to you.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mirror doesn't\n\"know\" anything about your position; it simply reflects the light\nthat hits it, doing so as objectively as any inanimate object knows how.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mirror does not reverse\nimages left-to-right or top-to-bottom, but from front-to-back. In other words,\nyour mirror image hasn't been swapped, but inverted along a third dimension,\nlike a glove being turned inside out.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/zRP82omMX0g/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/zRP82omMX0g?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term MAYA&nbsp; is mentioned&nbsp;\n72 times in Rigveda written down in Sanskrit in 5000 BC.&nbsp; Maya is mentioned&nbsp; 29 times in the Atharva Veda. The Supreme God\nis not bound by Maya&nbsp; just as magicians\ndo not believe the illusions of their own magic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you see the\nreflection of a banyan tree in water, it will have its branches down and roots\nup. Similarly this material world is a perverted reflection of the spiritual\nworld and this reflection is situated on the desire of the living entity to\nenjoy independently of the Supreme<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as the reflection\nof a tree can be situated in the water of a river, the spiritual world\nreflected on the \u201cwater\u201d of self-centered desire becomes the illusory ...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAYA is &nbsp;interpreted as delusion (a false belief about\nthe world). I suffer a delusion when I believe the images in my mind are the\nexternal world. I deceive myself when I think that the tree I see is the tree\nitself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The world we actually\nknow, is the world that takes form in our mind. And this world is not made of\nmatterstuff, but mindstuff.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything we know, perceive, and imagine, every\ncolor, sound, sensation, thought, and feeling, is a form that consciousness has\ntaken on. As far as this world is concerned, everything is structured in\nconsciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human mind is so\nconstituted that it is forced to construct its experience within the framework\nof space and time. Space and time are not, however, fundamental dimensions of\nthe underlying reality. They are fundamental dimensions of consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goal of spiritual\nenlightenment is to perceive BrahmAn and Maya and distinguish between\nthem.&nbsp;&nbsp; Conversely Maya gets destroyed\nfor a person when they perceive Brahman with transcendental knowledge.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The banyan tree is both\na\u015bvattham\u0301 and avyayam \u2013 it is both temporary and eternal. In other words it\nappears to be eternal, but it is eternally changing form and shape, and the\nform that it is in today will be gone tomorrow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas are meant for clearly\nknowing what the banyan tree is. &nbsp;&nbsp;The\nmicrocosmic world of human affairs is but a reflection of the macrocosmic world\nof brahman..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If one can understand\nthis indestructible tree of MAYA (illusion) , then one can get out of it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People see the blue sky\nand they tell that the color they see is blue. Cells in the human brain,\nhowever, can be modified so that the sky looks green or red. &nbsp;&nbsp;When you have LSD the banyan tree leafs look\nblue and the tree talks to you<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/zFdxGE77vvD2w5xHy6jkVuElKv-U9_9qLkRYK8OnbDeJPtjSZ82UPq5w6hJ-SA=s35\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4983993137714693749\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_72M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/06033962332238284211\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 16, 2018 at 12:24 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nsir, who was arius of libya and what was his role during the reign of emperor constantine and council of nicea?</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_72BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_70T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_70TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_72b+seedBDw_D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_70TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer;
