, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism you cannot\nraise your Kundalini unless your Karmic baggage is NIL.&nbsp; Once you do that you are JIVAN MUKT and must\nbe buried , NOT cremated. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So understand this ,\nand stop giving away money to FAKE gurus who claim that they can raise your\nKundalini OR GIVE YOU DEEKSHA FOR instant MOKSHA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently we had a man\nMumtaz Ali ( Sri M if you pleaJJe ) walking all over India \u2013he claims to have a\nraised Kundalini.&nbsp; Sorry, such Jivan\nMukhts do NOT bask in the limelight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Buddhism, the\nultimate goal is the attainment of the sublime state of Nirvana., thus escaping\nwhat is seen as a cycle of suffering and rebirth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUDDHISM DOES NOT TALK\nABOUT KARMIC BAGGAGE . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First of all the caste\nsystem was created by the white invader .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We had only VARNA \u2013\nintellectuals, fighters , skilled , unskilled.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intellectuals were NOT\nrequired to fight. A skilled man was NOT required to do unskilled jobs, which\nwas left for people who had no brains, no courage and no skilled .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A captain of a ship is\nnot expected to clean the deck .&nbsp; If he\ndoes it, he loses respect. Yes, in an emergency, say there is a Chemical spill\non deck, he made decide to lead by example for safety reasons alone.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu knows , it is\nimpossible to be selfish and happy \u2013as he is programmed to use his conscience.\nA Hindu family is happier as relationships have never been hinged on selfish\nreasons.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No Hindu woman will\ndivorce her LOSER husband because he lost his job . LOSER concept is not a\nHindu concept.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caring is what made a\nHindu a vegan. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Communism was designed\nby Rothschild for selfish atheists \u2013and this is why wherever Communism went\nbloodbath and corruption followed.&nbsp;&nbsp; In\nSanatana Dharma we do NOT run after happiness like the white man, rather we allow\nhappiness to overtake us and alight on us \u2013we know it happens when we deserve\nit. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Happiness is FREE. It\nis about filling up the space deep inside, or gratification of the soul.&nbsp;&nbsp; Freedom from unnecessary want ( to keep up\nwith the Joneses ) is the greatest liberator. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such liberated people\nare NOT found in PAGE 3 parties \u2013 they will NOT curtsy to kosher Prince\nWilliams and his wife Kate at the Taj.&nbsp;\nAll things of great value are absolutely free, given an received in\nsilence without an audience<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subconscious mind never\nsleeps even in a coma. The Subconscious has a tendency to accept what it\nimagines as real.&nbsp;&nbsp; Just to say , what it\ntakes to lessen your Karmic baggage .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thinking is not an\naction of the mind , but an action of our entire body. Tell your subconscious\nwhat you want repeatedly and it will produce it. You can call this\nvisualization or intention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious has a\nperfect memory. Every thing you have experienced using your 5 senses is part of\nthe permanent memory of the subconscious mind, which never sleeps The\nsubconscious mind acts on old beliefs stored over a lifetime. Many of those\nbeliefs you may have accepted without thinking. Or you may have absorbed them\nwhen you were too young to exercise choice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Maharishis\nknew the workings of the mind<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot control our\npast samskaras because they have been automatically created as a result of our\npast actions.&nbsp;&nbsp; So how do we&nbsp; stop our past samskaras from controlling us?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The answer is found in\nthe practice of YOGA which reveals that the way to break the karmic cycle is to\ninterrupt the cycle at the VRITTI level.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nPatanjali defines Yoga as thus:&nbsp;&nbsp;\nYoga is the restriction (control) of the modifications of the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The laws of the\nuniverse seeks balance .&nbsp;&nbsp; Karma is about\nthe cosmos seeking to restore balance.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma manifests as a\nresult of our negative emotions and thoughts&nbsp;\n(fear, shame, guilt, anger, regret, hatred, self-loathing), not only\ntowards other people, but also towards our self.&nbsp;&nbsp; If we let go of all this stuff, we will be\nliberated.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>OUR PLANET EARTH IS A\nSCHOOL FOR BRAHMAN ( GOD ) --&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>HE UPDATES HIS KNOWLEDGE BY SOUL EXPERIENCES ON PLANET EARTH.&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THESE SOULS WERE PART OF HIS OWN BODY&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is the true\nspiritual law governing interactions.&nbsp; It\nstarts with the energy of a single thought, which develops and grows over time\nthrough our feelings, attitude, words, actions, and relations.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The law of karma\ndictate that every single action results in a reaction ( NOT equal and opposite\n). &nbsp;We have a choice in what initial\nactions that we take.&nbsp; Then we have our\nfree will to respond to the energy force that returns to us as the resulting\nreaction.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through our free will,\nwe can choose actions that bring success and happiness to ourselves and others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma can be\nfixed/strong or non-fixed/weak, or a combination of the two.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the karma is strong\nthen the predetermined event will almost certainly happen. If the karma is weak\nthen it may be relatively easy to avert it.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three levels of\nmagnitude are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Fixed karma (Dridha)\n\u2013 This is karma that cannot be changed by any effort on our part. Only the\ngrace of&nbsp; God can alter fixed karma\n(Dridha).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Mixed karma\n(Dridha/Adridha) \u2013 This is karma that can be changed but only with substantial\neffort.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Non-Fixed karma\n(Adridha) \u2013 This is karma that can be easily changed with some effort.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanchita Karma is the\nvast store of piled-up Karma accumulated in the preceding and in all other\nprevious births and yet to be resolved. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In other words, it is the aggregate sum of yet\nunseen Karmas committed during innumerable previous existences.&nbsp;&nbsp; This is your total cosmic debt. It is the\naccumulated result of all the actions from all our past lifetimes and from the\ncurrent lifetime till this moment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus Sanchita Karma is\nour total Karmic debt (combination of Karmic Credit and Karmic Debit.) Every moment\nof every day we are adding to the account by performing a Good or bad Karma. We\nalso reduce Karma balance from our account sometimes by selfless service and\nspiritual practice.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From the accumulated\nkarmas (sanchita karma) a certain portion is taken out for being worked out or\nconsumed in this birth. Many ripe karmas amongst the accumulated sanchita join\ntogether and bring one life. This forms the prarabdha karma of the present\nlife.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astrology has been a\ntool to mitigate the magnitude of Karma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astrologers are like\ndetectives looking for clues. When we\u2019re looking at a chart and trying to\ndetermine the level of magnitude of a particular karma we\u2019re literally counting\nthe number of reinforcing indications.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A small number of\nindications represent a non-fixed karma (adridha), or only a possibility of the\nevent manifesting.&nbsp;&nbsp; A large number of\nindications represent a more fixed karma (dridha) or a relative probability of\nthe event manifesting.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The 'Law of Karma', states that a points of\nmerit is added to our life for every positive deed we do and similarly a points\nof demerit for every negative deed we do&nbsp;\n- the number of points ( marks)&nbsp;\ndepend on the nature and gravity of the event.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything in the\nUniverse is in a state of creation, maintenance, or destruction. The cosmic\nforces involved in this are Brahma / Vishnu/ Shiva. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actions in the Turiya\nstate do not create karma. Meditation is a practice aimed at giving individuals\nthe experience of being in this objective state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nAn individual who is constantly in the turiya state is said to have attained moksha where their actions happen as a response to events (and not because of thought process); such actions do not result in accumulation of karma as they have no karmic effect.<br />\n<br />\nTURIYA means \u201cconsciousness minus thinking\u201d . It represents consciousness free from material influence or supreme consciousness . In Turiya there is the absolute awareness . It is the experience of ultimate reality and truth.<br />\n<br />\nIn Turiya, the self does not think, feel, or do, but rather observes thought, emotion, and action capable of truly understanding the totality of the universe. Turiya has no limits and no endpoint. It is infinitely transcendent, which means its potential is forever expanding.<br />\n<br />\nYou are now a unique individual and you are a vital part of a larger universal life force that transcends everything on earth.. Reality and truth become more clearly defined, allowing you to perceive that which lies above, below, and beyond the human experience.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU ACHIEVE TURIYA YOU ARE NOW A JIVAN MUKT , ENTITLED FOR MOKSHA.&nbsp; YOUR THIRD EYE IS OPEN.<br />\n<br />\nYOUR SOUL IS FREE EVEN WHILE INSIDE YOUR BODY .&nbsp; THE SOUL CAN LEVITATE AND TRAVEL ASTRALLY.<br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Jivanmukt who has\nreached the Imperishable Turiya state can never be affected by the pairs of\nopposites. He always rests in his own Sat-Chit-Ananda Swaroopa. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The egoism of the\nJivanmukta is like a burnt cloth which has got the appearance of a cloth but is\nactually reduced to the state of ashes. The individual consciousness of the\nJivanmukta is powerful enough to maintain the existence of his physical body,\nbut it is not capable of bringing to him another birth as an embodied being.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;His Sanchita-Karmas get fried by the fire of\nBrahma-Jnana or Knowledge of the Absolute Reality. He has no Agami Karmas to\nbring future births because he has no feelings of Kartritva and Bhoktritva. His\nactions are cosmic movements and not the instincts of the sense of egoism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">Karma teaches by\nexperience NOT by punishment.&nbsp;&nbsp; Read this\na thousand times.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only way to achieve\na state of karmic balance is to love and be fair.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma gives you the\nopportunity at every moment to become open to greater levels of love and\ncompassion. It operates impersonally: applying to everyone, all the time, no\nexceptions. It is very logical: what you sow is what you reap in exact and\nprecise measure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Karma is as predictable as the laws of\ngravity: what is done to you is the net result of what you have done to others.\nThe goal of karma is to give you all the experiences that you need to evolve\ninto greater levels of love, joy, awareness, and responsibility.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Karma teaches that you are totally responsible\nfor the circumstances of your life. Karma drives us from oneness to wholeness\nto unity with life. Karma forces us to look beyond ourselves (oneness) so that\nwe can see ourselves as we truly are (wholeness or Self Realization). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once we truly\nunderstand ourselves, we can see our divinity (God Realization) and our unity\nwith all life. Karma drives us to service. Belief in karma ought to make the\nlife pure, strong, serene, and glad. Only our own deeds can hinder us; only our\nown will can fetter us<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carnivorous animals\nhave been created by God.&nbsp; They kill and\neat other animals.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Animals do NOT have ego\nand hence are NOT affected by laws of Karma. They only have survival instincts\nwhich is governed by a strong mooladhara chakra ( will to survive and live).</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The law of karma does\nnot apply to insect, animal or plant life, where the soul\u2019s promotion to higher\nlife forms is automatic.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me ask single holy\nbook&nbsp; single messiah intellectuals -- If\neverything ends with death, where is the meaning to life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why is it that all are\nNOT born equal ( this has nothing to do with caste ). Some are born blind, some\nwithout brains, some cripples .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This&nbsp; cannot be considered the mere results of\nchance happening; for if such were the case, there would be no incentive for\nmoral or material improvement.&nbsp;&nbsp; The\nbullshit doctrine of eternal happiness in heaven, or eternal suffering in hell,\nfalls PHUTTTT here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY A MAD MAN WILL SAY\nEVOLUTION IS RESTRICTED FROM MONKEY TO MAN--WITH IDIOTS STILL TRYING TO FIND\nMISSING LINKS,&nbsp;&nbsp; AND COMMIE CRIMINALS\nPRODUCING FAKE MISSING LINKS..( PEKING MAN,&nbsp;\nPILTDOWN MAN , LUCY BABY etc )</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GOOGLE PROVIDES A\nDOODLE FOR FAKE MISSING LINK LUCY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Karma' is a concept\nfrom Sanatana Dharma in contradiction to 'blind faith' promoted by Abrahamic\nreligions (Judaism, Christianity, and Islam), which view all human life events\nas the Will of God as opposed to present and past life actions and\nconsequences.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Greeks were\nPAGAN , the philosophers studied in India , and hence supported karma , rebirth\nand moksha theory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God CANNOT punish or\nreward people based on his will and sweet fancies.&nbsp; God is neither partial nor unjust.&nbsp; God is not responsible for the wealth of one\nman or the poverty of another. You suffer on account of your own actions\n(Prabdha karma).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Things do NOT happen in\nthis universe by accident or chance in a disorderly manner or with God\u2019s Random\nWill. They happen in regular succession and events follow each other in a\nregular order. They happen exactly as per the perfect system laid down by the God\ncalled Law of Karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No wonder Abrahamic\nreligions are living in darkness even after 2000 years.&nbsp;&nbsp; Things do not happen in this universe by\naccident or chance in a disorderly manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the words of\nChrist ( who never existed ) :&nbsp; EVERY..WORD\nTHAT MEN SHALL SPEAK, THEY SHALL GIVE ACCOUNT THEREOF IN THE DAY OF JUDGMENT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">In Hinduism, we have\ninstant judgments every split second of our lives rather than one final\njudgement after death.&nbsp;&nbsp; Read this line a\nmillion times.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is not punishment\nor retribution but simply a consequence of natural acts.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although it may often\nappear like a punishment (or reward), the purpose of Karma is to perfectly\nfollow the cosmic law. Through the doctrine of rebirth and the law of karma,\nHinduism seeks an ethical interpretation of life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We suffer or enjoy\nbecause of conditioning of our mind. Our past determines our present, and our\npresent will determine our future.&nbsp; No\nchange will ever be effected by brooding over past mistakes or failures or by\ncursing others. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The circumstances of\nour present life, our pains and pleasures, are all the results of our past\nactions in this existence and in countless previous existences. You verily\ndeserve your harvest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karmic baggage is\naffected by improper channeling of energy. YES !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu is a composite\namalgam of panch tatva or five elements such as air, earth, fire, water and\nsky. Vastu Shastra is the group of scientific principles made for structural\ndesigning in order of prime methodology for synchronizing your structure with\nnature and its energy inflow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu makes the\nindividual to live in balance and harmony with the panch tatva.&nbsp;&nbsp; Vastu Shastra is the only science which\ninstructs us how to maintain best equilibrium of these five elements in a\nbuilding and make best use of them to energize mental and physical energies of\ninhabitants to the maximum extent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is about creating\namicable settings or a place to live or work, in most scientific way by taking\nadvantages of the benefits bestowed by the five elements of the nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vastu accomplishes the\npositive vibrations and energy inflow within houses and professional premises,\nwhich leads to the environment of absolute success, harmony, peace and good\nhealth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each of the five\nelements is also related to a primary organ of action, allowing the body to\nrespond to the input of the five sense. These five organs are named\nkarmendriyas from the Sanskrit word karma meaning \u201caction\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The five lower chakras\n(muladhara, svadhistana, manipura, anahata, and vishuddha) are attuned to the\nenergies of the five elements, and thus also have a relation to the tanmantra\nand indriyas associated with each element.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketu deals with the\npast Karma and Rahu with the future<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahu Ketu deals with\nthe inner fight within us, the moral and the social choices we have to\nconstantly make and the inner dilemmas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahu takes people off\ntheir Dharmic past path to tempt them on the road of self destruction.&nbsp;&nbsp; Ketu is considered the keeper of the book of\nour life- past and present Karmas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GAYATRI MANTRA MUST NOT\nBE DONE BY WOMEN DURING MENSTRUATION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS NO PURASCHARAN\nROCKET SCIENCE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER CHANTING 108\nTIMES-- HAVE A MENTAL RESOLUTION THAT TODAY YOU WILL HAVE NO FEAR AND DO ONLY\nGOOD THINGS ( GOOD KARMA )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REMEMBER IN HINDUISM WE\nDONT BEG FOR MERCY LIKE IN CHRISTIANITY .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN CHRISTIANITY THEY\nDRIVE INTO YOUR HEAD THAT JESUS WILL ABSOLVE YOU OF YOUR SINS.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA IF\nYOU SIN, IT ADDS UP TO YOUR BAGGAGE OF BAD KARMA--WHICH YOU HAVE ACCUMULATED IN\nALL PREVIOUS LIVES AS A HUMAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE HEARD MY\nTAMILIAN BRAHMIN CHIEF ENGINEER ( A GOOD MAN ) TELLING MY BIHARI CHIEF OFFICERs\nWIFE ( A BRAHMIN ) THAT WOMEN CANNOT CHANT GAYATRI MANTRA--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY--HE IS WRONG<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gayatri Mantra is\nenshrined in the Vedas, the most ancient Scriptures of Man. (Rig Veda III 62.\n10) which went on oral route for 330 centuries and was penned down 70 centuries\nago<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas proclaim\nGayatri to be a Mother as light.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gayatri is chanted for\nthe attainment of universal consciousness and for the awakening of intuitive\npowers. Gayatri meditation destroys all delusions and energises prana,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE EFFICACY OF A SRUTI\n( OF VEDA SAMHITA ) IS IN THE SOUND --NOT THE MEANING</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">North node Rahu is like\ngravity- pulling us toward something whether we really want to or not, whether\nwe have agency over this desire or not. The South Node Ketu is like anti-matter\nin a natal chart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY WIFE AND ALMOST ALL\nANCIENT FAMILIES IN KERALA CONSULT THE RAHU KALAM CHART BEFORE WE DO SOMETHING\nCRITICAL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Moon (Chandra)\ncompletes its orbit round the earth in about a month crossing the orbit of\nearth twice in the same period, once when it goes from south to north and at\nanother time while travelling from north to south.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ascending point is\ncalled \"Rahu\" and descending point - \"Ketu\". These have\nretrograde motion in the zodiac at the rate of 19\u00b020' per year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has been established\nbeyond doubt that Rahu and Ketu influence an individual\u2019s life, at times more\nthan other planets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since Rahu and Ketu are\nin exact opposition to each other, their effect should be considered\nsimultaneously.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahu has the properties\nof Shani (Saturn) whereas Ketu has the influence of Mangala (Mars)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They indicate the\nprecise point of the harmony with the three most important influences in our\nlife- the Sun, the Earth and the Moon. This relationship plays an important\npart in the enfolding of individual consciousness.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their role as Karmic\nindicators of our life is connected with their power to cause eclipses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The eclipses occur in\nthe vicinity of Rahu Ketu during the Full Moon and the New Moon. (During New\nMoon when it is +/- 18 degrees from Rahu Ketu, the Solar eclipse takes place.\nAt the full Moon +/- 11 degrees 15' from the nodal position, the Lunar eclipse\ntakes place.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As they symbolically\neclipse the Sun (consciousness) and the Moon (the Mind), they have a great part\nto play in darkening our perspective in order to bring in new light. They deal\nwith the concept of death and re-birth, transformation and regeneration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have been given\nthe status of planets to emphasise their significance and the importance placed\non eclipses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have no substance\nand are physically non-existent. Yet their influence is full of potency and\nspiritual significance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They work in unison 180\ndegrees apart, two opposite points in the zodiac with a mission to churn our\nlives in order to externalise hidden potential and wisdom. In keeping with\ntheir shadowy nature, they work on a psychological level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is always difficult\nto gauge their effect because their main concern is with our emotional makeup.\nThey effect us internally. We are unaware of what exactly is happening to us at\nthe time..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The five instincts that\nkeep us attached to the materialistic purpose of life are Kaam (Desire, passions)\nKrodh (Anger) Madh (intoxicants- drugs, alcohol etc) Moh (Attachment)\nLobh(Greed) and Matsaya(Jealousy).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We need to control our\ninstincts rather than allowing ourselves to be controlled by them. Both Rahu\nand Ketu have the ability to keep our mind focused on these instincts- Rahu by\nexaggerating and Ketu by obscuring or blocking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are tied down to the\ncycle of unhappiness and dissatisfaction as we cannot break away from our lower\nselves. We are born again and again to experience the pleasures and pains of\nthe earthly life until we recognise them to be the illusions that they are.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When all the planets\nare hemmed between Rahu and Ketu (i.e., the moon's north node and the moon's\nsouth node), Kaalsarpa YOGAM ( not dosham ) is formed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kalasarpa yogam is a\nkarmic dosha that may run across the generations\u2014bad luck galore .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AGAIN,&nbsp; YOU CAN GET MOKSHA ONLY IF YOUR KARMIC\nBAGGAGE IS ZERO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Waggle dance is a term\nused in beekeeping for a MOBIUS &nbsp;figure-eight dance of the honey bee. An external load will\ncontinuously drain off the buildup voltage and prevent the generator from\nreaching its proper operating voltage.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>40 years I spent at\nsea. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is at the heart that\nthe center of the vascular m\u00f6bius coil is found: an intersection of venous\nblood passing through the right atrium, overlapping aortic blood coming through\nthe left atrium.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Scalar waves are\nproduced when two electromagnetic waves of the same frequency are exactly out\nof phase (opposite to each other) and the amplitudes subtract and cancel or\ndestroy each other. The result is not exactly an annihilation of magnetic\nfields but a transformation of energy back into a scalar wave.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The continuous\nflow of blood through the arterial system--which runs next to the venous system\nbut in opposite directions--contains m\u00f6bius coil properties. The circulation of\nblood throughout the body resembles the figure-eight shape of the m\u00f6bius coil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE SOUL EXITS WHEN\nYOUR HEART STOPS ITS PERPETUAL MOTION, POWERED BY SCALAR ENERGY OF MOBIUS FLOW\nOF BLOOD. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE HEART WAS SET INTO\nPERPETUAL MOTION BY EXCITATION BY THE ENERGY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR AURA IS A SCALAR\nFIELD <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Faster than light scalar\nwaves generated in the body &nbsp;provide an\nenergetic communication system that connects all cells.
