, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They must discover dark\nenergy \u2013which don\u2019t have speed of light limitations.. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN VEDAS \u2013&nbsp; DARK MATTER AND BLACKHOLES ARE CALLED KALI (\nWIFE OF SHIVA ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dark matter does not\nemit or interact with observable electromagnetic radiation, such as light, and\nis thus invisible to the entire electromagnetic spectrum. &nbsp;&nbsp;Dark matter influences the universe's\nlarge-scale structure, the formation of galaxies, and affects the cosmic\nmicrowave background<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In hospitals,\nradioactive molecules that emit antimatter particles are used for imaging in\nthe technique known as positron emission tomography.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At CERN, physicists\nmake antimatter to study in experiments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antimatter is the same\nas matter except their orbital circulation is reversed --such that if matter\nelectrons emit clockwise helical photons then antimatter electrons (i.e.\npositrons) emit counterclockwise helical photons, and the same applies to all\nother matter particles and their antimatter counterparts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FUCKIN\u2019 AROUND WITH\nANTIMATTER &nbsp;AT CERN IS DANGEROUS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matter and antimatter &nbsp;annihilate each other , whenever they come\ninto contact. &nbsp;However this can happen\nonly if mediator Vishnu ( Sattva ) &nbsp;allow\nEvery particle has an antiparticle with the same mass but the opposite electric\ncharge. The proton has the negatively charged antiproton; the electron has the\npositively charged anti-electron, or positron. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neutral particles can\nhave antiparticles, too. The neutron might have no charge, but quarks - the\nsmaller particles that make it up - do. Turn these quarks into antiquarks by\nflipping their charges, and you've made an antineutron.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE 7 ASTRAL LAYERS ARE\nDIMENSIONS WHICH HAVE THEIR OWN FREQUENCIES. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SOUL RESONATES WITH\nTHE FREQUENCY OF THESE 7 DIMENSIONS..&nbsp; AND\nESTABLISHES &nbsp;SYNCHRONICTY, WHICH IS AKIN\nTO TUNING TO A RADIO STATION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONSCIOUSNESS IS\nBASICALLY A SENTIENT VIBRATION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SENTIENT VIBRATION IS\nWHAT DISTINGUHES A INANIMATE OBJECT ( NO LIFE/ NOW GROWTH ) WITH AN ANIMATE\nOBJECT , WHICH AS A SOUL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONSCIOUSNESS IS\nINTEWINED WITH SENTIENT VIBRATION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LIGHT OF CONSCIOUSNES &nbsp;IS PROVIDED BY SAVITUR, THE MOTHER QUASAR (\nGAYATRI MANTRA )\u2014THIS LIGHT IS FASTER THAN THIEF EINSEINs RIDICULOUS SPEED\nLIMIT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VISHNU AVATARS RECEIVED\nMORE OF THIS CONSCIOUSNESS LIGHT\u2014AND THEY HAS 13 OR MORE STRAND DNA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SUBCONSCIOUS MIND (\nRIGHT BRAIN LOBE FOR RIGHT HANDERS ) IS INTERCONNECTED ITH THE SOUL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOUL HAS A MEMORY (PAST\nSAMSKARAS ) BEING EMBEDDED IN ANTIMATTER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNLIKE A BATTERY \u2013WHICH\nBECOMES WEAK WITH ACTION\u2014SOUL ENERGY GETS STRENGTHENED BY POSITIVE ACTION WHICH\nFOLOWS THE LAWS OF THE UNIVERSE.&nbsp; KARMA\nIS PART OF THIS LAW<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SOUL EVEN IF OF\nLOWER FREQUENCY THAN &nbsp;BRAHMAN ( 7<sup>TH</sup>\nASTRAL LAYER ) IS INTERCONNECTED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMAN PROVIDES\nSTABILITY FOR EACH SOUL\u2014EVEN IF THE SOUL IS AT ITS LOWEST FREQUENCY , MEANT TO\nBE PARKED IN THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER AFTER DEATH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOULS WITH HIGH\nFREQUENCY HAS MORE CONSCIOUSNESS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOULS WITH THE LOWEST\nFREQUENCY ( CRIMINALS / HOMOSEXUALS ) HAVE LESS CONSCIOUSNESS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONSCIOUSNESS AND\nSENTIENT VIBRATION ARE QUANTUM IN NATURE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONSCIOUSNESS AND TIME\nARE INTERWOVEN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything, an\nunlimited field of potential\u2026until you give it your intention, or consciousness.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA\nADVOCATED SHRADDHA , NEVER BHAKTI<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/wH1tRVB4eqE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/wH1tRVB4eqE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">karma\u1e47o hyapi boddhavya\u1e41\nboddhavya\u1e41 cha vikarma\u1e47a\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">akarma\u1e47a\u015bh cha\nboddhavya\u1e41 gahan\u0101 karma\u1e47o gati\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Bhagawad Gita \u20134000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BG 4.17: You must\nunderstand the nature of all three\u2014recommended action, wrong action, and\ninaction. The truth about these is profound and difficult to understand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Krishna says in the\nBhagavad-gita (4.17) that karma works in complex ways difficult to understand.\nGod knows best what reaction has to be given at what time and under what\nconditions. Therefore, some reactions may come in this lifetime, some in the\nnext, and some in a distant future lifetime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The mills of God grind the\ngrist slowly, but they grind exceedingly fine. Sooner or later, every single Karma\nwill be accounted for.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Karma was created to &nbsp;\u201cpush humans\u201d to raise their soul frequencies\nand provide wisdom of life experience to brahman<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As humanity worked the\nkarma they had been given, with total free choice, it provided the catalyst for\nchange. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Karma is about situations with\nother humans, unfinished business, and a system in interaction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AS YOU LIGHTEN YOUR\nNEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE YOU SOUL FREQUENCY GOES HIGHER, YOU KUNDALINI RISES\nPROPORTIONATELY AND YOU AURA COLORS CHANGE AS PER THE PREDOMINANT CHAKRA.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When you drop your\nkarma you are releasing an old controlling energy and moving to one where you\nare free to better help the planet with your light. &nbsp;This is your free choice, and it is driven by\nyour intent.&nbsp; &nbsp;Those who are coming in with new attributes of\npure spiritual intent, begin to understand that they don\u2019t need past-life karma\nto complicate their new energy decisions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Part of this karma-dropping process\nunderstands that becoming multi-dimensional means blending the past, present\nand future (potential) into a new reality called THE NOW.&nbsp; &nbsp;This\nleaves no room for \u201cpast karmic instruction sets\u201d within the DNA. Our DNA is\nevolving spiritually.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Karma is a mindset, a\nsystem of core beliefs, that has been put into place by the experiences,\nthoughts, beliefs and actions of many incarnations.&nbsp; If you have a mindset, karma or core belief\nwhich is not serving you, you can transcend it through understanding.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Karma is often thought of as \u201can eye for an\neye\u201d.&nbsp; This is not exactly accurate.&nbsp; This is not a system of punishment at all \u2013it\nis QUANTUM PHYSICS \u2013it &nbsp;is a balancing and\nelevation of frequencies.&nbsp; Certain\nactions and thoughts create certain energy formations in your field of body,\nmind, emotions and spirit.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Your\njudgments about and reactions to these thoughts and feelings then create more\nenergy formations.&nbsp; These energy\nformations then create certain frequencies which resonate at this level.&nbsp; These frequencies may have been reinforced\nfor hundreds or thousands of years.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These frequencies attract like experiences and thoughts\u2026more of the\nsame, more of whatever will prove your core beliefs to be true.&nbsp; This is&nbsp;\nnot punishment; it is the law of attraction combining perfectly with the\nlaw of cause and effect--it is about education.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pain is a messenger for a deeper message, a higher message. If you don\u2019t\nmove beyond the pain, you are doomed to repeat it&nbsp; until you get the message!&nbsp; And the message is this:&nbsp; you are doing it to yourself!&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Through awareness, you can make a conscious\nchoice to change your behaviors, thoughts and beliefs.&nbsp; Through grace, you are always given another\nchance\u2026if you allow yourself to let go of old guilt, fear and self-judgment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Once understood within\nthe framework of your soul\u2019s purpose in this lifetime, the core beliefs which\nlimit or sabotage you in any way can be \u201creprogrammed\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Subsequently, it is possible to simply remove\nthe actual energy formations which have been created and housed within your\nbody/mind perhaps for eons.&nbsp; Therefore,\nthere will be no \u201canchor\u201d dragging you back into the old patterns.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Once reinforced, nurtured and set into place\nconsciousness shifts may manifest which create wondrous new ways of approaching\nlife.&nbsp; Powerful energies can be released\ninto your field of body, mind, emotions and spirit enabling you to harmonize\nwith your Higher Self.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; SELL THEM ALL TO FOREIGN NATIONS FOR BEEF , CASTRATE THEM OR JUST KILLTHEM ALL 100% \u2014THEY ARE WORSE THAN PIGS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE \u201cWHITE REVOLUTION\u201d WITH HUMPLESS COWS IS THE REASON WHY EVIL PHARMA THRIVES IN INDIA\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWHEN A COW GIVES HUGE QUANTITY MILK\u2014IT AUTOMATICALLY MEANS THE MILK QUALITY IS LESS..<br />\n<br />\nGOD HAS MADE AN EQUATION BETWEEN QUALITY AND QUANTITY..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/nutritious-a1-milk-of-vedic-cows-with.html<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD ELIMNINATED 60% OF OUR HUMPED COWS \u2013BY KILLING THEM FOR TANNERY LEATHER .... WW1 AND WW2 TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL REQUIRED HUGE QUANTITIES OF LEATHER FOR BELTS, BOOTS, HOLSTERS , JEEP SEATS, HORSE SADDLES ETC\u2026<br />\n<br />\nFOREIGN HUMPLESS JERSEY COWS GIVE TOXIC A1 MILK, TOXIC URINE, TOXIC DUNG AND TOXIC BEEF\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nVEDIC HUMPED COW GAVE PRICELESS A2 MILK, PRICELESS GOMUTRA ( URINE ) AND PRICELESS PLEASANT SMELLING DUNG FOR HUMUS TOP SOIL , WHICH BREED HEALTHY MICROBES AND EARTHWORMS\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/gomutra-drinking-cows-urine-as-elexir.html<br />\n<br />\nGOMUTRA OF HUMPED COW / BULL WAS AN AGGRESSIVE \u201cSEARCH AND DESTROY\u201d ANTIBIOTIC IN AYURVEDA\u2026 HUMPED COW URINE SEARCHED FOR BAD BACTERIA / VIRUSES SELECTIVELY AND DISSOLVED THEIR TOUGH PROTECTIVE EXTERIOR ARMOR\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE CONSCIOUS GOLD COLLOIDS ( NEGATIVE CHARGED ANION ) IN HUMPED COW URINE ( SURYANADI ) WERE BULLETS WHICH NEUTRALISED DISEASE CAUSING BACTERIA/ VIRUSES.... COLLOIDAL GOMUTRA GOLD ( LIKE SILVER ) IS ANTIBIOTIC / ANTISEPTIC/ ANTI INFLAMMATORY ( FREE RADICAL NEUTRALISER ).<br />\n<br />\nFree radicals are very unstable and react quickly with other compounds, trying to capture the needed electron to gain stability\u2026 Generally, free radicals attack the nearest stable molecule, \"stealing\" its electron. ..When the \"attacked\" molecule loses its electron, it becomes a free radical itself, beginning a chain reaction. ..Once the process is started, it can cascade, finally resulting in the disruption of a living cell\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCHEMICAL FERTILISERS HAVE RAPED INDIAs HOLY TOPSOIL.. 90% OF OUR LAKES ARE DEAD IN JUST 55 YEARS OF THE DESH DROHI GREEN REVOLUTION\u2026<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF CM OF TAMILNADU AND ALL JALLIKKATTU ORGANISERS ..<br />\n<br />\nBEEF LOBBY OF HUMPLESS COW PRODUCES MAXIMUM GREENHOUSE GASES BY FART/ BELCH OF METHANE GAS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF\u2014<br />\nALL CMs OF INDIA ( LEAVE OUT MAMATA/ KACHRAWAAL )<br />\nIAS OFFICERS/ COLLECTORS<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nFOOD MINISTER<br />\nWATER MINISTER<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SBHA<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nFINANCE MINISTER<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTER<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nYOGI ADITYANATH<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nJP NADDA<br />\nHEALTH MINISTER<br />\nENVIRONMENT MINISTER<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nWEBSITES OF ALL DESH BHAKTS<br />\nSPREAD LIKE WILD FIRE ON SOCIAL MEDIA .. it is 100% fair and absolutely infallible. It doesn't matter if a criminal seems to GET AWAY WITH IT \u2013 see evil Jew Rothschild has got away with it<br />\nUNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nJi - there is old story , where God take human form of husband and wife of old age in kasi to test the people who take bath in River Ganga and one who has no sins will save her husband alive. No one dared and one thief immediately took bath in River Ganga and safes the old age man. Here the intention plays a crucial role. The thief must face his fast karma act but his new good karma has saved life. Will this act cancels all past negative karma. His intention based on saying - who take bath in Ganga will get rid of past karma has worked here. I really don't know that this story has happened or not. Karma is subtle, a same work can be done with different intentions - based on intention the output of action and results of action will vary and how would karma effects acts here?<br />\n<br />\nBG 4.17: One has to know or understand what action is, what wrong action is and what inaction is. It is hard to understand karma\u2019s course or path.<br />\n<br />\nHow can one effectively understand his path of Karma and make it nullify in every action or deeds.<br />\n<br />\nIts a humble request to you to enlighten all us.<br />\n<br />\nThanks<br />\n<br />\nThanks</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_165BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_11.html?showComment=1515931360222#c7386461603969836280\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 14, 2018 at 5:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_169MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LIFE IS 1% OF WHAT HAPPENS TO YOU AND 99% OF HOW YOU REACT TO TRIGGERS. YOUR ACTIONS GOVERN YOUR KARMA.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FOR REDUCING YOU KARMIC BAGGAGE YOU HAVE TO DO YOGA</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">YOGA DEALS WITH HARNESSING / STIMULATING THE VAGUS NERVE AND AMYGDALA</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Emotional and physical pains and their intensity are similar in nature and the brain does not differentiate between the two. MRI scans of the subjects showed that the pain of rejection (emotional pain) and stubbing of big toe (physical pain) illuminated the same part of the brain.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Emotional pain allows the brain to intensely focus on resolving the conflicts and at the same time helps it to send and receive thought packets.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Yoga helps to remove the useless and squeamish \u201d monkey chatter\u201d sense organ inputs to the brain from various parts of the body.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Vagus nerve is the only nerve in the body that is present through each one of the 7 Chakras.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It will take modern scientists another 200 years to master the Vagus nerve...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The 108 marma points of ancient Kalari and Ayurveda were mostly to stimulate the Vagus nerve and the Amydgala.. we were grandmasters in this field ( which the white invader called superstition )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Vagus nerve acts as the mind-body connection, and it is the cabling behind your heart\u2019s emotions and gut instincts.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Vagus nerve is stimulated when we feel empathy. When we connect with someone else's emotions and feel for them, the Vagus nerve gets stimulated.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Vagus nerve is attached to emotions, and hence the right lobe of our brain.--right lobe is subconscious for right handers</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The parasympathetic system is pretty automatic and not within that \"conscious\" control.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sometimes you need to step back and \"allow\" intelligent conscious morphogenetic energy to flow the way it normally would if you didn't put up a fight or flight ( triggered by the amygdala )</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HUMANS ARE MORE CONSCIOUS THAN ANIMALS AS WE HAVE MORE AMYGDALA NUCLEI</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The amygdala is the most PRIMAL, sensitive and most active structures in the brain. It uses more blood than any other part of the brain.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You cannot control amygdala\u2019s immediate, instinctive, automatic reactions because they happen much before your consciousness kicks in.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Harnessing the amygdala is the miracle of yoga&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Amygdala makes your body ready to fight or flight the situation. Imagine you are taking a piss and suddenly find that you are pissing onthe head of an angry black mamba.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WITHIN A MICRO SECOND--Heart beats faster. Muscles tense. Blood pressure rises. Adrenalin is pumped into your bloodstream. More sweating. Lungs take in more O2- the works</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Your prefrontal cortex (rational brain) is not able to switch off the false alarms raised by an amygdala that has been triggered by thoughts and memories. Remember the amygdala is not out to get you. Quite the contrary this primal organ is trying to protect you</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The brain can and does change.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The amygdala can and does do both - sensitize as well as desensitize. Being TRAGEDY KING or MELODRAMA QUEEN affets your thoughts, intentions and actions .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GOD HAS GIVEN HUMANS NARROW BANDWIDTHS FOR 5 SENSES AND THESE SENSES ARE SQUELCHED--SO THAT YOU DONT REACT FOR NO REASON LIKE AN ASSHOLE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Neuroscience is showing that we can change our brain's wiring at any age. Meditation rewires the brain.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The amygdala has been implicated in nearly every psychiatric disorder. We don\u2019t have animals with mood swings, and OCD , right?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The amygdala has a substantial role in mental states, and is related to many psychological disorders. Children with anxiety disorders tend to have a smaller left amygdala.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Larger amygdalae allow for greater emotional intelligence, enabling greater societal integration and cooperation with others.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There are functional differences between the right and left amygdala. Electrical stimulations of the right amygdala induce negative emotions, especially fear and sadness.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_169MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_169BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_169B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_170B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2425128547841936012\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_170M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_11.html?showComment=1515931423110#c2425128547841936012\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 14, 2018 at 5:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_170MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nIn contrast, stimulation of the left amygdala mostly induces happiness. The left amygdala plays a role in the brain's reward system. The amygdala is the seat of emotion.<br />\n<br />\nPsychopaths and homosexuals lack emotion. They lack empathy, remorse, guilt.<br />\n<br />\nBrain scans of psychopaths and hardcore homosexuals show a deformation in the amygdala compared to non-psychopaths.<br />\n<br />\nIt is the amygdala which jolts our bodies in fear, form emotional memories, helps us feel our dreams and can shape the effects of certain stress disorders and phobias.<br />\n<br />\nThe amygdala has an important role in memory. It reminds us, for better or worse, of past situations.<br />\n<br />\nThe amygdala is responsible for those persistent thoughts and extra mental baggage we wish we would forget. It nags us with recollections of painful or shocking events. You cant be IN THE MOMENT<br />\n<br />\nSurya namaskar harnesses your amygdala. It must be done with the associated mantras . It is NOT a physical exercise<br />\n<br />\nThe post below is the most widely read among all my 1287 posts-- 96% by foreigners<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html<br />\n<br />\nStimulating the amygdala can be done by Pranayama .<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WRITE ABOUT PRANA YOU WILL KNOW WHAT I MEAN<br />\n<br />\nActivating the amygdala in a positive way stimulates higher order mental processes. This can improve creativity and intelligence while elevating positive emotion.<br />\n<br />\nIT WILL TAKE MODERN SCIENTISTS 300 YEARS TO UNDERSTAND THE HUMAN AMYGDALA.<br />\n<br />\nThere are Links ( which can be modified ) between homosexuality and the connectivity of the amygdala to the rest of the brain.<br />\n<br />\nHomosexuality depends on hormonal factors operating during fetal life and NOT genetics.<br />\n<br />\nHomosexuals are more likely to be left-handed.<br />\n<br />\nNo baby is born a homosexual. While the amygdala is almost fully developed at birth, the prefrontal cortex does not mature until early adulthood.<br />\n<br />\nDamage to the amygdala can thus result in behavioral deficits such as autism, post traumatic stress syndrome, child abuse, alcoholism, etc.<br />\n<br />\nThe amygdala is not only sensitive to physical hurt but also to emotional hurt.<br />\n<br />\nAmygdala is involved in both the basic emotions such as pain, pleasure, fear, disgust, surprise, and anger but also in social emotions, viz., shame, guilt, love, embarrassment, envy, jealousy, and pride.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike western psychiatrists and psychoanalysts the yogi does not commit suicide<br />\n<br />\nBy stimulating the amygdala you cane be in the flow.<br />\n<br />\nBeing in flow on auto-pilot results in single-minded focus and joy that comes from losing yourself in productive activity.<br />\n<br />\nTrivial issues don't slow you down ( like MELODRAMA QUEEN ) when you are actively engaged and living creatively. You will NOT view life through a narrow prism like our KUMAARI MAYAWATI<br />\n<br />\nSilencing the body is easy, but silencing the mind is difficult in this modern age. Silencing is about grace, harmony and tranquility. Exhaustion is NOT tranquility.<br />\n<br />\nIn the modern age people get stressed, and they need to still the mind--the chattering monkey, which remains entangled in the past and the imagined future, but never in the present.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_170MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_170BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_170B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_171B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7909315952926669242\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_171M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The aim of every form of meditation is to still the mind, or you cant purify it and get rid of deep rooted negativities , which affect your health and even give you severe migraines.<br />\n<br />\nMeditation is a surgical operation of your subconscious mind to remove and discard negativity / ego and improve tolerance, grace and kindness.<br />\n<br />\nFor a layman-- you are stressed when your hands feel cold, your heart rate, breathing, and muscle tension increases. The result is that your immune system goes for a toss and you get depressed or burnt out.. Depression is a weird feeling of loss .<br />\n<br />\nMeditation teaches you to look inwards, with awareness , within yourself and know the true nature of all sensations, and loosen the stranglehold of habits and vices.. He scans his own body and sees where the stress and tension is.<br />\n<br />\nHe just witnesses , he does not react. His mind does not control him, rather he controls his mind. It is a universal remedy for all universal ills.<br />\n<br />\nPatanjali says that once the gunas (result of karma) are resolved through Yoga then the soul becomes pure (without memory) and merges into Universal Consciousness ( brahman )<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: THEY WERE\nFOOT SLOGGING UNSUCCESSFUL LAWYERS . ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">MOST OF THESE LOSER LAWYERS BECAME JUDGES TO C0CK A SNOOK AT\nTHEIR SUCCESSFUL COLLEAGUES WHO DROVE MERCEDES CARS WHILE THEY FOOT SLOGGED\nWITH HAWAI CHAPPALS \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WE KNOW COLLEGIUM JUDGES HAVE FOREIGN SUPPORT WHEN THEIR\nLEGISTLATE , DO EXTREME JUDICIAL OVERREACH . . . . . . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">BHARATMATA IS RACING TO BE THIS PLANETS NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN\n15 YEARS --BEFORE THAT THE NEW WORLD ORDER WANTS INDIA TO IMPLODE. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">OUR COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY BURNT MIDNIGHT OIL TO OPEN CHAMIYA\nBARS ( WH0RE HOUSES IN MUMBAI ) AS IF TWO DOZEN GOOD LOOKING DANCING GIRLS CANT\nGET A DECENT JOB..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">BREAD WINNERS OF ENTIRE FAMILIES HAVE BEEN ROTTING IN JAIL\nWITHOUT A TRIAL FOR THREE DECADES .. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ONE OF THE REASONS FOR NAXALISM , IS BECAUSE OF THE\nCOLLEGIUM JUDICIARY . . .. THESE PAST JUDGEMENTS ARE BEING USED TO HIJACK JUSTICE BY\n\"OUT OF CONTEXT \" REFERENCE .....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 2\u2014'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">EVERY SINGLE CASE MUST BE SEEN WITH FRESH EYES WITHIN THE\nPERIMETER OF NATURAL JUSTICE AND CONTEXT..... SOME STUPID JUDGES HAVE EVEN USED\nRIDICULOUS PROSE IN THEIR JUDGEMENTS , TO SHOW THAT THEY ARE POETS AND\nPHILOSOPHERS -- EVEN QUOTING A MAD MAN NAMED SIGMUND FREUD.....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">OUR FAILED LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES DO NOT HAVE THE\nCEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO UNDERSTAND THAT SANE/ FAIR JUDGMENTS MUST BE WITHIN THE\nPERIMETER OF CONTEXT --AND NATURAL JUSTICE MUST BE INHERENT.......<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA DO NOT WANT LOSER LAWYERS TO BECOME\nJUDGES--RATHER THERE MUST BE A NATION WIDE EXAM ( LIKE IIT/ IAS ) TO CHOOSE\nJUDGES . ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WE KNOW THE BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL BECAME\nLAWYERS -- UNLESS THEY WERE LAWYER SONS ( LIKE BOLLYWOOD STAR KIDS ) LIKE\nMAHESH JETHMALANI ....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">GANDHI USED TOLSTOY OUT OF CONTEXT TO MAKE INDIANS\nSLAVES....... MEANING IS CONTEXT BOUND..... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IT WAS JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO CREATED THE LEGEND THAT LADY\nJUSTICE IS BLIND....... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THIS WAS TO SHOW THAT THE CROWN PRINCE AND A OLD DYING LEPER\nON THE STREET WILL GET SAME IMPARTIAL JUSTICE.. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IN DUE COURSE THIS FINE CONCEPT WAS HIJACKED IN A CUNNING\nMANNER &nbsp;TO A FOUL &nbsp;\u201c WE DON\u2019T CARE WHY YOU DID A CRIME \u201d\u2014&nbsp; MIND YOU, IT COULD BE FOR SHEER SURVIVAL OR\nBREAK CHAINS OF SLAVERY \u2026\u2026.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">JUSTICE MUST NEVER EVER BE BLIND , AS IT KILLS DHARMA OR\nNATURAL JUSTICE WHICH IS ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION .....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THE RICHEST LAWYERS IN SUPREME COURT ARE THE ONES WHO HAVE A\n\u201cSETTING \u201c OR NEXUS WITH THE COLLEGIUM JUDGE AND THE OPPOSITE CAMP LAWYER\u2026 SAB\nMIL BHAANTKE KHAATE HEIN\u2026.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THESE RICH LAWYERS CANT ARGUE FOR NUTS -- IF SO HOW DO THEY\nWIN THEIR CASES ?... WE MUST DISMANTLE THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY AND REBUILD IT\u2026\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In USA the attorney General interprets the laws that govern\nexecutive departments, and examines alleged violations of federal laws\u2026. In\nIndia our attorney general does NOT know his powers. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTEMPT OF COURT APPLIES WHEN THE COURT IS IN SESSION AND\nSOMEONE IN THE COURT RELATED TO THE CASE UNDERMINES THE JUDGE\u2019'S AUTHORITY\nREPEATEDLY . \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 3-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 2---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTEMPT OF COURT CANNOT BE APPLIED ALONG THE LENGTH AND\nBREATH OF INDIA ( ON LAND/ UNDER GROUND/ IN SPACE ) , AS IT IS MEANT WITHIN THE\nCONFINES OF A WEE BRICK AND CEMENT BUILDING COURT ROOM \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ONE STUP1D JUDGE HAD SLAPPED BOTH \"SEDITION\" AND\n\"CONTEMPT OF COURT \" ON ARUN JAITLEY FOR SAYING CONSTITUTION DOES NOT\nSUPPORT \"COLLEGIUM SYSTEM\" BUT ONLY NJAC \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">OUR FAILED LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES DO NOT HAVE THE\nCEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO UNDERSTAND THAT SANE/ FAIR JUDGMENTS MUST BE WITHIN THE\nPERIMETER OF CONTEXT --AND NATURAL JUSTICE MUST BE INHERENT....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THE MELORDS CANT EVEN UNDERSTAND THE MEANING OF\nCIRCUMSTANTIAL EVIDENCE ... Wever from\nthe Max Planck Institute for Behavioral Physiology in Erling-Andechs, built an\nunderground bunker that completely screened out magnetic fields. On the subatomic level MIND\nIS OVER MATTER.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW SIGMUND FREUD TRIED\nPAST LIFE REGRESSION , THOUGH&nbsp; HE DID NOT\nBELIEVE IN HINDUISM \u2013 KARMA AND RE BIRTH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern science teaches\nus that our cells contain DNA which is the blueprint for the complete design of\nour physical bodies. They also hold the blueprint for our emotional, mental and\nspiritual state. Our cells remember all of who we have been in past lives and\nall that has been in this life right up to the present day (hence the term\ncellular memory). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So as we change and\ngrow in any aspect of our lives, our cells are constantly updating our personal\ndata. Cells also retain the information of all life experiences that has been\nabsorbed from genetic heritage, nothing ever experienced whether positive or\nnegative escapes being programmed...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wilder Penfold , who\nlifted from the Vedas, was the first person in modern times, to bring to the\nmedia (and hence patent the 7000 year old idea) the idea of our genes storing\npermanent records of our past, and that these memories are hidden away from our\nconscious mind, either by choice or blocked by trauma etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An example of cellular\nmemory affecting you is recurring nightmares. These arise from cell memories of\nyour own negative emotions which you deliberately suppress during waking hours.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These upsetting events\ncan sometimes show up this way when the subconscious mind has so many\nsuppressed memories that it is impossible for them to remain dormant, and just\nstart to bubble over and&nbsp; try to connect\nwith the conscious mind, to be recognized and dealt with. If we cannot meet our\nfeelings of fear, or emotional pain we allow ourselves to be controlled by\nthem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without past life\nregression therapy it can be almost impossible to heal, as the memories are\nsuppressed and we are not aware of holding onto them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past life regression is\nmentioned in the Upanishads of ancient India and is also&nbsp; discussed in great detail in the Yoga Sutras\nof Pata\u00f1jali. The Hindu scholar Pata\u00f1jali discussed the soul being burdened\nwith an accumulation of impressions that were part of the karma from previous\nlives. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pata\u00f1jali called the\nprocess of past life regression, prati-prasav (literally \"reverse\nbirthing\"), and involved addressing current problems through memories of\npast lives. Prati-prasav is used today as a practice in some types of yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past life regression is\na 7000 year old Vedic technique that uses hypnosis to recover what most\npractitioners believe are memories of past lives or incarnations. Hindus belive\nin re-incarnation.&nbsp; Past life regression\nis typically undertaken either in pursuit of a spiritual experience, or in a\npsycho therapeutic setting.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past life regression a\nVedic technique of Charaka is recommended for people who are willing and\ndecided to change, to secure relief from vices, negativity, repetitive illnesses,\nphobias, separations and conflicts, inability to love,trust, learn. etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon completion of the\npast life regression therapy, subjects are able to \u201creverse and resolve\u201d\nnegativity and vices&nbsp; which, they were\nunable to solve through any other treatment or therapy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each cell in our body\nstores memories from early life, intra-uterine life, our parents and ancestors\nas well as, many past generations. A bio computer essentially acts like a file\nwhich when triggered causes us to act in a repetitive manner..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erasing stored\ntraumatic experiences from our cellular memory is akin to deleting a virus from\na computer.&nbsp; The healer&nbsp; helps the subject access the specifiv\ninternal negative file and then reprograms or formats it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Entering the 'cellular\nlevel' of your consciousness is like entering a vast personal library, in which\nyou can access all the significant memories, events, relationships and\nexperiences of one's entire existence from a viewpoint of clarity, insight,\nand, most importantly, safety.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From this place of clarity the significant\nissues are brought gently into awareness and integrated on all levels:\nphysical, emotional, mental and spiritual. From these 'ah-ha' moments of\nrealisation and release, profound healing is triggered at all levels., and is\nfacilitated with hands-on, energetic and vibrational work .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cellular memory is\nthe complete blueprint for your existence. It is the energetic expression of\nyou as a holistic being. The labels \"mind\", \"body\" and\n\"spirit\" are artificial labels that exist to make it easier for you to\ncomprehend your multidimensional existence on earth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each point within your\nholographic cellular memory contains all the information of the whole. This\ninformation is infinitely accessible to each and every cell of your body. If\nyou magnify your cells down to your atoms, you would see that you are made up\nof subtle bundles of \"info-energy.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each organ in our body\nrenews itself after a few days or weeks. For instance, in six weeks, each cell\nof the liver would have died, to be replaced by new cells. Our eye cells\nregenerate every two days, our skin cells regenerate about every 20 to 30 days,\nand our stomach lining regenerates about every four days.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why then, even when\nthe cells are new, and the organ is renewed, do the old physical ailments\ncontinue to show up even in the new blueprint? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why does an\neye-problem, for example, not cure itself by the third day? What\u2019s happening is\nthat the memory from the old cell, sometimes called a phantom memory, is passed\non to the new cell being born so the eye problem is replicated again and again\neven though the cell is entirely new and this continues indefinitely until the\ncell programming is interrupted.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, if we can somehow interrupt the\nnegative programming, and reprogramme the cell towards positivity, healing can\ntake place.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our body is like a river, it may look the same but water gets\nchanged all the time.&nbsp; 98% of our body\nrenews itself every 8 years.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our skin\nrenews itself every 28 days, our blood plasma every ten days, white blood cells\nrenew three weeks, red blood cells every 120 days, entire blood in four months,\ncornea replaces every 24 hours,&nbsp; the soft\ntissue every 6 months, and the dense tissue every 4 years, stomach lining turns\nover every 4 days, the villi which absorbs nutrients in the small intestine\nrenews every 3 days, the skeleton will completely renew itself about every ten\nyears, the liver in 150 days, entire hair on head in six years , the inner\nlining of the cheeks in a few hours, taste buds on tongue in weeks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of course brain damage\nis permanent and heart muscle damage is semi-permanent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then why is that if you\nhave some skin disease , the new skin which comes does NOT cure the disease? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some types of yoga\ncontinue to use prati-prasav as a practice the \"memories\" recovered\nby techniques like past-life regression are the result of cryptomnesia:\nnarratives created by the subconscious mind using imagination, forgotten\ninformation and suggestions from the therapist. Memories created under hypnosis\nare indistinguishable from actual memories and can be more vivid than factual\nmemories.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CNaHL_R8Q5Q/WlOAw6cW_cI/AAAAAAABX1s/-6If6TiYqiE78plC7o75xAXi-LbhlFk_ACLcBGAs/s1600/7b6a61d6ca8e5ef66014ea200b1d31849--past-life-phobias.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"570\" data-original-width=\"736\" height=\"494\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CNaHL_R8Q5Q/WlOAw6cW_cI/AAAAAAABX1s/-6If6TiYqiE78plC7o75xAXi-LbhlFk_ACLcBGAs/s640/7b6a61d6ca8e5ef66014ea200b1d31849--past-life-phobias.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samskara is the\nMalayalam / Sanskrit word for an indelible impression, from a current or past\nlife, stored in the subconscious mind which cannot be easily recalled to the\nconscious mind and generates a predetermined thought pattern, behavior or\ninfluence that can negatively affect one\u2019s current life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By erasing the\ninfluence of the Samskara, a person can become free of its effect in order to\nlead a more conscious, productive, happy, and fulfilled life. Samskaras from a\nprevious life or lives can still have an influence in and upon our current\nlife. Some of the strongest impressions are from a traumatic death which then\nshows up as fears and phobias.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-awGN0sEvOwA/WlOAgqTRn1I/AAAAAAABX1o/ccy5GSwoBN8H1Sv_C6hOT8DkRZipUqcQwCLcBGAs/s1600/past-life-regrewwssion-why-blog-image-300x214.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past life\nregression cannot erase past Karmas but helps in performing Karmas better by\nremoving some of the impediments.Vasanas affect our ability to live fully in\nthe present moment and curtail our true nature.&nbsp;\nThe conscious mind can access the conscious mind, memories and\nintellect, but not the subconscious.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThe subconscious mind, the causal body, that stores these impressions\ncan be tackled through subconscious states.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through deep meditation we can access these deeper layers of our\nexistence and memories from previous lives. By exploring our own past lives we\nbecome aware of these repetitive, unconscious patterns and we erase our past by\nresolving those patterns.&nbsp; Only then, are\nwe free from our past and the whole past is dropped. Without making peace with\nthe past we will not progress.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past-Life-Regression\nhelps individuals to understand the karmic patterns involved and the resultant\nenergy blockages. It is these energy blockages that manifest as diseases, which\nare sometimes chronic. The understanding that flows clears the energy blockages\nand thereby the disease is healed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example a person who had this fear of\nclosed spaces (claustrophobia) had experienced a past life where he was buried\nalive in an earthquake. Once he relives this trauma, he was able to overcome\nhis claustrophobia immediately.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dY6psODTvFA/WlOA8AsVdAI/AAAAAAABX14/hzAhiH6TlAciY-bCIcj9xRPiWEU-c0KMACLcBGAs/s1600/4e4a2a78589d962721b5eba1e23ce0b9a.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"300\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dY6psODTvFA/WlOA8AsVdAI/AAAAAAABX14/hzAhiH6TlAciY-bCIcj9xRPiWEU-c0KMACLcBGAs/s400/4e4a2a78589d962721b5eba1e23ce0b9a.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past-Life-Regression helps us to explore our\npast lives and through this exploration we realize that we are eternal beings.\nWe understand that death is a mere transition from one state to another and\nthat the essence of our being continues into eternity as we have lived before\nand are going to live again after \u2018death\u2019. Samskaras which have left a very\ndeep impression on our personality.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samskara has nothing to do with our intellect or buddhi. We should not\nlook at things only from the intellectual standpoint but from the aspect of the\ntotal personality. This is what meditation teaches. Just as a healthy body can\nresists toxins and pathogens, a healthy mind can ward off the negative sensory\ninfluences around it&nbsp; Humans are the\nresult of their deeper mind and its store of countless impressions from the\npast.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankalpa is a resolution for self transformation out of free will.&nbsp; When divinity is added to the Sankalpa; it gains\nstrength and gets proper direction. . Yoga Nidra provides the tools to \u2018weed\nout\u2019 these unconscious negative patterns and in their stead plant positive\nseeds deep in the subconscious mind, gradually allowing expression from the\nhighest aspect of the self.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word\n\"pratiprasava\",&nbsp; which is the\nopposite of \"prasava\", means resolving into the cause.&nbsp; These kleshas are subtle; they are destroyed\nwhen (the mind) dissolves back into its original matrix. When the mind has\nfulfilled its purpose of attaining \"nirbija samadhi\", then it\ndissolves back into prakriti. The mind at this point becomes redundant.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The\nkleshas too dissolve along with the mind. Like burnt seeds, kleshas do not\ndisappear as long as the mind is still active.Three stages of dealing with the\nkleshas:Attenuation (tanu-karana), Burning the seeds (dagdha bija),--by Prati\nPrasava we can&nbsp; accessing the deep hidden\nnegative memories of the past this and previous lifetimes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; This\nexplains phobias.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of our\nbirth is to resolve the issues that remained unresolved from our past lives.\nThe circumstances and the problems one is facing is due the stored baggage of\npsychic impressions that one has collected in various lives with every action,\nword and thought. You are given a shot that\ncontains a small controlled amount of a bacteria. Your immune system\nimmediately sets up a counter-offensive to keep you from getting sick from\nit.&nbsp; Then your immune system 'remembers'\nthat type of experience to keep you healthy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means vaccines evoke cell\nmemory by their actions. Cells can \u201cremember\u201d how to fight a virus so you won\u2019t\nget reinfected.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All these modern psychiatrists talk about past life\nregression.&nbsp; This means they are Hindus\nor they have stolen from our ancient texts.
