font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A bio computer essentially acts like a file\nwhich when triggered causes us to act in a repetitive manner..&nbsp; Erasing stored traumatic experiences from our\ncellular memory is akin to deleting a virus from a computer.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All Vedic healers were psychiatists . How\nmany of modern psychiatrists are healers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the great\nproblems with the popular idea of karma is that many spiritual seekers will\ntend to look at their lives and the \u201cbad\u201d things they have done; at their\nunsatisfactory level of enlightenment; compare themselves unfavourably with\nspiritual masters \u2013 and decide that they must have more karma work through.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nresult is that they become full of self-judgment and guilt. And these things,\nyet again, take the mind into remembered pasts and imagined futures (where\nredemption is only ever to be found later on).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b0FfgSkE9Ec/WlOBN4JhQ6I/AAAAAAABX18/8k0p7l-50H0s1Wh-FYcIMmiLG_xRhJJJQCLcBGAs/s1600/e6fa11ab885b9648we336248c8bbecd60--past-life-migraine.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"563\" data-original-width=\"736\" height=\"305\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b0FfgSkE9Ec/WlOBN4JhQ6I/AAAAAAABX18/8k0p7l-50H0s1Wh-FYcIMmiLG_xRhJJJQCLcBGAs/s400/e6fa11ab885b9648we336248c8bbecd60--past-life-migraine.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such a na\u00efve spiritual\nseeker might go to a regression therapist to dig out some mind-crap that he\nfeels needs resolving. He might believe that this will help him to go about\nemptying the karma bucket. Then hopefully one day he can rub his name off the\ncosmic blackboard and God will reward him with a wonderful life of\nenlightenment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In such a scenario the\nmind takes over, filling the person\u2019s energy field with self-denial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inherent in this\ndelusion is that God is separate, and that one must await the great judgment in\norder to pass some cosmic test.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this exacerbates\nthe sense of separation, and prevents the person from surrendering and becoming\ndeeply present. It prevents the relaxation that invites joy into the heart,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In other words, the\nsearch for enlightenment or redemption through past-life resolution is\nself-defeating. It ensures that redemption always remains in an imagined\nfuture, and in the hands of an imaginary God.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obstacles in life\nindicates unresolved issues and more the obstacles and issues in life, the more\nare the unresolved issues, which need to be resolved so that one does not get\nstuck in similar circumstances again and again repeatedly, birth after birth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This unresolved issue is what is called as samskars or sanchit karmas or\npsychic impressions. In order to release the suffering, pain or disease of\npresent life or to attain the higher level of spirituality and experience the\nultimate truth one has to release the sanchit karma or samskaras or psychic\nimpressions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LsTBnNF4b-g/WlOBdErlVHI/AAAAAAABX2E/AXBVcD75qTYngSH27XONlBCm-m4hlD3bgCLcBGAs/s1600/4pl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"245\" data-original-width=\"160\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LsTBnNF4b-g/WlOBdErlVHI/AAAAAAABX2E/AXBVcD75qTYngSH27XONlBCm-m4hlD3bgCLcBGAs/s400/4pl.jpg\" width=\"261\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prati Prasav Sadhna teaches how to shed this heavy load and bring\nout the inner light in the form of health happiness and prosperity. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The experience of sleep paralysis sounds too\ncrazy to be true.&nbsp; When it occurs, which\nit does with surprising frequency, the victim often questions his or her own\nsanity,&nbsp; if he does NOT believe in the\ndevil.&nbsp; One in 3 people suffer from it-\nyet they keep quiet for fear of being ridiculed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some wake up in the\nmiddle of the night, paralysed for a few seconds, unable to move or speak.\nTheir&nbsp; mind is awake but the body is\nstill asleep.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They feel the presence\nor a fearsome entity, -- an evil entity lurking .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; For some this entity pulls away the sheets, and in\nthe struggle they fall down.&nbsp; Most people\nwho fall down from the beds have been victims of this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep paralysis may\nleave you feeling frightened, especially if you also see or hear things that\naren't really there. Sleep paralysis may happen only once, or you may have it\nfrequently -- even several times a night.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you become aware\nbefore the REM cycle has finished, you may notice that you cannot move or\nspeak.&nbsp; Eye movements and breathing are\nalways preserved, though some people experience a sense of breathlessness. This\nparalysis may be accompanied by vivid hallucinations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These hallucinations\ncan be most unnerving and may include seeing, hearing, smelling or even feeling\nthings that are not there. Some can feel a dent on the mattress where the evil\nentity is sitting \u2013and this can terrorise and cause trauma. The figure may walk\nlast a background light and block it --this is how real it gets .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of those afflicted\nwith sleep paralysis describe the sinister entity shaped like a human figure\nlike a dark ghost or a shadow.&nbsp; It tends\nto be just beyond the periphery of vision, and it is indeed menacing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This may be accompanied\nby a sensation of being touched, and some even describe feeling like they are\nbeing held down. This strange experience in the middle of the night, as you\njust come out of sleep, can be downright terrifying<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the end of NREM,\nyour sleep shifts to REM.&nbsp; Your eyes move\nquickly and dreams occur, but the rest of your body remains very relaxed.&nbsp; Your muscles are \"turned off\" during\nREM sleep. The muscles controlling the eyes and diaphragm remain active.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During REM ( rapid\nmovement of eyes ) sleep exchange of information takes place between the left\nlobe and right lobe of the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM SLEEP HAPPENS ONLY\nWHILE YOUR BRAIN IS IN THE ALPHA STATE WHEN YOUR PINEAL GLAND AND TWO STRAND\nDNA RESONATES WITH 7.83 HERTZ , THE EARTH\u2019S FREQUENCY OR THE FREQUENCY OF\nOM&nbsp; , THE HINDU KING MANTRA&nbsp;&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our cosmos is self\naware. Every atom, planet and star is self aware with individuality. The alpha\nwave state is a sign of deep relaxation WHEN AWAKE.&nbsp; REM happens in the Alpha brainwave state\nwhile asleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subconscious mind has a\nmemory of more than 100 trillion images, all our experiences, emotions and\nfeelings are stored as an image or a sound in a digitised manner .&nbsp; Yet the brain accesses akashik records while\nin REM sleep \u2013 an unlimited cosmic memory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Data that cannot be\nrecalled are retained in the subconscious. This is why after a brain\nstorming session, the thoughts must be left to incubate till an REM sleep.&nbsp; Major decisions are kept pending till then.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep, is\nparticularly important to the developing brain, possibly because it provides\nthe neural stimulation that newborns need to form mature neural connections and\nfor proper nervous system development. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deprivation of REM\nsleep early in life ( like loud AZAN from a mosque &nbsp;at 5 AM ) for new born babies can result in\nsevere behavioral problems, permanent sleep disruption, decreased brain mass,\nand will result in an abnormal amount of neuronal cell death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That is why babies need\na quiet environment while sleeping . REM sleep gives the brain a chance to\nexercise important neuronal connections that may otherwise deteriorate from\nlack of activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep provided\nendogenous stimulation to prevent the brain from being shut down too long.&nbsp; REM sleep also acts as an escape valve for\nbacking up painful information to EXTERNAL akashik records drive.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During REM dreaming\nalmost all neurons in all parts of the brain increase firing rate.&nbsp; This firing rate is generally considered\nindicative of biologically significant information processing.&nbsp; During REM sleep, the brain\u2019s oxygen\nconsumption increases , which reflects its energy consumption. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every time you get\nchoked, and oxygen levels fall too low , the survival mechanism kicks in and\nyour body automatically gets out of REM sleep to \"DE- paralyse \" your\nvoluntary muscles, so that you may continue breathing and live another day\n.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep is sometimes\ncalled paradoxical sleep, due to the contrast between the high brain activity\nand the physical immobility of the sleeper<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: large;\">IN FUTURE ANYBODY DENIGRATING INDIA BY USING THE LIES OF KAMASUTRA MUST BE JAILED WITHOUT BAIL...</span></div>\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE LINK IN THE WEBSITES OF<br />\n<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nATTORNY GENERAL<br />\nHOME MINISTER<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nYOGI ADITYANATH<br />\nALL CMs OF INDIAN STATES<br />\nLOK SABHA SPEAKER<br />\nRAJYA SABHA SPEAKER<br />\nEDUCATION MINISTER<br />\nWEBSITES OF ALL DESH BHAKTS</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">35 YEAR AGO\u2014MY SHIP WAS\nAT FELIXSTOVE LONDON.&nbsp; MY CADET TOLD ME\nTHAT THE OLD STEVEORE FOREMAN WITH A FLOWING WHITE BEARD WAS IN INDIA AS A\nYOUNG SOLDIER OF THE BRITISH RAJ. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO LATER I QUIETLY WENT\nON DECK AND STRUCK UP A CONVERSATION WITH THIS MAN.&nbsp; I ASKED HIM \u201cCAN YOU NAME ONE PLACE IN INDIA\nYOU CAN REMEMBER?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE REPLIED INSTANTLY \u201cKAMATIPURA\n,BOMAY\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW THIS IS A REPLY\nWHICH IS SOAKED IN TRUTH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I INVITED HIM TO MY\nCABIN FOR A SIP OF PREMIUM SCOTCH ( ROYAL SALUTE \u2013 &nbsp;AGED 21 YEARS &nbsp;) AFTER HIS SHIFT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHILE SIPPING THE\nSCOTCH HE TOLD ME.. BEING A ENGLISH MAN , HE NEVER GOT TO DRINK ANY PREMIUM\nWHISKY \u2013AS HE COULD NOT AFFORD IT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE TOLD ME ABOUT\nDEVADASIS IN KAMATIPURA .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY WERE ALL IN THE\nAGE GROUP OF 12 TO 17.&nbsp; &nbsp; THEY TREATED HIM LIKE GOD HANUMAN AND DID PUJA BEFORE\nSEX. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HE TOLD ME AT THE PUJA LAMP THERE WOULD BE A\nSMALL BOOKLET NAMED \u201cHANUMAN CHALISA\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAD MET AN AUSTALIAN\nIN SYDNEY , IN 1976, &nbsp;WHO WAS AN OFFICER\nIN THE BRITISH RAJ\u2014HE WAS MORE THAN 90 YEARS OLD.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AGAIN WHEN HE SAID \u201cSONAGACHI\n, CALCUTTA \u201c I KNEW IT WAS SOAKED IN TRUTH.&nbsp;\nHE JUST WANTED A GOOD MEAL OF MUTTON CURRY AND RICE . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE SAID THE BEST GIRLS\n( AND BOYS ) WERE RESERVED FOR OFFICERS OF BRITSH EAST INDIA COMPANY. &nbsp;SEX WAS FREE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN LONDON I WENT TO AN\nOLD BOOK STORE AND UNEARTHED A BOOK WRITTEN BY A WOMAN, WHOSE HUSBAND WAS A\nBRITISH RAJ OFFICER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HER HUSBAND WAS NOT\nINTERESTED IN SEX WITH HER \u2013AND SHE WAS VERY YOUNG.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO ONE DAY SHE DRESSED\nUP IN INDIAN CLOTHES , PUT ON A VEIL AND OFFERED HERSELF IN A PAY &nbsp;BROTHEL, MEANT FOR INDIAN SOLDIERS .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A BURLY SIKH CAME IN ,,\nPAID HER AND STARTED HUMPING.&nbsp; SUDDENLY\nHE KNEW THAT THE WOMAN , ( AS SHE WAS CRYING OUT --OH SHIT-- JESUS CHRIST ) &nbsp;-- WAS NOT INDIAN AND HE LIFTED HER VEIL. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE EJACULATED 3 TIME IN\nSUCCESSION AFTER HUMPING HER FOR MORE THAN AN HOUR\u2014AND THEN HE WANTED A 4<sup>TH</sup>\nTIME. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHE VOMITTED ON THE\nBED- <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHE TALKED ABOUT HIS\nHUGE PRICK AND HIS VORATIOUS APPETITE . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HER WHITE HUSBAND\nTHOUGH HUGE HAD A TINY PINK SOFT WILLY\u2014WHICH WOULD NOT GET HARD EVEN AFTER\nHOURS OF ORAL SUCTION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: large;\">https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2011/04/11/i-was-gandhis-boyfriend</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BRAHMACHARYA\nHAS NOTHING TO DO WITH ABSTAINING FROM SEX <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Brahmacharya\nmeans purity of speech, of body, and of mind \u2013being a righteous person.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN\nSANATANA DHARMA NO MAN CAN DO A YAGNA UNLESS HE IS MARRIED AND HIS WIFE STILL\nLIVED WITH HIM...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cJahi\nsatrum mahabaho kamarupam durasadam\u201d \u2014Kill this powerful enemy, passion, by the\nobservance of Brahmacharya\u201d (Bhagwad Gita -Chap. III-43).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">PASSION\nMENTIONED ABOVE DOES NOT INVOLVE SEMEN AND OJAS BULLSHIT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IT HAS\nMORE TO DO WITH TEMPTATION, GREED , CRAVINGS , INDULGENCE IN SENSE OBJECTS ,\nAVARICE , SELF RESTRAINT AND EGO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS\nIS FOR PURIFICATION OF NADIS IN WHICH FLOWS PRANA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS\nFOUL LIE OF SEMEN WAS INJECTED INTO OUR SCRIPTURES BY FAKE MUTTS AND THE LYING\nWHITE HISTORIAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ROTHSCHILD\nUSED VIVEKANANDA AND GANDHI TO SPREAD HIS FAKE BRAHMACHARYA MESSAGE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HINDUISM\nIS NOT CATHOLIC CHRISTIANITY WERE PRIESTS DO NOT MARRY. IN HINDUISM A PRIEST\nMUST MARRY AND HAVE CHILDREN .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THERE\nARE NO UNMARRIED ASTROLOGERS IN KERALA.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Patanjali\nMaharshi, the exponent of Raja Yoga philosophy, recommends that ten virtues\nshould be practised by all men.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The first five are: Ahimsa (non-violence), Satya\n(truthfulness), Brahmacharya (celibacy in thought, word and deed), Asteya\n(non-stealing) and Aparigraha (non-covetousness). These constitute Yama or\nself-restraint.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The other five virtues are: Saucha (internal and external\npurity), Santosha (contentment), Tapas (austerity), Svadhyaya (study of\nscriptures or recitation of Mantra) and Isvarpranidhana (consecration of the\nfruits of all works to the Lord). These constitute Niyama or religious\nobservance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nmost foul thing done was to encourage married men in Grihasta stage to practice\nBrahmacharya by sexual continence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Gandhi\nused this lame lie , to discard his wife from his bedroom and take in a\nhomosexual German Jew&nbsp; Hermann Kallenbach\nwith an enema kit .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Later\nthis German Jew was discarded to take in teenaged naked girls who would sleep\nwith him under the same blanket.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rothschild\ngot his fake and backdated Rishi Yajnavalkya to write: \u201cBrahmacharya is\nabstaining from sexual pleasure for ever, under all conditions and in all\nplaces, either physically, mentally or verbally.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE ASK\nTHE POPE -ALLOW PRIESTS TO MARRY ( to avoid homosexuality/ pedophilia and rape\nin church ) -- THIS IS THE WAY OF GOD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW\nROTHSCHILD INTRODUCED \"BRAHMACHARYA \" ( CELEBACY ) AND WE HAVE HIS\nAGENT ROGUES LIKE VIVEKANANDA AND GANDHI MAKING A VIRTUE OUT OF IT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LET ME\nQUOTE PATANJALIs YOGASUTRA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">###################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When\nthe sadhaka is steadfastly established in continence, knowledge, vigour,\nfearlessness and energy rush to him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Brahmacharya\nhas nothing to do with withholding semen. The celibate transforms the energy of\nreproduction into spiritual energy (ojas), bringing in lustre. He who seeks\nmerely to suppress or subdue his sexual energy is in effect belittling his own\norigins.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You\nare today reading what I write because all your forefathers had sex. If we all\nabandoned sex the human race would fizzle out in one generation. The great yogi\nVasishta several children, yet he was called a brahmacari.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is\nwhen sensory pleasure is the sole motivating factor that brahmacarya is\nencroached upon. In the\nHindu system four stages of life have been prescribed: brahmacharya (celibacy),\ngrihastha (family life), vanaprastha (literally, living in a forest), sanyasa\n(total renunciation).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the\nfirst stage, brahmacharya, a person leads the life of a student as a celibate.\nAfter finishing the studies, he enters the married life of a grihastha. Having\nfulfilled the obligations to children and the society, both husband and wife\nfollow spiritual pursuits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nsanyasa, a person completely renounces all worldly belongings and becomes a\nmendicant. And what\npeople call Ishta (worship) is really Brahmacharya, for only worshipping by\nmeans of Brahmacarya does one attain the Atman (the liberated Self).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Now,\nwhat people call the Sattrayana (sacrificial session) is really Brahmacharya,\nfor only by means of Brahmacharya does one obtain one's salvation from Sat\n(Being). And what people call the Mauna (vow of silence) is really Brahmacharya\nfor only through Brahmacharya does one understand the Atman and then meditate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Now,\nwhat people call a Anasakayana (vow of fasting) is really Brahmacharya, for\nthis Atman never perishes which one attains by means of Brahmacharya. And what\npeople call the Aranyayana (life of a hermit) is really Brahmacharya, for the\nworld of Brahman belongs to those who by means of Brahmacharya attain the seas\nAra and Nya in the world of Brahman. For them there is freedom in all the\nworlds.\u201d \u2014\u2009<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b>Chandogya Upanishad, VIII.5.1 - VIII.5. 5000 BC. Brahmacharya means\n\u2018to respect the creative power of sex and not abuse it by manipulating others\nsexually.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nsex you have with your wife is LOVE. The sex you have with a whore is LUST.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Brahmacharya\nis a way to get to God\u2026 When sexual energy is directed wisely, it becomes a\nmeans to transcend separation, or otherness. When sexual energy is used to\nexploit, manipulate, or humiliate another, however, it propels us into deeper\nseparation and ignorance (avidya).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like\nthe other yamas, brahmacharya has to do with balance, and how we choose to use\nor \u201cinvest\u201d our resources. Each and every act and thought is an outflow of\nenergy. Some thoughts and actions offer beneficial dividends, while others\nsimply drain our resources. In the name of continence, we are asked to be wise\ninvestors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nyamas all center around intuitive ways of being, and of treating ourselves and\nothers, so that we can be more connected internally and externally. The yamas\nare about how to treat others \u2013 to achieve the aim of dissolving otherness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When\nbrahmacharya becomes stable then the yogi gains great energy and power. In a\nvery traditional sense Brahmacharya was a description for the early part of\nlife, on average up to about the age of 25, before marriage, time focused on\nstudies.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Here all energy was devoted to learning of which much of that was\ngaining the tools to practice the ways to self-realisation. It was typically a\ntime of sexual abstinence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Later\none entered family life and naturally sex was part of it. This was the system\nand culture around the time of Patanjali. The yogic process is one of channeling\nand managing energy within, where as in average daily life this life energy, or\nprana, is wasted, drained out the senses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nthought of sex and the force of the sex drive is a huge component in this. One\nof the biggest drainers of energy is the sex impulse. Very often it plays a\nlarge distraction just in the mind even though no physical engagement has\noccurred.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is\nvery difficult for that individual to find peace when the mind is continually\ndistracted and desirous of sexual activity. It draws the energy down and keeps\nit low. The flip side is some people totally suppress the sexual urge which\nleads to an unnatural repressed state and block.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sex is\na need, both for society and for our personal well-being. Abstinence should\nnever be forced. It should come naturally. One might find at a point in life\nthat time in sex is complete. This aspect of Brahmacharya has arisen from\nwithin.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Brahmacharya is about harnessing the energy or power of our senses and\ndirecting that instead to greater personal understanding- not withholding\nsemen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALMOST\nALL ANAL SEX RECEIVING GAYS HAVE PROSTRATE GLAND CANCER LATE IN LIFE ...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lot of\nTATTUS who can get it up and homosexuals who only get sexually excited with a\nmale asshole , have become gurus..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW\nROTHSCHILD ENCOURAGED HOMOSEXUALS AND IMPOTENT MEN TO BECOME GURUS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I KNOW THE CURRENT AND PAST SET OF\nHOMOSEXUAL / IMPOTENT GURUS. ALL IN GOOD TIME <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What\nis clear is that nowhere in Yoga does it suggest a liberal use of sex and\nrandom partners to satisfy one\u2019s craving and appetite. It comes up in the Yamas\nafter Ahimsa (don\u2019t hurt another), Satya (be truthful) and Asteya (no greed,\ndon\u2019t take what is not your\u2019s).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Typically\nloose sexual conduct ends up with one person being hurt and very often lied to.\nPeople feel let down and something taken from them. So to follow these three\nYamas is key in behaviour and relations with another.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Then\nthe sexual activity becomes shared and understood. Enjoy sex when engaged in\nit. Share it. Give attention and care. This is love in itself. The self control\nas meant by Brahmacharya brings a healthy relationship into your life and,\nbeing so channeled, gives great strength and energy, as Patanjali has\nexplained.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If\ncomplete celibacy arises then it is as a natural result of the focus and\npractices engaged in over the years of rigorous penance and yoga practice.\nTransmutation of sex-desire is a very potent, efficacious and satisfactory way\nto realise eternal Bliss. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ntechnical meaning of Brahmacharya is self-restraint, particularly mastery of\nperfect control over the senses- not the PRICK or DICK&nbsp; alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I\nrepeat again , forget the bull given by fake TATTUS who cant get it up / homosexual\ngurus \u2013 The word brahmacharya literally means a lifestyle adopted to seek and\nunderstand Brahman \u2013 the Ultimate Reality. It means \"devoting oneself to\nBrahman\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Brahmacharya\nis the virtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married. It represents\na virtuous lifestyle that also includes simple living, meditation and other\nbehaviors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Brahmacharyam\nmeans an overall lifestyle conducive to the pursuit of sacred knowledge and\nspiritual liberation.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Brahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes\ncleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary\nrestraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual\nbehavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">The\nVedas and Upanishadic SRUTI texts of Hinduism in their discussion of\nBrahmacharya, make no mention of any restraint on sexual activity. Now we have\nthe FAKE Brahmakumari cult peddling celibacy for women.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_27.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Freemason\nVivekananda said&nbsp;&nbsp; \u201c The vast majority of\nmen are atheists. I am glad that, in modern times, another class of atheists\nhas come into existence in the Western world \u2014 I mean the materialists. They\nare sincere atheists. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NOR\nDID HE UNDERSTAND DVAITA VEDANTA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NOR\nDID HE UNDERSTAND SANKHYA VEDANTA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HAS\nNOT VIVEKANANDA \" CEMENTED AS TRUE \" ALL POISON INJECTIONS OF\nROTHSCHILD \u2013WHICH WAS EXPOSED BY A BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HUNDREDS\nPIR ALI \"MUSLIMS\" &nbsp;LIKE\nVIVEKANANDA&nbsp; ,RAJA RAM HOMHAN ROY ,\nDWARAKNATH TAGORE ( GRANDFATHER OF RABINDRANATH TAGORE ) BECAME KULIN KAYASTHA\n\"BRAHMINS\" AND INITIALLY BRAHMO SAMAJ HAD ONLY THESE PEOPLE .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/opium-raja-british-stooge-ram-mohan-roy.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/opium-raja-british-stooge-ram-mohan-roy.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THERE\nARE NO KAYASHTAs IN KERALA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE IN\nKERALA KNOW !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE\nWHITE INVADER PROMOTED CERTAIN CASTES -- DIVIDE AND RULE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">PIR\nALI MUSLIMS ARE A SMALL PERCENTAGE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A LOT\nOF OPPORTUNISTIC HINDUS CONVERTED TO ISLAM DURING MOGHUL RULE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHEN\nTHE MUGHALS WENT OUT OF POWER , THESE OPPORTUNISTIC MUSLIMS FOUND IT MORE\nOPPORTUNISTIC TO COME BACK TO HINDUISM .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW\nROTHSCHILD SPONSORED THESE OPPORTUNISTS - AND THEY SUCKED UP TO THE WHITE\nINVADER - BUT SOME OF THEM WERE DOUBLE AGENTS , WHO PRETENDED TO BE PATRIOTIC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AFTER\n1947 A LOT OF KAYASTHS MIGRATED TO PAKISTAN-- THEY SHED THEIR HINDUS ROBES OF\nDECEIT <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW\nNIZAM OF HYDERABAD SPONSORED KAYASTHA CLAN ( Qanungoh Shaikh )</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN\nSANANATA DHARMA THERE ARE ONLY 4 VARNAS<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW\nROTHSCHILD USED ABHINAVAGUPTAs WORK GHATAKARPARA KULAKA VIVRITHI TO PRAISE\nGHATAKARPARA , THE FAKE WORK OF FAKE KALIDASA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">KALIDASA\nNEVER EXISTED AND WAS A FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ABHINAVAGUPTA\nWAS CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS\nFELLOW NEVER EXISTED \u2013 LIKE EMPEROR ASOKHA WHO CONVERTED FROM BAAAAAD HINDUISM\nTO GOOOOOOD BUDDHISM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HIS\nWORKS ARE ALL FAKE AND USED TO SHOW THAT SANATANA DHARMA IS A SAVAGE AND\nDEBAUCHED RELIGION\u2014TANTRA REDUCED TO PERVERSE SEX AND KAULA MARGA .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ABHINAVAGUPTA\nIS THE FOUNTAINHEAD OF AGAMA SHIT--- WHICH IS NOT PART OF HINDUSIM. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN HIS\nWORK TANTRA LOKA CHAPTER 36 HE AUTHENTICATES ROTHSCHILDs AGAMA SHIT</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">MAHARS WERE NOT DALITS-&nbsp; -BUT WERE CONVERTED TO DALITS BY BR AMBEDKARs GRANDFATHER IN CAH0OTS WITH THE WHITE INVADER ( JEW ROTHSCHILD )</span></span></div>\n<br />\nSAME HAPPENED IN KERALA TO THIYYAS.<br />\n<br />\nTHIYYAS WERE THE RULING CLASS OF KERALA TILL THEY WERE OUSTED AND REPLACED BY PALE EYED CRYPTO JEW VARMAS ..<br />\n<br />\nCLAN NAMED VARMAS NEVER EXISTED BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nANCIENT THIYYAS WERE \"BRAHMIN + KHSATRIYA \" EQUIVALENT TILL PARASHURAMA BROUGHT NAMBOODIRIS BACK TO KERALA ALONG WITH 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS AFTER SARASWATI RIVER DRIED UP<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD CONVERTED THIYYAS TO COCONUT TREE CIMBING MONKEYS ( TODDY TAPPERS)<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE PARASHURAMA 4000 BC--THE GLORY OF THIS PLANET WAS THE LAND OF PUNT ( MALABAR ) -- EVERY VESTIGE OF ANCIENT KNOWLEDGE CAME FROM DANAVA THIYYAS<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\nTHIYYAS ARE THE KERALA EXPERTS IN KALARI AND AYURVEDA EVEN TODAY<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS NO NAMBOODIRIS CLAN BEFORE 4000 BC .. BEFORE PARASHURAMA EMPOWERED THESE VISITING KERALA THIYYA PROFESSORS TO SARASWATI RIVER BANKS<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS WERE SANSKRIT AND VEDAS ( ORAL ROUTE ) KNOWING CREAM OF THE THIYYAS<br />\n<br />\nMAHARS WERE WARRIOR CLAN RIGHT THROUGH INDIAN HISTORY<br />\n<br />\nSHIVAJI IS A GREAT HERO--WE WANT HIS STATUE IN THE ARABIAN SEA--LET IT COST THOUSANDS OF CRORES--WE DONT CARE<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE SICK AND TIRED OF HEROES LIKE GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED HEROES LIKE SHIVAJI AND CHANAKYA<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE FORTS REPAIRED AND SAID TO HAVE BEEN BUILT BY SHIVAJI EXISTED THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE SHIVAJI ( BHONSLE / WARRIOR CLAN MAHAR )BECAME EMPEROR MARATHA CHIEFS ( CHITPAVAN JEWS ) HAD REFUSED TO SIT AND DINE WITH HIM.<br />\n<br />\nThe empire formally existed from 1674 with the coronation of Chhatrapati Shivaji and ended in 1818 with the defeat of CHITPAVAN JEW Peshwa Bajirao II ( ON PAPER ALONE )<br />\n<br />\nPeshwa Baji Rao II was a general in the early Maratha Empire during the reign of Shivaji.<br />\n<br />\nShahu, a grandson of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, ruled as emperor until 1749.<br />\n<br />\nDuring his reign, Shahu ( ARMTWISTED ) appointed the first CHITPAVAN JEW Peshwa as head of the government.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the death of Shahu, the JEW Peshwas ( supported by Jew Rothschild from the shadows ) became the de facto leaders of the Empire from 1749 to 1761<br />\n<br />\nEMPEROR SHAHUS SONS WERE DISINHERITED OF THE MIGHTY MARATHA EMPIRE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\">EVEN TODAY BHONSALAEs ARE MAHARS --&nbsp; ALBEIT DEMOTED TO DALITS BY BR AMBEDKARs GRANDFATHER IN CAHOOTS WITH ROTHSCHILD .. YOU CAN SEE ADS IN NEWSPAPER OF BHONSALE MAHAR DALITS ASKING FOR BRIDES</span><br />\n<br />\nToday Bhonsles claim that their origins are from Suryavanshi Sisodia Rajput--BALLS !<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER NEVER FOUGHT A SINGLE BATTLE WITH THE MIGHTY MOGHULS--IF ANYBODY CAN ROVE ME WRONG--I WILL STOP BLOGGING<br />\n<br />\nMAHARS FOUGHT UNDER THE LEADERSHIP OF BENE ISRAEL PESHWAS ( CHITPAVAN JEWS ) -- THE PESHWAS WERE PROVIDED WITH LONG RANGE GUNS AND ROCKETS BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<br />\n<br />\nCHITPAVAN JEWS ARE KERALA BENE ISRAEL JEWS WHO WERE TAKEN ON JEW ROTHSCHILDs SHIPS ( BRITISH EAST INDIA COMPANY ) AND DUMPED OFF THE COAST OF KONKAN WHERE THEY WADES ASHORE AND CLAIMED TO BE SHIPWRECKED..<br />\n<br />\nTILAK, RANADE, GOKHALE, SAVARKAR WERE ALL CHITPAVAN JEWS<br />\n<br />\nMahar population is about 10% within the state of Maharashtra<br />\n<br />\nC0NTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_43BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HIS GREAT GRANDFATHER WAS </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">FRENCH JEW MICHAEL HARRY NEDOU </span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">, AN AGENT OF ROTHSCHILD WHO OWNED LUXURY HOTELS IN KASHMIR AND ELSEWHERE IN INDIA.</span></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; BEGUM AKBAR JEHAN ( WIFE OF JEW LAWRENCE OF ARABIA AS PER MY PAKISTANI OFFICERS )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; FEROZ KHAN STAYED IN A MUMBAI FLAT OWNED BY A PARSI , WHERE INDIRA USED TO MEET HIM BEFORE SHE GOT MARRIED - THIS PARSIs SON SAILED WITH ME</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">SINCE THE LAST 80 YEARS , MOST OF THE KHANS IN BOLLYWOOD AND INDIAN POLITICS ARE CRYPTO JEWS.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AND HEY RAM AS HIS LAST WORDS ( SIC) ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RICHEST INDIANS TODAY ARE KATHIAWARI CRPYO JEW JAINS\u2014THE DIAMOND MERCHANT AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD AT ANTWERP</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE ENTIRE ISLAMIC KINGS RULING OIL RICH KINGDOMS TODAY ARE CRYPTO JEWS - THEIR MASSES ARE MUSLIMS\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MONEY COMING IN FOR ISLAMIC HARDCORE SUNNI MADRASSAS IN INDIA/ PAKISTAN AND BANGLADESH FROM ABROAD IS JEW MONEY . ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Read all 5 parts below\u2014 you will also know who is LAWRENCE OF ARABIA who was married to Omar Abdullah\u2019s grandmother BEGUM AKBAR JEHAN&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-truth-exhumed-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main scientific\nwork on reincarnation to date is the work of Dr. Ian Pretyman Stevenson author\nof Where Reincarnation and Biology Intersect. Here, we encounter dozens of\ncases of children retelling stories of life in former bodies and places.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nvividly recall their own and other family member\u2019s names, the place where they\nlived, and often how they died. He documents many cases in which the children\u2019s\ninformation are checked and match-up perfectly with real people and places.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of them claim to have faced violent deaths in their previous lives and,\nstrangely, they often have birth marks that match the way they were killed.\nStephenson\u2019s work on over 2500 cases through the University of Virginia is so\nfar the most scientific study of reincarnation. (Stephenson, 2008)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0QBFBE7VtF8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0QBFBE7VtF8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_77M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 10, 2018 at 4:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_77MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTALKING ABOUT LOOK ALIKES<br />\n<br />\nOn 26 November 2016, Canadian prime minister Justin Trudeau sparked controversy by praising Fidel Castro<br />\n<br />\nThe Trudeaus were indeed close to Castro \u2014 Castro once described Pierre Trudeau as \u201ca close friend and an extraordinary figure.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nFIDEL CASTRO WHEN HE WAS YOUNG LOOKED L IKE THE TWIN BROTHER OF CANADIAN PM MICHAEL TRUDEAU<br />\n<br />\nJUSTINs MOTHER MARGARET WAS THE WIFE OF PREVIOUS CANADIAN PM PIERRE TRUDEAU<br />\n<br />\n\u201cI don\u2019t intend to be just a rose in my husband\u2019s lapel,\u201d Margaret Trudeau said once.<br />\n<br />\nFidel met with Margaret at the time of Justin\u2019s conception at Havana in April 1971\u2014this visit is now DELETED from history<br />\n<br />\nShe again visited Cuba in 1976 to show her 4 month old baby Michel ( younger to Justin ) to Fidel\u2014there was too much LOVING familiarity -- it was NOT lost on the media.<br />\n<br />\nWhat with lipstick ( same colour on Margaret\u2019s lips ) on his uniform lapels and wide smudge of baby saliva all over his shoulders ..Fidel never blushed --but here he was blushing all the while<br />\n<br />\nMargaret and Pierre Trudeau were secretly wed on March 4th 1971\u2014she was 22 and he was 51<br />\n<br />\nMARGARET WAS A FRANK WOMAN.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN SHE WAS A FLOWER CHILD SHE WROTE THAT SHE HAD SEX WITH MULTIPLE PARTNERS . ANY HIPPIE WHO GOT A HOP AND WENT TO HER, SHE SPREAD HER LEGS. SHE WOULD SMOKE POT AND WALK BAREFEET<br />\n<br />\nMargaret was with the Rolling Stones, got called their \u2018groupie\u2019 and was in a perennial state of intoxication, imbibing the life of drugs and rock \u2018n\u2019 roll\u2014at the side of Mick Jagger<br />\n<br />\nIn the '70s Margaret Trudeau scandalised a nation, dancing at Studio 54 ( raving drug den ) and partying with the Stones and Andy Warhol.<br />\n<br />\nCanadian Prime Minister\u2019s Office had no full grasp on her movements. \u201cIt\u2019s her private life,\u201d a Trudeau spokesman said stiffly, \u201cand she\u2019s on record as saying she wants to lead it the way she wants to.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nNaturally, her dilly-dallying and notorious reputation caused an irreversible strain on her relationship with her husband Pierre. The couple finally divorced in 1984, and in 1998 their youngest son, Michel, met with a fatal skiing accident.<br />\n<br />\nMargaret had reached such a high stage of negligence and adversity that she was forcibly taken by the medical authorities for a health recovery.<br />\n<br />\nSuffering from stress and bouts of bipolar depression, she separated from her husband in 1977 and became a much-talked-about jet-setter.She gave many \"tell-all\" interviews to Canadian and American magazines for HUGE amounts of money<br />\n<br />\nShe had remarried after Pierre, but following her son\u2019s death she was so traumatised that she filed for a divorce from him.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN MARGARET VISITED HAVANA IN 1971 APRIL, SHE HEARD A SOUND AND LOOKED OUT OF THE WINDOW AT MIDNIGHT-AND IN THE MOONLIGHT SHE SAW A BEAUTIFUL DEER..<br />\n<br />\nSHE WENT OUT IN HER SEE THROUGH NIGHTIE AND PETTED THE DEER\u2014AND SHE GOT THW WHIFF OF FIDELs CIGAR SMOKE WAFTING ACROSS THE WOODS<br />\n<br />\nSHE HERSELF WROTE THIS<br />\n<br />\nJUSTIN IS OPEN MOOLIGHT CUBAN DEER CHILD<br />\n<br />\nTrudeau had an affair with US Senator Ted Kennedy and Ronnie Wood.<br />\n<br />\nMARGARET HAD PUBLICLY ACCEPTED THAT SHE WAS BIPOLAR<br />\n<br />\n\"From the day I became Mrs. Pierre Elliott Trudeau,\" she writes in her memoirs, \"a glass panel was gently lowered into place around me, like a patient in a mental hospital who is no longer considered able to make decisions and who cannot be exposed to a harsh light.\"<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n.</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; If the brain had to rely solely on the visible light\nspectrum that was reflected off the external object and onto the retina of the\neyes, the object would appear two dimensional just as it would be if a picture\nof the object was recorded photographically with a camera. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Contrary\nto the popular opinion that we see objects in three dimensions entirely because\nof binocular vision, just close one eye and observe an external object with the\nremaining open eye. The object appears \"out there\" and not as an\nimage \"in the brain\" because of PCAR. This clearly presents a\nsurvival advantage to an organism allowing it to accurately see and locate\nobjects (especially predators and food) in three dimensional space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;
