font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nQuantum Hologram is a model of how reality works. Like all models it enables us\nto make predictions and create interpretations about how nature operates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every\none of our cells contains the same genetic blueprint of DNA and clearly that\nDNA and environmental influences exert major influences over the development\nand functioning of our cells.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">But cells are not only subordinate to DNA; they\nalso function and maintain homeostasis by communicating and cooperating\nsimultaneously with many other cells of the body and by the information they\nreceive from the environment. Much of this inter-cellular signaling is\nelectrochemical in nature<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">With\nup to 100 trillion cells it is hard to imagine how that many cells can remain\nin harmony by the slow process of electrochemical signaling especially under\ntimes of great distress when survival of the entire organism is at stake and /\nor requires extremely rapid and coordinated responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Epigenetics\nwhich is the study of the mechanisms by which the environment influences cells\nand their offspring without changing genetic codes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Inter-cellular\ncommunication is especially critical in embryonic development. From a single\nfertilized egg, the embryo divides thousands of times and each time producing\nidentical offspring cells called stem cells. Then at some critical point when\nthe embryo has reached a certain size, something truly miraculous happens. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CONTINUED\nTO 4--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CONTINUED\nFROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cells\nbegin to differentiate and form groups of like cells that will eventually\nbecome all the highly specialized tissues and organs that make up the human\nbody. Out of the entire mass of undifferentiated cells making up the embryo,\nhow does a particular stem cell suddenly know that it is to transform into a\nheart cell, liver cell, neuron, etc? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Clearly,\nsome of the differentiation results from electrochemical signaling with the\nimmediate surrounding cells. This exchange is certainly necessary and provides\ninformation about how a cell must change to express itself correctly to become\nthe right type of cell at the right place and at the right time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nhigher organisms with brains, the massively parallel processing capabilities of\nthe brain structures are capable of simultaneously resonating with QUANTUM\nHOLOGRAM information at an incredible range of frequencies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">AKASHIK\nRECORD of Vedas described as an all pervasive foundation that contains not only\nall knowledge of the human experience but also the entire history of the\nuniverse. Our normal five senses cannot access this information but it can be\naccessed through spiritual practices such as meditation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">We\nlive in a universe that operates according to the following principles. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\nis:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Self-organizing\n- All non living and living matter seems to be the result of the emergent\ncomplexity adapting and evolving in response to changes in the environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Intelligent\n- The universe utilizes information, processes it and assigns meaning to it. It\nseems to evaluate new experiences against stored information and\n\"chooses\" actions based on that evaluation based on feedback\nmechanisms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Creative\n- All matter in the universe appears to be interconnected and communicates with\nitself to continually form more complex systems. These systems seem to regulate\nand organize themselves in ways that are flexible, adaptable and exhibit some\nform of purposeful behavior.--<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Interactive\n- All matter continually interacts with all other matter. There is no such\nthing as independent action. Everything is defined in relationship to\neverything else.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Learning\n- Experience is retained in nature\u2019s memory, the Quantum Hologram. Once\ninformation is created it is always available and never forgotten.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Participatory\n-The role of intention in conscious matter has demonstrable effect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Evolving\n- Since its beginnings, nature has been developing into ever increasing levels\nof complexity in response to environmental changes or pressures resulting from\nnatural processes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Non-locally\nconnected - All things in nature are interconnected in a very fundamental way\nbeyond time and space. The exchange of information between any two objects\noccurs instantaneously no matter their space time separation and these\ninterconnections cannot be shielded or attenuated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Based\non Quantum Principles - From the micro scale of subatomic particles to the\nlargest objects in the cosmos and everything in between, all matter displays\nthe quantum characteristics of entanglement, coherence, correlation and\nresonance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALL\nTHOSE WHO CLAIMED THAT VEDAS WERE BUMPKIN SHEPHERD VERSES , FOR INDRA TO MUSTER\nTHE COWS SO THAT HE CAN SCREW THEIR ASSHOLES\u2014 RAISE YOUR HANDS ? , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u093e\u092e\u092e\u092f\u094b\u093d\u0915\u093e\u092e\u092e\u092f\u0903</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0927\u0930\u094d\u092e\u092e\u092f\u094b\u093d\u0927\u0930\u094d\u092e\u092e\u092f\u0903</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u0925\u093e\u0915\u093e\u092e\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092d\u0935\u0924\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0915\u094d\u0930\u0924\u0941\u0930\u094d\u092d\u0935\u0924\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u0924\u094d\u0915\u094d\u0930\u0924\u0941\u0930\u094d\u092d\u0935\u0924\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0915\u0930\u094d\u092e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u0941\u0930\u0941\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u0924\u094d\u0915\u0930\u094d\u092e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u0941\u0930\u0941\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u0926\u092d\u093f\u0938\u0902\u092a\u0926\u094d\u092f\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0965</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(Verse 4.4.5:) &nbsp;&nbsp;Brihadaranyaka\nUpanishad- 5000 BC )<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">sa v\u0101 ayam\u0101tm\u0101 brahma\nvij\u00f1\u0101namayo manomaya\u1e25 pr\u0101\u1e47amaya\u015bcak\u015burmaya\u1e25 \u015brotramaya\u1e25 p\u1e5bthiv\u012bmaya \u0101pomayo\nv\u0101yumaya \u0101k\u0101\u015bamayastejomayo'tejomaya\u1e25 k\u0101mamayo'k\u0101mamaya\u1e25 krodhamayo'krodhamayo\ndharmamayo'dharmamaya\u1e25 sarvamayastadyadetadida\u1e43mayo'domaya iti; yath\u0101k\u0101r\u012b\nyath\u0101c\u0101r\u012b tath\u0101 bhavati\u2014s\u0101dhuk\u0101r\u012b s\u0101dhurbhavati, p\u0101pak\u0101r\u012b p\u0101po bhavati; pu\u1e47ya\u1e25\npu\u1e47yena karma\u1e47\u0101 bhavati, p\u0101pa\u1e25 p\u0101pena | atho khalv\u0101hu\u1e25 k\u0101mamaya ev\u0101ya\u1e43 puru\u1e63a\niti; sa yath\u0101k\u0101mo bhavati tatkraturbhavati, yatkraturbhavati tatkarma kurute,\nyatkarma kurute tadabhisa\u1e43padyate || 5 ||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">5. That self is indeed\nBrahman, as well as identified with the intellect, the Manas and the vital\nforce, with the eyes and ears, with earth, water, air and the ether, with fire,\nand what is other than fire, with desire and the absence of desire, with anger\nand the absence of anger, with righteousness and unrighteousness, with\neverything\u2014identified, as is well known, with this (what is perceived) and with\nthat (what is inferred). As it does and acts, so it becomes; by doing good it\nbecomes good, and by doing evil it becomes evil\u2014it becomes virtuous through\ngood acts and vicious through evil acts. Others, however, say, \u2018The self is\nidentified with desire alone. What it desires, it resolves; what it resolves,\nit works out; and what it works out, it attains.\u2019</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-PzGD7ETTaIc/WlXksKQUatI/AAAAAAABX30/LsMGM_hDiGsjsHQ2noszon5f5mDjGbI0wCLcBGAs/s1600/Spirit%252BfWhat%252Bis%252Bliberation%252B%2528Moksha%2529%252BWhat%252Bis%252BSelf%252BRealization.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-PzGD7ETTaIc/WlXksKQUatI/AAAAAAABX30/LsMGM_hDiGsjsHQ2noszon5f5mDjGbI0wCLcBGAs/s640/Spirit%252BfWhat%252Bis%252Bliberation%252B%2528Moksha%2529%252BWhat%252Bis%252BSelf%252BRealization.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Man in essence is the all-pervading immortal\nsoul. He identifies himself, on account of delusion and ignorance, with the\nfive illusory Koshas or sheaths<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/rPtHCCT1SZM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/rPtHCCT1SZM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The five sheaths (pancha-kosas) are described\nin the Taittiriya Upanishad. &nbsp;From gross\nto fine they are:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Annamaya kosha, \"foodstuff\" sheath\n(physical)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pranamaya kosha, \"energy\" sheath (\nlife force)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Manomaya kosha \"mind-stuff\" sheath\n( mental )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vijnanamaya kosha, \"wisdom\" sheath\n( intellect )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Anandamaya kosha, \"bliss\" sheath (\nemotion )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Anandamaya is a state of mind which does not\nchange, despite anything that happens in life. With that state of mind you can\nlive with all the conditions of life. You are where you are, firmly rooted in\nyour own self, but at the same time you can interact with everyone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">In a gurukul when a maharishi leads his pupil\nto Anandamaya kosha, the last words they exchange is </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">AHAM BRAHMASMI</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">,-- and they\npart probably never to meet again.</span></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">The Upanishads says: \"Aham\nBrahmasmi\" - \"I am Brahman, I am the totality, really I am\neverything.\"</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8Xfn8BPo00Y/WlXnaDKy5dI/AAAAAAABX4A/kqB5uK2Nxx0hdEIzoHnZwJkplRddfUKSACLcBGAs/s1600/sanskrit-etattoor-designs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"171\" data-original-width=\"200\" height=\"341\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8Xfn8BPo00Y/WlXnaDKy5dI/AAAAAAABX4A/kqB5uK2Nxx0hdEIzoHnZwJkplRddfUKSACLcBGAs/s400/sanskrit-etattoor-designs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In order to transport man by the ship of\nBrahma-Vidya to the farthest shore of the great ocean (Koshas), the Sruti says,\nThis Atman is Brahman; Thou art That.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ucpzpbpock8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ucpzpbpock8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Within anandamaya kosha lies the\nunderstanding that separation and ego are just an illusion. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>This is the stage in which atma ( SOUL )\nexperiences the eternal bliss, a perfect state of peace, comfort, stability and\ncarefree nature.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>This recognition totals compassion, love and\nhappiness-- anandamaya kosha is the bliss body.</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>A TRUE GURU LEADS YOU TO YOUR OWN SOUL..&nbsp;</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_84B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/zFdxGE77vvD2w5xHy6jkVuElKv-U9_9qLkRYK8OnbDeJPtjSZ82UPq5w6hJ-SA=s35\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1355131828973993083\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_84M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/08173368436479307173\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Anurag Shukla</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_8.html?showComment=1515577636725#c1355131828973993083\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 10, 2018 at 3:17 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nFollow your inner voice. When reading bhaja govindam previously, even I did not fee comfortable with the first verse saying \"\u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u094d\u0930\u093e\u092a\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928\u093f\u0939\u093f\u0924\u0947 \u0915\u093e\u0932\u0947<br />\n\u0928\u0939\u093f \u0928\u0939\u093f \u0930\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0924\u093f \u0921\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0919\u094d\u0915\u0930\u0923\u0947\". Then again the part where a saffron clad Adi Sankara says<br />\n\u091c\u091f\u093f\u0932\u094b \u092e\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0940 \u0932\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0924\u0915\u0947\u0936\u0903<br />\n\u0915\u093e\u0937\u093e\u092f\u093e\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0930\u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 \u0964<br />\n\u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0928\u094d\u0928\u092a\u093f \u091a \u0928 \u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0924\u093f \u092e\u0942\u0922\u094b<br />\n\u0939\u094d\u092f\u0941\u0926\u0930\u0928\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0902 \u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 \u0965 \u0967\u096a\u0965<br />\n<br />\nThere are many who go with matted locks, many who have clean<br />\nshaven heads, many whose hairs have been plucked out; some are<br />\nclothed in orange, yet others in various colours --- all just for<br />\na livelihood.<br />\n<br />\nHow can a saint himself deride saints like this? Even if there are black sheep, will he write a verse deriding all sadhus?<br />\n<br />\nAgain in Hanuman Chalisa - even when reading it aloud, I could not get myself to say these lines -<br />\n<br />\n\u0914\u0930 \u0926\u0947\u0935\u0924\u093e \u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u0928 \u0927\u0930\u0908 \u0964<br />\n\u0939\u0928\u0941\u092e\u0924 \u0938\u0947\u0907 \u0938\u0930\u094d\u092c \u0938\u0941\u0916 \u0915\u0930\u0908 \u0965\u0969\u096b\u0965<br />\n<br />\nI will not keep any other God in my heart, except Hanuman.<br />\nSo I will not even remember Ram/Vishnu (even though Hanuman himself worships Ram)?<br />\n<br />\nThis never felt right.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as Ajit ji wrote this, it was a Eureka moment.<br />\n<br />\nMany thanks, Ajit ji.</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_84MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-961860932\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_84BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px;
