Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "220", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8833386318192218365/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "5580708985423816784", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2018-01-07T11:02:00+05:30", "updated": "2019-04-21T08:12:57+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTU1ODE0NTc3OTQ3Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_7.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5580708985423816784", "title": "SANATANA DHARMA , HINDUISM EXHUMED AND RESURRECTED, PART 86 - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 85, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_4.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_4.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yE73dp_67Tg/WlIkSgX6WGI/AAAAAAABXvA/c_7m3QvholoRkGXp0-TQW23WD8k6E2F1QCLcBGAs/s1600/ebc2bfad281479dbc3d2b638f8264c537.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"313\" data-original-width=\"855\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yE73dp_67Tg/WlIkSgX6WGI/AAAAAAABXvA/c_7m3QvholoRkGXp0-TQW23WD8k6E2F1QCLcBGAs/s640/ebc2bfad281479dbc3d2b638f8264c537.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prime Minister Narendra\nModi on Mann Ki Baath , last Sunday performed the curtain-raiser ceremony of\nthe commemoration of professor Satyendra Nath Bose's 125th birth anniversary at\nKolkata.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/satyendranath-bose-nobel-prize-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/satyendranath-bose-nobel-prize-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xu7gK6EZ_u8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/xu7gK6EZ_u8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>Bose-Einstein\ncondensates (BECs) are one exception where quantum effects are visible on a <span style=\"color: red;\">MACRO</span>SCOPIC&nbsp; level.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Bose\u2013Einstein\ncondensate is a phase of matter formed by bosons cooled to temperatures very\nnear to absolute zero (0 kelvin or -273.15 degrees Celsius).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of the five states\nmatter can be in, the Bose-Einstein condensate is perhaps the most mysterious.\nGases, liquids, solids and plasmas were all well studied for decades, if not\ncenturies; Bose-Einstein condensates weren't created in the laboratory until\nthe 1990s.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under such supercooled\nconditions, a large fraction of the atoms collapse into the lowest quantum\nstate, at which point quantum effects become apparent on a macroscopic scale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under such cold conditions,\na large fraction of bosons occupy the lowest quantum state, at which point\nmicroscopic quantum phenomena, particularly wavefunction interference, become\napparent. A BEC is formed by cooling a gas of extremely low density, about\none-hundred-thousandth the density of normal air, to ultra-low temperatures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This state was first\npredicted, generally, in 1924\u201325 by Satyendra Nath Bose and Albert Einstein.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Bose-Einstein condensate\nis a group of atoms cooled to within a hair of absolute zero. When they reach\nthat temperature the atoms are hardly moving relative to each other; they have\nalmost no free energy to do so. At that point, the atoms begin to clump\ntogether, and enter the same energy states.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They become identical, from a\nphysical point of view, and the whole group starts behaving as though it were a\nsingle atom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With a Bose-Einstein\ncondensate, you start from a disordered state, where kinetic energy is greater\nthan potential energy, -You cool it down, but it doesn't form a lattice like a\nsolid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead, the atoms fall\ninto the same quantum states, and can't be distinguished from one another. At\nthat point the atoms start obeying what are called Bose-Einstein statistics,\nwhich are usually applied to particles you can't tell apart, such as photons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Below:&nbsp; &nbsp;ANOTHER EXAMPLE OF THIEF EINSTEIN AFFIXING HIS NAME ON A PURE 100%&nbsp; HINDU ( BOSE ) DISCOVERY .&nbsp; THE ESSENCE&nbsp;IS IN OUR VEDAS.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9RDocoSWqPY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/9RDocoSWqPY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By changing your brain\nvibration &gt; 40 Hz Gamma through altering the state of your consciousness ,\nyou can develop psychic powers. When you use psychic power you tap into the\nlevel of the universe, where individuality does not exist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you are under\nanesthesia, the Gamma brain waves stop.&nbsp;\nObtaining a stress-free gamma state is perhaps one of the GREATEST\nFEELINGS imaginable<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If i suddenly put a\nKing Cobra in your room , as soon as you see it, you will experience intense\nfear --your brain will jump into the Gamma range ( &gt;40 Hz on EEG&nbsp; ) for a very brief time . The mind is\nextremely focused on just one thought while in the gamma brainwave range.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gamma Brainwaves are\nassociated with the brain function which creates a holographic synthesis of\ndata stored in various areas of the brain to fuse them together into a higher\nperspective. The Gamma state fosters intuition and creativity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When i wrote the\nChemical Handbook for my company--i used to be in the Gamma brainwave state for\nabout 8 hours a day--- in a state of crystal-clear mental lucidity and great\nfocus . It is a state of peak performance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gamma brainwaves have a\nfrequency of over 40 Hz (40 pulses per second). This EEG frequency registers\nduring problem solving.&nbsp; Gamma brainwaves\nare associated with high-level information processing in the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gamma waves are\nassociated with enhanced perception and a high level of consciousness. There\nhappens a binding of your senses . The gamma brainwave is what allows you to\nexperience, smell, touch, vision, taste, and hearing altogether.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your brain is able to\noperate more efficiently at a higher level. Thoughts are easily processed and\nthe brain is able to easily absorb and understand new information and changes\nin one\u2019s environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gamma brainwave is\na natural antidepressant and it boosts your overall levels of happiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with high\namounts of gamma brainwaves have a advanced learning abilities\u2014including SPEED\nREADING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/speed-reading-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/speed-reading-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;At this level each of us is a part of a\nuniversal and cosmic consciousness where we are connected as though held\ntogether by invisible threads. This inter connectedness means that everything\nwe do or think affects everything and everyone else.&nbsp; The brain does not create consciousness,\nrather-- consciousness created the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yoga-Kundalini\nUpanishad is eighty-sixth among the 108 Muktika Upanishads, associated with the\n7000 year old written text Yajurveda from India.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gamma brainwave has\nbeen associated with higher than average levels of intelligence. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Observing a thought not\nonly makes you aware of the thought but it also makes you conscious of yourself\nas a witness to the thought. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A new dimension of\nconsciousness has stepped in, the habitual, compulsive thoughts have lost their\npower and will gradually subside. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As you learn to go into\nthe high Gamma state, you decide when to think, and in the empty spaces between\nthe thoughts, you will feel an inner peace and calmness. is\nfound beyond thoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gamma is the\nharmonizing frequency - for example when you are observing an object, its\ncolour, size, texture etc are all perceived and processed by different parts of\nthe brain, Gamma allows for unification of all the different information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; It was placed in an earthen pitcher and buried underground until the\nfull moon. Then it was removed and the juice was extracted and taken. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drinking Soma induced\nimmediate explosion into&nbsp; higher\nconsciousness. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation Verse No 1\n: Shiva becomes capable of creating the Universe, only when united with Shakthi\n, but otherwise , He is incapable of even a stir.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Tantric\ncosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and\nsustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect,\nindestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva and\nShakti. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism we have\nplaced the female on a pedestal . , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no place that\nHe is not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hear Her in all sounds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the right nostril\nis flowing, the left hemisphere of the brain is activated. When the left\nnostril is flowing, the right hemisphere is activated.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moving from macrocosmic\nto microcosmic to atomic, at every level, two great principles or forces can be\nseen at work motivating our universe.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In our 7000 year old\nvedic texts it is called&nbsp; Tamas-Rajas ,\nin modern times it is called Yin-Yang.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Energy/ matter <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Particle/ wave <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cathode/ anode <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscious/ subconscious\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aerobic bacteria/\nanaerobic <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Catablism/ anabolism <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potential energy/\nkinetic energy <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attraction/ repulsion <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excitation/ inhibition <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Birth/ decay <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Static / dynamic <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Organic / inorganic <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Freezing/ melting <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaporization/\ncondensation <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Positive pole/ negative\npole <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">North pole/ southpole\nmagnetic <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ionization/\nde-ionistaion <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clockwise vortex/\ncounterclockwise vortex <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Absorption/ secretion <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contraction/ relaxation\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Evaporation/\ncondensation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscious/ Subconscious<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Left brain lobe/ Right\nbrain lobe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These dual poles are\nconnected via consciousness.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This cosmic dance of\nseparate forces , which sustains this universe is called the DANCE OF SHIVA.. There\nis a cosmic dance of energy back and forth between the physical realm and the\nzero point field, a constant creation and destruction of matter from the void.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY CUNTS WILL SAY\nTHAT SHIVA IS A TRIBAL PERVERT MORTAL WHO FUCKS WIVES OF SAPT RISHIS AND EATS\nDEAD BODIES IN A CREMATION YARD <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is about the quantum\npossibility wave vibration between two poles. Together they express the great\nvoid at absolute peace with itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a perfect tango\nof dynamic balance where one polar opposite changes into another smoothly and\nconstantly . If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost , the universe\nwill spiral out of control and end. This guarantees change, growth and\nevolution. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lessening of Yin-\nalways results in increase of Yang and vice versa.&nbsp; One cannot exist without the other and they\nare dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its\nopposite. They consume each other yet support each other. Whatever is in excess\ngets reduces, whatever is deficient gets replenished.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balance can never be\npermanent\u2014 Ying and Yang continuously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscious = induction +\ndeduction ( determines what is to be done ).&nbsp;\nLEFT BRAIN LOBE ( for right handers ) : Numbers, written language,\nreasoning, spoken language, scientific skills , RH control<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subconscious = only\ndeduction ( no thinking , draws conclusions, does not care for right or wrong,\ngives the power to do the job ) RIGHT BRAIN LOBE ( for right handers ):\nInsight, 3D forms , art, imagination, music, left hand control.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The central nervous\nsystem does not know the difference between visualization and the event.\nVisualizing you are having sex and doing the real thing has the same standing\n\u201covation effect\u201d on a man or a \u201ccreaming effect\u201d on a woman.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The picture in our mind\nhas an impact on every cell in our bodies. Thinking is not an action of the\nmind , but an action of our entire body. Tell your subconscious what you want\nrepeatedly and it will produce it. You can call this visualization or intention.\nIn India people realized this and more and more people started going the\nspiritual way for bliss. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Indian\nkings in all their practical wisdom realized this and made all those Hindu\ntemples with stone statues amazing sexual content ( ONLY OUTSIDE \u2013NEVER INSIDE\n) , to wean away a potential yogi who could have been a soldier or a farmer or\na husband..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are poised between\nlife and death and our whole existence is a struggle to retain balance between\nthese two dual forces.&nbsp; Vedic Maharishis\nwho were yogis realized the existence of these forces and understood their\nrelationship. They said that man has three main flows of energy nadis-- ida,\npingala and sushumna, and which have been roughly translated as body, mind and\nspirit.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala can be deemed\nas the dynamic, active, masculine, positive, yang , Tamas energy within\nour&nbsp;&nbsp; personality.&nbsp;&nbsp; It&nbsp;&nbsp;\nhas&nbsp;&nbsp; a&nbsp;&nbsp; physical&nbsp;&nbsp;\nand&nbsp;&nbsp; mental&nbsp;&nbsp; side.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nIts&nbsp;&nbsp; material&nbsp;&nbsp; qualities&nbsp;&nbsp;\nare&nbsp;&nbsp; light,&nbsp;&nbsp; heat, solar, energy accumulating, creative,\norganizing,&nbsp; focused (centripetal) and\ncontractive. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The positive, dynamic\nmental side within Freud's system is Eros, the pleasure principle, and in\nJung's system is the conscious personality, the rational, discriminating side.\nWe can say that pingala is&nbsp; psychosomatic\nenergy, outwardly directed, mind acting on body to motivate the organs of\naction, the karmendriyas. It is the basic energy of life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida is the energy\nwithin the personality which is passive, receptive, feminine, negative, yin. At\nthe physical level it is dark, cold, lunar, energy dissipating, disorganizing,\nentropic, expansive (centrifugal) and relaxing. At the mental plane Freud\ncalled it Thanatos, the death instinct, and Jung called it anima, the\nunconscious, female within, emotional, feeling, intuitive and\nnon-discriminating, the background on which the differences can be seen and\nwhich unifies. This is the somopsychic aspect of man, where energy is inwardly\ndirected, and body acts on the mind. Ida controls the sense organs or\ngyanendriyas and therefore gives us knowledge and awareness of the world we\nlive in.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The third force if the\nmediator middle prong of Shiva\u2019s trident called Sattva. When two opposing\nforces are equal and balanced a third force arises. Strike a match on a\nmatchbox and you create fire, bring positive and negative currents together and\nyou can work machinery, unite body and mind and a third force called sushumna,\nspiritual energy, arises. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is one of the aims\nof yoga, because only when sushumna awakens can the super power of kundalini,\nthis maximum force, ascend safely to fuel, power and create cosmic\nconsciousness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sushumna is a high\ntension power line and ida and pingala carry the domestic lines to power the\nbasic necessities. Few of us realise this third, spiritualized state and most\nof us oscillate from one state to another. Every 90 to 180 minutes ida and\npingala alternate their dominance and only for a few minutes does sushumna come\ninto potential being. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the goal of all\nyogic techniques to balance and harmonize ida and pingala, life force and\nconscious awareness, so that they join at ajna chakra to create the inner light\nof knowledge and bliss and reveal the truth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nadis are flows of\nenergy which move through each and every part of our body, the subtle\ncounterpart of the physical flows such as nervous energy and blood. All of the\n72000 nadis in the body are based on ida and pingala which spiral around the\nspinal cord. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the basic two\nmodes of function on which all of our bodily and mental processes work.\nSushumna is the royal road which takes us to higher awareness and transforms\nthe function of ida and pingala .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each and every cell of\nour body, every organ, the brain and mind, everything is polarized and\ninterconnected at both the physical and subtle levels, and this allows us to\nthink, speak and act in a concerted, balanced, synchronous manner, every part\nworking to help every other part. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two basic\nsystems in the body that control this, ida and pingala, and if we stimulate any\ncomponent of one system we turn on the whole system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This&nbsp;&nbsp; is&nbsp;&nbsp;\nhow&nbsp;&nbsp; asana,&nbsp;&nbsp; pranayama,&nbsp;&nbsp;\nmeditation,&nbsp;&nbsp; and&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp;\nwhole&nbsp; &nbsp;armamentum&nbsp;&nbsp;\nof&nbsp;&nbsp; yogic techniques work. This\nis how yoga affects the nadis.&nbsp; Nadis are\npsychic channels for distribution of prana in the astral body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain has an almost\ninfinite capacity, and all of it within the two kilograms or so of amorphous, &nbsp;&nbsp;pinkish&nbsp;&nbsp;\ngrey&nbsp;&nbsp; brain&nbsp;&nbsp; matter&nbsp;&nbsp;\nwith&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp; consistency&nbsp;&nbsp;\nof&nbsp;&nbsp; jelly&nbsp; . How this&nbsp;\njelly-like substance remembers, thinks, analyzes, feels, discriminates,\nintuits, decides, creates and directs all the countless functions of the body,\nintegrating the whole so that we synchronize action, speech and thought, is\nsomething that each of us should ponder about.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain, houses the\nmaster control systems for the body within its unlimited circuitry, and it\ncontains the circuits for the nadis and chakras. The brain is also the\ninterface between the body and the mind.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All sensory information\ntravels to the brain via the gyanendriyas ( the sense organs of knowledge ),\nand is then fed into the mind, and all decisions in the mind are then\ntranslated into the body via the karmendriyas,( the organs of action ) , in a\ncontinuous, seamless , synchronous, dynamic process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sensory-motor nervous\nsystem (SMS)&nbsp; : all electrical activity\nin the body moves in one of two directions, into the brain (afferent), ida, and\nout of the brain (efferent), pingala. Yogis called the sensory nerves which are\ngoverned by ida, as gyanendriyas, The motor nerves, governed by pingala,&nbsp; as karmendriyas. These nerves are concerned\nwith perception of and activity in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Y5DoF4tUj8U/WlHF1DoixhI/AAAAAAABXuM/NCPu-6dBk38ysaRZs0tmUQ7dLyjLnLtYgCLcBGAs/s1600/nervSoussystem.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"366\" data-original-width=\"720\" height=\"324\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Y5DoF4tUj8U/WlHF1DoixhI/AAAAAAABXuM/NCPu-6dBk38ysaRZs0tmUQ7dLyjLnLtYgCLcBGAs/s640/nervSoussystem.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Autonomic nervous\nsystem (ANS) is divided into the outward directed, stress handling, energy\nutilizing, pingala dominant, sympathetic nervous system, or the inwardly\ndirected, rest handling, energy conserving, ida dominant, parasympathetic\nnervous system. These two systems control and regulate all the automatic body\nprocesses: heart, blood pressure, respiration, digestion, liver and kidney and\nso on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Central nervous\nsystem&nbsp; (CNS)&nbsp; consists&nbsp;&nbsp;\nof&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp; brain&nbsp;&nbsp;\nand&nbsp;&nbsp; spinal&nbsp;&nbsp; cord&nbsp;&nbsp;\nand contains the controls for the SMS and ANS.&nbsp; The brain contains much more than this\nthough, for it is a huge, ultimately complex computer, which stores and\nintegrates information and puts our decisions into action in a superbly\nsynchronized and orchestrated performance.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its functioning is\ndefinitely much more than its parts. Within the&nbsp;&nbsp; infinite&nbsp;&nbsp;\ncircuitry&nbsp;&nbsp; of&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp;\nbrain&nbsp;&nbsp; resides&nbsp;&nbsp; more&nbsp;&nbsp;\npotential&nbsp;&nbsp; than&nbsp;&nbsp; we&nbsp;&nbsp;\ncan&nbsp;&nbsp; realize&nbsp;&nbsp; in&nbsp;&nbsp;\none lifetime, however, the techniques of yoga systematically clear and\nstrengthen these circuits with regular practice. This is what yogis have been\ntelling us, that the circuitry for nadis and chakras exist within the CNS,\nalong the spine and in the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we can tap, purify,\nstrengthen and reconnect these circuits via the various yogic techniques, we\ncan totally transform our mind/&nbsp; body\ncomplex . Only when the left brain lobe (Pingala) and the right brain lobe\n(Ida)&nbsp; work together can we appreciate\nthe moral of a story, the measuring of a metaphor, words describing emotion, or\nthe punch line of a joke. A computer can never understand the moral of a story\n( like stitch in time saves nine ) or a funny joke.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I once had a Chief\nOfficer on my ship who had never ever breathed through his nose due to a bone\novergrowth. Only I know what he was worth -- as such a man cannot go (or grow\nmentally) beyond a limit. He can never pass a Mensa test.&nbsp; They see the explicit, the facts, but cannot\nunderstand what has been implied. The important points in their sentences are\nlost and are submerged or flattened, becoming part of the background. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When one nostril has\ndominant air flow,&nbsp; the opposite\nhemisphere of the brain is dominant.&nbsp;\nForceful breathing through the more congested nostril awakens the less\ndominant hemisphere The nasal cycle is also linked to the basic rest/activity\ncycle, which includes within the sleep cycle, the rapid eye movement (REM)\nphase and the non REM phase, because right nostril/left hemisphere dominance\ncorresponds to phases of increased activity (pingala), and left nostril/right\nhemisphere dominance corresponds to rest phases (ida).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Buried within the brain\nare undreamed of capabilities and potentials which can transform our lives if\nwe can tap them. . Chakras act as transducers, converting psychic energy into\nphysical energy and vice versa. They distribute this energy to the body via the\nnadis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The breath in the right\nnostril is related to pingala function (left brain), and in the left nostril is\nrelated to ida function (right&nbsp;&nbsp;\nbrain).&nbsp; By&nbsp;&nbsp; controlling&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp;&nbsp; speed,&nbsp;&nbsp; rate,&nbsp;&nbsp;\nrhythm,&nbsp;&nbsp; length&nbsp;&nbsp; and&nbsp;&nbsp;\nduration&nbsp;&nbsp; of &nbsp;&nbsp;the breath, by altering the ratio of\ninhalation to exhalation in the nostrils and by stopping the breath, we can\nactivate or tone down neurological and mental processes so as to achieve\nheightened awareness and altered states of consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each level in the\nchakra system is the sum total of various physical, emotional, mental, psychic\nand spiritual elements. Each chakra has its own neurological plexus and\nendocrine gland and these link up to various organs and systems in the body.\nThey in turn are connected to the controlling mechanisms of the brain, each of\nwhich has emotional, mental and psychic components. The chakra is like a\ntransducer, a linking point between the various levels of our being and it\nconverts and channels energy either up or down to the various levels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ajna chakra has as its\nsymbol the two-petalled lotus, and we can think of this as representing the two\nhemispheres of the brain with the pineal gland as its main focusing central\npoint . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cosmic consciousness\ntakes place in Sahasrara chakra.&nbsp; The\nhuman brain is still in an organic state of evolution toward higher levels of\nconsciousness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The driving force of\nthat evolution, is the Kundalini energy.&nbsp; &nbsp;The Bose-Einstein photon condensate\ncan be made to give off coherent laser like X-rays that can be precisely\ndirected.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Kundalini Awakening is only triggered when you\nare ready to go through it, because your higher self is actually the source\nthat triggers it.&nbsp; Your higher-self which\nis vastly intelligent is not going to give you something which is threatening\nto your survival.&nbsp; Resistance to change\nhas always been the human problem, and this resistance comes from our fixed ego\naspect. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; If the body is completely immobile and respiration\nis slow and barely perceptible \u2013 as is the case in deep meditation \u2013 these micromotions\nwill assume great regularity and oscillate at seven cycles per second (7.3 Hz-\nHindu king mantra OM frequency ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subsequently scalar\nstanding waves in and above the audio frequency range will develop in the\nventricles of the brain. These causes the high-pitched sounds which herald the\nactivation of the Kundalini.&nbsp; The\nstanding waves in the ventricles will stimulate an electrical loop circuit in\nthe sensory cortex oscillating at 7.3Hz \u2013 which incidently is within the EEG\ntheta frequency band.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As this oscillating\ncurrent passes through the sensory cortex in a closed circuit, it will create\ndifferent bodily sensations starting in the toes and moving up the body to the\nhead. These are the sensations described by yogis, which accompany the Kundalini\nawakening. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 7.3 Hz oscillating\ncurrent in the sensory cortex \u2013 set up by sitting immobile in meditation \u2013 also\npasses through the limbic system. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here it stimulates the PLEASURE\nCENTERS &nbsp;in amygdala ( TANTRA METHOD ) thereby\ninitiating the Kundalini kindling phenomenon.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">YOGA ADDRESSED VAGUS NERVE AND AMYGDALA --THOUSANDS OF YEARS AGO.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE MODERN SCIENTIST STILL IS NOT AWARE OF IT</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; NOBODY KNOWS THAT SHE IS HAVING&nbsp;</b><b>ALZHEIMERS</b><br />\n<b><br /></b>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This extra supply of energy from lower centers causes a diffuse\nactivation of the whole cortex reflected by increased synchronization and coherence\nof brain wave activity within all frequency bands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the energy flows\nfrom the thalamus to the cortex and awakens latent or unused parts of the brain\n(especially in the frontal lobes) the whole brain begins to pulse as a unit\ngenerating coherent, high amplitude brain waves within a broad frequency\nspectrum. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During rest maximum\namplitude will be in the alpha band but during intense focus high amplitude\nbeta and gamma waves will prevail, especially in the frontal area. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">A \u2018condensate\u2019 is a\nsubstance whose molecules have a greater order and coherence than normal.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Examples of\n\u2018Bose-Einstein condensates\u2019 in inorganic matter are superconductors and laser\nbeams. By feeding extra energy to the cell walls of living tissue, the cells\nwould line up in the most orderly, condensed way we know \u2013 the \u2018Bose-Einstein\ncondensate\u2019 \u2013 and the cell walls would start acting as a unit.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">When the\nbrain is supplied with an extra amount of high grade energy (Kundalini) it\nbecomes a \u2018Bose-Einstein condensate\u2019.&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How did the ancient\nHindus Maharishis know all this 11000 years ago--without a laser beam ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Bose-Einstein\ncondensate,&nbsp; is named after the Indian\nscientist&nbsp; Satyendra Nath Bose.&nbsp; Since he was a partner of&nbsp; Albert Einstein ( <b><span style=\"color: red;\">HE DID NOTHING </span></b>) ,&nbsp; his name is in it too.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Bose was denied a Nobel\nprize,&nbsp; as Indians were at that time made\nto feel that we are an inferior race\u2014 though every single discovery and\ninvention of that Quantum age , had its roots in our 7000 year old Vedas. </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our bodies are\npiezo-electric bio-crystals, resonant transducers of living light and life\nforce. We have unlimited access to the radiant field of consciousness which is\ninfinite active universal intelligence. We all have direct and immediate access\nto the scalar field of consciousness . There is a connection between DNA and\nconsciousness . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain and the DNA\nare transducers for quantum information from the scalar field. When a DNA\nstrand is placed in a vacuum, the energy emitted by that strand will attract\nphotons which will assume the same shape of the DNA strand, even if the DNA\nstrand is removed later. Quantum coherence in the micro tubules of every cell\nis the key to consciousness</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To become enlightened\nyou have to let go of attachment to all material aspects, which include body,\nmind and emotions . You are entering into unknown fields, yet there is a rock\nof stability and that is your ability to be aware . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The more you let go of\nattachment to physical aspects, the more you are guided and the more self-sovereign\nyou become. The more you let go, the more aware you become. This is truly a\njourney that everyone must take alone, once you are prepared for the\njourney,&nbsp; under a guru.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nadis exist in the\netheric body, unseen to the naked eye and is based on energy currents,\nvibration and psychic energy . Kundalini rises only when the state of\npurification of the nadis and chakras has progressed far enough.&nbsp; The goal of many of the yoga practices is to\npurify the nadis, and then to cause the prana and apana to meet and rise up\nthrough the sushumna.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A method of purifying\nthe nadis and disciplining them is by doing Surya Namaskar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The post below stands\nNo1 among all my 1285 extra \u2013long posts by readership 96% foreigners<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/surya-namaskar-11000-year-old-vedic-sun.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balancing Ida and\nPingala&nbsp; balances the sympathetic and\nparasympathetic branches of the autonomic nervous system, reducing the elevated\nflight or fight response.&nbsp; In other\nwords, the single act of balancing the breath is a tremendous aid in physical\nstress reduction, in addition to being a spiritual practice setting the stage\nfor Kundalini Awakening.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said before out of\nthese 72,000 subtle nadis only 3 nadis are very important.&nbsp; They are Ida, Pingala and Sushumna.&nbsp; The 10 main nadis which carry prana out of\nthe 72000 are Ida, Pingala, Sushumna, Gandhari, Hastijihva, Pusa, Yusasvini,\nAlambusa, Kuhuh and Sankhini .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ida is feminine (\nirrespective of gender ) , left sympathetic nervous system, on LH side of\nspinal cord,&nbsp; tamas- yin negative charge\npolarity energy, represented by cooling moon, connecting to left nostril,\ncontrols mental processes, connects to RH brain lobe, pale colour<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pingala is\nmasculine ( irrespective ofgender ) , on RH side of spinal cord,&nbsp; rajas-yang positive charge polarity energy ,\nrepresented by heating sun, connecting to right nostril, controls vital\nprocesses, connects to RH brain lobe, red colour,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Both ida and pingala ends between the eye\nbrows\u2014at Shiva\u2019s third eye.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Medullar Sushumna,\nwhich interpenetrates the cerebrospinal axis from the perineum to the juncture\nof the lamboid and sagittal suture of the cranium, and is associated with both\nnostrils being open and free to the passage of air.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sushumna-Sattwa is at\nthe back of the anus, in the middle of the Spinal chord and is the most\nimportant of all nadis, neutral charge energy . It is attached to the spinal\ncolumn and extends to the Brahmarandhra of the head and is invisible and\nsubtle. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the coiled-up energy,\nKundalini, passes up along the Sushumna Nadi and is taken up from Chakra to\nChakra the Yogi gets different sorts of experiences, powers and Ananda ( bliss\n). When ida and pingala get balanced and unite in the activated sushumna, pure\nconsiousness arises.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is only when prana\nmoves into the sushumna that the latent spiritual power of&nbsp; kundalini can be awakened. Kundalaini is the\npower of pure consciousness, the dynamic potential of the soul. It is the\nDivine Mother Herself, visualized as a serpent coiled three and a half times,\nwith its tail in its mouth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">( I HAVE NOT WRITTEN\nABOUT PRANA YET )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the objects of\nactivating the spiral fire and its progress up the spine to the head is to\nawaken the pineal gland, which results in the opening of the third eye and the\nconsequent revelation of the subtler planes of life When it reaches the brain,\nthe yogi is perfectly detached from the body and mind; the soul finds itself\nfree.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, the goal of the\nsadhaka ( the man who does meditation) in his sadhana (meditating practice) is\nto bring the hood of the kundalini to Sahasrara chakra through Sushumna\nsituated in between Ida and Pingala.&nbsp;\nThat is when the hood reaches head or Sahasrara chakra, the tail of the\n3.5 coiled serpent will reach Mooladharachakra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While doing meditation\nthe awakened kundalini should raise neither through left side Ida nor through\nright Pingala but through centre Sushumna nadi only. If not the sadhaka will\nget traumatic results. The&nbsp; breathing\nshould be slow and long. The posture should be straight and erect. internally\nplacing attention between the eyebrows, making the energies flow evenly between\nthe nostrils.Otherwise the breath will take Ida path or pingala path deviating\nfrom Sushumna path.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ida and pingala\nfunction alternately and directly influence the temperature of the body,\ndigestive and hormonal secretions, the brainwaves and all the bodily systems.\nIda and pingala function according to a natural cycle, but on account of poor\neating habits, pollution&nbsp; and\ninharmonious lifestyles, the natural cycle is often disturbed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes one nadi\npredominates and the other is suppressed. This leads to mental and physical\nimbalances and generally results in disease. Therefore, ida and pingala must be\ndisciplined or made to function according to the laws of nature. Only when\nthere is harmony between these two nadis can sushumna be awakened. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When sushumna awakens,\nkundalini ascends straight to sahasrara and one becomes a jivanmukta, a\nliberated soul .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When awakening takes\nplace in sushumna, you may feel or see a rod of light, or your spinal cord may\nseem to be fully illumined from within. The \u201cjerking\u201d that occurs, is an effect\nof the energy pulsating through the Sushumna.&nbsp;\nThis movement and sounds of a train in a tunnel signifies the movement\nof the serpent Shakti towards Shiva. Once attained this you have reached Shiva,\nthe Highest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">\"A hundred and one\nare the arteries of the heart, one of them leads up to the crown of the head.\nGoing upward through that, one becomes immortal.\"--- (CU 8.6.6) Chandogya\nUpanishad ( 5000 BC ).</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two phases of\nkundalini awakening.&nbsp; Only after\npurification can there be awakening&nbsp; Only\nby purifying the nadis and awakening the 7 main chakras is the kundalini able to\nrise up through the spine . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purification of nadis\nis critical to good health so that a balanced level of prana can flow\nthroughout the nadis and chakra systems.&nbsp;\nImpure nadis cause blockages of the prana and this is what leads to\ndisease in the physical body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;By purifying you can experience better sense\nof self-control and, overcome anger and resentment to find inner calm and\nmental peace. It strengthens the immune system too and helps you fight off\nseveral diseases and keep them at bay. A positive mind is a great weapon\nagainst all of them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When pranayama is\ncorrectly and regularly practiced, it calms and internalized the mind, floods\nthe system with fresh prana, strengthens the organs of the body and purifies\nthe nadis . Pranayama practices, including nadi shodhana, which involves\nalternate breathing through left and right nostrils, which would alternately\nstimulate respectively the left and right sides of the brain. Although we often\nrefer to pranayama as breath control, it actually is the expansion and\nredirection of prana via the medium of breath . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our Vedas Prana-vayu\nis responsible for inhalation. This form of prana moves between the navel and\nheart and is responsible for the functioning of the heart and lungs. It\ncontrols breathing, swallowing and the circulation of blood.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apana-vayu is\nresponsible for exhalation and is a downward moving current. Its seat is\nbetween the anus and the navel. It controls the functions of the kidneys,\nbowels and bladder and is responsible for excretion, urination, expulsion of\ngas, sexual fluids and childbirth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serious yogis should\nrefrain from eating eat meat, fish or eggs, and avoid all mind-altering drugs\nand alcohol and impure items such as tobacco, onions, garlic, fermented and\nacidic foods , and anything that overloads your system or agitates your mind.\nOccasional fasts are good for the body and mind.
