Even the facial\nhair does not grow during the period of hibernation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I guess I am shocking\nmy readers too much -- so let me stop!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When kundalini wakes up\nin mooladhara it begins to ascend spirally,like a hissing snake. However, the\nawakening of kundalini which exists in manipura takes place like a blast.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kundalini practices are\ncertainly no more dangerous than many of the activities people engage in for\nthe sake of cheap thrills and sport. Just do it the right way.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the chakras are not\npurified, then purification of the nadis will not serve any purpose. If the\nelectrical junctions are not connected or properly organized, even if you have\nthe best wiring available, how will the electrical energy be distributed?&nbsp; The chakras are the junctions from which the\nnadis, like cables, transmit the energy to different parts of the body. The\nseven primary chakras which exist based on the number of times ida and pingala\ncriss-cross at sushumna.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every cell of your body\nis directly related to one of the chakras. If you experience pain in any part\nof the body, the sensation will go to the chakra related to that particular\narea. This means your whole body is connected with one of the chakras. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, the\nurinary, excretory and reproductive systems are fed by swadhisthana chakra. The\nsexual organs are connected to mooladhara chakra. The digestive system, small\nintestine, large intestine, appendix, pancreas, duodenum, stomach and liver are\nall connected to manipura chakra. The heart and lungs are fed by anahata\nchakra. However, in most people, the chakras beyond manipura are dormant. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because mooladhara\nchakra is the highest chakra in animal evolution, it is already functioning in\nmost people. That is why everybody has a very acute sexual awareness and sex\nhas become one of the most important events in man's life. Therefore, most of\nour social traditions are based upon this particular human requirement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Specific Yogic\nasanas&nbsp; are&nbsp;&nbsp; intended&nbsp;&nbsp;\nto&nbsp;&nbsp; create&nbsp;&nbsp; mild&nbsp;&nbsp;\nawakening&nbsp;&nbsp; in&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp;\nchakras.&nbsp;&nbsp; For&nbsp;&nbsp; example, sarvangasana will awaken vishuddhi,\nmatsyasana will awaken anahata and bhujangasana will awaken swadhisthana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind is not a\npsychological stuff, nor is it a thought process.&nbsp; Mind is energy.&nbsp; Anger, passion,&nbsp; greed,&nbsp;\nambition, etc. are waves of that scalar energy. People with relased\nKundalini sees everything as fractal geometry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mere fact that\ntoday's society is utilizing the five tattwas of tantra (meat, fish, wine,\ngrain and sexual interaction) in everyday life means that in most people,\nkundalini is somewhere between mooladhara and swadhisthana. People who eat meat\n, kill , and lead base lives have their Kundalini dead asleep in\nMooladhara.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once kundalini leaves\nswadhisthana and ascends to manipura and anahata, you no longer need the five\ntattwas. If you are stuck in mooladhara or swadhisthana, you will need to\npurify the higher chakras and bring them into operation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nagas (serpents) of\nHindu literature are none other than rishis, liberated yogis and enlightened\nadepts with released Kundalinis. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the serpent\u2019s tail\nis in its mouth, an endless circle is made, implying boundless wisdom and\neternity itself. That is the union of a symbolised positive and negative charge\n.&nbsp; Lord Shiva is NOT a snake charmer living\nin a cremation ground eating dead flesh and sneaking behind the meditating\nSapta Rishis to FUCK their horny wives .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since 11000 BC, the\ntantrics and yogis have realized that in this physical body there is a\npotential force. It is not psychological, philosophical or transcendental,\nrather it is a dynamic potential force in the material body, and it is called\nkundalini. This kundalini is the greatest discovery of tantra and yoga.&nbsp; The mind is nothing but an extension of the\nbody complex. Consciousness exists in your DNA . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All energy is a\nvortex-- NOT a wave, as you are told in your science books. Scalar waves faster\nthan light can also be generated by balancing the RH and LH lobes of your\nbrain, if your pineal gland is still not calcified.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scalar or longitudinal\nelectromagnetic waves come in phase conjugate pairs.--of of which ONE IS TIME\nREVERSED.&nbsp; You can call this identical\nwaves, basically a WAVE and an ANTI-WAVE&nbsp;\n( following the laws of Tamas-Rajas ) that are in phase spacially, but\nout of phase temporarily. Rather 2 identical waves out of phase in time. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scalar waves follow a\nmobius pattern on axis just like your DNA. Within the vascular mobius coil,\nthere are subsets of figure of eight along major capillary networks. At the heart\n, the intersection of venous blood passing through the right atrium, over laps\nthe aortic blood coming out of the left atrium. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are essentially\nonly two types of human beings - those who are on the pravritti path and those\nwho are on the nivritti path. A man following the pravritti (outward) path\nlooks away from bindu towards the outside world. He is almost entirely\nmotivated by external&nbsp;&nbsp; events.&nbsp;&nbsp; This&nbsp;&nbsp;\nis&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp; path&nbsp;&nbsp;\nof&nbsp;&nbsp; most&nbsp;&nbsp; people&nbsp;&nbsp;\ntoday&nbsp;&nbsp; and&nbsp;&nbsp; it&nbsp;&nbsp;\nleads&nbsp;&nbsp; away&nbsp;&nbsp; from&nbsp;&nbsp;\nself knowledge and into bondage. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The other path, the\nnivritti (reversed) path, is the spiritual path, the path of wisdom. On this\npath the individual begins to face the bindu, turning in towards the source of\nhis being. This path leads to freedom. The path of evolution is the pravritti\npath of manifestation and extroversion. The path of involution leads back along\nthe path that has produced your individual being. It leads back through the\nbindu to sahasrara. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole purpose of\nyoga practice is to help direct your awareness along the involutionary path.\nThere is tremendous power ensheathed within the infinitesimal point. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, one theory\nabout the origin of the universe suggests that an infinitely dense point of\nmatter exploded in a 'big bang' to form the entire cosmos. Similarly, research\nin subatomic physics has revealed that vast amounts of power are found\nconcentrated within the multitudinous different subatomic particles existing in\nthe space/time continuum. Physics is moving into the realms of the ineffable\nbindu. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In molecular biology,\nthe essence of bindu can be found in the DNA and RNA molecules, each one of\nwhich contains the complete genetic blueprint for the entire organism. . In\ntantra, each bindu, each particle of manifested existence is regarded as a\ncenter of power or shakti. This shakti is an expression of the underlying\nsubstratum of static consciousness. The aim of the tantric system is to bring\nabout a fusion of Shakti - the individual manifested power, with Shiva - the\ninert, underlying universal consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogis and quantum\nphysicists share a wonderful view of the universe as a sea of \"quantum\nfoam\", of space and time existing not as fixed realities but as mental\nconstructs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every day scientists\nfind new diseases and pharma companies invent chemical drugs with destructive\nside effects. It is a money spinning industry. Why are there so many new\nchronic diseases that have entered our everyday vocabulary such as ADD,\nanorexia, bulimia, migraines, acid reflux, hypertension, diabetes, IBS,\nfibromyalgia, depression and chronic exhaustion to name just a few.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This solution is found\nin the practice of yoga. The fundamental purpose of the yoga practice is to\nallow the practitioner to find the balance between the polar opposites in their\nlives.&nbsp; Human beings must first slow down\nour minds long enough (by practicing introspection) to begin to notice their\nimbalanced thoughts, habits and actions.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kundalini in Sanskrit\nliterally means \u201ccoil.\u201d Kundalini is the cosmic energy that lays dormant at the\nbase of the spine in the perineum, and is symbolically depicted as a serpent. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keep your mind open\nabout all this. This is NOT Indian snake charmer mysticism .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One century ago if you\ntold somebody that you can have a video call on your mobile phone, nobody would\nhave believed you, right? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes, there are things\nscience does NOT know.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who the hell is a\nSHALLOW MINDED &nbsp;scientist?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0wgv7sYKuTQ/WlHUepOxHLI/AAAAAAABXuc/uV0tzWdE_TIbzD2YIoePqOw-5qzM4r2vgCLcBGAs/s1600/KundaliSni%252C%2BSuperconductor.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, a \u2018condensate\u2019\nis a substrate whose molecules have a great order and coherence than normal .\nIn a \u2018Bose-Einstein \u2013 Condensate\u2019 the molecules have a high degree of order and\noverlap so that the condensate behaves like a unit .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Super Conductors and\nlasers beams are examples of Bose- Einstein \u2013 Condensates in inorganic\nmatter.If the&nbsp; human brain have a\nsufficient supply of high grade energy , the neurons will line up in the most\norderly and condensed way we know- The Bose-Einstein -Condensate. This is also\ncalled neurological coherence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Kundalini has\nawakened , the brain will turn into a Super -conductor and Attention will be\nlike a Laser \u2013beam\u2014the brain can be used as a laser beam<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a part of the\nbrain is active, it generates electrical signals, brainwaves, which can be\nvisualized through an ElectroEncephaloGram or EEG.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A computer can\nmathematically calculate to what degree the waveforms of different parts of the\nbrain are similar or coherent with each other. A high coherence between 2 parts\nof the brain is a strong indication that these parts are working together as\none unified whole. When this happens, everything about the brain becomes\nbetter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When our attention is\ndirected outward, the coherence between different parts of the brain is very\nlow. We see things, hear things, think about things etc. And each part of the\nbrain works on its own<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we transcend and\nour wave settles down and becomes the ocean. The brain doesn\u2019t focus on\nanything specific anymore, but it still remains active. In this state the whole\nbrain becomes coherent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coherence is a measure\nof how effectively two sites are able to link and unlink, to share information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coherence is one\nmathematical method that can be used to determine if two or more sensors, or\nbrain regions, have similar neuronal oscillatory activity with each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brian connectivity\ndescribes the networks of functional and anatomical connections across the\nbrain. The functional network communications across the brain networks\ndependent on neuronal oscillations. Detection of the synchronous activation of\nneurons can be used to determine the wellbeing or integrity of the functional\nconnectivity in the human brain networks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well-connected highly\nsynchronous functional activity can be measured by Electroencephalography (EEG)\nor Magnetoencephalography (MEG) and then analyzed with several types of\nmathematical algorithms. Coherence is one mathematical method that can be used\nto determine if two or more sensors, or brain regions, have similar neuronal\noscillatory activity with each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the 1960\u2019s,\ncoherence has generally been assessed on the similarity of the frequency\ncontent across EEG sensors. Recently coherence, after it has been imaged in the\nbrain, has been used to assess how coherent or connected specific locations in\nthe brain are networked together in several different neurological disorders.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Statistical analysis can then be performed on the coherence results to verify\nevidence of normal or abnormal network activity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coherence is a\nmathematical technique that quantifies the frequency and amplitude of the\nsynchronicity of neuronal patterns of oscillating brain activity. This\ntechnique quantifies the neuronal patterns of synchronicity measured between\nspatially separated scalp electrodes (Electroencephalogram) or coils\n(Magnetoencephalogram)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alpha synchrony relates\nto the brain\u2019s ability to keep the channels clear and open when the neurons are\nnot active. It\u2019s not just about raising alpha amplitude.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/06/alpha-state-and-earths-heartbeat-of-783.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/06/alpha-state-and-earths-heartbeat-of-783.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Higher coherence is\nassociated with more integrated and effective thinking and behavior, including\ngreater intelligence, creativity, learning ability, emotional stability,\nethical and moral reasoning, self-confidence, and reduced anxiety.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Corticocortical\nCoherence is referred to the synchrony in the neural activity of different\ncortical brain areas. The neural activities are picked up by\nelectrophysiological recordings from the brain (e.g. EEG, MEG, ECoG, etc.). It\nis a method to study the brain's neural communication and function at rest or\nduring functional tasks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain has an\nanalytical neural network that allows for critical thinking as well as a social\nnetwork that supports empathy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two networks play a\ngame of tug-of-war when faced with a problem. When critical thinking is\nrequired, the empathetic part of the brain is suppressed. When moral reasoning\nis needed, the analytical network is subdued.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronistic events\nprovide an immediate religious experience as a direct encounter with the\ncompensatory patterning of events in nature as a whole, both inwardly and\noutwardly-Jung lifted this from Vedas without understanding it<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To imitate is to go\nagainst yourself. To imitate simply means you are denying yourself and you are\nimposing somebody else upon you. You have brahman within you ( soul )\u2014why\nshould you imitate ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science is based on the\nlaw of causality.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The law of causality is mechanical. The church and IDIOT Newton , made sure you\nhave to use your narrow band 5 senses ( squelched ) to verify<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of this law of\ncausality, science cannot believe in the existence of soul, in the existence of\nconsciousness, in the existence of God \u2013 because they are non-mechanical\nphenomena<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronistic moments\nfeel like grace, as they induce in us the feeling that we are right where we\nare supposed to be. Being numinous, synchronicities have a strong feeling\ncomponent and emotional charge, which is both an expression of while\nsimultaneously flowing into, influencing and altering the surrounding field of\nconsciousness.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kNfw4PJYu2Y/WlIloE9uCTI/AAAAAAABXvY/sDz5obTvkQstovCQI8jfDdBh1FYFrRsIACLcBGAs/s1600/imaszges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"224\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kNfw4PJYu2Y/WlIloE9uCTI/AAAAAAABXvY/sDz5obTvkQstovCQI8jfDdBh1FYFrRsIACLcBGAs/s400/imaszges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicities are a reflection of the deeper, underlying\nnonlocal field of consciousness waking up to itself through us. The gift of synchronicity\ncannot be realized from the point of view which imagines we exist as a separate\nperson who is \u201cother\u201d than the field in which we are arising.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicities\nare acute outbreaks of the archetypal, collective mind-field crystallized into\nour personal sphere through the third-dimensional medium of time and space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicities are\nglimpses of transcendental unity.&nbsp; The\nunus mundus, just like the deeper, dreaming Self, is a psycho-physical reality,\na universe beyond time and outside of space in which psyche and matter are\ninseparably co-joined as interconnected parts of a deeper, unified field. It is\na realm beyond duality, beyond the opposites, beyond even the concept of\nbeyond..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicities are a\nliving, unmediated materialization of our unconscious&nbsp; Synchronicities are utterances of the soul,\nas they contain, are an expression of and unite the opposites. Synchronicities\nare soul-making in action.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2tC-UIGKvUc/WlIo402i9gI/AAAAAAABXv0/p4efQGYBXekUduj0OKzm59HtPHjyZEgugCLcBGAs/s1600/0a66a84f8eb35fWd223d12ece287de739--spiritual-quotes-spiritual-growth.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"720\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2tC-UIGKvUc/WlIo402i9gI/AAAAAAABXv0/p4efQGYBXekUduj0OKzm59HtPHjyZEgugCLcBGAs/s640/0a66a84f8eb35fWd223d12ece287de739--spiritual-quotes-spiritual-growth.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicities occur\nwhen we step out of the personal dimension of our experience and access&nbsp; the archetypal dimension of experience. If we\nare absorbed in and identified with the person-alistic perspective, we\nperson-alize our experience, imagining we exist as a separate person isolated\nfrom the space around us.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We thus become entranced into a particularized point\nof view which develops a seemingly autonomous life of its own and becomes a\nself-reinforcing feedback loop, a true \u201cself\u201d fulfilling prophecy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To become\nidentified with the fixed reference point of the separate self limits our\nfreedom, entraps our creative potency and hinders our compassion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To the extent\nwe recognize the dreamlike nature of our situation, however, we step out of a\nperson-alistic and reductive viewpoint based on linear causality (i.e., the\nperspective of the illusory skin-encapsulated ego) into a more archetypal\nperspective in which we find ourselves playing roles in an eternal, mythic and\ndivine drama of incarnation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/nJ-3m5W4cp4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/nJ-3m5W4cp4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Know nature to be\nMaya and the Ruler of this Maya is the Lord Himself.\" -- Svetasvatara\nUpanishad.( 5000 BC )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God lives in Time and\nSpace and moves with Time&nbsp; (both are\neternal ).&nbsp; Heavens, Earth, day and night\nall serve Time and Time controls All . (Rig Veda 1-95-7).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'That which is above\nthe sky, that which is beneath the earth, that which is between these two, sky and\nearth that which the people call the past, the present and future, across space\nis that woven like warp and weft.&nbsp;&nbsp; -\nBrhadaranyaka Upanisad 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>The theory of Maya is\none of the grand pillars&nbsp; upon which\nVedanta rests.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word origin of MAYA\nis derived from the Sanskrit roots MA ( not ) and&nbsp; YA ( that ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>The term MAYA&nbsp; is mentioned&nbsp;\n72 times in Rigveda written down in Sanskrit in 5000 BC.&nbsp; Maya is mentioned&nbsp; 29 times in the Atharva Veda.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Puranas and Vaishnava theology,&nbsp; Maya is described as one of the nine shaktis\nof the reclining Vishnu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: This giant golden idol was found at Padmanabha Swamy temple Kerala from a locked and forgotten vault.. Brahma sitting on a tender swaying lotus on the navel shows precession of the planet.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Qutab Minar, a Hindu monument--&nbsp; is meant to be viewed from TOP--from a helicopter hovering above the pillar.&nbsp; &nbsp; Islamic lies wont work anymore !&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GbiwJL_d1ig/WlImZsCIaVI/AAAAAAABXvk/WPHntBBx7bIvA-i2v0hMxif3vU9rSFi4gCLcBGAs/s1600/VishSnu_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"651\" data-original-width=\"956\" height=\"434\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GbiwJL_d1ig/WlImZsCIaVI/AAAAAAABXvk/WPHntBBx7bIvA-i2v0hMxif3vU9rSFi4gCLcBGAs/s640/VishSnu_1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAYA is the veritable\nfabric of duality, and she performs this role at the behest of BrahmAn, the\nmorphogenetic consciousness field.. The Supreme God is not bound by Maya&nbsp; just as magicians do not believe the\nillusions of their own magic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swami Vivekananda had\ntold Nikola tesla that science and religion would meet and shake hands.&nbsp; He told Tesla that when science meets the\nconsciousness field of Vedanta written 7000 years ago, the last frontier of\nscience can be breached.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;I think that time has come to understand this\nprofound truth , but this is possible only after understanding the concept of\nMAYA in Hinduism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universe is filled\nwith an incomprehensible amount of energy and substance , most of which is\nimperceptible to our physical senses.&nbsp;\nRadio waves, microwaves, infrared waves and microscopic particles are\njust a few examples of the infinite aspects of reality that elude the\nperception of our 5 senses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our 5 senses serve as a\nfilter allowing us to experience only what is absolutely necessary for our\nphysical existence.&nbsp; The 5 senses create\nthe set for the stage we call our lives.&nbsp;\nThe senses squelch out , let we will have a breakdown due to excess\ninformation.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya is invisible\nand&nbsp; beyond sense-perception. No human\ncan see beyond the quantum screen .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dvaita Hinduism tells\nus about the duality of nature and existence .&nbsp;\nThese dual poles of Tamas \u2013Rajas ( Yin Yang ) are connected via\nconsciousness.&nbsp; It is about the quantum\npossibility wave vibration between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This guarantees change,\ngrowth and evolution Lessening of Yin- always results in increase of Yang and\nvice versa.&nbsp; One cannot exist without the\nother and they are mutually dependant .&nbsp;\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014&nbsp;\nYin and Yang continuously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lila is a way of\ndescribing all reality, including the cosmos, as the outcome of creative play\nby BrahmAn, the intelligent empty space in which the electrons in an atom whiz\naround.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY BRAHMAN CAN CREATE\nPERPETUAL MOTION <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya may be understood\nas the phenomenal universe of perceived duality ( Dvaita Vedanta ) , a lesser\nreality-lens superimposed on the unity of BrahmAn ( Advaita Vedanta )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">Below:&nbsp; When you have a big bang which created the\ncosmos, you need to have a black hole singularity too. This is commonsense\nwhich Albert Einstein and party ignored despite being very proficient with\nIndian Vedas. The Bindu of the Sri Yantra represents singularity. The modern\nBig Bang CUNT cosmologists want to get the Universe out of nothing. It's like\nasking us to believe that nothing made everything out of nothing. They could\nnot understand singularity which the Vedic seer did.. Christian historians have\nbeen trying to date Rig Veda to 1500 BC ( instead of 5000 BC ) because as per\nBible the big bang happened in 4004 BC on 23 rd Oct at 9 AM while Vedanta and\nthe modern quantum theory agrees that it is around 15 billion years. Naturally\nyou cannot have a book written before the creation of cosmos , right ? And how\ncan the servant race be better than the white master race\u2014whose burden is the\nblack man ? . &nbsp;The ridiculous Noah's arc great\nflood incident happened in 2500 BC ( while actually life came to earth 4\nbillion years ago ). , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Werner Heisenberg's\nuncertainty principle is MAYA. Heisenberg pointed out that the product of our\nnecessary uncertainty in where a particle is and our necessary uncertainty in\nits momentum can never be smaller than Planck's constant over two pi. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Heisenberg uncertainty principle or\nindeterminacy principle, statement, articulated (1927) by the German physicist\nWerner Heisenberg, that the position and the velocity of an object cannot both\nbe measured exactly, at the same time, even in theory. The very concepts of\nexact position and exact velocity together, in fact, have no meaning in nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/sMbA-ZfYvh8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/sMbA-ZfYvh8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; We are now in the age of Quantum Computers and Quantum satellites&nbsp; --when speed of light limit is a ridiculor JOKE</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">Vedas were transmitted orally for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries ago</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bcQlorQPbCs/WlI3TFS-_rI/AAAAAAABXxc/JhexC2KEixQXGVx7xsdxBb6UypmJetPmwCLcBGAs/s1600/imddages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bcQlorQPbCs/WlI3TFS-_rI/AAAAAAABXxc/JhexC2KEixQXGVx7xsdxBb6UypmJetPmwCLcBGAs/s400/imddages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 24px; margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4671100578196233665\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_175M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/blockchain-bitcoin-big-brother-will.html?showComment=1513185259860#c4671100578196233665\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 13, 2017 at 10:44 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPhysicists in China and the US have built a 10-qubit superconducting quantum processor that could be scaled up to tackle problems not solvable by classical computers.<br />\n<br />\nQubits are the building blocks of quantum computing, capable of superposition \u2013 being in two states at the same time, rather than the computer bits of today, which are either a 1 or a 0 at any given moment.<br />\n<br />\nEntanglement is where quantum states can't be described independently, but only in relation to the others, making for a more solid system. The team used a measurement technique called quantum tomography to prove that they had indeed entangled their qubits<br />\n<br />\nThe phenomenon of entanglement in quantum physics, which has been observed in many experiments, implies that objects that are far removed in space (even across billions of miles) remain connected even though there is no mediating agency.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVedic philosophy tells us about the existence of another type of particle called the atma, the soul, the self, having different properties from those of ordinary particles.This is not unusual in physics, as is the case with antimatter particles.<br />\n<br />\nThe atma does not come into or out of existence, it is always present. It does not decay or degrade, it maintains its individuality always, it\u2019s infinitesimally small and it\u2019s not composed of more elementary particles. It\u2019s unchangeable, which along with the individuality property implies that it does not unite with other particles to create more complex structures, nor does it merge with others.<br />\n<br />\nThe atma does not interact directly with matter, but given that the atma is the source of consciousness and the life force in a living entity, any entity displaying them reveals the presence of an atma in it\u2014whether human, animal, plant, etc.<br />\n<br />\nVedanta wrote 7000 years ago-- The living entities are not made up of atmas; rather, they are these particles and are animating the material bodies that encase them. As soon as the atma leaves one body for another, the old body no longer exhibits consciousness or life symptoms, and begins to degrade.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMaharishi Kashyapa is also known as Kanada Muni. He called the atom Anu. He wrote that there are 108 such elements ...<br />\n<br />\nThe basic Vaisheshika concepts of matter, action, attribute, time and space are described. The 8500 year old Nyaya-Vaiseshika Sutra of Kanada Muni consists of 373 Sutras and is composed of 12 chapters.<br />\n<br />\nIt\u2019s main postulates are:--<br />\n<br />\nAll of the universe is composed of the 5 mahabhuttas and the 4 non physicals: that is Fluid, Atomic elements, fields/force, energy, ether and space, time, mind and soul.<br />\n<br />\nExcept ether, all of the physical elements are made of discreet and distinct paramanus or atoms<br />\n<br />\nSpace-time is a frame in which the physical universe exists<br />\n<br />\nThere are seven categories of experience, which are substance, quality, activity, generality, particularity, inherence, and nonexistence.<br />\n<br />\nEnergy and mass are equivalent.<br />\n<br />\nHere are some of the Sutras: ---<br />\n<br />\nForce is that which displaces, holds together or moves things apart.V.S 1.1.20<br />\nIn the absence of a force, a particle of matter experiences no change. V.S 1.1.6<br />\nThe forces to be considered are an external force, gravity, that with causes attraction of particles, that which causes repulsion of particles and the internal movements of them in matter.<br />\n<br />\nV.S 1.1.13 Action is opposed by an equivalent opposite reaction<br />\nV.S 5.1.1618 The diversities of the movement of an arrow are due to the consecutive changes in the components of the acting forces. The stored energy provides the propulsion to the arrow and this causes it move further to a high point. This component keeps reducing while that of gravity increases resulting in its fall.Once the work against gravity ceases then the body reaches an energyless state falling under gravity.<br />\nV.S 1.1.27 The force on a body is the resultant of gravity and the work done against it.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;\"><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: x-small; line-height: normal;\"><span lang=\"EN-GB\"></span></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_173T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_173B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5923840167230626705\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_173M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nV.S 5.1.13 In the absence of all other forces (saMyogabindings) gravity exists.<br />\nV.S 5.1.7 The \u201cguna\u201d of forces (direction) prevents a magnitude from being obtained<br />\nV.S.1.1.20a The nature of physical changes in matter is the terms of work being done on the basic particles that constitute matter.<br />\nV.S 2.1.14 The particular nature of air is suggested by the mixing of gases that occurs on their collision. Despite of being made of atoms and occupying space air fails show orderly movement so its form cannot be perceived<br />\nV.S 4.1.8 Solids occupy space and assume form due to conglomeration of the constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 4.1.6 The (fluid\u2019s) particles possess energy. This causes them to possess the property of fluidity. The heat bearing rays provide the particles with energy to form a gas and rise. The heated particles of air impact the vapor and with this energy it mixes with it. Freezing and melting of a liquid as being a result of heat being taken up or given up by its particles.<br />\nV.S 5.2.9 Some apparently solid substances like ghee, lac and wax are in reality liquids, as their particles are naturally \u201cheat-conjoined\u201d or disorganized as in water. Other true solid substances such as tin, lead, iron, silver and gold need their atoms to be supplied with external heat to disorder them before they become a fluid.<br />\nV.S 2.1.67 Any body\u2019s mass needs to be wholly explained in terms of its constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 1.1.89 A substance can only emerge from another substance and not on its own eventhough its properties change from one to another.<br />\nV.S 9.1.9 Any fundamental particular entity can be a constituent multiple substances.<br />\nV.S 1.1.22 Any substance comprising of two or more primary particle types requires a chemical reaction to generate the conjoining and break up of preexisting molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.23 The \u201cmolecules\u201d are stated as emerging from combinations between the fundamental entities.<br />\nV.S 1.1.25 Forces are necessary to bring about combination and break up of molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.28 The combinations of particles to produce molecules result in substances with states very different from those of the original particles.<br />\n<br />\nKanada Muni\u2019s laws:<br />\n<br />\nIn the production or increment of karma (i.e. motion), the root cause is force. In other words, there is incremental or decremental change in motion.<br />\nThis law is a law of the measure of force. According to this, so long mechanical force works, there is change in motion i.e. there is momentum. To find its value, it is calculated how much work it produces in a unit time.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c466643263114631994\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nMathematically, the rate of change in momentum i.e. the increment in work in unit time is proportional to the force in action. Also, this change is in the direction of the force. Suppose that the mass of an object is \u2018m\u2019 and in time interval \u2018t\u2019, the velocity of the object changes from \u2018u\u2019 to \u2018v\u2019 due to the force acting on it.<br />\n<br />\nThen, Initial momentum = m*u<br />\nFinal momentum = m*v<br />\nChange in momentum = m(v*u)<br />\nTherefore, the rate of change of momentum = m(v*u)/t<br />\nt = m*a (from Kanada\u2019s first law)<br />\n<br />\nFrom Kandas second law, force is proportional to the rate of change of momentum<br />\nOr, p = k*m*a (where k is a constant)<br />\nIf m=1 and a=1, then<br />\n1 = k*1*1 or k = 1<br />\nOr, p = m*a<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, unit force is the one that produces unit acceleration in an object of unit mass. The VS then goes to say that force is a result of work and is not a physical quantity which is superior to Newtons law that measures it as a physical quantity.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe sutras on energy:<br />\n<br />\nVaiseshika defines energy as being a radiant thing(i.e. energy is radiation) and energy is related totemperature and motion of a particle.<br />\n<br />\nVedic Indians understood the process of refraction and absorbtion of energy by \u201cmaterial obstructions\u201d and they understood heat, electricity and magnetism to be forms of energy. It is already understood by the elemental theory that light is also an energy and is composed of discreet units.<br />\n<br />\nThis was of course was not understood in modern times till Max Plank and Einstein in the 20th cetury devised quantum theory after the study of black body radiation and the photoelectric effect.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 24px; margin: 0px;\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8984368294814858237\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_9M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. You have known neither paradise nor hell. Here there is no happiness, no punishment, no family, no enemies. Rise in tranquility. Here words end, like thought. This was your last illusion- the veil of MAYA is now lifted .\u201d<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHALLOW MIND OF THE WHITE MAN CANNOT UNDERSTAND WHAT I WROTE ABOVE<br />\n<br />\nThe philosophy of ancient India is quite diverse and complex in structure. So complex, in fact, that almost all have given up on making sense of this kaleidoscope\u2014till Quantum physics came on the scene.<br />\n<br />\nYet since the advent of quantum physics reveals that Vedanta is beyond the cutting edge of physics, which is only now, discovering the illusory nature of physical reality and the existence of subtler energy and information currents behind all that we see.<br />\n<br />\nVedanta is the very science of consciousness at both human and cosmic levels. It recognises consciousness as the ultimate reality and affirms its presence in all existence.<br />\n<br />\nModern physicists have looked to Vedanta for understanding their proposed unitary field of consciousness behind the universe, to explain the coherence of all cosmic laws and understand the THEORY OF EVERYTHING represented by the divine geometry of Sri Yantra ( the geometry of OM)<br />\n<br />\nVedanta is the unitary philosophy explaining the oneness of the individual soul with the universal consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nSuperluminal communication is a hypothetical process in which information is sent at faster-than-light (FTL) speeds. If wormholes are possible, then ordinary subluminal methods of communication could be sent through them to achieve superluminal transmission speeds<br />\n<br />\nOn the surface Quantum Physics (QP) and Vedanta may look very different. One is part of the scientific tradition and the other in some ways is philosophy soaked in spirituality.<br />\n<br />\nScience is trying to understand the universe \u2018out there\u2019 and Vedanta addressed the universe \u2018inside you\u2019\u201d<br />\n<br />\nOne of the fundamental difference between western philosophy, with that,of Vedanta is that ,the western philosophy believe the universe and everything in the universe belongs to god.<br />\n<br />\nOn the other hand Vedanta philosophy believe that god himself present in each and every atom of this creation ,god is present not only in human, but even in animals ,plants , rocks ,stars planets atom and molecules.<br />\n<br />\nTo a Vedantic every part of this universe is dynamic, it is vibrating, it is listening and can respond according to ones KARMA, It can be by action and can be purely thought. The universe listens to our action as well as thought and gives in return what exactly we want either knowingly or unknowingly, weather it is bad or good.<br />\n<br />\nThe scientific tradition is about Science of object. And Vedanta is called science of consciousness or science of subject. And is not a philosophy<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;\"><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span class=\"Apple-style-span\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;;
