&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">His ministers dont object, as they survive by giving endless EGO MASSAGE</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VyNIRZPe9LM/WlLpr_kfgBI/AAAAAAABX0k/zohb8SADCbcSGKLKEewib9rm0V-SyElxACLcBGAs/s1600/main-dqimg-1e2b2179894d6a3b400446e107d0fee1.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"658\" data-original-width=\"602\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VyNIRZPe9LM/WlLpr_kfgBI/AAAAAAABX0k/zohb8SADCbcSGKLKEewib9rm0V-SyElxACLcBGAs/s400/main-dqimg-1e2b2179894d6a3b400446e107d0fee1.png\" width=\"365\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sri-bhagavan uvaca--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">urdhva-mulam\nadhah-sakham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ashvattham prahur\navyayam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">chandamsi yasya parnani<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">yas tam veda sa\nveda-vit (Bhagawad Gita )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation: --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Blessed Lord said, &nbsp;&nbsp;\u201cThere is a banyan tree which has its roots\nupward and its branches down and whose leaves are the Vedic hymns. &nbsp;&nbsp;One who knows this tree is the knower of the\nVedas.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tree of cosmic\nexistence has no beginning and no end, n\u0101nto na c\u0101dih, &nbsp;in space or in time; for it is eternal and\nimperishable, avyaya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hymns of the Veda\nare compared to its leaves, and the man who knows this tree of the cosmos is\nthe Veda-knower.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rightly after\nIndependence the Indian Govt had chosen the Banyan tree as our national tree,\nfor here is a tree that regenerates unlike other trees, &nbsp;&nbsp;and is immortal, unless sabotaged..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every single village in\nIndia has a Banyan tree, who stood as a mute spiritual witness to deeds\nconducted under it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every village held\ncourt without written records under it, the tree being the sole witness. -\nUnder this tree people do NOT tell lies, lest the spirits in the tree get\noffended.&nbsp;&nbsp; Provoking the spirits within\nthe tree brings misfortune and ill health.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nInstant justice was provided under the canopy of this majestic sacred\ntree of wisdom. &nbsp;&nbsp;It is about culture ! --\nPeople without culture will never understand this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Bhagawat Gita ,\nLord Krishna praises the tree as immortal.&nbsp;\nSanatana Dharma ( Hinduism ) is known as a giant banyan tree, &nbsp;under whose shade a thousand faiths bloom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Krishna tells\nArjuna in the Kuruskhetra field, ..Just before the war 6000 years ago -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\" This world is a\nBanyan tree whose roots are above and branches below, and whose attractive\nleaves are promises of enjoyment. He who knows this tree well knows the methods\nof gaining such enjoyment. Watered by the three qualities of nature, its\nbranches expand in all directions, upwards and downwards, finally producing\nbuds of enjoyable sense objects. From these branches, roots also fall downwards\nand find nourishment in the selfish deeds of the mortal world. \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You must search out\nwhat is beyond it; some place from which no one ever strays. There, finally,\nseek for that Original Person.. \u2013 The ancient one from whom the true tree grows\n\u2013 .....and give yourself to him. . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The upside-down tree is\nthe banyan tree, representing the material world, which is a perverted\nreflection of the spiritual world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The demigods are on the\ntop branches, the human beings are on the middle branches, and the animals are\non the lower branches.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A man disentangles\nhimself from the tree by cutting it with the WEAPON OF DETACHMENT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entanglement of\nthis material world is compared here to a banyan tree.&nbsp;&nbsp; For one who is engaged in fruitive\nactivities, there is no end to the banyan tree.&nbsp;\nHe wanders from one branch to another, to another, to another.&nbsp; The tree of this material world has no end,\nand for one who is attached to this tree, there is no possibility of\nliberation.&nbsp; The Vedic hymns, meant for\nelevating oneself, are called the leaves of this tree.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This tree's roots grow\nupward because they begin from where Brahma is located, the topmost planet of\nthis universe.&nbsp; If one can understand\nthis indestructible tree of MAYA (illusion), then one can get out of it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The banyan tree can be\nfound beside a reservoir of temple pond water.We can see that the trees on the\nbank reflect upon the water with their branches down and roots up.&nbsp; The tree of this material world,.. - Is only\na reflection of the real tree of the spiritual world.&nbsp; This reflection of the spiritual world is\nsituated on desire,.. ...just as a tree's reflection is on water.&nbsp; Desire is the cause of things being situated\nin this reflected material light.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One who wants to get\nout of this material existence must know this tree thoroughly through study of\nthe Vedas. - Then he can cut off his relationship with it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A reflection is\ntemporary, for it is sometimes seen and sometimes not seen. But the origin from\nwhence the reflection is reflected is eternal. - The material reflection of the\nreal tree has to be cut off.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When it is said that a\nperson knows the Vedas, it is assumed that he knows how to cut off attachment\nto this material world. - If one knows that process, he actually knows the\nVedas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One who is attracted by\nthe ritualistic formulas of the Vedas is attracted by the beautiful green\nleaves of the tree. - He does not exactly know the true purpose of the Vedas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of the Vedas,\nas disclosed by the Personality of Godhead Himself, is to CUT DOWN THE\nREFLECTED TREE and attain the Real Tree of the Spiritual World.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TO UNDERSTAND THIS\nPROFOUND TRUTH, &nbsp;&nbsp;EVERY TEMPLE HAS A\nWATER BODY WITH A BANYAN TREE REFLECTED IN THE WATER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Krishna tells\nArjuna 6000 years ago at the battlefield of Kurukshetra --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The branches of\nthis tree extend downward and upward, nourished by the three modes of material\nnature. The twigs are the objects of the senses. &nbsp;This tree also has roots going down, and these\nare bound to the fruitive actions of human society.\" - Bhagavad-gita 15:2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real root is from\nBrahmaloka, and the other roots are in the human planetary systems. After one\nenjoys the results of virtuous activities in the upper planetary systems ( one\nof the lower 6 dimensions ), he comes down to this earth to lighten his KARMIC\nBAGGAGE, in the hope of attaining the topmost 7th dimension for MOKSHA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The real form of\nthis tree cannot be perceived in this world. No one can understand where it\nends, where it begins, or where its foundation is. But with determination one\nmust cut down this tree with the weapon of detachment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So doing, one must seek\nthat place from which, having once gone, one never returns, and there surrender\nto that Supreme Personality of Godhead from whom everything has began and in\nwhom everything is abiding since time immemorial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">aham sarvasya\nprabhavah, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- \" I am the\norigin of everything.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To get out of the\nentanglement of this strong banyan tree of material life, one must surrender to\nKrishna. As soon as one surrenders unto Krishna, he becomes detached\nautomatically from this material extension.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Bhagawat Gita Sri\nKrishna tells Prince Arjuna before the great war - \" Of all the trees I am\nthe Banyan tree \"&nbsp; This is where the\ncreation and destruction of the Cosmos comes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peepal trees emit\npositive energy <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- The peepal ( female\n) and banyan tree (male ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">...Have HUGE auras. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is NOT\nsuperstition.!.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS NO\nSUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA - IF YOU KNOW QUANTUM PHYSICS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_31B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; EMPEROR JEHANGIRs HAREM HAD 6000 WHORES<br />\n<br />\nSonagachi in Kolkata, Kamathipura in Mumbai, G.B. Road in New Delhi , Budhwar Peth in Pune were all whorehouses ( holding devadasis \u2013handmaidens of God ) created by Jew Rothschild for his white troops.<br />\n<br />\nThere were more than 3.8 lakhs ( 380,000 ) military prostitutes in the Lal Bazaars<br />\n<br />\nPROSTITUTION MAY HAVE BEEN THE OLDEST PROFESSION ON THIS PLANET-BUT IT DID NOT EXIST IN INDIA , THE LAND OF SPIRITUALITY<br />\n<br />\nWhen the bronze figure of a dancing girl was unearthed at Mohenjodaro , immediately the white man branded her as a \u201csacred prostitute\u201d<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_149BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 14, 2018 at 7:18 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_148MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/the-sack-of-somnath-temple-by-mahmud-of.html<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD INJECTED POISON INTO 7000 YEAR OLD RIG VEDA \u2013 THERE WAS NEVER A SANSKRIT WORD NAMED \u201cSADBARANI\u201d ( WHORE WHO GIVES SEX FOR MONEY ) IN OUR VEDAS<br />\n<br />\nPOISON was injected into the Vedas that prostitutes must dress in red colour , and even their gold jewellery must painted red to scare away demons and give protection to those who \u201cchose to live in a moral grey zone\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMore than three lakhs ( 380,000 ) white skinned military prostitutes were housed in the Lal Bazaars ( red flesh markets) attached to military cantonments ..<br />\n<br />\nIt was an evening stroll, have free sex with young girls ( age range 12 to 17 ) \u2013 forcing them to degrade themselves with filthy deviant sex.<br />\n<br />\nAll thes girls were given small booklets of HANUMAN CHALISA in Awadhi language , mostly printed by Gita Press Gorakhpur<br />\n<br />\nThe whorehouses for elite British Officers of Rothschid in Calcutta ( Sonagachi) was created by Rabindranath Tagore\u2019s grandfather ( a Pir Ali muslim ) which also contained sections for homosexual pedophilia \u2013 young boys as tender as 8 , for anal sex<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/opium-drug-running-tagore-family-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nA whole FAKE chapter for prostitution laws was inserted into Chanakya\u2019s Arthashastra<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html<br />\n<br />\nFAKE Kalidasa's \u2018Meghadhoot\u2019, describes prostitutes dancing and waving flywhisks at a Shiva temple<br />\n<br />\nAccording to a popular FAKE story, sage Jamadagni ordered his son Parshurama to behead his mother Renuka. Parushurama obeyed his father and got three boons in return. He used one of the boons to bring his mother back to life. Renuka\u2019s decapitated head could not be traced. Head of a lower caste woman named Yellamma was attached to Renuka\u2019s body. Thus a lower caste woman achieved the higher status of being a Brahmin\u2019s wife.<br />\n<br />\nFollowing the tradition a number of young girls started dedicating themselves to the FAKE goddess YELLAMMA \u2013and they became prostitutes after first menses<br />\n<br />\nThe white invader injected poison that in Vedic times Devadasis were divided into seven categories.<br />\n<br />\nThey are known as Dutta, Hruta, Bikrita, Bhrutya, Alankara and Gopika or Rudraganika \u2014 depending on the sexual deviancy branch they were experts in oral / anal / morbid fetish etc.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_149b+seedBt2D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_149b+seedBt2D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Because the true meaning changes the entire context of the verse. THE WHITE INVADER INJECTED POISON AND REPLACED LAND BHARAT WITH BHARATA ( SON OF SHAKUNTALA WHO NEVER EXISTED )<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA ( ARJUNAs ANCESTOR ) IS NAMED AFTER BHARATA ( LAND)<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">BHA / BHAVA- EMOTION<br />RA / RAGA- MELODY<br />TA / TALA- RHYTHM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Natya Shastra like Vedas have NO author as it is a SRUTI . />\nThere are three bandhas employed in yoga: the root valve located at the perineum (called mula bandha, also spelled as moola bandha), the stomach valve located around the belly (called uddiyana bandha) and the chin valve located at the throat (called jalandhara bandha).<br />\n<br />\nMula bandha is performed by contracting and lifting inward and upward the muscles of the perineum\u2014a Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/06/lord-ganesha-and-milk-drinking-episode.html?showComment=1421371774065#c2085101033762123368\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 16, 2015 at 6:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe pubococcygeus muscle is a hammock-like muscle, that stretches from the pubic bone to the coccyx (tail bone) forming the floor of the pelvic cavity and supporting the pelvic organs.<br />\n<br />\nActivate this Mula Bandha at the end of an inhalation, as the exhalation starts. Draw the pelvic floor in and up.<br />\n<br />\nBrahma granthi, ( the knot of Brahma ) located near muladhara chakra, is pierced and then untied by a moola bandha.<br />\n<br />\nKundlaini cannot travel upwards unless the Brahma Granthi is untied.<br />\n<br />\nBy the way Brahma Granthi ( a muladhara chakra ) is related to the physical body, Vishnu Granthi ( at anahata chakra ) is related to the astral body and Rudra Granthi ( at Ajna chakra ) is related to the causal body.<br />\n<br />\nWhen Kundalini ascends Vishuddha Chakra and reaches Ajna Chakra, and beyond the five elements of earth, water, fire, air, and akasha- he Ida and Pingala nadis cross over each other and disintegrate in the left and right nostrils, respectively.<br />\n<br />\nAs lunar and solar channels, Ida and Pingala are time bound. After this plexis in Ajna Chakra, the time bound consciousness dissolves, and one establishes himself in Infinity.<br />\n<br />\nGANESHA UNTIES THE BRAHMA GRANTHI AT THE MOOLADHARA CHAKRA FOR HIS MOTHER SHAKTI ( PARVATI ) TO RISE UP AS KUNDALINI AND MERGE WITH HIS FATHER SHIVA AT SAHASRARA CHAKRA .<br />\n<br />\nThe Muladhara chakra ( root ) hangs outside your body between your thighs , just beneath your scrotum.<br />\n<br />\nThe Sahasrara chakra ( crown ) is located on top of your head.<br />\n<br />\nthe allegories of Hinduism are for the intelligent NOT for dimwits.<br />\n<br />\nOn the micro scale, lord ganesha resides in muladhara chakra. he is in charge of the brahma granthi knot.<br />\n<br />\nonly when ganesh loosens the knot can his mother shakti / parvati ( kundalini ) rush up to embrace her husband shiva who resides at topmost sahasrara chakra . son ganesha removes the obstacle --<br />\n<br />\n----and this is why ganesha is known so--so that kundalini can take the safe path of sushumna for exploding consciousness --not ida or pingala..<br />\n<br />\nso all these myths are for idiots -- of ganesha standing guard ( an obstacle ) while his mother parvati is taking bath , and shiva wanting to enter the bath room etc .<br />\n<br />\nmooladhara chakra is associated with jnana indriya -- sense of smell -- a large nose -- trunk of elephant.<br />\n<br />\nin hindu astrology mars is the malefic planet. mooladhara is red resonance.<br />\n<br />\nganesha removes the obstacles. When I moved into my new home I did ganesha homam\u2014<br />\n<br />\nIn Hindusim Mars is mangalam --auspicious --as ganesha is there to take care of this planet.<br />\n<br />\nwe do ganesha homam-- to remove blockages - addictions, compulsions, fear, indiscipline.<br />\n<br />\nthe root chakra is the survival seat - will to live, faith in life.<br />\n<br />\nOn the macro scale , Ganesha has the swastika symbol on his palm. It represents the cosmic spinning vortex.<br />\nEverything is energy.<br />\nAll energy is a vortex .<br />\n<br />\nlet choots say whatever they want over brandy and cigars --or halal meat or pork chops or kosher vinegar !.<br />\n<br />\nBENAMI MEDIA DARLINGS LIKE AMISH TRIPATI , DEVDUTT PATTANAIK ETC HAVE MADE MONEY ON FAKE HINDUSIM. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN A SOUL GETS MOKSHA\nIT MERGES WITH BRAHMAN.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IT GIVES BACK\nITS LIFEs EXPERIENCE IT PICKED UP &nbsp;WITHIN\nEVERY POSSIBLE LIVING BODY&nbsp; --\nINSECT-PLANT -ANIMAL - HUMAN.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS REAL HOME COMING\u2014YOU\n( SOUL ) IS NOW GOD.&nbsp; YOU WILL NOT TAKE\nRE-BIRTH AGAIN ON PLANET EARTH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HINDUS MUST CREMATE THE\nDEAD BODY-- <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHILE THE BODY BURNS ,\nYOUR SKULL POPS AND CREATES A PERSONAL TSUNAMI WAVE ( SOLITION CARRIER WAVE )\nAND YOUR SOUL RIDES UP TO ANY OF THE 6 ASTRAL LAYERS .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your skull does not\npop your eldest son must break your skull with a heavy rod to generate that\nsoliton wave while being cremated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SKULL BURSTS DURING\nCREMATION ( LIKE A COCONUT ) AND CREATES A SOLITION CARRIER WAVE ( TSUNAMI )\nWHICH PROPELS YOUR SOUL TO ONE OF THE SEVEN LAYERS..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER DEATH IF\nCREMATION IS DONE THE RIGHT WAY, YOUR SOUL GETS ONE LAYER ELEVATION. THIS\nCANNNOT BE TO SEVENTH LAYER.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; MOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA BASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR\nJUGAAD POSSIBLE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF A WHITE CHRISTIAN\nMAN IS CREMATED IN THE WEST HIS SOUL WILL SHOOT UP TO ONE OF THE BOTTOM SIX\nASTRAL LAYERS--BUT NOT TO THE SEVENTH --THAT CAN HAPPEN ONLY IN THE HOLY LAND\nOF INDIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A WHITE MAN IN THE WEST\nWHOSE SOUL IS EVOLVED AND WORTHY OF THE SEVENTH LAYER IS BORN AS AN INDIGO\nCHILD. HIS DEATH WILL BE MOURNED .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN THE MANDH BUDDI\nWITH LOW SOUL FREQUENCY AND POOR AURA DIES -ON THE OTHER HAND---ALL WILL SAY\n\"GOOD RIDDANCE \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE WAS A TRADITION\nIN KERALA TO GO FOR THE LAST PILGRIMAGE TO KASHI ( VARANASI/ BENARES ) GHATS\nAND REMAIN THERE. THE CHILDREN WOULD TAKE THE FATHER THERE AND LEAVE HIM BEHIND\nTO SPEND THE LAST DAYS IN PRAYER <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT VARANASI GHATS THE\nSOUL CAN JUMP FROM SIXTH LAYER TO SEVENTH LAYER.&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CREMATION FIRES HAVE\nBEEN BURNING AT VARANASI GHATS CONTINUOUSLY FOR MILLENNIUMS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVOLVED SOULS&nbsp; ON COMPLETION OF \"MISSION\nEARTH\",&nbsp; ACHIEVE ENOUGH HIGHER\nFREQUENCY TO REJOIN THE MOTHER FIELD ON THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A CRIMINAL OR HOMOSEXUAL HAS ONLY ONE AURA (\nRED IN COLOUR --RIDDLED WITH BLACK HOLES ).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHE HAS NOT RISEN ABOVE HIS MOOLADHARA CHAKRA ( ROOT --SURVIVAL SEAT LIKE\nANIMALS )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; You and your dog came to existence\nat the same split second along with the stars<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; They will be humans in due course of\ncourse with samskaras ( soul impressions ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THIS IS EVOLUTION - NOT THE ONE PROPAGATED BY MAD MAN\nCHARLES DARWIN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONCE THE FREQUENCY IS\nSAME AS THE MOTHER FIELD ON THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER , IT MERGES BACK , GIVING\nBACK TO THE FIELD, ITS RICHNESS OF EXPERIENCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMAN ( FIELD / GOD )\nKNOWS EVERYTHING<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PADMA VIBHUSHAN FAKE\nGURUS SIT IN A HOLE AND GIVE LECTURES ON LIFE MANAGEMENT - WHAT IS IT WORTH ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA URGES\nYOU TO SHED YOUR EGO AND LEAD A SIMPLE LIFE WHILE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOUR EGO IS YOUR (\nSOULs ) GREATEST ENEMY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVOLUTION IS YOUR (\nSOULs ) EVOLUTION UP THE LADDER -- TO THE 7 LAYERS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every thing which lives\nand grows ( including plants ) have a soul.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is not some\nmysterious metaphysical, or supernatural, force or power that somehow comes\nback to haunt you.&nbsp;&nbsp; The weight of karmic\nbaggage is simply what we do in a conscious manner .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your karmic baggage is\nwith you in your next life too. Suicide will not eliminate the karmic baggage\n\u2013rather the weight of karmic baggage increases as your soul gets inducted to\nanother&nbsp; human form in your next rebirth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A human being is not a\ntotally different entity than its experiences in its previous lives.&nbsp; YOU are the old soul within your current mortal\ncoil.&nbsp; The soul is indestructible.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the essence of\nkarma to bring forth the actions of the past to the present. The inability to\ncomplete even the simple action of \u2018fight or flight\u2019 as a result of trauma in\npast lives is also carried into the present as the soul continues to create\nfrom its own wounded place in an ongoing effort to heal.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once my Dutch Chief\nEngineer told me, - a guy half his size put his hand in his pocket removed his\nwallet and slowly walked away , and he could not react or even lift his hand , though\nhe knew what was happening .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In each incarnation we\nsuffer the consequences of some of our previous bad karma \u2013and every human soul\nhas a&nbsp; RESULTANT KARMIC BAGGAGE plus some\npicked up samskaras , which affect current life on the planet , like phobias ,\ndeep rooted vices etc .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS PER QUANTUM PHYSICS\nWE HUMANS ARE COGS OF THE UNIVERSE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS PER STUPID NEWTON WE\nHUMANS ARE INSIGNIFICANT SPECKS OF MATTER&nbsp;\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the literary\ntraditions of the Upanishads, Brahma Sutras and the Bhagavad Gita, conscience\nis the label given to attributes composing knowledge about virtues and vices\nbut also good and evil, that a soul acquires from the completion of acts and\nconsequent accretion of karma over many lifetimes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The awareness of vice\nand virtue is inherent in the soul.&nbsp; &nbsp;Gratitude is inherent and woven into Hinduism,\nwhich makes this religion noble. Hinduism does not allow you to breach a trust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO IF A HINDU GOES TO\nSABARIMALA -- HIS WHOLE IDEA IS TO GET INSPIRED TO LESSEN HIS KARMIC BAGGAGE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE\nWORKS LIKE A MIRACLE--DRUNKEN WIFE BEATERS AND TOTAL NALAYAKS COME BACK\nREFORMED --ALL KNOW THIS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TAKING A DIP IN PAMPA\nRIVER IS COMPULSORY --OR SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE DOES NOT WORK.. WATER HOLDS\nMEMORY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REMEMBER DOING PUJA ,\nVISITING TEMPLES , &nbsp;DOING SHRADDH FOR\nANCESTORS , DIPPING IN GANGES --IS ALL TO PUT YOU IN A MENTAL FRAMEWORK OF\n\"GRATITUDE\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN YOU ARE \"\nGRATEFUL \" YOUR BODY BECOMES A WONDERFUL MACHINE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN YOU DO REIKI --YOU\nHAVE TO BE IN A FEELING OF GRATITUDE TO THE SUPREME FORCE --IF YOU ARE UNABLE\nTO DO THAT, BECAUSE YOU ARE A CUNT, EVEN BEING GRATEFUL TO YOUR MOTHER OR PET\nCAT WORKS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BOTH BRAIN LOBES HAVE\nTO BE SYNCHRONIZED BY SPIRIT LEVEL ( INNER EAR COCHLEA ) SITTING POSTURE--WITH\nLEGS IN A MOBIUS COIL CIRCUIT. IMMEDIATELY YOUR BODY EMANATES SCALAR WAVES\nFASTER THAN LIGHT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHINESE ARE MAKING\nQUANTUM COMPUTERS BASED ON \"QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT \" -WHICH IS FASTER\nTHAN LIGHT. &nbsp;&nbsp;YET WE TEACH OUR SCHOOL\nCHILDREN THAT FASTER THAN LIGHT COMMUNICATIONS ARE IMPOSSIBE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LIGHT FROM QUASARS\nTRAVEL FASTER THAN LIGHT-- OUR GAYATRI MANTRA -BEING GRATEFUL TO OUR MOTHER\nWHICH PROVIDES LIGHT</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are NOT cremated\non death ( but buried ) -- your soul remains trapped on earth-- to suffer and\nmake others suffer .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every thing which lives\nand grows ( including plants ) have a soul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.DARWINS EVOLUTION IS\nNOT FROM MONKEY TO MAN, AS THE FREEMASONS TOLD HIM AFTER MISUNDERSTANDING\nINDIAN SANSKRIT TEXTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVOLUTION IS UP THE\nSEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE DO SHRADDH /\nIMMERSION OF ASHES , HOPING THAT THE DECEASED JUMPS UP BY ONE ASTRAL LAYER--\nDUE TO LOVE SHOWN BY THE PEOPLE HE LEFT BEHIND.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/pitru-paksha-shraadh-pitru-tharpanam.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/pitru-paksha-shraadh-pitru-tharpanam.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A soul attracts karmic\nmatter even with the thoughts, and not just the actions. Thus, to even think\nevil of someone would endure a karma-bandha or an increment in bad karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma operates as a\nself-sustaining mechanism as natural universal law, without any need of an\nexternal entity to manage them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In sanatana dharma only\nACCUMULATED KARMIC BAGGAGE decides moksha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Moksha, the soul\nmust go through all the experiences of life in the physical world.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The belief in karma and\nreincarnation brings to each Hindu inner peace and self-assurance. The Hindu\nknows that the maturing of the soul takes many lives, and that if the soul is\nimmature in the present birth, then there is hope, for there will be many\nopportunities for learning and growing in future lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cannot create\nexperience-&nbsp; you have to undergo it. &nbsp;&nbsp;Pain of mistake is part of experience . Good\njudgement flows from experience .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The field of brahmAn (\ngod ) , does not treat all the same.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why some are\nbeautiful having brains who are respected , while some are ugly lepers with NIL\nbrains who are despised&nbsp; or some are fat\nand ugly like a certain KUMARI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE TAMIL \"BHAKTI\nMOVEMENT \" CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD CONSITED OF 12 ALWARS (\nVISHNU ) AND 63 NAYANARS ( SHIVA )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD USED HIS\nFAKE AND BACKDATED KANCHI MUTT TO PROPAGATE THE TAMIL \"BHAKTI MOVEMENT\n\" AND AGAMA SHIT--ELABORATE , RIDICULOUS RITUALS IN HINDU TEMPLES\nMONOPOLISED BY SHREWD TAMIL BRAHMINS ( POWER GRABBING ) WHICH ALIENATED THE\nHINDUS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your present life is\nnothing, when compared with the whole soul-life. It is momentary - a mere\nfragment.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/zFdxGE77vvD2w5xHy6jkVuElKv-U9_9qLkRYK8OnbDeJPtjSZ82UPq5w6hJ-SA=s35\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1939804403848492309\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 4, 2018 at 10:51 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_33MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSir, are there any true and authentic spiritual guru left in India like those during ancient Indian history who can guide us honestly with no ambition of monetary benefits?Till now all we know are triple Sri, ramdev baba, brahmakumari,ramkrushna math, iskcon..but all of them are exposed by you..can you tell someone like swami chinmayananda in today's times in India.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_33BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Mind is made out of much finer ripples, which indicate that it contains more of the consciousness of the absolute.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nScalar waves allow for information transfer across the universe, connecting every atom with every other atom and since these waves travel at super luminous speeds they could be the explanation of the non-local effects that were predicted in theory and empirically discovered in quantum physics.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOur universe is NOT a bunch of single individual parts of atoms, molecules, planets and stars that only maintain contact by separate forces such as gravity acting upon them. Quantum entangled particles keep their coherent relation eternally and are not bothered by any distance separating them whether it be a few millimetres or the distance of a galaxy.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nScalar waves are information carrying waves rather than energy waves. which are linked to human consciousness and are created by human thought and emotions.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThey are the interface between the mental and the physical world although we must keep in mind that in reality there is no duality between them.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nScalar waves encode the information of space and time into a timeless spaceless quantum shorthand of interference patterns.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nLittle did Darwin know , that Biology is a quantum DNA process. All the processes in the body including cell communications are triggered by quantum fluctuations, and all higher brain functions and consciousness also appears at the quantum level. Newtons modern physics has set mankind back by many centuries.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe speed of light (communication), or electron to electron reaction, is slower than the speed of gravity, or quark to quark reaction--hence the higher the scalar wave frequency, the faster the time rate.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nYOU DNA GENERATES SCALAR WAVES AS SOON AS YOU BALANCE YOUR INNER EAR COCHLEA SPIRIT LEVEL --WITH A FEELING OF GRATITUDE .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nONCE A CUNT CHALLENGED ME OVER THE INNER EAR SPIRIT LEVEL \u2014 HE EVEN SAID THAT I WAS FOOLISH TO MATCH 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SON</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI ASKED HIM TO BEND AND USE RIGHT HAND THUMB TO TOUCH HIS NOSE TIP AND THE PINKY FINGER TO INSERT INTO HIS NAVEL</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHE DID</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHEN I ASKED HIM TO ROTATE FAST 5 TIMES --IN A CIRCLE</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAS SOON AS HE COMPLETED HIS 4TH ROUND TURN , I GAVE HIM ONE KICK ON HIS ASS--AND TOLD HIM--SEE YOU LATER AFTER TEN MINUTES ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">HE WAS LYING THERE FOR TEN MINUTES--I HAD UPSET HIS INNER EAR SPIRIT LEVEL , CAUSING VERTIGO</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nDONT FUCK AROUND WITH COSMIC TRUTHS !</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAuthor Lynn McTaggart, has written a book \" The intention experiment\". There is NOT a single original idea in the entire book. Yet she had NOT made a single mention of Vedas or India.\"</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI WISH I COULD KICK HER THIEVING ASS.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_36b+seedK2zD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_36b+seedK2zD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/YMIMvBa8XGs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/YMIMvBa8XGs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/mwTmM6uF5yA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/mwTmM6uF5yA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Karma comes to\nan entirely neutral state, with neither good karma nor bad karma outstanding,\nthen the person ( Jivan Mukt ) &nbsp;is said\nto have obtained Moksha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A JIVAN MUKT IS IN A\nTURIYA STATE\u2014HE IS NOT A SAINT\u2014HE BECOME A SAGE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A saint is a very\nordinary guy.. A sage is the extraordinary being. A sage does not dream,\nbecause he has no polarity. He\u2019s just a witness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A SAGE HAS NO EGO. WE\nBURY HIM . THERE ARE NO SEEDS INSIDE HIM TO BE BURNT BEFORE HIS SOULS MERGES\nWITH BRAHMAN <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TURIYA means\n\u201cconsciousness minus thinking\u201d . It represents consciousness free from material\ninfluence or supreme consciousness . In Turiya there is the absolute awareness\n. It is the experience of ultimate reality and truth.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actions do not create\nkarma (good or bad) when performed by an individual in the state of Moksha or\nliberation. Such a person is called \"Stithaprajna\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus believe that\neverything in the Universe is in a state of creation, maintenance or\ndestruction. Similarly, the mind creates a thought, maintains (follows) it for\nsome time and the thought ultimately dies down (perhaps to be replaced by\nanother thought).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In addition to the three states of\nconsciousness, Hinduism puts forward a fourth state of being called Turiya or\npure consciousness, where the mind is not engaged in thinking but just observes\nthe thoughts. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actions in the Turiya\nstate do not create karma. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An individual who is\nconstantly in the turiya state is said to have attained moksha where their\nactions happen as a response to events (and not because of thought process);\nsuch actions do not result in accumulation of karma as they have no karmic\neffect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya, the self\ndoes not think, feel, or do, but rather observes thought, emotion, and action\ncapable of truly understanding the totality of the universe. Turiya has no\nlimits and no endpoint. It is infinitely transcendent, which means its\npotential is forever expanding.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are now a unique\nindividual and you are a vital part of a larger universal life force that\ntranscends everything on earth..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reality and truth\nbecome more clearly defined, allowing you to perceive that which lies above,\nbelow, and beyond the human experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This utterly quiet,\npeaceful and blissful state is the ultimate aim of all spiritual activity this highest\nstate is not affected by Maya The Waker, The Dreamer, The Deep Sleeper and The\nObserver<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You experience\ndetachment and joy .&nbsp; Turiya\nConsciousness&nbsp; is the ultimate goal of\nspirituality for here you know what freedom is all about.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D1dG6hLTIQg/Wk7MnFqij6I/AAAAAAABXqc/f5XT32SSFTgWIsbEUTTAAoJva2lZavIjgCLcBGAs/s1600/imagesCAWFL6LND.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dot, point, or\nbindu of OM symbol represents the fourth state, the absolute consciousness,\nwhich encompasses, permeates, and is the other three\u2014this is Turiya. (Silence\nafter A, U, and M of OM Mantra)&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Piercing the bindu\nfinally allows one to attain the highest experience, and this comes after\nfollowing the process of Kundalini Awakening.&nbsp;\nTuriya is regarded as synonymous with videhamukti, liberation without a\nbody. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you become a\nwitness in your life, life becomes absolutely simple. . You cannot call it\nwaking, because this witness never sleeps; you cannot call it dreaming, because\nfor this witness no dream ever appears; you cannot call it sleep, because this\nwitness never sleeps. It is eternal awareness, this is Nirvana or enlightenment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM is the four states of\nconsciousness, as per Patanjali Yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM is the waking state\nor jagrat. Beta brain wave<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM is the dreaming\nstate or svapna.&nbsp; REM sleep state<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM is the deep sleep\nstate or sushupti. (dream-less deep sleep state , the delta brain wave)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om is the transcendental\nstate or turiya. (beyond all the states) , the fourth has been called nirvana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY SINGLE MESSIAH\nSINGLE HOLY BOOK HAS STOLEN OM AND MODIFIED IT \u2013PATHETIC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHRISTIANS MADE IT OM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MUSLIMS PUT 786 ON\nEVERY KORAN COVER.. DRAW THE SYMBOL OF OM \u2013SHW TO A MIRROR AND READ FROM RIGHT\nTO LEFT\u2014YOU CAN READ 786<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEWS MADE IT SHALOM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
