font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/SNraVirlP8U/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/SNraVirlP8U?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Four stages:\nconsciousness plus thinking is waking, consciousness minus thinking is turiya,\nunconsciousness plus thinking is dreaming, unconsciousness minus thinking is\nsleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally, the\nsemi-circle symbolizes Maya and separates the dot from the other three curves.\nIt is the illusion of Maya that prevents us from the realization of this\nhighest state of bliss. The semi-circle is open at the top and does not touch\nthe dot. This means that this highest state is not affected by Maya. Maya only\naffects the manifested phenomenon.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya thoughts\nsubside and one becomes increasingly more awake; the mind settles down and\nconsciousness itself becomes primary. Mediators describe this as pure\nconsciousness or unbounded awareness. One sees the entire world and all things\nwithin it as part of oneself, and oneself part of all. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xNL_iYrpojw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/xNL_iYrpojw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SOUL HAS\nALREADYMERGED WITH BRAHMAN WHILE ON PLANET EARTH AS A QUANTUM&nbsp; ENTANGLEMENT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya&nbsp; is a state of transcendence.. The Upanishads\nequates this experience with enlightenment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We ordinary people lack\ncontact with our fourth state of consciousness, and so we fail to live up to\nour potential as human beings\u2014like ancient Maharishis .. Turiya is the totality\nof everything, and the headwaters from which all consciousness flow. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is said in the\nMandukya Upanishad. It is \u201cunseen, transcendent, the sole essence of the\nconsciousness of self, the completion of the world.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya yoga emphasizes\na complete freedom, rejecting force and power, and instead embracing the ideal\nof a universal harmony.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya is the Reality\neternal, beyond all phenomena. Turiya is Satchidananda \u2014Existence,\nConsciousness, and Delight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is here, that a\nhighly advanced seer or a spiritual Grand Master can actually hear the\nsoundless sound, \u2018 AUM \u2019, the supreme secret of the Creator .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya there is\ntotal mental clarity, and complete inner peace one recognizes the Self in every\nshining atom of existence<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya is beyond\nSamadhi. Samadhi is sleepless sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not considered a\nstate in Vedic&nbsp; Indian texts, rather it\nis an absence of states (dualistic or otherwise), and in Turiya; the\npractitioner is able to transcend into advaita-- Into universal oneness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE REAL HINDU GOD IS\nBRAHMAN \u2013THE FIELD WHICHCANNOT BE PICKED UP BY THE 5 SENSES.&nbsp; ISLAM COPIED FROM IT .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOHAMMAD WAS A KERALA\nNAMBOODIRI ( YOUNGER BROTHER WHO COULD NOT MARRY OR HOLD LAND )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ALL</span></b> <b><span style=\"color: red;\">AH</span></b> IS BEEJ MANTRA\nOF SAHASRARA CHAKRA<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wyFv0AOy3WU/Wk7NNp_PeDI/AAAAAAABXqo/a0OV1eS-9eo1ezpq4V_Wf-33nvXbE3KCQCLcBGAs/s1600/doSwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"260\" data-original-width=\"194\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wyFv0AOy3WU/Wk7NNp_PeDI/AAAAAAABXqo/a0OV1eS-9eo1ezpq4V_Wf-33nvXbE3KCQCLcBGAs/s400/doSwnload.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gnPbq7yQy9w/Wk7N0J11EPI/AAAAAAABXqw/wCaVqkTPVoUaE4qPfORSopwkh6tNr1RugCLcBGAs/s1600/chakraR-info.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"756\" data-original-width=\"594\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gnPbq7yQy9w/Wk7N0J11EPI/AAAAAAABXqw/wCaVqkTPVoUaE4qPfORSopwkh6tNr1RugCLcBGAs/s640/chakraR-info.jpg\" width=\"502\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Vedic\nMaharishis with NIL karmic baggage and highest frequency soul, went beyond\nnature and realized the transcendental nature of man.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They dared to take up\nthis challenge and the Upanishads are the unique record of the methods they\nadopted, the struggles they undertook and the victory they achieved in this\nastonishing adventure of human spirit . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With their mental\ngifts, they had turned their mental energies to the conquest of the inner world\nrather than of the world of matter and life at the sensate level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QzPOXqITB5E/Wk7MweZJTcI/AAAAAAABXqg/5ZqfoEmf50wjKmvf8VEivsN5uYFPvmN2wCLcBGAs/s1600/WRGJKK.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"263\" data-original-width=\"192\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QzPOXqITB5E/Wk7MweZJTcI/AAAAAAABXqg/5ZqfoEmf50wjKmvf8VEivsN5uYFPvmN2wCLcBGAs/s1600/WRGJKK.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In the 7000 year old Upanishads we get a\nglimpse into the workings of the minds of the great ancient Indian thinkers who\nwere unhampered by the tyranny of religious dogma of men who became brokers of\nGods or Gods themselves , burnings at the stake, political authority, pressure\nof public opinion, seeking truth with single-minded devotion, rare in the\nhistory of thought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Indian sages were\nnot satisfied with their intellectual speculations. They discovered that the\nuniverse remained a mystery and the mystery only deepened with the advance of\nsuch knowledge, and one of the important components of that deepening mystery\nis the mystery of man and consciousness. The Upanishads became aware of this\ntruth, which modern science now emphasizes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LISTEN-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF ALL WORLD RELIGIONS\nARE A DROP OF DIRTY WATER\u2014SANATANA DHARMA IS THE DEEP PRISTINE BLUE OCEAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHITE INVADER STOLE\nTHE BRAHMANA ( 2ND PART ) AND ARANYAKA ( 3RD PART ) OF THE VEDAS\u2014BECAUSE THEY\nCONTAINED SCIENCE AND MATH .. THEY LEFT BEHIND THE 1ST PART SRUTI ONLY BECAUSE\nIT APPEARED MEANINGLESS TO THEM..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY WONDERED WHY\nHINDUS PROPAGATES THESE APPARENTLY STUPID VERSES FOR 330 CENTURIES&nbsp; BEFORE PENNING THEM DOWN&nbsp; 70 CENTURIES AGO..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;ROTHSCHILDs AGE&nbsp; BR AMBEDKAR SAID THAT VEDAS ARE USELESS.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILDs AGENT EVR PERIYAR SAID VEDAS\nDESERVE TO BE BURNT <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THATIS BECAUSE ONLY\nSOUND OF VERSES MATTERS ..THE MEANING OF WORDS IS ONLY TO INTRODUCE A FEELING\nOF GRATITUDE ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WERE GIVEN THE WRITTEN 4\nVEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS BY PARASHURAMA AND THEY HELD IT FROM 4000 BC TO 2000\nBC .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN 2000 BC KERALA NAMBOODIRI ADI\nSHANKARACHARYA FOUND THAT NAMBOODIRIS ( HIS CLAN ) HAD BECOME SEXUALLY DECADENT\nAND HE DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A CUNT NAMED SUHEL SETH\nDOES NOT KNOW THAT INDIA WAS ONE \u2013 A CONCEPT AS EARLY AS 4000 YEARS AGO. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT MORE PROOF DO YOU\nWANT.. YES THERE WERE MANY KINGDOMS \u2013LIKE WE HAVE STATES TODAY UNDER A CM, BUT\nBHARATMATA WAS ONE ENTITY.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LIES BY WHITE AN THAT\nHE UNITED WARRING KINGDOMS WILL NOT WORK.. THEY TRIED TO INNJECT POISON AND\nCONVERT CHANAKYA INTO AN EVIL ASSHOLE . IT WONT WORK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EMPEROR ASHOKA WHO\nCONVERTED FROM BAAAAAAD HINDUISM TO GOOOOOOD BUDDHISM (OF BR AMBEDKAR )&nbsp; NEVER EXISTED ..&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KOSHER BIG BROTHER IS NOW TRYING TO REVIVE\nBUDDHISM ( DALIT RELIGION FOR DALITISTAN&nbsp;\n) BEFORE THE 2019 ELECTIONS..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS BLOGSITE WONT ALLOW IT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of the\nVedas was to ensure the true welfare of all beings, worldly as well as\nspiritually. Before such a synthesis could be achieved, there was a need to\npenetrate the inner worlds to its depth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;This is what the Upanishads did with precision\nand gave us the science of the self, which helps man leave behind the body, the\nsenses, the ego and all other non-self elements, which are perishable. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads tell us\nthe great saga of this discovery \u2014 of the divine in the heart of man.\nUpanishads in an attempt to unravel the mystery of the human mind and of\nconsciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Maharshis\nunderstood the staggering scale of the human mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"As flowing rivers\ndisappear into the sea, losing their name and form, thus a wise man, freed from\nname and form, goes to the divine person who is beyond all.\" - Mundaka\nUpanishad iii 2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The Upanishads\ncontain such godlike fullness of wisdom on all things that I feel the authors\nmust have looked with calm remembrance back through a thousand passionate\nlives, full of feverish strife for and with shadows, ere they could have\nwritten with such certainty of things which the soul feels to be\nsure.\"--A. E. George Russell -Poet, mystic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upanishads, the\nBrihadaranyaka ( 1.3.28 ) says: This was my school morning assembly prayer--a\n7000 year old, lofty&nbsp; Sanskrit chant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0950</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0938\u0924\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u0926\u094d\u0917\u092e\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0903</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0903</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0903</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c424713162804997044\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_54M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_4.html?showComment=1515116198699#c424713162804997044\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 5, 2018 at 7:06 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://edition.cnn.com/2018/01/04/politics/psychiatrist-congress-meeting-trump/index.html<br />\n<br />\nINDIAN SAGES NEVER COMMITTED SUICIDE-- ZERO %<br />\n<br />\nWESTERN SAGES HAVE COMMITTED SUICIDE MAXIMUM BY PERCENTAGE ON THIS PLANET<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/tavistock-institute-creating-herd.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/08/homosexuality-pedophilia-deviant-porn.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEver heard of Satyanarayan Gangaram Pitroda , who calls himelf Sam Pitroda? In 1984, he sold himself to Rajiv Gandhi who put him as his tech advisor . He instantly developed a Messiah Complex. He was literally ze cat\u2019s whiskers.<br />\n<br />\nHe had his first meeting with the Indian Tech minister Mr Unnikrishnan \u2013 a sharp and level headed politician, who had returned six times to Lok Sabha, from Badagara constituency, next to my hometown .<br />\n<br />\nThe entire group was waiting for Sam to appear. And there he breezes nay sashays in , fashionably late. All must wait for the messiah right? He tells the minister \u201c Hi , you must have heard of me , I am Sam Pitroda\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nIn the meeting , his huge ego occupied the whole room and he rubbed everybody the wrong way.<br />\n<br />\nFinally Unnikrishnan told him \u201c I do NOT need messiahs!! \u201d<br />\n<br />\nAfter this electric shock UGLY Satyanarayan Gangaram Pitroda\u2014 OOPS \u2014 Sam got his messiah syndrome rearranged.<br />\n<br />\nUnnikrishnan did NOT jump into conclusions.<br />\n<br />\nHe observed this man carefully for the messiah syndrome.<br />\n<br />\nThere was a grandiose sense of self-importance. There was this tendency NOT to acknowledge imperfections.<br />\n<br />\nHe required excessive admiration and respect . He had a sense of entitlement, i.e., unreasonable expectations of automatic compliance with his expectations .<br />\n<br />\nThere was this lack of empathy - unwilling to recognize or identify with the needs of others . There was this arrogant attitude and inflated feeling of personal ability, privilege, or infallibility.<br />\n<br />\nThe messianic wish is not merely a general wish for improved conditions and for changes for the better, but the wish of that private person to become personally the redeemer of the world . It's a secret fondness to be noticed. It's a love of supremacy. It's drawing attention to themselves in conversation. It's enjoying being flattered by the team.<br />\n<br />\nThere was this noble impulse to come to rescue of the sufferers even when there is no real necessity. There was this fixation and obsession on \"I,\" \"me,\" \"my\" and \"mine,\" and the need to to draw attention. There was this mental stubbornness ..There was this exaggeration of own importance and past achievements.<br />\n<br />\nMessiahs try to set goals that are unrealistic . There is a belief that all others in the team or those that surround you are subservient or in some way beneath you..<br />\n<br />\nThe messiah sees himself as the one visionary who can save the world and restore utopia, even if they have to drag everyone else kicking and screaming to get there, because they are the only ones that understand things as they are.<br />\n<br />\nSteve Jobs was a narcissist who failed to grasp that his company belongs to its shareholders. A messianic CEOs can never come to see the company they run as being public-- they see the company as being theirs.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/steve-jobs-answer-is-blowing-in-wind.html</span><br />\n<br />\nFew of the people who suffer from the messiah syndrome actually are clinical cases suffering from schizophrenia, a mental disorder distinguished by a loss of contact with reality and the occurrence of psychotic behaviors, including hallucinations and delusions.<br />\n<br />\nGrandiose delusions are frequently found predominantly in paranoid schizophrenia, in which a person has an extremely exaggerated sense of his or her significance, personality, knowledge, or authority. Think of the people who have revelatory driven experiences and even started new religions.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_54BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; They will use emotional triggers e.g. \u201cWe must do it for our children\u201d and \u201cThink of the penquins \u201d etc.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THINK OF THE POOR DALITS -- JIGNESH MEWANI BELONGS TO JAIL-FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs CREATED HIM IN CAHOOTS WITH BENAMI MEDIA AND COMMIES</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Messiah complex is the will, intention, compulsion to be a messiah, to be the redeemer and savior of the world. He believes that he is the one destined to deliver the goods. He needs to taking advantage of others to reach own goals.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">He requires constant attention and positive reinforcement from others. He thrives on excessive admiration and is in the lookout for fans and fathu publicity. He believes in his invulnerability or does not recognize his limitations. He creates a belief that he is carrying a heroic burden on his head.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Messiah complex does not carry any danger to life as long as it does not grow into mania. When the messiah complex tends to grow into the stubborn maniac syndrome, preventive medical assistance is called for, for such people can be the cause of serious troubles in society. He feels that a certain divine \u201cchosen\u201d mission is confined to him and that he has to fulfill it at any cost&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN SUCH A MAN IS A CRIPPLE THE COMPLEX BECOME EVEN GREATER</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE: CRIPPLE-- NAY --PHYSICALLY CHALLENGED NAXAL GN SAIBABA</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sigmund Freud suffered from the messiah complex himself. The seven main ones are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gayatri: 3 padas of 8\nsyllables containing 24 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ushnuk : 4 padas of 7\nsyllables containing 28 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anustubh: 4 padas of 8\nsyllables containing 32 syllables in each stanza. This is the typical shloka of\nclassical Sanskrit poetry<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brihati : 4 padas (8 +\n8 + 12 + 8) containing 36 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pankti : 4 padas\n(sometimes 5 padas) containing 40 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tristubh: 4 padas of 11\nsyllables containing 44 syllabes in each stanza<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jagati: 4 padas of 12\nsyllables containing 48 syllables in each stanza<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mantra has got a\nBeeja or seed. The seed is a significant word, or series of words, which gives\na special power to the Mantra. The Beeja is the essence of the Mantra. This\nrepresents the sound string defined by the Seers as being the repository of\nauditory energy sources.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Beeja gives the\nmantra in which it is used, its special power of self-generation and effects.\nJust as within a seed is hidden within tree, so too, the energy of the mantra\nis resident in the seed on which it is based. This helps the mantra to manifest\nitself into spiritual consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound frequencies have\nbeen used to stimulate new cellular growth, resolve tumors, dissolve calcium\ndeposits, stimulate new neurological development, deliver nourishment,\ndetoxify, resolve paralysis, remove plaque and tooth decay, act as a carrier\nfrequency to deliver higher forms of knowledge and information, even scan and\nharvest information. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sonocytology is the\nstudy of cell sounds. Where there is vibration, there is sound and vice\nversa.&nbsp; Modern science has slowly begun\nto realize the benefits of sound mantras used in Ayurveda fore body cell\nrejuvenation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While literally\neverything is vibrating, different things vibrate at different rates or\nfrequencies. Some frequencies are perceived as light, some as sound, some as\ncolor, and some as solid matter. The rate at which something vibrates\ndetermines how dense it is and what we perceive it to be. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human ear can\ndiscern only a very narrow band between 20 Hz to 20000 Hz.&nbsp; The rest is inaudible. This is why NO cosmic\nsound can be heard by the human ear. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These cosmic sounds\nwere heard by 12 strand DNA maharishis in their spiritual trances which\nbroadened their sense spectrums.&nbsp; However\nour brain can register the vibrations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diviners use OM\nresonance to find water in arid areas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mantric power of Om\nemanates not only from its sound vibrations, but also from the inner attitude\nof the speaker-- his spiritual purity and his freedom from worldliness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The earth vibrates at\n7.83 Hz and so does OM. When you blow a conch your body must be erect, as per\nthe spirit level in the inner ear cochlea, to balance right and left brain\nlobes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spiral in the inner\near also follows the Fibonacci series. Scalar waves and sound waves are\nLONGITUDINAL.&nbsp; Rest are all transverse.\nSpirals which follow the Golden mean and Fibonacci series can create scalar\nwaves.&nbsp; Which means a conch can create\nscalar waves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sound of the sea\nwhen you listen to the conch held to your ear is the sound of the Zero Point\nField or Scalar Field or Brahman or OM.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nIn Hindu temples before and after a puja or arti the shank is\nblown.&nbsp; Lord Shiva is also known as\nShankara.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dead cells emitted a\nlow rumbling like radio static. Distinguishing between the sound signatures of\nhealthy and diseased cells WILL be a part of the medicine of the future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the sixth fetal\nmonth, life inside the womb is full of sounds that the ear is capable of\nhearing. The uterus resounds with the sounds of the heart beating\n(approximately 50-60 beats per minute) and the blood swooshing through the\narteries, the wavelike cadence of the breath (approximately 1,215 cycles per\nminute), and the external sounds and voices muted by the amniotic fluid.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before we are even\nborn, we are attuned to the rhythms and sounds around us.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our 7000 year\nold Vedas sound creates, organizes and forms all the basic fundamental shapes\nfound throughout the known universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound operates through\nthe law of Resonance. Resonance eliminates the limitations of the \"sender\nand receiver dynamic.\"&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Resonance\nis where two become one, where minds join.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Resonance is, in\nitself, a state of awareness and experiential knowing far beyond concept and\nmental, cognitive thinking. On the vibration field-form-body-time level,\nresonance is the experiential state of Oneness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound has the ability\nto affect whatever forms it comes into contact with by exposing that form to a\ndifferent rate of frequency vibration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound has the ability\nto bring this place back into Oneness by changing its rate of vibration through\nsympathetic vibration - Resonance.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nDepending on the frequencies being used, sound vibratory resonance can\nfacilitate accessing a state of understanding and knowing without the need for\nlimits, fears and defenses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound waves can travel\nbelow the order of mental cognitive defense structures and deliver a deeper\nexperiential state of harmony. Resonance is not a mental idea. It is a visceral\nknowing-feeling state beyond question. We call this Sound Frequency Healing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For any healing to be\ncomplete, it needs to take place at all levels \u2013 the body, the mind and the\nspirit. The smallest particles known to man are vibrations.&nbsp; Thoughts are vibrations.&nbsp; Words are vibrations.&nbsp; Sounds are vibrations.&nbsp; Light is a vibration.&nbsp; Our planet is a vibration.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our entire universe and\neverything within it (seen and unseen) is a vibrating mass of atoms and\nsubatomic particles. If the hydrogen bonding angles of one molecule are\naltered, those in the other molecules might be expected to follow suit (as in a\ndomino effect).</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a mantra is\nchanted , it vibrates the brain matter and connects new neural circuits. This\neffect comes after repeating the mantra for a long period of time and bringing\nin the resonance effect in the brain.&nbsp;\nFor this the seers developed various methods.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How much a mantra is to\nbe chanted and how it is to be chanted etc.&nbsp;\nwere all given in the Mantra Shastra (Scripture of Mantras).&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The inner ear gives the\ncycloid spiral space curve motion. Vedic seers used the inner ear method for\nbending space time. The inner ear acts as a spirit level for the human body to\nachieve balance, Tight rope walkers walk across great heights including the\nNiagra falls with eyes blindfolded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the brain and\ncentral nervous system that hears. The inner ear cochlea is filled with liquid.\nMicroscopic hairs called cilia project out into this liquid and they release a\nchemical neurotransmitter when stimulated. ( just like the cats's whiskers ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound waves are\ntransformed into nerve impulses, to the temporal lobe of the cerebral cortex\nwhich is dedicated to sound. The audio range is 20 hz to 20 K Hz.&nbsp; 1 hertz is one cycle per second. All\nmusicians convey the message in the 0.5- 4 KHz range .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cilia waves 20000 times\nper sec at 20 Khz frequency. Basically a mechanical signal is converted&nbsp; to an electrical signal. Sound is localised\nby echo positioning system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cochlea looks like\na small snail. When the head moves, so does the fluids, inside the cochlea like\na spirit level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sound wave is a\nlongitudinal wave--a series of compressions and rarefactions.. Higher the\nfrequency, higher the perceived pitch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wonder of the cilia\nhairs is that it can perceive 1500 levels of pitch. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The number of discriminable\ntones in in the hundreds of thousands.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Are you not able to\nrecognise the voice of a long lost friend?&nbsp;&nbsp;\nAmazing , right? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The audio frequency\nrange encompasses 9 octaves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If 300 Hz is played in\none ear and 310 in the other ear via stereo headphones the binaural frequency\nwill be 10 Hz. Frequencies of the brain are below 40 hertz. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Kerala system of\nmartial arts Kalari ( basically deadly sword fighting ), as 5 year old kids we\nwere taught by the gurikkal how to upset the spirit level of the cochlea to\nimmobilise a stronger and heavier opponent.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>When he is down you can\ntell him to give you a BLOW JOB\u2014he will do it</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_61M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/16142894564723797861\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Murali Meleth</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_4.html?showComment=1515131332644#c1570759362423818769\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 5, 2018 at 11:18 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_61MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Captain,<br />\n<br />\nIn the instance of Ramana Maharshi \"Giving\" Moksha to his mother, Ramana Maharshi did not wipe out her \"Karmic baggage\" instead he speeded up the Karmic process with respect to the space-time framework where the death happened.<br />\n<br />\n[QUOTE]<br />\nDescribing the process afterwards, he(Maharshi) said: \u201cInnate tendencies and the subtle memory of past experiences leading to future possibilities became very active. Scene after scene rolled before her in the subtle consciousness, the outer senses having already gone. The soul was passing through a series of experiences, thus avoiding the need for rebirth and making possible Union with the Spirit. The soul was at last disrobed of the subtle sheaths before it reached the final Destination, the Supreme Peace of Liberation from which there is no return to ignorance.\u201d<br />\n[UNQUOTE]<br />\n<br />\nIf Ramana Maharshi was capable of giving Moksha by his own will, why was he not able to do the same with his first devotee Palaniswami. Maharshi attempted the same process while Palaniswami was dying and he himself announced that it did not work. Obviously there are other factors involved.<br />\n<br />\nMurali</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_61BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_61b+seedCJrpD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_59T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8716441859604149510\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_59M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_4.html?showComment=1515140551101#c8716441859604149510\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 5, 2018 at 1:52 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_59MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHY DO YOU THINK I AM WRITING THIS POST ON KARMA-- BREAKING MY RESOLUTION NOT TO BLOG -<br />\n<br />\nTOO MANY FAKE GURUS ARE PRETENDING TO GIVE \"MOKSHA BY DEEKSHA \" AND GRABBING FAALTHU POWER<br />\n<br />\nRAMANA MAHARISHI OR ANYBODY ELSE CANNOT LESSEN YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE --NOT EVEN A VISHNU AVATAR<br />\n<br />\nVISHNU AVATARS ALL SURRENDERED TO KARMA... THIS WAS A PRECONDITION TO BEING INDUCTED ON TO PLANET EARTH<br />\n<br />\nRAMA SURRENDERED TO THE CURSE OF QUEEN TARA .<br />\n<br />\nKRISHNA SURRENDERED TO THE CURSE OF QUEEN GANDHARI --<br />\n<br />\nBOTH CHASE WOMEN.. BEING CHASTE GAVE THESE WOMEN SPECIAL CURSE POWERS ..<br />\n<br />\nKRISHNA AWAITED JARAs ARROW TO PIERCE HIS FOOT -- PLAYING HIS FLUTE .<br />\n<br />\nRAMA HIS MISSION ACCOMPLISHED ON PLANET EARTH WAS ASKED TO LEAVE FOR VAIKUNTA/ SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER - ( POISON INJECTED LORE SAYS BY YAMA ).<br />\n<br />\nBUT YAMA CONTROLS ONLY ASTRAL LAYER ONE FOR CRIMINAL HUMANS AND ASTRAL LAYERS TWO TO SIX FOR NORMAL MEN<br />\n<br />\nTHE POISON INJECTED LORE SAYS THIS==<br />\n<br />\nYAMA CAME TO RAMA ,AND TOLD HIM--OH RAMA YOU HAVE NOW TO LEAVE PLANET EARTH .. YOUR MISSION TO KILL JAYA AND VIJAYA ( RAVAN / KUMBHAKARNA ) IS NOW ACCOMPLISED.<br />\n<br />\nBUT HEY-- MONKEY HANUMAN WONT ALLOW IT<br />\n<br />\nPRAY WHY?<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE MONKEY HANUMAN LOVES HIS MASTER RAMA TOO MUCH--<br />\n<br />\nAND OF COURSE OUR MONKEY CAN SCREW THE HELL OUT OF YAMA --SINCE OUR MONKEY IS GOD SHIVA AVATAR<br />\n<br />\nBALLS-- ONLY VISHNU HAS AVATARS<br />\n<br />\nSO RAMA TOOK OUT HIS GOLDEN RING AND THREW IT INSIDE A NAGA HOLE IN THE GROUND-- MAKING SURE HANUMAN SAW IT<br />\n<br />\nSO OUR MAN HANUMAN REDUCED HIS SIZE AND DIVED INTO THE HOLE TO RETRIEVE HIS MASTERS RING.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">SEE SHIVA AVATAR IS SERVANT OF VISHNU AVATAR-- ( DIVIDE AND RULE AT ITS BEST )</span></div>\n<br />\nHANUMAN WAS MET BY THE NAGA KING INSIDE THE GOPHER --NAY--SNAKE HOLE AND HE LED HIM TO A PIPE OF GOLDEN RINGS AFTER A LONG JOURNEY --BY WHICH TIME RAMA VAMOOOSED TO VAIKUNTA --LUNGI UTHAAKE<br />\n<br />\nNOW HANUMAN STARTED SCRATCHING HIS HEAD-- ALL RINGS LOOK ALIKE THOUSANDS OF THEM IN A HUGE FUCKIN' PILE<br />\n<br />\nSO NAGA BABY TOLD HANUMAN BABY<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE RINGS BELONG TO RAMA -- FROM PREVIOUS YUGAS -- EVERY PRALAYA CREATES A NEW RAMA ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS FALSE EPISODE ( TO MAKE HANUMAN TO A GOD WITH GREAT POWERS ) WAS SHOWN ON EPIC TV YESTERDAY NIGHT--WITH DEVDUTT PATTANAIK DOING THE NARRATION<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID --RAM DID NOT WANT TO TAKE SITA TO THE FOREST ... BUT SITA SAID \"ALL PREVIOUS TIMES YOU TOOK ME-- WHY NOT NOW \"( SITA SHOULD HAVE BEEN A LAWYER )<br />\n<br />\nAND SO RAMA HAD NO CHOICE BUT TO TAKE SITA TO THE FOREST<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nTHIS REMINDS ME OF A DRAMA IN \"THOTTI COLONY \" --SCAVENGERS COLONY ( ALL TAMIL DALITS ) NEXT TO CALICUT STADIUM.<br />\n<br />\nI WAS JUST 7 YEARS OLD--I WENT TO SEE THEIR DRAMA WITH SIX OF MY PLAYMATES<br />\n<br />\nA BLACK TAMILIAN WAS DRESSED UP AS SITA --WITH LOT OF TALCUM POWDER ON HIS FACE AND COCONUTS FOR BOOBS<br />\n<br />\nOUR SITA CRIED \" PLEASE RAMA --KINDLY TAKE ME WITH YOU TO THE FOREST \"<br />\n<br />\nRAMA , A SHIT LOOKING TAMILAIN DALIT WITH A GARGANTUAN PAUNCH AND PAAN STAINED LIPS MOANS \" OF SITA PLEASE--KINDLY DONT COME--<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_59MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_59BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVEN TODAY, WHEN I WANT TO HAVE A BELLY LAUGH-I THINK ABOUT THIS DRAMA EPISODE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LAST TIME I WENT TO SEE THIS THOTTI COLONY--IT WAS STILL THERE - DESCENDANTS OF THESE TAMIL DALITS-- THEY NO LONGER ARE THOTTIS ( MANUAL SHIT SCAVENGING ) BUT ROAD SWEEPERS WHO CRY FOR RESERVATION</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; He lay there for a couple of minutes totally dazed , picked himself up and came charging . This time my son palmed his jaw, jerked his head backwards to upset the inner ear spirit level again, and shoved him so hard that he went flying again . It took some time for him regain his balance get up and slink away .<br />\n<br />\nThat was it.<br />\n<br />\nThe girls , two dozen of them were the first to start clapping , and then the rest of the class followed .<br />\n<br />\n###########################################<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE MORE DEADLY WAYS IN KALARI --YOU CAN TAKE A BLOW JOB WHEN THE MAN IS ON HIS KNEES<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/kalaripayattu-oldest-and-deadliest.html</span><br />\n<br />\n##################<br />\n<br />\nAbout 15 years ago, my ship was going up a South American river. The pilotage was long and tedious, with the river swollen due to floods.<br />\n<br />\nThe pilot was a tall and handsome guy of German descent. He was nice to talk to.<br />\n<br />\nI noticed that his knuckle boneheads were smashed up-- and the tendons displaced into the recesses -- so this means he could punch into concrete slabs without hurting himself.<br />\n<br />\nIn between I had to go down to sort out a machinery problem caused by human carelessness , and by the time I got back on the bridge , I was in a nasty mood.<br />\n<br />\nI resumed my conversation with the pilot-- then I told him \" You appear to be a trained fighter!\"<br />\n<br />\nSo this dude starts off with the degree of the black belt he holds -- etc . And then I could see the inherent arrogance surfacing.<br />\n<br />\nI stopped him when he said \" I can whip anybody on this planet!\" ( the way Mike Tyson had told on TV before )<br />\n<br />\nMy Chief officer and Quarter master were listening to all this in silence. I winked at Chief Officer, took out my key chain from my pocket, and told the pilot to hold it in his hand.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThen I stepped back by about 6 feet , and told him to press the black button on the handle. A small sharp box cutter blade snapped out. I told him \" I know where your jugular vein is-- if I am half the distance closer, it just takes me less than a second to kill you\"<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe pilot's face became white, and my Chief Officer and Quarter Master nearly fainted.<br />\n<br />\nThen I said \" Now press the red button on the side\"<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nA compass divider snapped out-- only difference was it had fish hooks at the end.<br />\n<br />\nI told him \" If I decide to be kind and not kill you , then I can make you give any crew member of my ship a blow job on your fuckin' knees for the next 2 hours ! \"<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAnd then immediately I apologised --told him I am very sorry .<br />\n<br />\n####################################<br />\n<br />\nKALARI URUMI WARRIORS TIED SEVERAL LINEN STRANDS ON THEIR KNEES WITH A SATCHEL OF TURMERIC POWDER --TO DEALAY IMMINENT DEATH BY BLEEDING .<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THE BATTLE THEY LOOSENED THEIR TOURNIQUETS TO DIE ON THE BATTLE FIELD<br />\nTHEY USED THEIR LINEN STRIPS TO BEND A OPPONENTS FINGER AND TIE IT UP WITH A GORDIAN KNOT<br />\n<br />\nWOMEN CAN MAKE HUGE DEADLY SUMO WRESTLERS GIVE THEM A REAMING WITH THEIR TONGUES --<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_75BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_4.html?showComment=1515218788044#c4061683608543518650\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 6, 2018 at 11:36 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_148MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE REAL HINDU GOD IS BRAHMAN\u2014THE MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD\u2014WHICH CANNOT BE PICKED UP BY THE 5 HUMAN SENSES<br />\n<br />\nWhen you know man, you know the universe. This intimate relationship between the human body and the universe forms a major topic of the most holistic system of health care, Ayurveda ( 4200 BC ) .<br />\n<br />\nSummarized in Charaka Samhita , written 6200 years ago : \"All material and spiritual phenomena of the universe are present in the individual. Similarly, all those present in the individual are also contained in the universe. This is how the wise desire to perceive.\"<br />\n<br />\nYajurveda ( 5000 BC )reveals the same truth: \"Yatha pinde tatha brahmande, yatha brahmande tatha pinde\"--\"As is the individual, so is the universe, as is the universe, so is the individual.\"<br />\n<br />\nRig Veda ( 5000 BC ) says-- \"As it is anywhere, so it is everywhere.\" You are the embodiment of all the Laws of Nature. You are the constitution of the Universe.<br />\n<br />\nThe human body is a good illustration of the effect of consciousness on form . Without an overseeing consciousness that can maintain an overview of the body's form and processes, we wouldn't be able to exist in our physical form.<br />\n<br />\nMorphogenetic fields help to differentiate cells and form biological systems. They instruct genes to produce necessary proteins in a given biological environment. Morphogenetic fields are not material, but are more like biological blueprints giving birth to various forms. They carry encoded organizational information.<br />\n<br />\nMind and mater are not separate. Matter is just an expression of mind. The wise ancient vedic Maharishis knew this truth .<br />\n<br />\nThe Vedas contain the meaning of consciousness. A visible attribute of consciousness is an energetic field that governs the shaping of organisms. Morphogenesis is a scientific term to explain this very shaping of tissues, organs, and entire organisms. Consciousness is the creative force of the entire universe.<br />\n<br />\nThe entire universe is in fact a single living conscious organism with complete awareness of itself.<br />\n<br />\nASTROLOGY IS NOT A SAVAGE SUPERSTITION.<br />\n<br />\nNot only is consciousness responsible for the physical universe and its elements-- it is the universe. The field of consciousness contains information about everything that has happened since the dawn of time.<br />\n<br />\nThe ancient Vedas tell us that the basis of all creation is the all pervading morphogenetic consciousness field. The Vedas said that all energy is a spiral and that empty space is not empty at all. It is a plenum, containing zero point energy..<br />\n<br />\nScalar waves are very different from electromagnetic waves. They can travel over immense distances with no loss of energy at super-luminal speed ( faster than light!) .<br />\n<br />\nWe all have direct and immediate access to the scalar field of consciousness \u2013where communications happens FASTER THAN LIGHT<br />\n<br />\nAll atoms in the entire universe are capable of mind reading and communicating with other atoms. Our consciousness is a cosmic DVD player<br />\n<br />\nThere is a cosmic dance of energy back and forth between the physical realm and the zero point field, a constant creation and destruction of matter from the void.<br />\n<br />\nThe continuous flow of energy in and out of the material world is THE COSMIC DANCE OF SHIVA.<br />\n<br />\nConsciousness becomes energy and then transforms to matter. Forces of attraction cause the particles to come together to form nuclei with electrons orbiting around them giving the illusion of matter. These atoms are attracted together to form molecules.<br />\n<br />\nMolecules are brought together by organizing forces inherent in the particular morphogenetic field of that being or material, causing the creation of DNA, cells, tissue, organs, systems, organisms, societies and on a larger scale, planets, solar systems, galaxies and universes. All of this from the one and only quantum field of consciousness .<br />\n<br />\nThe whole of material creation is conscious. Our consciousness creates our reality. What our consciousness can conceive , it can also create.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_148MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_148BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_148B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_149B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5245970537203622439\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_149M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. It remains unchanged for the past 4 billion years. In your body you have 125 billion miles of DNA, which is 500 billion trips around the earth.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">We are NOT independent from this cosmos. We are part of it. This is the reason we must live in harmony with the laws of the universe by exercising our free will.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Newton\u2019s absolutism broke down at the foundation level of matter. Newton\u2019s billiard ball would miss the pocket hole every time at the sub-atomic level. Newton\u2019s laws applies only to the macroscopic world, the world which can be detected by our 5 senses.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the microscopic world quantum physics rules. Nothing is certain. In the quantum realm the observer is king, as he creates reality, as demonstrated by the Double slit experiment.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DfPeprQ7oGc</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If you are NOT shell shocked by this experiment, you have not understood it</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is what the Vedas and our Maharshis have been saying</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You intentions and consciousness play a huge role. This explains the power of prayer and the placebo effect.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">An act of simple observation as shown in the double slit experiment is an action of consciousness\u2014as expounded in the Vedas.. A \u201cparticle\u201d observation would momentarily \u201cfreeze\u201d the molecules\u2019 positions, resulting in the appearance of thought.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Another complementary \u201cwave\u201d observation where the proteins remained unobserved would produce changes in the energy of these waves, resulting in the arousal of feelings. Thus feelings and thoughts would show the same type of duality as waves and particles .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Stupid Newton pushed consciousness into the realm of religion and mysticism. Scientists who wanted to factor consciousness in were chucked out of the scientific community and the peer reviewed magazines controlled by free masons made them pariahs. With the advent of quantum science we now know what great injustice was done.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The classical physics of Newton takes a material perspective in which the Universe is composed of discrete building blocks, solid and unchangeable. Quantum physics takes a spiritual perspective in which there are no separate parts, in which everything is fluid and always changing. In the quantum world there are no CAUSES.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Matter is NOT a inert substance. It is conscious and active. Experts in organic and inorganic chemistry know what I mean. Matter constantly makes choices for alternate possibilities.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Vedic Maharishis experienced Turiya ( Samadhi ) when they meditated. This is a fourth state of transcendental consciousness beyond waking, sleeping and dreaming. By using Soma they went into the fifth state of cosmic consciousness. When they got enlightened they went into the sixth state. The last state is pure consciousness, a state of bliss where everything inside is same as outside, in which state they can defy classical scientific laws..</span><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />LAWS OF KARMA ARE BASED ON QUANTUM PHYSICS</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Quantum Physics which suddenly appeared in the 20th century is the result of ancient Vedic Sanskrit texts being translated by the Christian invaders . These texts are 7000 years old.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\"After the conversations about Indian philosophy, some of the ideas of Quantum Physics that had seemed so crazy suddenly made much more sense.\" - W.
