font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Understanding\nsynchronicity requires nothing less than a radically different cosmology than\nwe\u2019re accustomed to, one with roots in a Vedic spiritual way of thinking\u2013 in\nwhich Jung\u2019s \u201cmeaningful coincidence\u201d actually plays only WEE part..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We all heard of the\nfable\u2014the blind men of Hindoostan and the elephant.&nbsp; A group of blind men come across a great\nelephant, and each one tries to determine its nature from their own limited\nperspective. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the man grasping\nonly its trunk, it seems to be a large snake, while for another, feeling only\nits leg, it\u2019s more like the trunk of a tree, and so on. Because of their\npartial and limited vantage points, none is able to grasp the true nature of\nthe creature, since that can properly be understood only from a larger, more\nglobal perspective.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All events and\nphenomena are elements of a supremely ordered whole. Like the intricately\narranged threads of a great novel or myth, the elements of daily experience\nare&nbsp; intimately interrelated, with no\nevent out of place, no situation accidental. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even a seemingly\ntrivial occurrence can serve as an important key toward unlocking a greater\npattern of meaning: the&nbsp; appearance of\nlightning at a critical moment, or the overhearing of a chance remark \u2013 such\nevents are significant because they\u2019re perceived as interwoven within a greater\ntapestry of relationship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carl Jung, the founder\nof analytical psychology, linked intuition to synchronicity, which he defined\nas :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The coming together of\ninner and outer events in a way that cannot be explained by cause and effect\nand that is meaningful to the observer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We\u2019ve all experienced\ncoincidences in our lives. However, at times there are coincidences that are so\nperfectly tailored to a detail and so improbable in terms of timing that you\ncan\u2019t dismiss it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is an internal\nvoice that sets you to something and synchronicity provides you with what you\nneed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jung believed that\nsynchronicity occurs when a strong need or a deep archetypal excitation arises\nin the psyche of an individual. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steve Jobs leant about\ngut feeling in India . He emphasised the overriding role of intuition and\nsynchronicity in his life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to him,\nfollowing his intuitions and stepping into the realm of synchronicity not only\nled him to greater creativity but also stengthened his belief and faith in his\npath. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said that even if at\ntimes you can\u2019t see what path you\u2019re going down, in time it will make sense as\nlong as you have faith (this can be faith in God, karma, destiny, yourself or\nyour talent but there has to be faith in something, so finding the source of\nyour self-belief is important).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can\u2019t connect the\ndots looking forward ; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have\nto trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. This is the only\ntime it is worth giving a darting glance in the rear view mirror on the road\nbehind<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have used intuition\nat sea , with marvelous results\u2014the best was all knew it out of 20/20 hindsight\nand they did NOT ask me why I decided in a particular way.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A JIVAN MUKT IS THE ULTIMATE IN INTUITION&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuits are able to\nsee possibilities and alternatives that aren\u2019t immediately apparent. Your inner\nknowing comes from first your instincts, second your intellect, and third from\nyour intuition. My blogs help in arousing your inner voice and honing your\nintuition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If we expereince the world in which we live as\nbeing holistically and intricately connected, feel we are part of what is\naround us and engage with it in an open, receptive and nonjudgemental way, we\nbecome more intuitive and creative.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition helps you\nstay in the present, like what is advocated in the Bhagavat Gita. Intuition is\nnot pseudo-science . It is an essential psychological function like thinking,\nfeeling and sensing. The divining power of intuition comes from our inner self.\nIt arises from very rapid processing of bits of information that are stored in\nour subconscious.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition thinks in terms of metaphor, feelings, pictures,\nand the spatial whole and doesn't fit neatly into the cause-and-effect model.\nIt is about trusting your own integrity - trusting your gut, trusting your\nheart.. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your intuition will not force you to do things that are truly wrong\nfor yourself or other people in contradiction with the laws of the universe.\nIntuition is listening to the inner voice or heeding the promptings from\nwithin.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition is a ability\nto cut through the thickness of surface reality . Intuition and confidence go\nhand in hand. Your sub-conscious which operates a dozen times faster than your\nconscious mind has picked up on signals that your conscious mind has not yet\nprocessed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We function through partial information, and intuition gives us an\noverview, a whole sense of things. Intuition acts like a bridge between your\nlogical reasoning and the sum total of your experience-based knowledge.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition is a knowing,\na sensing that is beyond the conscious understanding \u2014 a gut feeling-- flashes\nof spontaneous thought that are done apparently without relating to facts or\nlogic. Intuition is fast, based on pattern matching.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The divining power of intuition comes from\nour inner self-- very rapid processing of bits of information that are stored\nin our subconscious. We cannot command our gut feeling to use it at will. It\njust surfaces spontaneously when certain circumstances are present. Intuitive\ninsights suddenly appear as ideas or feelings.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition is now an EQ\ncompetency. It\u2019s considered something necessary to successful living, and\nsomething to be respected and valued. Intuitive decisions are NOT guesswork .\nIntuition has an important role to play in decision making . Intuition is not\nlimited to opinions but can encompass the ability to know valid solutions to\nproblems.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition usually shows\nup in the areas where you have passion and talent. By logic that we prove, by\nintuition we discover. Intuition is a sudden and inexplicable knowing. It lies\nat the roots of spontaneity, humor, creativity, inspiration, and even genius.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intuition has its own\nunique language for communicating with you through touch, sight, taste, sound,\nand smell. As you pay attention to your senses, you\u2019ll begin to understand the\n\u201cvocabulary\u201d of your intuition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Traits often found in\nthose with high intuitive intelligence include-- an awareness of one's personal\nvalue system, a healthy awareness of one's own feelings, an ability for\nself-direction and self-management, a powerful level of self-trust, a desire\nfor innovation, a refined knowledge of one's strengths and weaknesses, and a\nhigh degree of self-regard and freedom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mental static and ego\ncan get in the way of tapping into intuition. Intuition bubbles up from within\nand can be overwhelmed by old mental or emotional \"tapes\" .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Intuition\ngone wild within a IDIOT becomes JUMPING INTO CONCLUSIONS .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By going too far out on a limb , you risk\nmisinterpreting the situation and start harming others. Intuition should not be\noverused and that too by IDIOTS.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your brain is a complex tapestry of\ninteracting neurons, all working together to provide you with insights that\nguide you through life. It\u2019s complicated. So complicated that your conscious\nbrain cannot keep up with everything it\u2019s trying to tell you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what exactly is\nintuition? It is the messages from your unconscious mind making contact with\nyour consciousness. . The uncanny ability to detect patterns in the world\naround us, and to extrapolate larger truths . Use it always, never ignore it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our instincts and\nintuition are more reliable in a decision making, than our conscious brain. .\nBy listening to what our heart and soul tells us to do - and then doing it - we\ncan take ourselves anywhere we have ever dreamed of going.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your consciousness only\nuses a tiny proportion of your brainpower and your intuition accesses the\nresidual power and communicates to your consciousness the bank of wisdom and\nknowledge it has available. This is done subtly through thoughts, feelings,\nsensations, images, sounds or any combination of them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as animals have a\nnatural survival instinct so humans are born with the natural ability to be\nintuitive; your human instinct.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never ignore the inner\nspark , the gut feeling, the sixth sense or hunch that ignites vision and leads\nyou to success. Intuitive insights motivate us to grow closer to the creative\nsource, thereby igniting our own creative spark and expression, which is the\nessence of our true self.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you feel excited about something, that's a hint\nabout what to pursue.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Decisions are made in the mind\u2014choices\nare made in the gut.&nbsp; Choices come from\nyour essence and attunement to your higher self.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both our gut and\nour brain originate early in embryo genesis from the same clump of tissue which\ndivides during fetal development.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While one section turns\ninto the central nervous system, another piece migrates to become the enteric\nnervous system. Later the two nervous systems connect via a cable called the\nvagus nerve \u2014 the longest of all the cranial nerves .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vagus nerve meanders\nfrom the brain stem through the neck and finally ends up in the abdomen.\nThere\u2019s the brain-gut connection. This means your psychological health, is\npartly derived from the heathy gut.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga tweaks your Vagus nerve for the better.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you have severe dysentry , have you\nnoticed how depressed you feel? WHEN YOUR GUT MICROBES BECOME YOUR ENEMY\u2014YOU BECOME\nA CUNT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being in the zone is a\nstate of mind\u2014where you are free of thinking and negative emotions and in A\nFEELING MODE. The less you think, the more you achieve\u2014for you own your\ndestiny.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GENIUSES ARE ORDINARY\nPEOPLE WHO CAN MAKE CONSCIOUS THEIR UNCONSCIOUS PERCEPTIONS. YES, YOU CAN CALL\nHIM A \u201cCRAZY GENUIS\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;REMEMBER , EVERYTHING YOU DO WELL WITHOUT\nAWARENESS ,IS DONE BY THE SUBCONSCIOUS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the left and right\nlobe of the brain works in harmony, the unleashed mysterious K force can made\nyou achieve the extraordinary .</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our intuition is like\nthe weather vane, pointing us in the right direction. It does not take your\ndecisions.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any idea or thought you yourself accept as true will\nbe taken as a command by the subconscious mind, as it cannot distinguish\nbetween dreams and reality . You can program or harness or fool the\nsubconscious mind by imagining, unrestrained by left lobe censorship and\nconventional inhibitions .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never squelch the\nhunches and perceptions spewed by your subconscious. Do not think inwards,\nthink in feelings and images\u2014 if possible using all 5 senses\u2014like texture ,\nsmells etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any problem if\napproached from a unpredictable angle can give unexpected creative results.\nThis is called 2D lateral thinking.&nbsp; This\nis just 1% of 4D VADAKAYIL BINDU THINKING \u2013where you go past all onion layers ,\nsit at the core and look outwards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And don\u2019t be too\nbashful and coy when you declare to yourself \u201c I am the best\u201d ( like a certain\nship captain ) \u2013 for it is the trigger for magic, it gives you the power .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6mX-u26tYmU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6mX-u26tYmU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It pays to remember --\nThe subconscious responds to stimuli, not pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have heard athletes\ndescribe the phenomenon of BEING IN THE ZONE.&nbsp;\nThe frontal lobe is that part of the brain that allows us to be in the\nPRESENT MOMENT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a state of flow,\nself consciousness disappears. You are too involved in the activity and your\nego takes a backseat.&nbsp; You feel connected\nto something larger than yourself. You are on the crest of a intuitive high.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nis a paradox, that in this state of flow, by letting go, you strengthen your\nself. You don't lose mental energy in how you appear to others. Time flies and\nyour sense of time gets distorted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arjun saw only the eye\nof the fish\u2014at that time the activity in the neocortex ceases and there is no\nthinking. The cerebellum takes over at that point.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE HALLMARK OF FLOW IS\nTHIS FEELING OF SPONTANEOUS JOY- NAY- RAPTURE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your attention is\nundivided and your awareness merges with your action. You are now inside the\nwaterfall of the flow, highly aligned with the task in hand. There is NIL anxiety.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowing how to be in\nthe flow, gives athletes the winning edge. Sports psychology is all about\nknowing how to trigger this state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You know what has to be\ndone, and you are doing it. You are engaged by the challenge , but NOT\noverwhelmed. You find a good match between the demands of the situation and\nyour own innate ability.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the frontal lobe\nis activated you have focus, clarity, decisiveness, concentration, pro\nactiveness and individuality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are what we\nrepeatedly do. Excellence then is not an action, but&nbsp; a habit.&nbsp;\nTT players, high board divers \u2013let the body do the work and tell the\nminds to FO.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the mind has repeatedly instructed the body to perform an\naction, the body will begin to remember the action better than the thinking\nbrain. Communication between cells is faster than the speed of light. Nerve\ncells are called neurons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The face of a high\nboard diver in the Olympics just before the jump for the gold medal --is the\nface of a human being in the zone. The brain has surrendered to the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CIVILISATION HAS\nADVANCED BY EXTENDING THE NUMBER OF IMPORTANT OPERATIONS WHICH WE CAN PERFORM\nWITHOUT THINKING ABOUT THEM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation is a\ncreation of the sages of&nbsp; Indian Vedic\ncivilization</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Often the hands will\nsolve a mystery that the intellect has struggled with in vain. - Carl G. Jung</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On a sub-atomic level,\nthe building blocks of our material universe can exist both as particles and\nwave-forms at the same time. Electrons are not bound by space-time\nrestrictions, as they can be everywhere in the universe simultaneously.\nHowever, as soon as one attempts to measure this phenomenon, the particle\nleaves this quantum dimension and collapses into a single aspect of space-time\nreality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum Physics has\ntherefore scientifically proven what the Maharishis had always taught, namely\nthat the reality we perceive as being out there in a fixed state is in fact an\nillusion.&nbsp; Instead what we are actually dealing\nwith is a field of infinite possibilities, which is in a constant state of\nflux. The reality we perceive is what our brain has come to assume is there.\nOur experience therefore is merely a result of conditioning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogi mystics posit\nagainst this illusory conditioning a direct experience of reality as a non-dual\nstate of consciousness. This \u201cby-passing\u201d of the mind, which results from\nsystematic techniques to stop its inner turbulence by temporarily suspending\nthought, is the only way we can catch a glimpse of how things really are.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any type of Yoga will\ndo this to a degree, but if you turn your practice into a conscious act of\nself-healing that involves an active dialogue between body/energy and\nmind/heart, the results will be more powerful. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the context of yoga,\nas well as Quantum physics, the body (or matter in general) cannot be spoken of\nas divorced from energy. Quantum physics has revealed that matter in fact\nconsists of spaces held together by energy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The thing that is more \u201creal\u201d, in\nthe sense that it informs the qualities and characteristics of a thing, is this\nenergy, not the object itself. That energy responds immediately when it comes\ninto contact with other force fields, and our mind, though not itself the\nsource, directs energy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hence, as soon as the instruments of perception are\ndirected to a thing, it responds and changes; so it is with the body in yoga.\nThis is why for our practice to be truly effective and transformative, it has\ngot to make room for such interactivity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once we imbue our\nsadhana with greater consciousness, we will become skilled at sustaining this\nsame level of awareness in all our actions. The importance of intention takes\non a whole new dimension, and this realisation will cause fundamental change\nand improvement in our lives and that of others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To understand how\nsynchronicities work is to understand the nature of reality. It is in fact a\ncomputer generated hologram in which characters and events created are\nprogrammed experiences that on this level of consciousness are perceived of as\nreal. It's all science and math set in linear time to experience emotions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nhologram in physical reality follows the numeric codes of the fibonacci\nsequence or golden ratio. The brain is a computer run by binary code which\naligns with the holograms grids of experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>IF YOU HAVE A FRACTAL\nBRAIN\u2014YOU CAN SEE VEDIC SRUTIS ARE HOLOGRAMS </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/fractal-mind-of-srinivasa-ramanujan.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/fractal-mind-of-srinivasa-ramanujan.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicities bring\npeople to into awareness. Many people come here looking for the numeric code 11\nwhich is part of binary code [0, 1, 10, 11, 100, 101, 110, 111, ...] and the\nfibonacci sequence [0,1,1, 2, 3, 5, 8,13, ...] as all is a mathematical algorithm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicities are\npreprogrammed experiences that occur when one's DNA is programmed for a\nspecific event in time. ... Something happens. You react. You think, \"This\nis a coincidence. I must investigate further.\" You do ... then more\nsynchronicities occur and you are suddenly following an exciting line of action\nand reaction. Your soul is sending you on a journey.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THIS IS HOW INVENTIONS\n, DISCOVERIES TAKE PLACE ( WE LEAVE OUT DIMPLE INNOVATIONS )</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today's journeys seem\nto be all about healing and energy. The ultimate goal is to understanding that\nwe are projected illusion in a hologram that is evolving back to consciousness\nand light - not pseudoscience but science.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicities are\npatterns that repeat in time. Synchronicity refers to the gears or wheels of\ntime, though the actual concept of synchronicity cannot be scientifically\nproven. One can only record synchronicities as they occur and watch the\npatterns of behavior that create them. The concept of synchronicity is\ncurrently linked more to Vedic&nbsp; metaphysics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The more 'consciously aware' you become of how\nyour soul manifests, the higher your frequency becomes and the faster you\nmanifest positively. Each day your life encounters meaningful coincidences,\nsynchronicities, that you have attracted, on other words created in the grid of\nyour experiences in the physical.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Souls create synchronicities, played out in\nthe physical. It is why you are here. It is how our reality works.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perception, and the way\nwe react to our perceptions, depends on the brain's ability to pattern match to\ninnate and learned knowledge. Although we talk about pattern matching, in a way\nit is more accurate to talk about pattern perception. What we perceive are the\nmeanings that we attribute to certain stimuli <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.Patterns of\nperception in our brain always seek completion in the environment and each\nperception is 'tagged' with emotion. Emotions are feelings which create\ndistinctive psycho biological states, a propensity for action and simplified\nthinking styles<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They originate in the\nlimbic system and it is here and in the thalamus that all basic patterns are\nstored. The system is continually on the lookout for physical danger,\nmonitoring information coming through our senses from the environment. It does\nall this prior to consciousness. The information that comes into conscious\nawareness arises up to half a second after the reality has been experienced\nunconsciously.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In other words, human beings experience conscious reality after\nit has actually occurred. It is what happens in that half second that is\nsignificant. Information, processed subconsciously at enormous speed, is\ncompared to patterns already existing in the brain derived f rom previous\nexperience. On this basis the emotional brain decides whether what is happening\nnow is threatening or non-threatening.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only after this\nfiltering process has occurred is information sent 'up', if necessary, into\nconsciousness. Our perceptions are always accompanied by emotions, ranging from\nvery subtle to the extremely strong. Emotions exist at a prior stage to\nlanguage.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are the only language available to the subconscious mind for\ncommunicating the significance of patterns. If an emotion is strong, the signal\nwill take the fast track route and trigger a response before the neo-cortex has\nhad time to get involved.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As happens, in a dark alley when we run away from\npossible attackers in the shadows. It also happens in non-emergency situations\nwhen certain individuals respond to stimuli as if they were emergencies because\nthey haven't learned to adjust an inappropriate pattern from the past.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">COMPUTERS CAN NEVER\nMATCH THE HUMAN BRAIN\u2014 THEY CANT BE MADE CONSCIOUS</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the emotional\narousal is not quite so strong, the information can take the 'slow' track which\ninvolves the neo-cortex. In such circumstances, in the dark alley, it is the\nneo-cortex which may decide that the shadows are in fact empty and that the\nfeelings and thoughts which they have prompted need modifying.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the job of\nthe conscious mind to discriminate, fill in the detail and offer a more\nintelligent analysis of the patterns offered up to it by the emotional brain.\nThe emotional brain is necessarily crude in its perceptions and the degree to\nwhich the fight or flight reflex is activated is the degree to which our\nthinking becomes polarized - more black or more white.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So with emotional\narousal there is only a right or wrong, all or nothing, black or white\nperception. Everything operates out of those two extremes; \"high emotional\narousal makes us stupid\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">. An effective\ncounsellor has the skills to disempower the strong emotional templates that\n'lock' their clients into disabling viewpoints and help them access more\nhelpful ones so that they can operate out of a bigger pattern. This is known as\nreframing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Black and\nWhite\" thinking, or stubborn, rigid and extreme thinking, is common with\nimmature cognitive development.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immature people are not\nyet developed enough to think in complex ways about a range of issues. Immature\ncognition often leads to simple solutions to problems, and a lack of ability to\nsee things from other people's perspectives. This type of thought is\npresent-focused and tied to reality Mature&nbsp;\nthinking includes the ability to think in the abstract and to consider a\nnumber of solutions to a problem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Loosening the VICE grip of black or white\nthinking allows you to gain a clearer understanding of the circumstances around\nyou. You\u2019ll find a new world of possibilities \u2014 alternatives you could never\nhave seen otherwise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicities may\nsimply occur just to make a point. Don't blow them out of proportion. You must\nlook at the bigger picture of the synchronicity, think outside the box, (the\npatterns of reality) not at the actual experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can consider an\nevent synchronistic when an inner experience such as a dream, vision, or other\nform of deja vu, prepares you for the physical event.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your soul is always\nmultitasking to create new experiences for you. If you observe how you move\nthrough life, you will understand. Doing this allows many people to clear their\nissues by writing their story as a catharsis of their experiences here. The\nhigher and clearer your frequency and intent, the faster you manifest\nsynchronicities.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You finally end a bad\nrelationship and immediately another partner comes into your life as if by\nsynchronicity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You meet someone who\ninterests you and touches your soul. Through synchronicity that person seems to\ncome into your life over and over again. You begin to feel a destiny with that\nperson. You begin to think with your heart instead of your head. You connect\nwith that person.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The parallel universe\ntheory states that all possible futures exist simultaneously, therefore the\nsubject indeed lives out all possible futures in parallel.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicity describes\nthe temporally coincident occurrences of acausal events. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many experiences\nperceived as coincidence were due not merely to chance, but instead potentially\nreflected the manifestation of coincident events or circumstances consequent to\nthis governing dynamic. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because Jung believed\nthe phenomenon of synchronicity was primarily connected with psychic\nconditions, he felt that such couplings of inner (subjective) and outer\n(objective) reality evolved through the influence of the archetypes, patterns\ninherent in the human psyche and shared by all of mankind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These patterns, or\n\"primordial images,\" as Jung sometimes refers to them, comprise man's\ncollective unconscious, representing the dynamic source of all human\nconfrontation with death, conflict, love, sex, rebirth and mystical experience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When an archetype is activated by an emotionally charged event (such as a\ntragedy), says Jung, other related events tend to draw near. In this way the\narchetypes become a doorway that provide us access to the experience of\nmeaningful (and often insightful) coincidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Implicit in Jung's\nconcept of synchronicity is the belief in the ultimate \"oneness\" of\nthe universe. As Jung expressed it, such phenomenon betrays a \"peculiar\ninterdependence of objective elements among themselves as well as with the\nsubjective (psychic) states of the observer or observers.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The belief suggested by\nquantum theory and by reports of synchronous events that matter and\nconsciousness interact, is far from new\u2014it is the essence of Vedic philosophy\nand astrology<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicity reveals\nthe meaningful connections between the subjective and objective world.\nSynchronistic events provide an immediate religious experience as a direct\nencounter with the compensatory patterning of events in nature as a whole, both\ninwardly and outwardly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AUM represents past,\npresent and future, It is also that which is beyond these.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">- Mandukya Upanishad (\n5000 BC )</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theoretical concept\nof karma&nbsp; represents recognition of\ncausal events in time.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta&nbsp; is based, not on a linear, but a cyclical or\ncircular understanding of time and causality.&nbsp;\nIt is the modern mind ( lifted from Vedas without understanding )&nbsp; which has fixated on linear time and cause\nand effect.&nbsp; It is so ingrained in us\nthat it seems difficult to conceive of anything otherwise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Albert Einstein stated,\n\"The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at\nonce.\"&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum mechanics has\nbrought into question the whole idea of the linear sequential separation of\nevents in space and time.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to quantum mechanics,\nobjects can lose their well-defined classical properties, such as e.g. a\nparticle that can be at two different locations at the same time. In quantum\nphysics this is called a \"superposition.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum physics has\nproved that even the causal order of events could be in such a\nsuperposition.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum physicists from\nthe University of Vienna and the Universit\u00e9 Libre de Bruxelles have shown that\nin quantum mechanics it is possible to conceive situations in which a single\nevent can be both, a cause and an effect of another one.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This has far-reaching implications for the\nfoundations of quantum mechanics, quantum gravity and quantum computing. In\neveryday life and in classical physics, events are ordered in time: a cause can\nonly influence an effect in its future not in its past.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to quantum\nmechanics, objects can lose their well-defined classical properties, such as\ne.g. a particle that can be at two different locations at the same time. In\nquantum physics this is called a \"superposition.\" What do ripples on\npuddles, waves on ropes and noise-cancelling headphones have in common?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They all show\nsuperposition. When two waves meet they overlap and interact. Sometimes they\nadd to make a wave bigger, sometimes they cancel each other out, and often it\u2019s\na combination of both. Noise-cancelling headphones listen to regular and\nconstant noise around you and play the exact opposite sound to cancel annoying\nnoises like jet planes engines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But because quantum\nmechanics is weird, instead of thinking about a particle being in one state or\nchanging between a variety of states, particles are thought of as existing\nacross all the possible states at the same time. It\u2019s a bit like lots of waves\noverlapping each other.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This situation is known as a superposition of states.\nIf you\u2019re thinking in terms of particles, it means a particle can be in two\nplaces at once. This doesn\u2019t make intuitive sense but it\u2019s one of the weird\nrealities of quantum physics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, once a\nmeasurement of a particle is made, and for example its energy or position is\nknown, the superposition is lost and now we have a particle in one known state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cannot measure\nScalar waves of 5 dimensional energy with 4 dimensional instruments .The master\ncellular control system of the human body is holographic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tesla inaugurated the\nconcept of scalar waves by describing the non-electromagnetic fields of\npotential that cannot be measured by standard electrical detectors<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Superposition means that a particle can be\nconsidered to be in more than one place at once.&nbsp; Superposition in time means that it can be\nconsidered to be in the past, present or future at once.&nbsp; On the quantum level, space and time as we\nordinarily think of them do not exist.&nbsp;\nThis is clear in Vedanta <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Yoga Sutras\n(4:12) Patanjali states, \u201cThe past and the future exist in their own form as\ninherent characteristics.\u201d&nbsp; In other\nwords past and future are superposed in the present.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">4.12- - - atitanagatan\nsvaroopatostyadhvabhedad dharmanam</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">The existence of the\npast and the future is as real as that of the present.&nbsp; As moments roll into\nmovements which have yet to appear as the future, the quality of knowledge in\none's intellect and consciousness is affected.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The understanding of\ntime liberates one from bondage. Time is a system revealing the sequential\nrelation that one event has to succeed another and another and so on, as past,\npresent, or future. Time is regarded as an indefinite continuous duration,\nwherein events follow one another.&nbsp; The\npast and future are as real as the present. The orderly rhythmic procession of\nmoments (ksana cakra) into movements is the wheel of time (kala cakra). Its\nexistence is real and eternal.&nbsp; The\npresent may fade into the past, or manifest clearly at a future time. Due to\nthe play of the gums of nature, conditions change, raising the illusion that\ntime has changed.&nbsp; Past and future are\nwoven into the present, though they appear different due to the movement of\nmoments.&nbsp; Desire nurtures action aimed at\nits gratification. The interlude between desire, action and fulfillment\ninvolves time, which manifests as past, present and future. True understanding\nof motivation and the movement of moments release a yogi from the loop of\nbondage.&nbsp; Moment is changeless and\neternal. Moments flow into movements eternally and are measurable as past,\npresent and future. This measurable time is finite, when contrasted with\neternity.&nbsp; The negative effects of time\nare intellectual (lack of spiritual knowledge, avidya, and pride, asmita);\nemotional (attachment to pleasure, raga, and aversion to pain, dvesa); and\ninstinctive (the desire to cling to life, abhini-Qesa). Time's positive effect\nis the attainment of knowledge. The experience of the past supports the\npresent, and progress in the present builds a sound foundation for the future.\nOne uses the past as a guide to develop discriminative power, alertness and\nawareness, which smoothens the path for Self-Realisation. The yogi who studies\nin depth this unique rotation of time, stays detached from the movement of\nmoments; he rests in the present. Thus he becomes clear of head, clean of\nheart, and free from time, which binds consciousness. When the concurrence\nbetween the movement of moments and consciousness terminates, freedom and\nbeatitude - kaivalya, are experienced. Human concept of time is not based on\nreality, but merely on the perception of the senses and the mind, whose\ncapabilities are limited. In reality, the whole of past exists even now, in\nthis very moment, but, it is hidden from human perception by being placed in a\ndifferent plane, which is unavailable to human eye and mind.
