Likewise, the\nwhole of future too, is available right now, in this moment. This is also\nhidden from eye and mind, by being placed in a different plane, unavailable to\nus. Past and future have different characteristics compared to his moment. The\npower to perceive those characteristics is not available to ordinary human\nmind. But, certainly, these are not beyond the Yogi\u2019s power of perception. We\nlive in the present. But, as we all know, our mind is constantly oscillating\nbetween the past and future. In fact, it is very difficult to keep the mind in\nthis moment. The Yogi\u2019s effort is not to go into the past or into the future,\nbut, to keep the mind in the here and now. But, Patanjali affirms that past and\npresent are available in the present moment itself \u2013 in different planes, due\nto their different characteristics. It is not that past just vanishes away\ntotally, nor that future comes into our life from nothingness.&nbsp; They are always available but come into our\nconsciousness as the present moment only and then go back into their planes.\nPast and future are in the here and now: All of the characteristics, forms,\nmemories, deep impressions, etc., exist in the here and now, whether in active\nor potential forms. The appearance of past and future comes from the condition,\npath, or order in which they are sequenced.&nbsp;\nThe existence of the past and the future is as real as that of the\npresent. As moments roll into movements which have yet to appear as the future,\nthe quality of knowledge in one's intellect and consciousness is affected.&nbsp; Time is not an illusion.&nbsp; It is real in that sense.&nbsp; Because of definite characteristics, there is\na certain course which time takes from the past into the present and into the\nyet-emerging future.&nbsp; The inherent\ncharacteristics (dharmanam) from the past mold the future.&nbsp; The changes which come about in the present\nare stockpiled by time as the basis for slight or major differences which are\nto come.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_14.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_14.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Vedanta ,\nthe past and the future can be understood in terms of the actualization (KARMA)\nof latent potentials (vasanas.)&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both past and future\nexist within a field of possibilities which are experienced inwardly as desires\nand actualized outwardly as objects.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;The past simply represents actualized\npotentials while the future represents latent potentials.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Because\nof memory and the cyclical ( fractal) nature of time, these potentials recycle\nthemselves endlessly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, according to Patanjali\n, the presence and the constant modification of objects is based on the\nconstant fluctuation of three basic principles: tamas ( Shiva- &nbsp;inertia) &nbsp;, rajas ( Brahma- activity ) and sattwa&nbsp; ( Vishnu \u2013homeostasis ).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is due to the\nfluctuation and combination of these three states of nature that time and\nobjects appear to exist.&nbsp; Purusha, the\nSelf, is purely the witness of this passing show.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yoga Sutras state,\n\u201cPurusha is the witness and the master of the fluctuations of the mind.\u201d\n(4:18)&nbsp; When we are able to experience\nthis deeper aspect of our being in meditation or contemplation then we are able\nto rest in a state of pervasive bliss and inner peace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">4.18- - -&nbsp; sada jnatashchittavrittayastatprabhoh purushasyaparinamitvat</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Purusa is ever\nilluminative and changeless. Being constant and master of the mind, he always\nknows the moods and modes of consciousness.</span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Lord of\nconsciousness is the seer. He is changeless, constant, and never alters or\nstumbles. In deep sleep, consciousness forgets itself. It is purusa, as a\nwitness which reminds the mind of sleep after waking. This designates that\npurusa is ever alert and aware (sada jnata). Purusa's alertness will be known\nto the sadhaka only when consciousness is purified and liberated from rising\nthoughts and their restraints. Then the sadhaka, the seeker, becomes the seer.\nThe seer knows his consciousness and its branchings. He is the seed and root,\nand consciousness is the seedling. Its stem is the 'I' consciousness (asmita),\nwhich branches forth as ego, intelligence and mind. The seer, being the seed\nand root of consciousness, observes the changes and transformations taking\nplace within it. The mind is never constant. It is ever-changing.&nbsp; Our thoughts, ideas, perceptions are always\nchanging. These are the modifications of our mind. But, behind these\nmodifications, there is an unchanging PURUSHA, the pure consciousness, who is\nthe watcher of all these modifications. The Purusha is the constant witness of\nthe mind and its modifications. The Purusha is superior to and is the master of\nthe Chitta.&nbsp; In other words, always two\nthings are happening simultaneously in us. At one level, within the mind is a\nconstant stream of ever-changing thoughts, emotions, ideas, desires and so on.\nBehind all this changes in the mind \u2013 there is a witnessing soul \u2013 the Purusha,\nwho is changeless&nbsp; and permanent. It is\nonly against this unchanging background of the Purusha, that all changes can occur\nin the mind. This unchanging Purusha is the lord, the pure consciousness, the\nreal ruler of the mind-stuff. And, he does it merely by witnessing and not\nparticipating. The activities of the mind are always known by the pure\nconsciousness, because that pure consciousness is superior to, support of, and\nmaster over the mind. The activities of the mind are always known by the pure\nconsciousness, because that pure consciousness is superior to, support of, and\nmaster over the mind. Purusa is ever illuminative and changeless. Being\nconstant and master of the mind, he always knows the moods and modes of\nconsciousness. Because the Atman, the Lord of the mind, is unchangeable, the\nmind's fluctuations are always known to it.&nbsp;\nThe activities of the mind are always known by the pure consciousness,\nbecause that pure consciousness is superior to, support of, and master over the\nmind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In dreams, meditation\nor Soma driven psychedelic experiences we get a glimpse of the open-ended,\nnonlinear field of potential that constitutes this mysterious universe.&nbsp; Yoga tells us that it is crucial that we\nrealize the underlying consciousness which actualizes this potential through\nthe power of pure observation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Free will plays a\ncentral role in the transition from potentiality to actuality and vice versa. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum entanglement is\na phenomenon in which pairs or groups of particles that have been in contact\nwith each other seem to remain connected over vast distances. When actions are\nperformed on one of the particles, corresponding changes are observed on the\nothers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In classical\ninformation, there\u2019s a binary system of bits, which can take only two values: 0\nor 1. A quantum bit (in a shortened form qu-bit) can take simultaneously the\nvalues 0 and 1<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as bits are the\nfundamental object of information in classical computing, qubits (quantum bits)\nare the fundamental object of information in quantum computing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum computers\nprocess data by applying a universal set of quantum gates that can emulate any\nrotation of the quantum state vector. In quantum computing, the valid\ntransformations that we are allowed to perform on a qubit are unitary\ntransformations and measurement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/7HXTt7HMDE8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/7HXTt7HMDE8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicity OR\nmeaningful coincidence is a clue to the nonlinear aspect of temporal\nexperience.&nbsp; The concept of synchronicity\nhas been linked to the phenomenon of nonlocality, or entanglement in quantum\nphysics&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In quantum physics it\u2019s\nbeen famously observed that, depending on the presence or absence of an\nobserving human mind, subatomic entities like electrons and photons behave like\npellet-like particles or waves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we attempt to observe\ntheir behavior using measuring instruments, they appear as particles. But when\nsuch instruments are removed, they behave like waves, meaning they don\u2019t seem\nto be located in any specific point in space at any given moment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unobserved, they are\ntheorized to exist in a \u201csuperposition,\u201d the range of all locations that it\nwill be possible for them to appear in when they are observed. Until they are\nobserved, they do not exist in space or time. They are literally dependent on\nthe presence of the mind to attain a position in 3-dimensional reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without the presence of\nthe human mind, the physical universe may exist in a kind of superposition \u2014 an\ninfinite range of possible modes of occurrence. Which is to say, it doesn\u2019t\nexist at all as a \u201cphysical\u201d universe unless the human mind is present.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From\nthis quantum perspective, the human mind, our consciousness, creates and\nsustains what seems like a universe much vaster and older than, as well as\nindependent of, ourselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronicity can guide\nyou in your life and can open up many doors should you tune into its magic. It\nis a nudge, a push or in some case a loud scream telling you to follow your\npath. Inventors know what this is<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The blurring of\nboundaries between consciousness and matter challenges everything taught in\nwestern systems<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Religious leaders to\ndraw clear lines between the \u2018subjective\u2019 and the \u2018objective,\u2019 the \u2018real\u2019 and\nthe \u2018unreal,\u2019 the existent and the non-existent, or the tangible and the\nintangible. Spirituality is subjective. Single messiah/ single holy book religious\ndogma is objective.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spirituality cannot be\nexplored using scientific methods because it involves deeply personal,\nsubjective experiences, and in this it differs from the over-riding ambition of\nscience: to be objective.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI regard consciousness\nas fundamental. I regard matter as derivative from consciousness. We cannot get\nbehind consciousness. Everything that we talk about, everything that we regard\nas existing, postulates consciousness.\u201d-- Max Planck<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s not possible to formulate\nthe laws of quantum mechanics in a fully consistent way without reference to\nconsciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">ONLY THE MAHARISHIS OF\nINDIA SPOKE OR WROTE ABOUT CONSCIOUSNESS TILL QUANTUM PHYSICS KICKED IN 90\nYEARS AGO\u2014&nbsp; ALL LIFTED FROM 7000 YEAR OLD VEDAS<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synchronistic events\nbetween the mental and the material domains as a consequence of a quantum\nentanglement between mind and matter.. Mental and material domains of reality\nwill be considered as aspects, or manifestations, of one underlying reality in\nwhich mind and matter are unseparated<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every atom in the\nuniverse , including the one in your body is connected to each other at the\ndeepest level. This is mentioned in our Vedas and has been proved by the\nquantum scientists.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are NO objects in the cosmos--only vibrations of\nenergy and relationships.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You as a person are\nintricately connected with the larger cosmos. Your 5 human senses can detect\nonly a small narrow segment of the energy scale--even a small child in school\nknows this today..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IDIOT Newton wanted human&nbsp;\nsenses to ratify everything ( objectively )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a\nconsciousness in every molecule of matter<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire universe is\na single living conscious organism with complete awareness of itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you use psychic\npower you tap into the level of the universe, where individuality does not\nexist. At this level each of us is a part of a universal and cosmic\nconsciousness where we are connected as though held together by invisible\nthreads. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This inter\nconnectedness means that everything we do or think affects everything and\neveryone else.&nbsp; The brain does not create\nconsciousness, rather-- consciousness created the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A preliminary step\ntoward quantum data storage occurred in 2008, when scientists transferred a\nsuperposition state from one qu-bit to another qu-bit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4933770657494039661\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_18M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. a\nhigh-minded person who feels the highest SHRADDHA for God and for his guru as\nfor God, and then they will surely shine forth as inner experiences - then,\nindeed, they will shine forth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: x-large;\">YOU WOULD NOT BE KNOWING ALL BELOW IN 2018</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<pre class=\"stotra\" id=\"content\" itemprop=\"text\" lang=\"sa\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 243, 231); display: table; font-family: Sanskrit2003, serif !important; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 33.6px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; padding: 0px 2em; white-space: pre-wrap; width: auto;\">\u0965 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u092e\u0939\u093e\u0935\u093e\u0915\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0925\u092c\u094b\u0927\u0903 \u0965\n\n\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u0917\u0923\u0947\u0936\u093e\u092f \u0928\u092e\u0903 \u0964\n\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e\u092e\u0917\u094d\u0930\u0947 \u0930\u0935\u093f\u091a\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0926\u0947\u0930\u094d\u092d\u093e\u0938\u0915\u0902 \u0932\u094b\u0915\u091a\u093e\u0932\u0915\u092e\u094d \u0964\n\u092a\u0943\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093e\u092e\u0940\u0926\u0902 \u0915\u0925\u0902 \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928\u092e\u093e\u092a\u094d\u0928\u0941\u092f\u093e\u0902 \u0926\u092f\u092f\u093e \u0935\u0926 \u0965 \u0967\u0965\n\n\u0907\u0924\u093f \u092a\u0943\u0937\u094d\u091f\u094b\u093d\u0930\u094d\u091c\u0941\u0928\u0947\u0928\u093e\u0939 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u0926\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0903 \u0936\u0943\u0923\u0941 \u092d\u0942\u092a\u0924\u0947 \u0964\n\u092f\u0926\u0947\u0915\u0902 \u092a\u0930\u092e\u0902 \u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e \u0928\u093f\u0924\u094d\u092f\u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u092e\u0935\u093f\u0915\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u092e\u094d \u0965 \u0968\u0965\n\n\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0936\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0938\u092e\u093e\u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u091f\u092e\u0940\u0936\u092e\u093e\u0939\u0941\u0930\u094d\u092e\u0928\u0940\u0937\u093f\u0923\u0903 \u0964\n\u0938 \u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0923\u0941\u0903 \u0938 \u0936\u093f\u0935\u094b \u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e\u093e \u0938\u094b\u093d\u0917\u094d\u0928\u093f\u0930\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930\u0903 \u0938\u094d\u0935\u0930\u093e\u0921\u094d \u0939\u0930\u093f\u0903 \u0965 \u0969\u0965\n\n\u0927\u093e\u0924\u093e \u0915\u093e\u0932\u0903 \u0915\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u093e \u0915\u0930\u094d\u0924\u093e \u091c\u0940\u0935\u0928\u0902 \u092e\u0943\u0924\u094d\u092f\u0941\u0930\u093e\u092e\u092f\u0903 \u0964\n\u0928\u093e\u0930\u093e\u092f\u0923\u094b \u0939\u0943\u0937\u0940\u0915\u0947\u0936\u094b \u092d\u0942\u0924\u0902 \u092d\u0935\u094d\u092f\u0902 \u092d\u0935\u091a\u094d\u091a \u0938\u0903 \u0965 \u096a\u0965\n\n\u0935\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0941\u092e\u093e\u0924\u094d\u0930\u092e\u093f\u0926\u0902 \u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u092e\u0939\u092e\u0947\u0935\u093e\u0938\u094d\u092e\u093f \u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0926\u0943\u0915\u094d \u0964\n\u0905\u0939\u092e\u0947\u0935 \u092a\u0930\u0902 font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD/ WHITE INVADER KNEW THAT VEDIC\nSRUTIS HAD DIVINE MATH INHERENT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHAT HE DID NOT KNOW THAT THIS DIVINE MATH\nCAN BE CROSS VERIFIED --&nbsp; &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL KNOWS HOW \u2013 HE WILL KEEP\nTHIS A SECRET AS OF NOW..&nbsp; LEST I GIVE A MATCH\nSTICK TO&nbsp; A WHITE KOSHER MONKEY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) ,\nFIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF\nOM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT --. THIS IS WHY WE HINDUS\nINSIST THAT SRUTIS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA AND IT IS NOT CREATED BY A MORTAL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SO JEW ROTHSCHILD USED HIS FAKE MUTTS AND\nCREATED FAKE VERSES TO SHOW THAT GRAMMAR AND MATER IN VEDIC RUTIS MEAN NOTHING\u2014AND\nIT IS GIVEN IMPORTANCE ONLY BY FOOLS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br />\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is the FAKE cooked\nup story attached to the composition of this Hymn BHAJA GOVINDAM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankaracharya was\nwalking along a street in Varanasi one day when he came across an aged scholar\nreciting the rules of Sanskrit grammar repeatedly on the street.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankara went up to\nthe scholar and advised him not to waste his time on grammar ( CHANDAS ) at his\nage but to turn his mind to God in INTENSE BHAKTI , which would only save him\nfrom this vicious cycle of life and death.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He composed the hymn\nextempore and sang out on this occasion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BALLS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TOTAL LIES !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>FAKE Bhaja govindam is\nmetrically highly irregular.&nbsp;&nbsp; It does\nnot follow the same Chandas throughout.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Not a SINGLE stanzas is\nthe toTaka meter.&nbsp; Adi Shankaracharya's\ndisciple&nbsp; Totakacharya is supposed to\nhave recorded BhajaGovindam <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>An example of toTaka\nmeter is the toTaka-aShTaka, in which each paada (quarter) is metrically\nequivalent to -<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>bhava\nshankara-deshika-me sharaNam.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Using 1 to represent\n'laghu' and 2 to represent 'guru', the format is<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">As long as you are able\nto acquire wealth , your kith and kin will follow you </span>. But no sooner your body\nis worn out ,&nbsp; limbs become infirm and\nyour earnings cease, none will care for you,&nbsp;\nor so much as speak to you , not even your own home-folk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PASYANNAPI CHA NA\nPASYATI MOODHO<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HIUDARANIMITAM\nBAHUKRITAVESHAH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ascetic with matted\nlocks, the man with the shaven head or one with hair pulled out, or the man\nparading in the ochre robes -- they all have eyes but yet do not see. All these\nare but <span style=\"background-color: white;\">mere deceptions for cheating the world, for filling their bellies.&nbsp; &nbsp;.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I KNOW JEW ROTHSCHILDs\nSIGNATURE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I WILL NOT CATCH HIM\nWITH HIS PANTS AND CHRONS BLOODIED LANGOT DOWN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">ADI SHANKARACHARYA\nLIVED IN 2000 BC .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; JEW ROTHSCHILD\nPLACED HIM AT 820 AD.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only an ABSOLUTE IDIOT\nwill try to change Adi Shankarachrya\u2019s verse meter style and his basic thinking\npattern ---this includes the main ADVAITA philosophy taught by him as he cannot\nchange his basic philosophy, which has become a part of his life itself<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The MAIN methods of\nevaluation&nbsp; is perusing the&nbsp; Sanskrit verse PROSODY&nbsp; ( chanda )&nbsp;\nand this includes colophon, writing style, chanda, matra, meter,\nterminology, grammar, etc used<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Chandas, as\ndeveloped by the Vedic schools, were notable for including both linear and\nnon-linear systems. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The structure of meters\nin Sanskrit prosody include those based on fixed number of syllables per verse,\nand those based on fixed number of morae per verse. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.ms.uky.edu/~sohum/sanskrit/yogavasishtha/Sanskrit-Prosody.pdf\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.ms.uky.edu/~sohum/sanskrit/yogavasishtha/Sanskrit-Prosody.pdf</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Vedic culture, the\nChandas were revered for their perfection and resonance..&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Compilations of Sanskrit prosody contain\nover 1000 meters.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is&nbsp; humongous--- a larger repertoire than in any\nother metrical tradition on this planet\u2014they copied from India..&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://sanskrit.sai.uni-heidelberg.de/Chanda/HTML/list_all.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://sanskrit.sai.uni-heidelberg.de/Chanda/HTML/list_all.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panini's treatise on\nSanskrit grammar distinguishes Chandas as verses that compose the Vedas<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://sanskrit.sai.uni-heidelberg.de/Chanda/HTML/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://sanskrit.sai.uni-heidelberg.de/Chanda/HTML/</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When syllabic instants\n(matra) is the foundation of the Sanskrit prosody, a short syllable is counted\nas one instant, and a long syllable is counted as two instants..&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://translate.google.co.in/translate?hl=en&amp;sl=hi&amp;u=http://sanskrit.sai.uni-heidelberg.de/Chanda/HTML/v_sundarI_1.html&amp;prev=search\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://translate.google.co.in/translate?hl=en&amp;sl=hi&amp;u=http://sanskrit.sai.uni-heidelberg.de/Chanda/HTML/v_sundarI_1.html&amp;prev=search</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matra is a meter in\nSanskrit prosody is measured in terms of a matra (i.e. the time taken in\nuttering a short vowel). A laghu is a syllable containing one matra<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HERE IS THE BULLSHIT\nGIVEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS\u2014 AS TO WHY BHJAGOVINDAM IS LIKE\nTASTELESS&nbsp; KHICHDI COOKED BY A MAN WHO\nDOES NOT KNOW THE ART OF COOKING --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: Bhaja govindaM\nis divided into dvAdashamanjarikA stotram and chaturdashamanjarika stotram. At\nthe end of composing the first stanza, it is said that Shankara burst forth\nwith the next 12 stanzas of bhaja govindam.&nbsp;\nThus stanzas 2-13 with 1st as refrain are called dvAdashmanjarika\nstotram. Inspired by the extempore recital by Shankara, each of his 14\ndisciples composed a verse and the 14 verse compendium is called\nchaturdashamanjarika stotram. (There are no evidences to prove the exact\nindividual authorship of these 14 verses, we have some traditional hearsay\nevidences as attribution.) Shankara added the finishing touches by adding five\nof his own stanzas at the last bringing the total to 31. The combined 31 are\nalso termed as mohamudgaraH by some.&nbsp; The\nlast two verses in this version is not found in all editions UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">OH&nbsp; FUCKIN\u2019&nbsp;\nYEAH ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">REAL Adi\nShankaracharya\u2019s&nbsp; words are never so\nharsh and cynical.&nbsp; He was a graceful\nmaharishi ,&nbsp; his REAL works are full of\nwisdom-- fragrant , soft and tender</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BrahmAn pervades the\nsmallest atom ( Microcosm ) to the vast cosmos (macrocosm).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The microcosm would be\nis the empty space in an atom which is 99.9999999% of the atom, in which the\nelectrons whiz around the nucleus. The macrocosm extends to the vast ocean of\nAkasha ( ether ) of the universe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Akasha, macro the\nmorphogenetic consciousness field , as per Vedanta is the source of everything\nthat exists, and in which the memory of the cosmos is encoded. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This empty space called\nbrahmAn has astounding power and can boil off this planet\u2019s oceans in seconds. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN SOME ORBITS\nELECTRONS WHIZ AROUND IN MOBIUS COIL, FIGURE OF EIGHT PATTERN GENERATING SCALAR\nENERGY-- FOR PERPETUAL MOTION AT MICRO SCALE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
