text-decoration-line: none;\">January 3, 2018 at 10:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_103MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nI HAD WRITTEN LONG AGO-SEVERAL TIMES<br />\n<br />\nTHAT THE BATTLE OF KOREGAON IS A BIG LIE<br />\n<br />\nI HAD PREDICTED 1ST JAN 2018-- THE DAY PRAKASH AMBEDKAR WILL BE BROUGHT ON AS THE NEW BR AMBEDKAR ( HIS GRANDFATHER ) BY FOREIGN FORCES --THE 200TH ANNIVERSARY OF A BATTLE ONLY ON PAPER<br />\n<br />\nPESHWAS / BRITISH / MAHARS WERE ALL BED FELLOWS<br />\n<br />\nHE IS NOT EVEN A DALIT AS HIS GRANDMOTHER ( BR AMBEDKARs WIFE ) WAS A CHITPAVAN JEW<br />\n<br />\nLONG AGO I WAS LISTENING TO BBC&nbsp; -- THIS WAS IN THE PEAK PERIOD OF LTTE ( 1984)<br />\n<br />\nTHINGS GET STUCK IN YOUR SUBCONSCIOUS<br />\n<br />\nMY SHIP WAS BRINGING 70,000 TONNES OF GASOLINE FROM USA FOR INDIA<br />\n<br />\nI WAS WONDERING WHAT THE HELL THIS IS --AS INDIA IMPORTS CRUDE FROM NEARBY AND REFINED THE OIL<br />\n<br />\nSO I WAS SUSPECTING A CAT IN THE BAG<br />\n<br />\nSURE ENOUGH -- THE MESSAGE CAME DIVERT TO TRINCOMALEE ( SRI LANKA ) TO PART UNLOAD CARGO--&nbsp; &nbsp;I WENT ON ON FAXED CHART..&nbsp; <span style=\"color: red;\">THIS WAS A SCAM INVOLVING INDIAN MINISTERS , IAS BABUS , AND SHELL COMPANIES</span> ..<br />\n<br />\nI REMEMBERED THE BCC NEWS AND IT DAWNED THAT THE DAY I WOULD DISHARGE THE PETROL AT TRINCOMALEE WAS A GRAND ANNIVERSARY FOR LTTE<br />\n<br />\nI REFUSED TO START DISCHARGE UNLESS MY SHIP WAS SURROUNDED BY SRI LANKAN NAVY ARMED SPEED BOATS<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE NIGHT SPEED BOATS AND COMMANDOS WERE GOING ROUND AND ROUND THE SHIP<br />\n<br />\nTHE NEXT DAY MORNING I HEAD ON RADIO COLOMBO--THAT THE LARGEST LTTE FORCES WERE KILLED ( MORE THAN 200 ARMED CADRE ) JUST OFF TRINCOMALEE AND THEY HAD DOZENS OF STINGER MISSILES<br />\n<br />\nI KNEW FOR SURE THAT THESE MISSILES WERE MEANT FOR MY SHIP<br />\n<br />\nSUBCONSCIOUS SAVES<br />\n<br />\nThe subconscious mind does not think\u2014it is only a store house of our experience. It has no sense of time. It cannot differentiate between positive and negative input. It cannot tell the difference between real and imagines experience.<br />\n<br />\nPERCEPTION HAS A LOT TO DO WITH HONED SUBCONSCIOUS<br />\n<br />\nHave you ever noticed that on a busy road--you day dreamed--yet you had no accident ?<br />\n<br />\nThe conscious mind can be engaged 100% in talking or deep thinking while the subconscious keeps the car on the road.<br />\n<br />\nGOOD AGENTS LIKE JAMES BOND -- MAKE USE OF THEIR SUBCONSCIOUS TO FIGURE OUT THINGS WELL IN ADVANCE<br />\n<br />\nSubconscious = only deduction ( no thinking , draws conclusions, does not care for right or wrong, gives the power to do the job ) RIGHT BRAIN LOBE ( for right handers ): Insight, 3D forms , art, imagination, music, left hand control<br />\n<br />\nSubconscious mind never sleeps even in a coma- it derives energy from the soul. The soul also is the power source for endless movement of the heart<br />\n<br />\nThe subconscious mind acts on old beliefs stored over a lifetime. Many of those beliefs you may have accepted without thinking. Or you may have absorbed them when you were too young to exercise choice.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Beliefs instilled with the subconscious mind can sabotage one's life and increase your KARMIC NEGATIVE BAGGAGE</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Catholic\nChristianity-- the POPE who wears ridiculous fancy clothes and holds a funny\nstaff can save you.&nbsp; Heck, he can even\nconvert a DEVIL INCARNATE with hajaaaar negative karmic baggage into a SAINT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This MIDDLE MAN or\nBROKER concept of EVIL Pope with a hotline to Jesus Christ was shunned by\nprotestants .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jews created PROTESTANT\nChristianity\u2014I appreciate the Jews for this good deed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism there is NO\npope .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The original Mutt\npontiffs ( Kerala Namboodiris ) led frugal lives . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They stayed in simple\nlodges when they traveled\u2014unlike our PADMA VIBHUSHAN rascal gurus who stay in\n5 star hotels.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanchita Karma: The\naccumulated result of all your actions from all your past lifetimes. This is\nyour total cosmic debt. Every moment of every day either you are adding to it\nor you are reducing this cosmic debt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prarabdha Karma: The\nportion of your \"sanchita\" Karma being worked on in the present life.\nThat is part of one\u2019s Sanchita Karma which must be worked out in the present\nlife (no options). Because the law of Karma implies determinism in human\nactivities, Prarabdha is often translated as DESTINY. When you work down your\nagreed upon debt in this lifetime, then more past debts surface to be worked\nupon in the next birth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasana is the inborn\nurge, deep-rooted inclination, inherent tendency. As your vasana so will be\nyour thought, desire and action. Your vasana then creates the environment or\ncircumstance. Thus you are a victim of your vasanas in the present. This is\nreferred to as DESTINY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">I REALLY DON\u2019T KNOW IF\nI SHOULD STAY AT THE LEVEL OF THE LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR .</span></span><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life is a mix of good\nand bad. We induce good or bad tendencies (vasanas) in our life depending upon\nour good or bad karmas. Each karma (action), each thought leaves a residual\nimpression or&nbsp; vasana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasana is a Sanskrit\nMalayalam word akin to&nbsp; the fragrance of\nfood that is left in the cooking vessel even after it is washed) in our mind or\nthe smell of your hand after eating biriyani and washing it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasanas are subtle\nimpressions which the individual soul will carry with when the soul separates\nitself from the physical body upon the death of a person.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To understand this\nnew term VASANA, first think of ice, which is gross. It is solid; can be\ntouched or felt and can be cut into different shapes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water is subtler than\nice. Water cannot be cut into shape, although it will assume the shape of its\ncontainer. Water is liquid and not solid like ice. Steam is subtler than water.\nWe cannot hold steam in our hand as we can hold water. Steam is visible for a\nwhile and then it becomes invisible. Humidity in the air is subtler than steam.\nThe presence of humidity in the air cannot be seen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vasanas are like\nthe humidity in the air; subtlest of all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The latent impressions\nor vasanas will start functioning when the soul enters a new body. It is like a\nseed which has the potential of a huge tree stored within the seed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind is by nature\npure and clear, and capable of reflecting reality. The impurities in it, which\ndistort the image of reality, are created by desires and attachments. Being\nforeign to it, they may be removed; and this is effected through the practice\nof spiritual disciplines (Karma Yoga, Raja Yoga and Jnana Yoga). Work, when\nperformed as a spiritual discipline is called Karma Yoga.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind is not an\nimpartite substance. Just as cloth is nothing but a bundle of threads, the mind\nis nothing but a cluster of Vasanas or past impressions and subtle desires that\npersistently lurk within the sub-conscience. When the threads are pulled out\none by one, where is cloth at all?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Vasanas are burnt with their seeds\nthe mind vanishes into the Immortal Seat of Brahman. The Upanishad says,\n\"when the senses do not work and stand together with the mind, and when\nthe intellect is still, that, they say is the Highest State\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The daily\nselfish actions of the Jiva add to the stock of these Vasanas and thus the\nembodied existence becomes unbroken, and the wheel of birth and death rolls on\nceaselessly. The emptying of these Vasanas demands a twofold counter-activity\nby the Jiva.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first one is to stop the adding of newer Vasanas and the\nsecond is the destruction of the existing ones.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CONSCIOUS human\nbeing alone is gifted with the choice of action. You can choose to act as per\nyour vasanas or be independent of them.&nbsp;\nWith this choice or purushartha you determine your future.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prarabda is the sum total of all your past purusharthas. It is irrevocable. So\nif you look at your past you are a victim. With reference to the future you are\na victor. At each juncture you are free to choose the way you think, desire or\nact. Once chosen you are a victim of its effect.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prarabdha is that\nportion of the past karma which is responsible for the present body. That\nportion of the sanchita karma which influences human life in the present\nincarnation is called prarabdha. It is ripe for reaping. It cannot be avoided\nor changed. It is only exhausted by being experienced. You pay your past debts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universe gives back what\nyou have given to it. So be very careful how you think. If you anger easily you\ncreate an angry mind that is predisposed to anger. As water gathers force when\ndirected into a narrow canal, the grooves in the mind create channels of\nbehavior patterns which become difficult to resist or reverse. Changing an\ningrained mental habit becomes an uphill battle.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Purushartha</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;( motivations )will is the key to your emancipation. Irrespective of your past you can choose\nto be better, nobler, more evolved. God is only the facilitator and enabler of\nyour actions. God has set the Law of Karma in place.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is up to you to use the\nlaw for your evolution. Purusharthas serve as pointers in life and act as\nstage-posts of awareness. It points to the goals in life that human beings need\nto live a life of meaning.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma is maintained as the first Purusharthas in\nthe scriptures, which lead us to have a disciplined and orderly life, by using\nthe right method to live a peaceful and satisfying life.&nbsp; Every human being needs to obey the law of\nnature by strictly following dharma. dharma ( natural justice ) is the\nstability of the society, the maintenance of social order, and the general\nwelfare of mankind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And whatever conduces to the fulfillment of this purpose is\ncalled \u2018dharma\u2019.. The law of karma (karma theory) postulates that what we\nacquired at the time of our birth was due to the consequences of our\ndeeds-actions creating debits or credits with us in previous births. Hence\nduring the present lifetime we must try and exhaust our past karma and get the\naccount fully cleared.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only yogis of high\norder,, who practice Niskama Karma, are free from the effects of their actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasanas are like the\nseeds that have to fructify or manifest (abhivyakti) according to the\nfavourable circumstances (anugunanam) at appropriate time (vipaka). Our psyche\nis a very fertile land. Nature is very kind to allow each and every seed to\nsprout.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The yogi knows the technique to\ncome out of this vicious circle of Vasana-Karma-Vasana.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What&nbsp; the relationship between prarabdha destiny\nand purushartha self-effort?&nbsp;&nbsp; The first\ncomparison is a ship in a river. The speed of the ship is 17 knots hour in still\nwaters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The ship is&nbsp;\nmoving downstream. The water in the river flows at a speed of&nbsp; 3 knots. The speed of the boat downstream\nwill then be 20 (17 + 3) knots. While moving upstream the speed of the ship\nwill reduce the 14 (17 - 3) knots. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus the speed of the\nship varies from 20&nbsp; to 14 knots over the\nground&nbsp; depending upon its movement down\nor up.&nbsp; The propeller speed is\nindependent of the speed of water.&nbsp; Yet\nwhen it moves in the river it becomes 18 downstream and 14 upstream.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now, compare the\noriginal speed of the boat to your purushartha self-effort. And the speed of\nwater to your prarabdha destiny.&nbsp; Your\nself-effort is ever free. Your destiny cannot alter your self-effort. The speed\nof the water cannot change the propeller speed.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nevertheless, in effect\nthe boat gains 3 knots downward and loses 3 upward. Similarly, even though your\nself-effort is independent, it is in effect altered by your destiny. When you\napply your self-effort in the background of your destiny, the effect produced\nis different. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your self-effort makes\nits free choice in the background of your destiny. The combination of your\neffort and destiny produces a different effect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8236015582454993370\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_127M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. the great leader will succumb;<br />\nThird big war will begin when the big city is burning.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nOn the 11th day of the 9 month,<br />\nTwo metal birds will crash into two tall statues<br />\nIn the new city,<br />\nAnd the world will end soon after.<br />\n<br />\nWITH EVERY NEW EDITION JEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AND INSERTED MERRILY-- TO MAKE THE BOOK HOLD WATER..<br />\n<br />\nIT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO EXPOSE JEW NOSTRODAMUS ( A MERE FRONT OF ROTHSCHILD ) LIKE JEW HITLER ..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <span style=\"color: red; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Death simply does not\nexist.&nbsp; &nbsp;It is an illusion which arises in the minds of\npeople. &nbsp;It exists because people\nidentify themselves with their body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are NOT your body\u2014You\nare the SOUL which electrically powers PERPETUAL MOTION of the heart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only Brahman ( god )\ncan cause perpetual motion.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that our\nuniverse is not alone is supported by data received from the Planck space\ntelescope.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entirety of\nthermodynamics is represented by the narrow infrared portion of the\nelectromagnetic spectrum, which is insignificant in a context of 0 Hz to\ninfinite Hz.&nbsp; We have much to learn,\nespecially where thermodynamics and electromagnetism meet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can tap into the\nZero Point Energy field.&nbsp; Positrons\nemanate from \"the quantum vacuum\"&nbsp;\nand get annihilated. These are energy oscillations at zero degrees\nKelvin, where all activity in an atom ceases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is called vacuum\nenergy because it is descriptive of the energy in a perfect vacuum, where no\nlight or matter is present. In this state, random electromagnetic oscillations\ncan still be observed, meaning that there is still some energy present.&nbsp; Such RESIDUAL energy is enormous and a cup of\nit could boil off the planet\u2019s oceans in a few seconds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAll matter originates\nand exists only by virtue of a force\u2026 We must assume behind this force the\nexistence of a conscious and intelligent Mind. This Mind is the matrix of all\nmatter.\u201d ~Max Planck, Founder of Quantum Physics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For a diatomic (two\natoms) molecule, for example, the zero-point energy per mole, E0, can be given\nby the equation:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">E0 = y N h c f<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">where N is the Avogadro\nconstant number of 6.0221367 \u00d7 1023&nbsp;\n,&nbsp;&nbsp; h is Planck\u2019s constant of\n6.626 \u00d7 10-34 joule-seconds, c is the velocity of light in vacuum of\n299,792,458 m/sec , and f is the frequency of vibration depending on the mass\nof the molecule, (which is different&nbsp; for\ndifferent isotopes of the same element.).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the zero point\neffect resulting from a very complex scalar-wave interaction between\nelectromagnetic &nbsp;fields and matter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A scalar wave is far\ndifferent from a regular wave in that a scalar wave goes in all directions into\nthe surroundings. A vector quantity has magnitude and direction while a scalar\nquantity has only magnitude<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE MOBIUS COIL WITHIN\nTHE CHEST CAUSES THE HEART TO EMIT SCALAR WAVES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ordinary\nelectromagnetic waves are transverse waves, while scalar waves are\nlongitudinal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound waves are longitudinal.\nSanskrit mantras cause scalar waves to be emitted by your body.. Strangely\nthese scalar waves do not actually exist in our \"material\"\nworld,&nbsp; but exist only in the vacuum of\nempty space, or the time domain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are only a little\nover 108 atoms in all the Universe that we know of.&nbsp; All that we see is built out of these and out\nof a combination of these.&nbsp; All atoms are\nmade up of protons, electrons and neutrons, except hydrogen which has no\nneutron.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY 108 ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Math is the fabric of\nour existence, it represents an algorithm on which life thrives and flows. The\nVedic srutis have DIVINE MATH embedded\u2014it cannot be poison injected.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why Srutis can\nbe verified even by GHANAS --the oral tradition of the Vedas (\u015arauta) went on\nfor 330 centuries before they were penned down 70 centuries ago, without losing\na speck of its essense.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE\nGOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI\nYANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT --.\nTHIS IS WHY WE HINDUS INSIST THAT SRUTIS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedic srutis are robbed\nof their essence when transferred to paper, for without the human element the\ninnumerable nuances and fine intonations \u2013 inseparable and necessary components\nof all four compilations \u2013 are lost completely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why BR Ambekar\nand EVR Periyar can cry as much as they want.&nbsp;\nIn a brain surgery theatre , the nurse cannot operate the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The various pathas or\nrecitation styles are designed to allow the complete and perfect memorization\nof the text and its pronunciation, including the Vedic pitch accent. Eleven such\nways of reciting the Vedas were designed - Samhita, Pada, Krama, Jata, Maalaa,\nSikha, Rekha, Dhwaja, Danda, Rathaa, Ghana, of which Ghana is usually\nconsidered the most difficult<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A ghanapaathin has\nlearnt the chanting of the scripture up to the advanced stage of ghana. The\nGhanapatha or the \"Bell\" mode of chanting is so called because the words\nare repeated back and forth in a bell shape.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rules or principles\nof Ghana Paata recital are as follows:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Assume there are\nseven words in a mantra as a Ruk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We will number these\nwords as 1,2,3,4,5,6,7<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. First take up Words\n1,2,3. The recital shall be as follows:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12,21,123,321,123. In\nthe second set, drop 1, take 234<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recite\n23,32,234,432,234. This continues till the ruk ends.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. If the statement 4\nis a word with two padams 4a and 4b, before taking up<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5,6; it is chanted as 4\niti 4a pause 4b. The student now grasps the details<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">of the Padams that make\nthis word 4. This is similar to Krama Paatam. 4. When the two words 6,7 are\ntaken up; the chanting rule (as explained<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">above with three letter\ncombination) cannot be followed; so it is recited as<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">67, 76,67. The flow of\nthe mantra and its word are repeated to memorise<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the words/padams.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. To indicate that the\nRuk has ended a final recital of 7 iti 7 like in Krama<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paatam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Then the next Ruk is\ntaken up as in Step 2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. All rules relating\nto normal Veda recital, Swaram rules, Vowel Sandhi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rules, Visarga Sandhi\nRules,Consonant Sandhi Rules and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">other grammar rules are\napplied<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. The Swaram markings\nand acquisition follow the normal Veda recital rules<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and is clearly marked\nin the Pada Paatam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. Elongation of\nrendering is made for the statements where padam is split<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">like in Krama Paatam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<br /><br /><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below: GHANA recital</span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0gDJgnhF23Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0gDJgnhF23Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">The sonority natural to Vedic chanting is enhanced\nin Ghana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dPm7cd5M674/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/dPm7cd5M674?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;In Jatapatha,\nthe words are braided together, so to speak, and recited back and forth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">1. Samhita Paatam \u2013 learning Vedas as they are\nrecited<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">2. Pada Paatam \u2013 learning Vedas with the Padam of\neach and every word<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">3. Krama Paatam \u2013 a method to learn Veda in a\nspecific order<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">4. Jata Paatam \u2013 a different method of ordering\nwords back and forth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">5. Ghana Paatam \u2013 a different method of ordering\nwords and reciting. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">&nbsp;The Pada\nPaatam is twice as powerful and effective in relation to Samhita<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Paatam; Krama paatam is rated four times and Jata\nPaatam thousand times as<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">per a sloka referred to by scholars. Ghana Paatam is\nsaid to have infinite power<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">and effectiveness in relation in Samhita/Vaakya\nPaatam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">There are other types of Veda Paata --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">1. Maala Paataa<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">2. Shika Paata<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">3. Dhanta Paata<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">4. Dwaja Paata<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">5. Ratha Paata<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">6. Rekha Paata<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/BNHtyO7qwsk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/BNHtyO7qwsk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">The insistence on preserving pronunciation and\naccent as accurately as possible is related to the TRUTH that the potency of\nthe mantras lies in their sound when pronounced\u2014not the meanings of the words ,\nwhy are only to produce a feeling of gratitude<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">The shakhas thus have the purpose of preserving\nknowledge of uttering divine sound originally cognized by the rishis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/yuS7CRnafaQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/yuS7CRnafaQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Portions of the Vedantic literature elucidate the\nuse of sound as a spiritual tool. They assert that the entire cosmic creation\nbegan with sound: \"By His utterance came the universe.\"\n(Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 1.2.4). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">The Vedanta-sutras add that ultimate liberation\ncomes from sound as well (anavrittih shabdat).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Mantras, or sacred sounds, are used to pierce\nthrough sensual, mental and intellectual levels of existence (all lower strata\nof consciousness) for the purpose of purification and spiritual enlightenment.\n\"By sound vibration one becomes liberated\" (Vedanta-sutra 4.22).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human brain is the\nperfect quantum computer, and the soul, or consciousness, is simply information\nstored at the quantum level.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It can be transferred, following the death of the\nbody; quantum information carried by consciousness merges with our universe and\nexists infinitely-- the soul migrates to another\nuniverse of 7 layers .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">China is trying to make\nQUANTUM COMPUTERS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microtubules are best\nsuited to function as carriers of quantum properties inside the brain. That is\nmainly because they are able to retain quantum states for a long time,-- they\ncan also function as elements of a quantum computer.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/vLnHu2bv2cE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/vLnHu2bv2cE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Ganesha decides if an\nanimal should become a conscious animal ( who can pass the colour/ mirror test\n) and if this conscious animal should become HUMANS in their next re-birth, fit\nfor the first astral layer &nbsp;.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_52M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/06/lord-ganesha-and-milk-drinking-episode.html?showComment=1494742187335#c787459393546969542\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 14, 2017 at 11:39 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_52MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nMay 14, 2017 at 11:36 AM<br />\n<br />\nZAKIR NAIK WAS ABLE TO CONVERT MANY HINDUS INTO ISLAM --AS HE MADE THE HINDU SELF LOATHING<br />\n<br />\nHE USED TO MALIGN LORD GANESHA<br />\n<br />\nZAKIR NAIK IS SO STUPID THAT HE DOES NOT KNOW THAT SHIVA/ PARVATI AND GANESHA ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES--OT MORTALS<br />\n<br />\nGHANA IS THE METHOD OF RECITING SRUTI ( VEDAS ) BACKWARDS \u2013 INDICATIVE OF MOBIUS PATH AND CURVED TRUNK<br />\n<br />\nGANAPATI ON THE MICRO SCALE CONTROLS THE MOOLADHARA BANDHAN -- ONLY OF THIS KNOT IS OPEN CAN KUNDALINI RISE<br />\n<br />\nGANESHAs MOTHER PARVATI ( SHAKTI ) RISES UP FROM MOOLADARA CHAKRA TO MEET HER HUSBAND SHIVA AT SAHASRARA CHAKRA ONLY IF HER SON OPENS THE DOORWAY<br />\n<br />\nLord Ganesha is mentioned in the Rig Veda (2.23.1) written in 5000 BC, as the Lord of Mantras and seer among seers.<br />\n<br />\nWhen I shifted to my new home , my wife got the Ganapathi Homam done. I remember staying overnight. The pujari came couple of hours before dawn and started his homam. Ganesha is also called Vighnesha, the lord who removes obstacles.<br />\n<br />\nGanesha is the son of Lord Shiva and his wife Parvati. As per lore Parvati removed anointed paste from here body during a bath, and gave it life. Then she showed off her handsome new baby to the other gods. Unfortunately, the god Shani (Saturn), who is said to have the evil eye, looked at him, causing the baby's head to be burned to ashes.The god Vishnu came to the rescue and replaced the missing head with that of an elephant.<br />\n<br />\nAll Ganesha statues kept at HOME, must show a broken tusk on the left side of Ganesha and the truck towards that side.<br />\n<br />\nThe white invader lied --that ganesha used the broken tusk was used by him to write the epic, Mahabharata.<br />\n<br />\nThe lore is that Ganesha in anger threw the left tusk at the naughty moon.<br />\n<br />\nThis is an allegory for keeping the distance between earth and moon is 108 times the diameter of the moon..and the tilt of the earth on its axis at the MACRO scale<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html<br />\n<br />\nWHY DOES GANESHAs MOTHER SHAKI NEED TO RISE TO MEET HER HUSBAND SHIVA ?<br />\n<br />\nIT IS ABOUT CREATION ?<br />\n<br />\nZAKIR HUSSIAN DOES NOT HAVE TE BRAINS NOR THE CHARACTER TO UNDERSTAND THIS<br />\n<br />\n4000 years ago Adi Shankaracharya wrote \u2013<br />\nShivah Shakthyaa Yuktho Yadi Bhavathi Shakthaha Prabhavithum<br />\nNa Chedevam Devo Na Khalu Kushalaha Sphandithumapi<br />\n<br />\nTranslation Verse No 1 : Shiva becomes capable of creating the Universe, only when united with Shakthi , but otherwise , He is incapable of even a stir.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva and Shakti.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha (SHIVA ) is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Pragati ( SHAKTI ) as the embodiment of pure energy.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<br />\n<br />\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy<br />\n<br />\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_52BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Microtubules are cylindrical lattice polymers of the protein\n\u2018tubuln\u2019, major components of the structural cytoskeleton inside cells<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">A laser hologram is that it exhibits the distributive property.\nThis means that even a small part of an entire holographic record contains the\nentire record of the recorded image .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The fact that living cells in any organism evolve and grow\nfrom more simple stem cells, implies quantum entanglement throughout the organism\nand its composite parts, with an associated instantaneous exchange of\ninformation through PCAR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">PCAR is necessary for the brain to perceive objects as they\nreally exist in three dimensional space. If the brain had to rely solely on the\nvisible light spectrum that was reflected off the external object and onto the\nretina of the eyes, the object would appear two dimensional just as it would be\nif a picture of the object was recorded photographically with a camera. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Contrary to the popular opinion that we see objects in three\ndimensions entirely because of binocular vision, just close one eye and observe\nan external object with the remaining open eye. The object appears \"out\nthere\" and not as an image \"in the brain\" because of PCAR. This\nclearly presents a survival advantage to an organism allowing it to accurately\nsee and locate objects (especially predators and food) in three dimensional\nspace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">ANIMALS CANY PASS THE COLOUR AND MIRROR TEST EXCEPT A\nHANDFUL OF CONCIOUS MAMMALS LIKE DOLPHIN, ELEPHANT, BONOBOS ETC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Max Planck knew Sanskrit and read the Vedas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Max Planck, ( founder of Quantum theory ) wrote the \u201cPlanck\npostulate\u201d, that electromagnetic energy could be emitted or absorbed only in\ndiscrete quanta which formed the basis of the description of black body\nradiation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">This was ultimately extended and used to describe how all\nmatter absorbs and reemits photons (quanta of energy) from and into the quantum\nfoam of the zero point field ( AKASHA that pervades all matter and even the\nvacuum of space..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Normally these emissions are random exchanges of energy\nbetween particles and the ZPF. However, the emissions from complex matter (e.g.\nliving organisms) have been shown to exhibit quantum coherence and also carry\ninformation non-locally. Recall that the quantum phenomena of non-locality\nimplies instantaneous transmission of information across space and time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Quantum Hologram is a model of how reality works. Like\nall models it enables us to make predictions and create interpretations about\nhow nature operates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Every one of our cells contains the same genetic blueprint\nof DNA and clearly that DNA and environmental influences exert major influences\nover the development and functioning of our cells. But cells are not only\nsubordinate to DNA; they also function and maintain homeostasis by\ncommunicating and cooperating simultaneously with many other cells of the body\nand by the information they receive from the environment. Much of this\ninter-cellular signaling is electrochemical in nature<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With up to 100 trillion cells it is hard to imagine how that\nmany cells can remain in harmony by the slow process of electrochemical\nsignaling especially under times of great distress when survival of the entire\norganism is at stake and / or requires extremely rapid and coordinated\nresponses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Epigenetics which is the study of the mechanisms by which\nthe environment influences cells and their offspring without changing genetic\ncodes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Inter-cellular communication is especially critical in\nembryonic development. From a single fertilized egg, the embryo divides\nthousands of times and each time producing identical offspring cells called\nstem cells. Then at some critical point when the embryo has reached a certain\nsize, something truly miraculous happens. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cells begin to differentiate and form groups of like cells\nthat will eventually become all the highly specialized tissues and organs that\nmake up the human body. Out of the entire mass of undifferentiated cells making\nup the embryo, how does a particular stem cell suddenly know that it is to\ntransform into a heart cell, liver cell, neuron, etc? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Clearly, some of the differentiation results from\nelectrochemical signaling with the immediate surrounding cells. This exchange\nis certainly necessary and provides information about how a cell must change to\nexpress itself correctly to become the right type of cell at the right place\nand at the right time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">In higher organisms with brains, the massively parallel\nprocessing capabilities of the brain structures are capable of simultaneously\nresonating with QUANTUM HOLOGRAM information at an incredible range of\nfrequencies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">AKASHIK RECORD of Vedas described as an all pervasive\nfoundation that contains not only all knowledge of the human experience but\nalso the entire history of the universe. Our normal five senses cannot access\nthis information but it can be accessed through spiritual practices such as\nmeditation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">We live in a universe that operates according to the\nfollowing principles. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">It is:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Self-organizing - All non living and living matter seems to\nbe the result of the emergent complexity adapting and evolving in response to\nchanges in the environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Intelligent - The universe utilizes information, processes\nit and assigns meaning to it. It seems to evaluate new experiences against\nstored information and \"chooses\" actions based on that evaluation\nbased on feedback mechanisms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Creative - All matter in the universe appears to be\ninterconnected and communicates with itself to continually form more complex\nsystems. These systems seem to regulate and organize themselves in ways that\nare flexible, adaptable and exhibit some form of purposeful behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Interactive - All matter continually interacts with all\nother matter. There is no such thing as independent action. Everything is\ndefined in relationship to everything else.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Learning - Experience is retained in nature\u2019s memory, the\nQuantum Hologram. Once information is created it is always available and never\nforgotten.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Participatory -The role of intention in conscious matter has\ndemonstrable effect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Evolving - Since its beginnings, nature has been developing\ninto ever increasing levels of complexity in response to environmental changes\nor pressures resulting from natural processes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Non-locally connected - All things in nature are\ninterconnected in a very fundamental way beyond time and space. The exchange of\ninformation between any two objects occurs instantaneously no matter their\nspace time separation and these interconnections cannot be shielded or\nattenuated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Based on Quantum Principles - From the micro scale of\nsubatomic particles to the largest objects in the cosmos and everything in\nbetween, all matter displays the quantum characteristics of entanglement,\ncoherence, correlation and resonance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">ALL THOSE WHO CLAIMED THAT VEDAS WERE BUMPKIN SHEPHERD\nVERSES , FOR INDRA TO MUSTER THE COWS SO THAT HE CAN SCREW THEIR ASSHOLES\u2014\nRAISE YOUR HANDS ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">FUCKIN\u2019 CUNTS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span
