position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_48M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1528260690839#c5097979333383648642\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 6, 2018 at 10:21 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_48MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nFAKE GURU SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV DOES NOT KNOW THE BASICS OF YOGA...<br />\n<br />\n98% OF WHAT THIS RASCAL TELLS IN HIS YOUTUBE VIDEOS IS BULLSHIT... AND HEY, MODI GAVE THIS FELLOW PADMA VIBHUSHAN..<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide is essential for internal respiration in a human body. ..<br />\n<br />\nInternal respiration is a process, by which oxygen is transported to body tissues and carbon dioxide is carried away from them. ...<br />\n<br />\nThe buffer system in which carbon dioxide plays an important role is called the bicarbonate buffer..<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide, a by-product of cellular respiration, is dissolved in the blood, where it is taken up by red blood cells and converted to carbonic acid by carbonic anhydrase. Most of the carbonic acid then dissociates to bicarbonate and hydrogen ions\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe bicarbonate buffer system is an acid-base homeostatic mechanism involving the balance of carbonic acid, bicarbonate ion ,and carbon dioxide (CO2) in order to maintain pH in the blood and duodenum, among other tissues, to support proper metabolic function..<br />\n<br />\nYOGA DOES NOT ALLOW HYPERVENTILATION BECAUSE IT REMOVES TOO MUCH CARBON DIOXIDE FROM THE BODY..<br />\n<br />\nThe blood also becomes abnormally alkaline as a result of the excessive elimination of carbon dioxide; this subsequent rise in blood pH is termed alkalosis. Alkalosis interferes with normal oxygen utilization by the brain. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe symptoms of alkalosis are neuromuscular irritability, muscular spasms, tingling and numbness of the extremities and around the mouth, and a dizziness, or giddiness, often interpreted as a sense of euphoria. ..<br />\n<br />\nThis euphoria and tingling of limb extremities was used by homosexuality pushing FAKE guru Sri Sri Ravishankar to push his bullshit SUDARSHAN KRIYA HYPERVENTILATION..<br />\n<br />\nIn the body alkalosis generally induces vasodilatation (widening of the blood vessels) but in the brain alone it causes vasoconstriction (narrowing of the blood vessels). ..<br />\n<br />\nVasoconstriction is only reversed by the build-up of carbon dioxide in the blood through suspension of breathing\u2026<br />\n<br />\nA low partial pressure of carbon dioxide in the blood causes alkalosis (because CO2 is acidic in solution), leading to lowered plasma calcium ions and increased nerve and muscle excitability. ..<br />\n<br />\nThis explains the other common symptoms of hyperventilation \u2014pins and needles, muscle cramps and tetany in the extremities, especially hands and feet\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHypocapnia caused by hyperventilation ( not allowed by Yoga ) is a state of reduced carbon dioxide in the blood. ..<br />\n<br />\nAGAIN, VEDIC YOGA ALLOWS ONLY DEEP DIAPHRAGMATIC BREATHING..<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation, or over-breathing, does not add oxygen to arterial blood. IDIOT Baba Ramdev does not understand this--when he shows off his kapalbhatti etc\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation does not only reduce the total cerebral blood flow, but also changes the distribution of blood flow within the brain. ..<br />\n<br />\nBlood flow to the frontal, occipital, and parieto-occipital cortex, as well as the hippocampus is reduced relative to other areas of the brain within seconds to minutes of commencing hyperventilation.<br />\n<br />\nSri Sri Ravishankar does NOT have a technical brain . He has PATENTED this Sudharshan Kriya ( SO HUM hyperventilation ) by trying to rehash Yogic pranayama exercises like Bhastrika and Kapalabhati\u2026<br />\n<br />\nYOGA HAS SHUNNED HYPERVENTILATION , AND HAS USED BHASTRIKA PRANAYAMA ONLY TO SHIFT THE DOMINANT NOSTRIL ( IDA / PINGALA ) FOR A FEW SECONDS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhen we do deep diaphragmatic breathing, our stress levels will decrease because it allows more oxygen to flow through the body. ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_49B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9170898860105841459\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_49M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1528260753785#c9170898860105841459\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 6, 2018 at 10:22 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_49MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nYogic breathing puts us in a parasympathetic (calm and relaxed) from a sympathetic (fight or flight) nervous system. It optimizes the carbon dioxide (CO2) and oxygen (O2) exchange in the lungs to give greater space in the thoracic cavity during inhalation. A better CO2/O2 exchange also allows for higher oxygen saturation in our blood. ..<br />\n<br />\nWhen we breathe more air, by hyperventilation, we get less oxygen in body cells. This is a paradox..<br />\n<br />\nIn fact, the slower your automatic breathing pattern at rest (down to only 3 breaths/min), the larger the amount of oxygen delivered to cells\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation can be voluntary or involuntary. ..<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation occurs when the rate and quantity of alveolar ventilation of carbon dioxide exceeds the body's production of carbon dioxide. ..<br />\n<br />\nWhen alveolar ventilation is excessive, more carbon dioxide will be removed from the blood stream than the body can produce. This causes the concentration of carbon dioxide in the blood stream to fall and produces a state known as hypocapnia. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe body normally attempts to compensate for this metabolically. If excess ventilation cannot be compensated metabolically, it will lead to a rise in blood pH. This rise in blood pH is known as respiratory alkalosis. ..<br />\n<br />\nWhen hyperventilation leads to respiratory alkalosis, it causes tingling in the lips, hands or feet, and carpopedal spasms (flapping and contraction of the hands and feet) . ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">MY WIFE HAS EXPERIENCED THIS SPASM IN SRI SRI RAVISHANKARs YOGA CLASS OF SO HUMM ( SUDARSHAN KRIYA ).. SHE WALKED OUT INSTANTLY AS A FEW HOURS BEFORE I HAS EXPLAINED ALL THIS IN GREAT DETAIL TO HER ...</span></div>\n<br />\nAgain--Cerebral blood flow is directly related to the carbon dioxide pressure in the blood, and inversely related to the pH of the blood flowing through the arteries going to the brain . In other words, the lower the carbon dioxide pressure in the blood, the lower the cerebral blood flow \u2026<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">THE DAMAGE TO THE BRAIN IS IRREVERSIBLE ..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">Hallucinating effects have been used by FAKE gurus to make an ass out of devotees..</span><br />\n<br />\nSince carbon dioxide is carried as bicarbonate in the blood, the loss of carbon dioxide will drive bicarbonate to combine with hydrogen ions (protons) to form more carbon dioxide. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe loss of hydrogen ions results in the blood becoming alkaline, i.e. the blood pH value rises. This is known as a respiratory alkalosis. This alkalization of the blood causes vessels to constrict (vasoconstriction). ..<br />\n<br />\nThe high pH value resulting from hyperventilation also reduces the level of available calcium (hypocalcemia), which affects the nerves and muscles, causing constriction of blood vessels and tingling. ..<br />\n<br />\nThis occurs because alkalization of the plasma proteins (mainly albumin) increases their calcium binding affinity, thereby reducing free ionized calcium levels in the blood. ..<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, low levels of carbon dioxide can cause tetany by altering the albumin binding of calcium such that the ionised (physiologically influencing) fraction of calcium is reduced. ..<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, there are two main mechanisms that contribute to the cerebral vasoconstriction that is responsible for the lightheadedness, paresthesia, and fainting often seen with hyperventilation. ..<br />\n<br />\nStupid people think that this most damaging thing is a good thingy. One mechanism is that low carbon dioxide (hypocapnia) causes increased blood pH level (respiratory alkalosis), causing blood vessels to constrict. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe other mechanism is that the alkalosis causes decreased freely ionized blood calcium, thereby causing cell membrane instability and subsequent vasoconstriction and paresthesia\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOxygen is very poorly soluble in blood, and blood contains negligible amounts of dissolved oxygen. Practically all oxygen in blood is chemically bound to hemoglobin inside red blood cells. But the chemical binding of oxygen with hemoglobin is directly affected by the acidity and alkalinity of blood (i.e. the pH of blood)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_49MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_49BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_49B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_50B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8640868769813799111\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_50M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1528261247076#c8640868769813799111\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 6, 2018 at 10:30 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--<br />\n<br />\nI CAN GO ON AND ON..<br />\n<br />\nYOU EXPECT STUPID PEOPLE LIKE DEEP STATE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR, DEEP STATE SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV AND BABA RAMDEV TO UNDERSTAND THIS HIGH TECH STUFF. .. ANCIENT YOGA WAS HIGH TECH..<br />\n<br />\nNOW TO MY HORROR, WE HAVE A BIMBETTE RIYA SEN FLAUNTING HER YOGA TRAINER CERTIFICATE...<br />\n<br />\nBOTTOM LINE:&nbsp; Hyperventilation causes loss of carbon dioxide from the body, causing the pH of blood to increase and become more alkaline. When blood is more alkaline, hemoglobin binds more tightly with oxygen\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DEMANDS FROM PM MODI-- DO NOT PROPAGATE YOGA AS A STUPID PHYSICAL EXERCISE..<br />\n<br />\nASK THE YOGA DEPT TO READ BOTH LINKS BELOW.. font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">As the\nfamous New Year's Eve Ball descends atop One Times Square, an estimated one\nmillion people in Times Square, millions nationwide and over a billion watching\nthroughout the world are united in bidding collective farewell to the departing\nyear and expressing joy and hope for the year ahead.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; Ajit Vadakayil&nbsp; January 4, 2018 at 11:38 AM<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nostradamus-predicted-in-21st-century-worlds-best-actor-will-be-from-india-jignesh-mevani-mocks-pm-narendra-modi/articleshow/62361212.cms</span><br />\n<br />\nJIGNESH MEVANI MUST BE JAILED IMMEDIATELY--HE IS NOT A PATRIOT ..<br />\n<br />\nTIME TO BREAK THE BIGGEST BOMBSHELL OF 2018..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LEGEND OF CHRISTIAN NOSTRADAMUS WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ( FRENCH BRANCH )..<br />\n<br />\nNOSTRADAMUS WAS A JEW\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE READ HIS BOOK OF PREDICTIONS AT THE AGE OF 11.. THE BOOKS IS STILL IN MY HOME LIBRARY..<br />\n<br />\nHIS QUATRAINS ARE VAGUE\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE LIKE HITLERs NAME WAS CONVERTED TO HISTER TO ACCOMODATE THE PREDICTIONS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW HITLER WAS USED BY ROTHSCHILD TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL -- HIS ORIGINAL NAME WAS NOT HILTER ( BUT HEIDLER AS PER SCHOOL RECORDS )-- IT WAS GRANTED TO HIM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS A PERFECT CASE OF CREATING TRUTHS VIA THE BACK DOOR..<br />\n<br />\nDURING WW1 AND WW2 --ROTHSCHILD DROPPED LEAFLETS ALL OVER EUROPE QUOTING NOSTRADAMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe book of predictions is Les Propheties, a collection of 942 poetic quatrains allegedly predicting future events. The book was first published in 1555 and has rarely been out of print since his death. ..WHY ?..<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS SO KEEN ON PROPAGATING THE FAME AND POWERS ( SIC) OF NOSTRADAMUS ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW NOSTRADAMUS WAS MADE POPULAR BY HIS ALMANAC WHICH WAS LIFTED FROM KERALA ..<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil declares today at 1105 AM, on 4th Jan 2018-- SATYA VACHAN that Nostradamus's predictions have been DELIBERATELY kept vague-- they could be applied to virtually anything, and are 100% useless for determining whether Nostradamus had any real prophetic powers. ..<br />\n<br />\nMost of the quatrains deal with disasters, such as plagues, earthquakes, wars, floods, invasions, murders, droughts, and battles\u2014all undated-..<br />\n<br />\nANY CHARLATAN CAN WRITE SUCH QUATRAINS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nOUR OWN VEDAS HAS SUCH COOKED UP VERSES INJECTED --BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FRENCH REVOLUTION WAS WORKED VIA BACKDOOR BY FRENCH ROTHSCHILDs FREEMASONS --THIS WAS THE FIRST REAL VICTORY OF FAKE NOSTRADAMUS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS THE FRENCH REVOLUTION PREDICTION..( BULLSHIT )..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH IS ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA LIE THAT THEY HEARD THE QUEEN SAYING \"IF PEOPLE DONT HAVE BREAD LET THEM EAT CAKE \"..<br />\n<br />\nCentury VI.--Quatrain 74.<br />\n<br />\nLa. dechass\u00e9e 1 an regne tournera,<br />\nSes ennemies trouv\u00e9s des conjur\u00e9s:<br />\nPlus que jamais son temps triomphera,<br />\nTrois et septante \u00e0 mort trop asseur\u00e9s.<br />\n<br />\nTranslation.<br />\n<br />\nShe who was proscribed will return to the kingdom,<br />\nHer enemies will be treated as conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.sacred-texts.com/nos/oon/oon15.htm</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHis astrologies were disastrously wrong, containing flagrant astronomical errors\u2014we in Kerala know astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nNobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true.<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus' writings are exploited in a number of fallacious ways. Ambiguous and wrong translations, \"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and the breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a vast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ONLY USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD FOR FAKE PROPAGANDA \u2013WITH THE SINGLE MINDED AIM OF CARVING OUT ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\nSO HOW DOES CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL KNOW ?..<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus wrote in 16th century French, which was significantly different from modern French\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS LIKE OUR JESUS WHEN THE LETTER J NEVER EXISTED TILL THE 17TH CENTURY !..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s histrorians gave bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled Nostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for this\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSome books and websites even go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern English translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within French translations\u2026<br />\n<br />\nErika Cheetham\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild was involed in MODERN bull..<br />\n<br />\nCheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".<br />\n<br />\nOccasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..<br />\n<br />\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. IT IS NOT THERE IN THE BOOK I READ IN MY CHILDHOOD\u2014WHICH IS IN MY LIBRARY ( BROUGH FROM AN OLD CALICUT BOOK STORE \u2013PROPERTY OF AN ENGLISHMAN IN CALICUT WHO DIED 150 YEARS AGO ) ..<br />\n<br />\nIn the city of York there will be a great collapse,<br />\n2 twin brothers torn apart by chaos<br />\nWhile the fortress falls; the great leader will succumb;<br />\nThird big war will begin when the big city is burning.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nOn the 11th day of the 9 month,<br />\nTwo metal birds will crash into two tall statues<br />\nIn the new city,<br />\nAnd the world will end soon after.<br />\n<br />\nWITH EVERY NEW EDITION JEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AND INSERTED MERRILY-- TO MAKE THE BOOK HOLD WATER..<br />\n<br />\nIT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO EXPOSE JEW NOSTRODAMUS ( A MERE FRONT OF ROTHSCHILD ) LIKE JEW HITLER ..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 52.95%..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">Note :&nbsp; Single engine\nhelicopters are NOT allowed to hover on&nbsp; Company chemical tankers carrying\nflammable or static accumulator chemicals unless the cargo tanks are inerted.\nThe helicopter winch wire can discharge an incendive static spark if it touches\nany metal part of ship. Helicopter\nlanding area is 3 concentric circles\u2014winching area is 2 concentric circles--. CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"color: #215868; font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><br /></span></i>\n<i><span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"color: #215868; font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: large;\">Below: I commanded this ship MAHARISHI KARVE ( SCI ) IN 1984 capable of carrying 1.3 lakh tonnes of oil--&nbsp; MY WIFE WAS ON BOARD&nbsp; ( not that female in the photo ).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"background-color: yellow; color: #215868; font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span lang=\"EN-GB\" style=\"background-color: yellow;
